40001001	A record of the ancestors of Jesus Christ , son of David , son of Abraham :
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac . Isaac was the father of Jacob . Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers .
40001003	Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah , whose mother was Tamar . Perez was the father of Hezron . Hezron was the father of Aram .
40001004	Aram was the father of Amminadab . Amminadab was the father of Nahshon . Nahshon was the father of Salmon .
40001005	Salmon was the father of Boaz , whose mother was Rahab . Boaz was the father of Obed , whose mother was Ruth . Obed was the father of Jesse .
40001006	Jesse was the father of David the king . David was the father of Solomon , whose mother had been the wife of Uriah .
40001007	Solomon was the father of Rehoboam . Rehoboam was the father of Abijah . Abijah was the father of Asaph .
40001008	Asaph was the father of Jehoshaphat . Jehoshaphat was the father of Joram . Joram was the father of Uzziah .
40001009	Uzziah was the father of Jotham . Jotham was the father of Ahaz . Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah .
40001010	Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh . Manasseh was the father of Amos . Amos was the father of Josiah .
40001011	Josiah was the father of Jechoniah and his brothers . This was at the time of the exile to Babylon .
40001012	After the exile to Babylon : Jechoniah was the father of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel .
40001013	Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud . Abiud was the father of Eliakim . Eliakim was the father of Azor .
40001014	Azor was the father of Zadok . Zadok was the father of Achim . Achim was the father of Eliud .
40001015	Eliud was the father of Eleazar . Eleazar was the father of Matthan . Matthan was the father of Jacob .
40001016	Jacob was the father of Joseph , the husband of Mary — of whom Jesus was born , who is called the Christ .
40001017	So there were fourteen generations from Abraham to David , fourteen generations from David to the exile to Babylon , and fourteen generations from the exile to Babylon to the Christ .
40001018	This is how the birth of Jesus Christ took place . When Mary his mother was engaged to Joseph , before they were married , she became pregnant by the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Joseph her husband was a righteous man . Because he didn’t want to humiliate her , he decided to call off their engagement quietly .
40001020	As he was thinking about this , an angel from the Lord appeared to him in a dream and said , " Joseph son of David , don’t be afraid to take Mary as your wife , because the child she carries was conceived by the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She will give birth to a son , and you will call him Jesus , because he will save his people from their sins . "
40001022	Now all of this took place so that what the Lord had spoken through the prophet would be fulfilled :
40001023	Look ! A virgin will become pregnant and give birth to a son , ( Emmanuel means " God with us . " )
40001024	When Joseph woke up , he did just as an angel from God commanded and took Mary as his wife .
40001025	But he didn’t have sexual relations with her until she gave birth to a son . Joseph called him Jesus .
40002001	After Jesus was born in Bethlehem in the territory of Judea during the rule of King Herod , magi came from the east to Jerusalem .
40002002	They asked , " Where is the newborn king of the Jews ? We’ve seen his star in the east , and we’ve come to honor him . "
40002003	When King Herod heard this , he was troubled , and everyone in Jerusalem was troubled with him .
40002004	He gathered all the chief priests and the legal experts and asked them where the Christ was to be born .
40002005	They said , " In Bethlehem of Judea , for this is what the prophet wrote :
40002006	You , Bethlehem , land of Judah ,
40002007	Then Herod secretly called for the magi and found out from them the time when the star had first appeared .
40002008	He sent them to Bethlehem , saying , " Go and search carefully for the child . When you’ve found him , report to me so that I too may go and honor him . "
40002009	When they heard the king , they went ; and look , the star they had seen in the east went ahead of them until it stood over the place where the child was .
40002010	When they saw the star , they were filled with joy .
40002011	They entered the house and saw the child with Mary his mother . Falling to their knees , they honored him . Then they opened their treasure chests and presented him with gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	Because they were warned in a dream not to return to Herod , they went back to their own country by another route .
40002013	When the magi had departed , an angel from the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream and said , " Get up . Take the child and his mother and escape to Egypt . Stay there until I tell you , for Herod will soon search for the child in order to kill him . "
40002014	Joseph got up and , during the night , took the child and his mother to Egypt .
40002015	He stayed there until Herod died . This fulfilled what the Lord had spoken through the prophet : I have called my son out of Egypt .
40002016	When Herod knew the magi had fooled him , he grew very angry . He sent soldiers to kill all the male children in Bethlehem and in all the surrounding territory who were two years old and younger , according to the time that he had learned from the magi .
40002017	This fulfilled the word spoken through Jeremiah the prophet :
40002018	A voice was heard in Ramah , weeping and much grieving .
40002019	After King Herod died , an angel from the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt .
40002020	" Get up , " the angel said , " and take the child and his mother and go to the land of Israel . Those who were trying to kill the child are dead . "
40002021	Joseph got up , took the child and his mother , and went to the land of Israel .
40002022	But when he heard that Archelaus ruled over Judea in place of his father Herod , Joseph was afraid to go there . Having been warned in a dream , he went to the area of Galilee .
40002023	He settled in a city called Nazareth so that what was spoken through the prophets might be fulfilled : He will be called a Nazarene .
40003001	In those days John the Baptist appeared in the desert of Judea announcing ,
40003002	" Change your hearts and lives ! Here comes the kingdom of heaven ! "
40003003	He was the one of whom Isaiah the prophet spoke when he said : The voice of one shouting in the wilderness ,
40003004	John wore clothes made of camel’s hair , with a leather belt around his waist . He ate locusts and wild honey .
40003005	People from Jerusalem , throughout Judea , and all around the Jordan River came to him .
40003006	As they confessed their sins , he baptized them in the Jordan River .
40003007	Many Pharisees and Sadducees came to be baptized by John . He said to them , " You children of snakes ! Who warned you to escape from the angry judgment that is coming soon ?
40003008	Produce fruit that shows you have changed your hearts and lives .
40003009	And don’t even think about saying to yourselves , Abraham is our father . I tell you that God is able to raise up Abraham’s children from these stones .
40003010	The ax is already at the root of the trees . Therefore , every tree that doesn’t produce good fruit will be chopped down and tossed into the fire .
40003011	I baptize with water those of you who have changed your hearts and lives . The one who is coming after me is stronger than I am . I’m not worthy to carry his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
40003012	The shovel he uses to sift the wheat from the husks is in his hands . He will clean out his threshing area and bring the wheat into his barn . But he will burn the husks with a fire that can’t be put out . "
40003013	At that time Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan River so that John would baptize him .
40003014	John tried to stop him and said , " I need to be baptized by you , yet you come to me ? "
40003015	Jesus answered , " Allow me to be baptized now . This is necessary to fulfill all righteousness . " So John agreed to baptize Jesus .
40003016	When Jesus was baptized , he immediately came up out of the water . Heaven was opened to him , and he saw the Spirit of God coming down like a dove and resting on him .
40003017	A voice from heaven said , " This is my Son whom I dearly love ; I find happiness in him . "
40004001	Then the Spirit led Jesus up into the wilderness so that the devil might tempt him .
40004002	After Jesus had fasted for forty days and forty nights , he was starving .
40004003	The tempter came to him and said , " Since you are God’s Son , command these stones to become bread . "
40004004	Jesus replied , " It’s written , People won’t live only by bread , but by every word spoken by God . "
40004005	After that the devil brought him into the holy city and stood him at the highest point of the temple . He said to him ,
40004006	" Since you are God’s Son , throw yourself down ; for it is written , I will command my angels concerning you , and they will take you up in their hands so that you won’t hit your foot on a stone . "
40004007	Jesus replied , " Again it’s written , Don’t test the Lord your God . "
40004008	Then the devil brought him to a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory .
40004009	He said , " I’ll give you all these if you bow down and worship me . "
40004010	Jesus responded , " Go away , Satan , because it’s written , You will worship the Lord your God and serve only him . "
40004011	The devil left him , and angels came and took care of him .
40004012	Now when Jesus heard that John was arrested , he went to Galilee .
40004013	He left Nazareth and settled in Capernaum , which lies alongside the sea in the area of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	This fulfilled what Isaiah the prophet said :
40004015	Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali ,
40004016	the people who lived in the dark have seen a great light ,
40004017	From that time Jesus began to announce , " Change your hearts and lives ! Here comes the kingdom of heaven ! "
40004018	As Jesus walked alongside the Galilee Sea , he saw two brothers , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew , throwing fishing nets into the sea , because they were fishermen .
40004019	" Come , follow me , " he said , " and I’ll show you how to fish for people . "
40004020	Right away , they left their nets and followed him .
40004021	Continuing on , he saw another set of brothers , James the son of Zebedee and his brother John . They were in a boat with Zebedee their father repairing their nets . Jesus called them and
40004022	immediately they left the boat and their father and followed him .
40004023	Jesus traveled throughout Galilee , teaching in their synagogues . He announced the good news of the kingdom and healed every disease and sickness among the people .
40004024	News about him spread throughout Syria . People brought to him all those who had various kinds of diseases , those in pain , those possessed by demons , those with epilepsy , and those who were paralyzed , and he healed them .
40004025	Large crowds followed him from Galilee , the Decapolis , Jerusalem , Judea , and from the areas beyond the Jordan River .
40005001	Now when Jesus saw the crowds , he went up a mountain . He sat down and his disciples came to him .
40005002	He taught them , saying :
40005003	“ Happy are people who are hopeless , because the kingdom of heaven is theirs .
40005004	“ Happy are people who grieve , because they will be made glad .
40005005	“ Happy are people who are humble , because they will inherit the earth .
40005006	“ Happy are people who are hungry and thirsty for righteousness , because they will be fed until they are full .
40005007	“ Happy are people who show mercy , because they will receive mercy .
40005008	“ Happy are people who have pure hearts , because they will see God .
40005009	“ Happy are people who make peace , because they will be called God’s children .
40005010	“ Happy are people whose lives are harassed because they are righteous , because the kingdom of heaven is theirs .
40005011	“ Happy are you when people insult you and harass you and speak all kinds of bad and false things about you , all because of me .
40005012	Be full of joy and be glad , because you have a great reward in heaven . In the same way , people harassed the prophets who came before you .
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth . But if salt loses its saltiness , how will it become salty again ? It’s good for nothing except to be thrown away and trampled under people’s feet .
40005014	You are the light of the world . A city on top of a hill can’t be hidden .
40005015	Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a basket . Instead , they put it on top of a lampstand , and it shines on all who are in the house .
40005016	In the same way , let your light shine before people , so they can see the good things you do and praise your Father who is in heaven .
40005017	“ Don’t even begin to think that I have come to do away with the Law and the Prophets . I haven’t come to do away with them but to fulfill them .
40005018	I say to you very seriously that as long as heaven and earth exist , neither the smallest letter nor even the smallest stroke of a pen will be erased from the Law until everything there becomes a reality .
40005019	Therefore , whoever ignores one of the least of these commands and teaches others to do the same will be called the lowest in the kingdom of heaven . But whoever keeps these commands and teaches people to keep them will be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	I say to you that unless your righteousness is greater than the righteousness of the legal experts and the Pharisees , you will never enter the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	“ You have heard that it was said to those who lived long ago , Don’t commit murder , and all who commit murder will be in danger of judgment .
40005022	But I say to you that everyone who is angry with their brother or sister will be in danger of judgment . If they say to their brother or sister , ‘ You idiot , ’ they will be in danger of being condemned by the governing council . And if they say , ‘ You fool , ’ they will be in danger of fiery hell .
40005023	Therefore , if you bring your gift to the altar and there remember that your brother or sister has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift at the altar and go . First make things right with your brother or sister and then come back and offer your gift .
40005025	Be sure to make friends quickly with your opponents while you are with them on the way to court . Otherwise , they will haul you before the judge , the judge will turn you over to the officer of the court , and you will be thrown into prison .
40005026	I say to you in all seriousness that you won’t get out of there until you’ve paid the very last penny .
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , Don’t commit adultery .
40005028	But I say to you that every man who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery in his heart .
40005029	And if your right eye causes you to fall into sin , tear it out and throw it away . It’s better that you lose a part of your body than that your whole body be thrown into hell .
40005030	And if your right hand causes you to fall into sin , chop it off and throw it away . It’s better that you lose a part of your body than that your whole body go into hell .
40005031	“ It was said , ‘ Whoever divorces his wife must give her a divorce certificate . ’
40005032	But I say to you that whoever divorces his wife except for sexual unfaithfulness forces her to commit adultery . And whoever marries a divorced woman commits adultery .
40005033	“ Again you have heard that it was said to those who lived long ago : Don’t make a false solemn pledge , but you should follow through on what you have pledged to the Lord .
40005034	But I say to you that you must not pledge at all . You must not pledge by heaven , because it’s God’s throne .
40005035	You must not pledge by the earth , because it’s God’s footstool . You must not pledge by Jerusalem , because it’s the city of the great king .
40005036	And you must not pledge by your head , because you can’t turn one hair white or black .
40005037	Let your yes mean yes , and your no mean no . Anything more than this comes from the evil one .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth .
40005039	But I say to you that you must not oppose those who want to hurt you . If people slap you on your right cheek , you must turn the left cheek to them as well .
40005040	When they wish to haul you to court and take your shirt , let them have your coat too .
40005041	When they force you to go one mile , go with them two .
40005042	Give to those who ask , and don’t refuse those who wish to borrow from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , You must love your neighbor and hate your enemy .
40005044	But I say to you , love your enemies and pray for those who harass you
40005045	so that you will be acting as children of your Father who is in heaven . He makes the sun rise on both the evil and the good and sends rain on both the righteous and the unrighteous .
40005046	If you love only those who love you , what reward do you have ? Don’t even the tax collectors do the same ?
40005047	And if you greet only your brothers and sisters , what more are you doing ? Don’t even the Gentiles do the same ?
40005048	Therefore , just as your heavenly Father is complete in showing love to everyone , so also you must be complete .
40006001	“ Be careful that you don’t practice your religion in front of people to draw their attention . If you do , you will have no reward from your Father who is in heaven .
40006002	“ Whenever you give to the poor , don’t blow your trumpet as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets so that they may get praise from people . I assure you , that’s the only reward they’ll get .
40006003	But when you give to the poor , don’t let your left hand know what your right hand is doing
40006004	so that you may give to the poor in secret . Your Father who sees what you do in secret will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , don’t be like hypocrites . They love to pray standing in the synagogues and on the street corners so that people will see them . I assure you , that’s the only reward they’ll get .
40006006	But when you pray , go to your room , shut the door , and pray to your Father who is present in that secret place . Your Father who sees what you do in secret will reward you .
40006007	“ When you pray , don’t pour out a flood of empty words , as the Gentiles do . They think that by saying many words they’ll be heard .
40006008	Don’t be like them , because your Father knows what you need before you ask .
40006009	Pray like this : Our Father who is in heaven , uphold the holiness of your name .
40006010	Bring in your kingdom so that your will is done on earth as it’s done in heaven .
40006011	Give us the bread we need for today .
40006012	Forgive us for the ways we have wronged you , just as we also forgive those who have wronged us .
40006013	And don’t lead us into temptation , but rescue us from the evil one .
40006014	“ If you forgive others their sins , your heavenly Father will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you don’t forgive others , neither will your Father forgive your sins .
40006016	“ And when you fast , don’t put on a sad face like the hypocrites . They distort their faces so people will know they are fasting . I assure you that they have their reward .
40006017	When you fast , brush your hair and wash your face .
40006018	Then you won’t look like you are fasting to people , but only to your Father who is present in that secret place . Your Father who sees in secret will reward you .
40006019	“ Stop collecting treasures for your own benefit on earth , where moth and rust eat them and where thieves break in and steal them .
40006020	Instead , collect treasures for yourselves in heaven , where moth and rust don’t eat them and where thieves don’t break in and steal them .
40006021	Where your treasure is , there your heart will be also .
40006022	“ The eye is the lamp of the body . Therefore , if your eye is healthy , your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But if your eye is bad , your whole body will be full of darkness . If then the light in you is darkness , how terrible that darkness will be !
40006024	No one can serve two masters . Either you will hate the one and love the other , or you will be loyal to the one and have contempt for the other . You cannot serve God and wealth .
40006025	“ Therefore , I say to you , don’t worry about your life , what you’ll eat or what you’ll drink , or about your body , what you’ll wear . Isn’t life more than food and the body more than clothes ?
40006026	Look at the birds in the sky . They don’t sow seed or harvest grain or gather crops into barns . Yet your heavenly Father feeds them . Aren’t you worth much more than they are ?
40006027	Who among you by worrying can add a single moment to your life ?
40006028	And why do you worry about clothes ? Notice how the lilies in the field grow . They don’t wear themselves out with work , and they don’t spin cloth .
40006029	But I say to you that even Solomon in all of his splendor wasn’t dressed like one of these .
40006030	If God dresses grass in the field so beautifully , even though it’s alive today and tomorrow it’s thrown into the furnace , won’t God do much more for you , you people of weak faith ?
40006031	Therefore , don’t worry and say , ‘ What are we going to eat ? ’ or ‘ What are we going to drink ? ’ or ‘ What are we going to wear ? ’
40006032	Gentiles long for all these things . Your heavenly Father knows that you need them .
40006033	Instead , desire first and foremost God’s kingdom and God’s righteousness , and all these things will be given to you as well .
40006034	Therefore , stop worrying about tomorrow , because tomorrow will worry about itself . Each day has enough trouble of its own .
40007001	“ Don’t judge , so that you won’t be judged .
40007002	You’ll receive the same judgment you give . Whatever you deal out will be dealt out to you .
40007003	Why do you see the splinter that’s in your brother’s or sister’s eye , but don’t notice the log in your own eye ?
40007004	How can you say to your brother or sister , ‘ Let me take the splinter out of your eye , ’ when there’s a log in your eye ?
40007005	You deceive yourself ! First take the log out of your eye , and then you’ll see clearly to take the splinter out of your brother’s or sister’s eye .
40007006	Don’t give holy things to dogs , and don’t throw your pearls in front of pigs . They will stomp on the pearls , then turn around and attack you .
40007007	“ Ask , and you will receive . Search , and you will find . Knock , and the door will be opened to you .
40007008	For everyone who asks , receives . Whoever seeks , finds . And to everyone who knocks , the door is opened .
40007009	Who among you will give your children a stone when they ask for bread ?
40007010	Or give them a snake when they ask for fish ?
40007011	If you who are evil know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your heavenly Father give good things to those who ask him .
40007012	Therefore , you should treat people in the same way that you want people to treat you ; this is the Law and the Prophets .
40007013	“ Go in through the narrow gate . The gate that leads to destruction is broad and the road wide , so many people enter through it .
40007014	But the gate that leads to life is narrow and the road difficult , so few people find it .
40007015	“ Watch out for false prophets . They come to you dressed like sheep , but inside they are vicious wolves .
40007016	You will know them by their fruit . Do people get bunches of grapes from thorny weeds , or do they get figs from thistles ?
40007017	In the same way , every good tree produces good fruit , and every rotten tree produces bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree can’t produce bad fruit . And a rotten tree can’t produce good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that doesn’t produce good fruit is chopped down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	Therefore , you will know them by their fruit .
40007021	“ Not everybody who says to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ will get into the kingdom of heaven . Only those who do the will of my Father who is in heaven will enter .
40007022	On the Judgment Day , many people will say to me , ‘ Lord , Lord , didn’t we prophesy in your name and expel demons in your name and do lots of miracles in your name ? ’
40007023	Then I’ll tell them , ‘ I’ve never known you . Get away from me , you people who do wrong . ’
40007024	" Everybody who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise builder who built a house on bedrock .
40007025	The rain fell , the floods came , and the wind blew and beat against that house . It didn’t fall because it was firmly set on bedrock .
40007026	But everybody who hears these words of mine and doesn’t put them into practice will be like a fool who built a house on sand .
40007027	The rain fell , the floods came , and the wind blew and beat against that house . It fell and was completely destroyed . "
40007028	When Jesus finished these words , the crowds were amazed at his teaching
40007029	because he was teaching them like someone with authority and not like their legal experts .
40008001	Now when Jesus had come down from the mountain , large crowds followed him .
40008002	A man with a skin disease came , kneeled before him , and said , " Lord , if you want , you can make me clean . "
40008003	Jesus reached out his hand and touched him , saying , " I do want to . Become clean . " Instantly his skin disease was cleansed .
40008004	Jesus said to him , " Don’t say anything to anyone . Instead , go and show yourself to the priest and offer the gift that Moses commanded . This will be a testimony to them . "
40008005	When Jesus went to Capernaum , a centurion approached ,
40008006	pleading with him , " Lord , my servant is flat on his back at home , paralyzed , and his suffering is awful . "
40008007	Jesus responded , " I’ll come and heal him . "
40008008	But the centurion replied , " Lord , I don’t deserve to have you come under my roof . Just say the word and my servant will be healed .
40008009	I’m a man under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes , and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and the servant does it . "
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was impressed and said to the people following him , " I say to you with all seriousness that even in Israel I haven’t found faith like this .
40008011	I say to you that there are many who will come from east and west and sit down to eat with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven .
40008012	But the children of the kingdom will be thrown outside into the darkness . People there will be weeping and grinding their teeth . "
40008013	Jesus said to the centurion , " Go ; it will be done for you just as you have believed . " And his servant was healed that very moment .
40008014	Jesus went home with Peter and saw Peter’s mother-in-law lying in bed with a fever .
40008015	He touched her hand , and the fever left her . Then she got up and served them .
40008016	That evening people brought to Jesus many who were demon-possessed . He threw the spirits out with just a word . He healed everyone who was sick .
40008017	This happened so that what Isaiah the prophet said would be fulfilled : He is the one who took our illnesses and carried away our diseases .
40008018	Now when Jesus saw the crowd , he ordered his disciples to go over to the other side of the lake .
40008019	A legal expert came and said to him , " Teacher , I’ll follow you wherever you go . "
40008020	Jesus replied , " Foxes have dens , and the birds in the sky have nests , but the Human One has no place to lay his head . "
40008021	Another man , one of his disciples , said to him , " Lord , first let me go and bury my father . "
40008022	But Jesus said to him , " Follow me , and let the dead bury their own dead . "
40008023	When Jesus got into a boat , his disciples followed him .
40008024	A huge storm arose on the lake so that waves were sloshing over the boat . But Jesus was asleep .
40008025	They came and woke him , saying , " Lord , rescue us ! We’re going to drown ! "

40013001	That day Jesus went out of the house and sat down beside the lake .

40013003	He said many things to them in parables : " A farmer went out to scatter seed .
40013004	As he was scattering seed , some fell on the path , and birds came and ate it .
40013005	Other seed fell on rocky ground where the soil was shallow . They sprouted immediately because the soil wasn’t deep .
40013006	But when the sun came up , it scorched the plants , and they dried up because they had no roots .
40013007	Other seed fell among thorny plants . The thorny plants grew and choked them .
40013008	Other seed fell on good soil and bore fruit , in one case a yield of one hundred to one , in another case a yield of sixty to one , and in another case a yield of thirty to one .
40013009	Everyone who has ears should pay attention . "
40013010	Jesus’ disciples came and said to him , " Why do you use parables when you speak to the crowds ? "

40013020	As for the seed that was spread on rocky ground , this refers to people who hear the word and immediately receive it joyfully .
40013021	Because they have no roots , they last for only a little while . When they experience distress or abuse because of the word , they immediately fall away .

40013023	As for what was planted on good soil , this refers to those who hear and understand , and bear fruit and produce — in one case a yield of one hundred to one , in another case a yield of sixty to one , and in another case a yield of thirty to one . "

41004005	Other seed fell on rocky ground where the soil was shallow . They sprouted immediately because the soil wasn’t deep .
41004006	When the sun came up , it scorched the plants ; and they dried up because they had no roots .
41004007	Other seed fell among thorny plants . The thorny plants grew and choked the seeds , and they produced nothing .
41004008	Other seed fell into good soil and bore fruit . Upon growing and increasing , the seed produced in one case a yield of thirty to one , in another case a yield of sixty to one , and in another case a yield of one hundred to one . "

41004016	Here’s the meaning of the seed that fell on rocky ground : When people hear the word , they immediately receive it joyfully .
41004017	Because they have no roots , they last for only a little while . When they experience distress or abuse because of the word , they immediately fall away .

41005001	Jesus and his disciples came to the other side of the lake , to the region of the Gerasenes .
41005002	As soon as Jesus got out of the boat , a man possessed by an evil spirit came out of the tombs .
41005003	This man lived among the tombs , and no one was ever strong enough to restrain him , even with a chain .
41005004	He had been secured many times with leg irons and chains , but he broke the chains and smashed the leg irons . No one was tough enough to control him .
41005005	Night and day in the tombs and the hills , he would howl and cut himself with stones .
41005006	When he saw Jesus from far away , he ran and knelt before him ,
41005007	shouting , " What have you to do with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? Swear to God that you won’t torture me ! "
41005008	He said this because Jesus had already commanded him , " Unclean spirit , come out of the man ! "
41005009	Jesus asked him , " What is your name ? " He responded , " Legion is my name , because we are many . "
41005010	They pleaded with Jesus not to send them out of that region .
41005011	A large herd of pigs was feeding on the hillside .
41005012	" Send us into the pigs ! " they begged . " Let us go into the pigs ! "
41005013	Jesus gave them permission , so the unclean spirits left the man and went into the pigs . Then the herd of about two thousand pigs rushed down the cliff into the lake and drowned .
41005014	Those who tended the pigs ran away and told the story in the city and in the countryside . People came to see what had happened .
41005015	They came to Jesus and saw the man who used to be demon-possessed . They saw the very man who had been filled with many demons sitting there fully dressed and completely sane , and they were filled with awe .
41005016	Those who had actually seen what had happened to the demon-possessed man told the others about the pigs .
41005017	Then they pleaded with Jesus to leave their region .
41005018	While he was climbing into the boat , the one who had been demon-possessed pleaded with Jesus to let him come along as one of his disciples .
41005019	But Jesus wouldn’t allow it . " Go home to your own people , " Jesus said , " and tell them what the Lord has done for you and how he has shown you mercy . "
41005020	The man went away and began to proclaim in the Ten Cities all that Jesus had done for him , and everyone was amazed .
41005021	Jesus crossed the lake again , and on the other side a large crowd gathered around him on the shore .
41005022	Jairus , one of the synagogue leaders , came forward . When he saw Jesus , he fell at his feet
41005023	and pleaded with him , " My daughter is about to die . Please , come and place your hands on her so that she can be healed and live . "
41005024	So Jesus went with him . A swarm of people were following Jesus , crowding in on him .
41005025	A woman was there who had been bleeding for twelve years .
41005026	She had suffered a lot under the care of many doctors , and had spent everything she had without getting any better . In fact , she had gotten worse .
41005027	Because she had heard about Jesus , she came up behind him in the crowd and touched his clothes .
41005028	She was thinking , If I can just touch his clothes , I’ll be healed .
41005029	Her bleeding stopped immediately , and she sensed in her body that her illness had been healed .
41005030	At that very moment , Jesus recognized that power had gone out from him . He turned around in the crowd and said , " Who touched my clothes ? "
41005031	His disciples said to him , " Don’t you see the crowd pressing against you ? Yet you ask , ‘ Who touched me ? ’ "
41005032	But Jesus looked around carefully to see who had done it .
41005033	The woman , full of fear and trembling , came forward . Knowing what had happened to her , she fell down in front of Jesus and told him the whole truth .
41005034	He responded , " Daughter , your faith has healed you ; go in peace , healed from your disease . "
41005035	While Jesus was still speaking with her , messengers came from the synagogue leader’s house , saying to Jairus , " Your daughter has died . Why bother the teacher any longer ? "
41005036	But Jesus overheard their report and said to the synagogue leader , " Don’t be afraid ; just keep trusting . "
41005037	He didn’t allow anyone to follow him except Peter , James , and John , James’ brother .
41005038	They came to the synagogue leader’s house , and he saw a commotion , with people crying and wailing loudly .
41005039	He went in and said to them , " What’s all this commotion and crying about ? The child isn’t dead . She’s only sleeping . "
41005040	They laughed at him , but he threw them all out . Then , taking the child’s parents and his disciples with him , he went to the room where the child was .
41005041	Taking her hand , he said to her , " Talitha koum , " which means , " Young woman , get up . "
41005042	Suddenly the young woman got up and began to walk around . She was 12 years old . They were shocked !
41005043	He gave them strict orders that no one should know what had happened . Then he told them to give her something to eat .
41006001	Jesus left that place and came to his hometown . His disciples followed him .
41006002	On the Sabbath , he began to teach in the synagogue . Many who heard him were surprised . " Where did this man get all this ? What’s this wisdom he’s been given ? What about the powerful acts accomplished through him ?
41006003	Isn’t this the carpenter ? Isn’t he Mary’s son and the brother of James , Joses , Judas , and Simon ? Aren’t his sisters here with us ? " They were repulsed by him and fell into sin .
41006004	Jesus said to them , " Prophets are honored everywhere except in their own hometowns , among their relatives , and in their own households . "
41006005	He was unable to do any miracles there , except that he placed his hands on a few sick people and healed them .
41006006	He was appalled by their disbelief . Then Jesus traveled through the surrounding villages teaching .
41006007	He called for the Twelve and sent them out in pairs . He gave them authority over unclean spirits .
41006008	He instructed them to take nothing for the journey except a walking stick — no bread , no bags , and no money in their belts .
41006009	He told them to wear sandals but not to put on two shirts .
41006010	He said , " Whatever house you enter , remain there until you leave that place .
41006011	If a place doesn’t welcome you or listen to you , as you leave , shake the dust off your feet as a witness against them . "
41006012	So they went out and proclaimed that people should change their hearts and lives .
41006013	They cast out many demons , and they anointed many sick people with olive oil and healed them .
41006014	Herod the king heard about these things , because the name of Jesus had become well-known . Some were saying , " John the Baptist has been raised from the dead , and this is why miraculous powers are at work through him . "
41006015	Others were saying , " He is Elijah . " Still others were saying , " He is a prophet like one of the ancient prophets . "
41006016	But when Herod heard these rumors , he said , " John , whom I beheaded , has been raised to life . "
41006017	He said this because Herod himself had arranged to have John arrested and put in prison because of Herodias , the wife of Herod’s brother Philip . Herod had married her ,
41006018	but John told Herod , " It’s against the law for you to marry your brother’s wife ! "
41006019	So Herodias had it in for John . She wanted to kill him , but she couldn’t .
41006020	This was because Herod respected John . He regarded him as a righteous and holy person , so he protected him . John’s words greatly confused Herod , yet he enjoyed listening to him .
41006021	Finally , the time was right . It was on one of Herod’s birthdays , when he had prepared a feast for his high-ranking officials and military officers and Galilee’s leading residents .
41006022	Herod’s daughter Herodias came in and danced , thrilling Herod and his dinner guests . The king said to the young woman , " Ask me whatever you wish , and I will give it to you . "
41006023	Then he swore to her , " Whatever you ask I will give to you , even as much as half of my kingdom . "
41006024	She left the banquet hall and said to her mother , " What should I ask for ? " " John the Baptist’s head , " Herodias replied .
41006025	Hurrying back to the ruler , she made her request : " I want you to give me John the Baptist’s head on a plate , right this minute . "
41006026	Although the king was upset , because of his solemn pledge and his guests , he didn’t want to refuse her .
41006027	So he ordered a guard to bring John’s head . The guard went to the prison , cut off John’s head ,
41006028	brought his head on a plate , and gave it to the young woman , and she gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s disciples heard what had happened , they came and took his dead body and laid it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles returned to Jesus and told him everything they had done and taught .
41006031	Many people were coming and going , so there was no time to eat . He said to the apostles , " Come by yourselves to a secluded place and rest for a while . "
41006032	They departed in a boat by themselves for a deserted place .
41006033	Many people saw them leaving and recognized them , so they ran ahead from all the cities and arrived before them .
41006034	When Jesus arrived and saw a large crowd , he had compassion on them because they were like sheep without a shepherd . Then he began to teach them many things .
41006035	Late in the day , his disciples came to him and said , " This is an isolated place , and it’s already late in the day .
41006036	Send them away so that they can go to the surrounding countryside and villages and buy something to eat for themselves . "
41006037	He replied , " You give them something to eat . " But they said to him , " Should we go off and buy bread worth almost eight months’ pay and give it to them to eat ? "
41006038	He said to them , " How much bread do you have ? Take a look . " After checking , they said , " Five loaves of bread and two fish . "
41006039	He directed the disciples to seat all the people in groups as though they were having a banquet on the green grass .
41006040	They sat down in groups of hundreds and fifties .
41006041	He took the five loaves and the two fish , looked up to heaven , blessed them , broke the loaves into pieces , and gave them to his disciples to set before the people . He also divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	Everyone ate until they were full .
41006043	They filled twelve baskets with the leftover pieces of bread and fish .
41006044	About five thousand had eaten .
41006045	Right then , Jesus made his disciples get into a boat and go ahead to the other side of the lake , toward Bethsaida , while he dismissed the crowd .
41006046	After saying good-bye to them , Jesus went up onto a mountain to pray .
41006047	Evening came and the boat was in the middle of the lake , but he was alone on the land .
41006048	He saw his disciples struggling . They were trying to row forward , but the wind was blowing against them . Very early in the morning , he came to them , walking on the lake . He intended to pass by them .
41006049	When they saw him walking on the lake , they thought he was a ghost and they screamed .
41006050	Seeing him was terrifying to all of them . Just then he spoke to them , " Be encouraged ! It’s me . Don’t be afraid . "
41006051	He got into the boat , and the wind settled down . His disciples were so baffled they were beside themselves .
41006052	That’s because they hadn’t understood about the loaves . Their hearts had been changed so that they resisted God’s ways .
41006053	When Jesus and his disciples had crossed the lake , they landed at Gennesaret , anchored the boat ,
41006054	and came ashore . People immediately recognized Jesus
41006055	and ran around that whole region bringing sick people on their mats to wherever they heard he was .
41006056	Wherever he went — villages , cities , or farming communities — they would place the sick in the marketplaces and beg him to allow them to touch even the hem of his clothing . Everyone who touched him was healed .
41007001	The Pharisees and some legal experts from Jerusalem gathered around Jesus .
41007002	They saw some of his disciples eating food with unclean hands . ( They were eating without first ritually purifying their hands through washing .
41007003	The Pharisees and all the Jews don’t eat without first washing their hands carefully . This is a way of observing the rules handed down by the elders .
41007004	Upon returning from the marketplace , they don’t eat without first immersing themselves . They observe many other rules that have been handed down , such as the washing of cups , jugs , pans , and sleeping mats . )
41007005	So the Pharisees and legal experts asked Jesus , " Why are your disciples not living according to the rules handed down by the elders but instead eat food with ritually unclean hands ? "
41007006	He replied , " Isaiah really knew what he was talking about when he prophesied about you hypocrites . He wrote , This people honors me with their lips , but their hearts are far away from me .
41007007	Their worship of me is empty since they teach instructions that are human words .
41007008	You ignore God’s commandment while holding on to rules created by humans and handed down to you . "
41007009	Jesus continued , " Clearly , you are experts at rejecting God’s commandment in order to establish these rules .
41007010	Moses said , Honor your father and your mother , and The person who speaks against father or mother will certainly be put to death .
41007011	But you say , ‘ If you tell your father or mother , " Everything I’m expected to contribute to you is corban ( that is , a gift I’m giving to God ) , "
41007012	then you are no longer required to care for your father or mother . ’
41007013	In this way you do away with God’s word in favor of the rules handed down to you , which you pass on to others . And you do a lot of other things just like that . "
41007014	Then Jesus called the crowd again and said , " Listen to me , all of you , and understand .
41007015	Nothing outside of a person can enter and contaminate a person in God’s sight ; rather , the things that come out of a person contaminate the person . "
41007017	After leaving the crowd , he entered a house where his disciples asked him about that riddle .
41007018	He said to them , " Don’t you understand either ? Don’t you know that nothing from the outside that enters a person has the power to contaminate ?
41007019	That’s because it doesn’t enter into the heart but into the stomach , and it goes out into the sewer . " By saying this , Jesus declared that no food could contaminate a person in God’s sight .
41007020	" It’s what comes out of a person that contaminates someone in God’s sight , " he said .
41007021	" It’s from the inside , from the human heart , that evil thoughts come : sexual sins , thefts , murders ,
41007022	adultery , greed , evil actions , deceit , unrestrained immorality , envy , insults , arrogance , and foolishness .
41007023	All these evil things come from the inside and contaminate a person in God’s sight . "
41007024	Jesus left that place and went into the region of Tyre . He didn’t want anyone to know that he had entered a house , but he couldn’t hide .
41007025	In fact , a woman whose young daughter was possessed by an unclean spirit heard about him right away . She came and fell at his feet .
41007026	The woman was Greek , Syrophoenician by birth . She begged Jesus to throw the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	He responded , " The children have to be fed first . It isn’t right to take the children’s bread and toss it to the dogs . "
41007028	But she answered , " Lord , even the dogs under the table eat the children’s crumbs . "
41007029	" Good answer ! " he said . " Go on home . The demon has already left your daughter . "
41007030	When she returned to her house , she found the child lying on the bed and the demon gone .
41007031	After leaving the region of Tyre , Jesus went through Sidon toward the Galilee Sea through the region of the Ten Cities .
41007032	Some people brought to him a man who was deaf and could hardly speak , and they begged him to place his hand on the man for healing .
41007033	Jesus took him away from the crowd by himself and put his fingers in the man’s ears . Then he spit and touched the man’s tongue .
41007034	Looking into heaven , Jesus sighed deeply and said , " Ephphatha , " which means , " Open up . "
41007035	At once , his ears opened , his twisted tongue was released , and he began to speak clearly .
41007036	Jesus gave the people strict orders not to tell anyone . But the more he tried to silence them , the more eagerly they shared the news .
41007037	People were overcome with wonder , saying , " He does everything well ! He even makes the deaf to hear and gives speech to those who can’t speak . "
41008001	In those days there was another large crowd with nothing to eat . Jesus called his disciples and told them ,
41008002	" I feel sorry for the crowd because they have been with me for three days and have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them away hungry to their homes , they won’t have enough strength to travel , for some have come a long distance . "
41008004	His disciples responded , " How can anyone get enough food in this wilderness to satisfy these people ? "
41008005	Jesus asked , " How much bread do you have ? " They said , " Seven loaves . "
41008006	He told the crowd to sit on the ground . He took the seven loaves , gave thanks , broke them apart , and gave them to his disciples to distribute ; and they gave the bread to the crowd .
41008007	They also had a few fish . He said a blessing over them , then gave them to the disciples to hand out also .
41008008	They ate until they were full . They collected seven baskets full of leftovers .
41008009	This was a crowd of about four thousand people ! Jesus sent them away ,
41008010	then got into a boat with his disciples and went over to the region of Dalmanutha .
41008011	The Pharisees showed up and began to argue with Jesus . To test him , they asked for a sign from heaven .
41008012	With an impatient sigh , Jesus said , " Why does this generation look for a sign ? I assure you that no sign will be given to it . "
41008013	Leaving them , he got back in the boat and crossed to the other side of the lake .
41008014	Jesus’ disciples had forgotten to bring any bread , so they had only one loaf with them in the boat .
41008015	He gave them strict orders : " Watch out and be on your guard for the yeast of the Pharisees as well as the yeast of Herod . "
41008016	The disciples discussed this among themselves , " He said this because we have no bread . "
41008017	Jesus knew what they were discussing and said , " Why are you talking about the fact that you don’t have any bread ? Don’t you grasp what has happened ? Don’t you understand ? Are your hearts so resistant to what God is doing ?
41008018	Don’t you have eyes ? Why can’t you see ? Don’t you have ears ? Why can’t you hear ? Don’t you remember ?
41008019	When I broke five loaves of bread for those five thousand people , how many baskets full of leftovers did you gather ? " They answered , " Twelve . "
41008020	" And when I broke seven loaves of bread for those four thousand people , how many baskets full of leftovers did you gather ? " They answered , " Seven . "
41008021	Jesus said to them , " And you still don’t understand ? "
41008022	Jesus and his disciples came to Bethsaida . Some people brought a blind man to Jesus and begged him to touch and heal him .
41008023	Taking the blind man’s hand , Jesus led him out of the village . After spitting on his eyes and laying his hands on the man , he asked him , " Do you see anything ? "
41008024	The man looked up and said , " I see people . They look like trees , only they are walking around . "
41008025	Then Jesus placed his hands on the man’s eyes again . He looked with his eyes wide open , his sight was restored , and he could see everything clearly .
41008026	Then Jesus sent him home , saying , " Don’t go into the village ! "
41008027	Jesus and his disciples went into the villages near Caesarea Philippi . On the way he asked his disciples , " Who do people say that I am ? "
41008028	They told him , " Some say John the Baptist , others Elijah , and still others one of the prophets . "
41008029	He asked them , " And what about you ? Who do you say that I am ? " Peter answered , " You are the Christ . "
41008030	Jesus ordered them not to tell anyone about him .
41008031	Then Jesus began to teach his disciples : " The Human One must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders , chief priests , and the legal experts , and be killed , and then , after three days , rise from the dead . "
41008032	He said this plainly . But Peter took hold of Jesus and , scolding him , began to correct him .
41008033	Jesus turned and looked at his disciples , then sternly corrected Peter : " Get behind me , Satan . You are not thinking God’s thoughts but human thoughts . "
41008034	After calling the crowd together with his disciples , Jesus said to them , " All who want to come after me must say no to themselves , take up their cross , and follow me .
41008035	All who want to save their lives will lose them . But all who lose their lives because of me and because of the good news will save them .
41008036	Why would people gain the whole world but lose their lives ?
41008037	What will people give in exchange for their lives ?
41008038	Whoever is ashamed of me and my words in this unfaithful and sinful generation , the Human One will be ashamed of that person when he comes in the Father’s glory with the holy angels . "
41009001	Jesus continued , " I assure you that some standing here won’t die before they see God’s kingdom arrive in power . "
41009002	Six days later Jesus took Peter , James , and John , and brought them to the top of a very high mountain where they were alone . He was transformed in front of them ,
41009003	and his clothes were amazingly bright , brighter than if they had been bleached white .
41009004	Elijah and Moses appeared and were talking with Jesus .
41009005	Peter reacted to all of this by saying to Jesus , " Rabbi , it’s good that we’re here . Let’s make three shrines — one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . "
41009006	He said this because he didn’t know how to respond , for the three of them were terrified .
41009007	Then a cloud overshadowed them , and a voice spoke from the cloud , " This is my Son , whom I dearly love . Listen to him ! "
41009008	Suddenly , looking around , they no longer saw anyone with them except Jesus .
41009009	As they were coming down the mountain , he ordered them not to tell anyone what they had seen until after the Human One had risen from the dead .
41009010	So they kept it to themselves , wondering , " What’s this ‘ rising from the dead ’ ? "
41009011	They asked Jesus , " Why do the legal experts say that Elijah must come first ? "
41009012	He answered , " Elijah does come first to restore all things . Why was it written that the Human One would suffer many things and be rejected ?
41009013	In fact , I tell you that Elijah has come , but they did to him whatever they wanted , just as it was written about him . "
41009014	When Jesus , Peter , James , and John approached the other disciples , they saw a large crowd surrounding them and legal experts arguing with them .
41009015	Suddenly the whole crowd caught sight of Jesus . They ran to greet him , overcome with excitement .
41009016	Jesus asked them , " What are you arguing about ? "
41009017	Someone from the crowd responded , " Teacher , I brought my son to you , since he has a spirit that doesn’t allow him to speak .
41009018	Wherever it overpowers him , it throws him into a fit . He foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and stiffens up . So I spoke to your disciples to see if they could throw it out , but they couldn’t . "
41009019	Jesus answered them , " You faithless generation , how long will I be with you ? How long will I put up with you ? Bring him to me . "
41009020	They brought him . When the spirit saw Jesus , it immediately threw the boy into a fit . He fell on the ground and rolled around , foaming at the mouth .
41009021	Jesus asked his father , " How long has this been going on ? " He said , " Since he was a child .
41009022	It has often thrown him into a fire or into water trying to kill him . If you can do anything , help us ! Show us compassion ! "
41009023	Jesus said to him , " ‘ If you can do anything ’ ? All things are possible for the one who has faith . "
41009024	At that the boy’s father cried out , " I have faith ; help my lack of faith ! "
41009025	Noticing that the crowd had surged together , Jesus spoke harshly to the unclean spirit , " Mute and deaf spirit , I command you to come out of him and never enter him again . "
41009026	After screaming and shaking the boy horribly , the spirit came out . The boy seemed to be dead ; in fact , several people said that he had died .
41009027	But Jesus took his hand , lifted him up , and he arose .
41009028	After Jesus went into a house , his disciples asked him privately , " Why couldn’t we throw this spirit out ? "
41009029	Jesus answered , " Throwing this kind of spirit out requires prayer . "
41009030	From there Jesus and his followers went through Galilee , but he didn’t want anyone to know it .
41009031	This was because he was teaching his disciples , " The Human One will be delivered into human hands . They will kill him . Three days after he is killed he will rise up . "
41009032	But they didn’t understand this kind of talk , and they were afraid to ask him .
41009033	They entered Capernaum . When they had come into a house , he asked them , " What were you arguing about during the journey ? "
41009034	They didn’t respond , since on the way they had been debating with each other about who was the greatest .
41009035	He sat down , called the Twelve , and said to them , " Whoever wants to be first must be least of all and the servant of all . "
41009036	Jesus reached for a little child , placed him among the Twelve , and embraced him . Then he said ,
41009037	" Whoever welcomes one of these children in my name welcomes me ; and whoever welcomes me isn’t actually welcoming me but rather the one who sent me . "
41009038	John said to Jesus , “ Teacher , we saw someone throwing demons out in your name , and we tried to stop him because he wasn’t following us . ”
41009039	Jesus replied , “ Don’t stop him . No one who does powerful acts in my name can quickly turn around and curse me .
41009040	Whoever isn’t against us is for us .
41009041	I assure you that whoever gives you a cup of water to drink because you belong to Christ will certainly be rewarded .
41009042	" As for whoever causes these little ones who believe in me to trip and fall into sin , it would be better for them to have a huge stone hung around their necks and to be thrown into the lake .
41009043	If your hand causes you to fall into sin , chop it off . It’s better for you to enter into life crippled than to go away with two hands into the fire of hell , which can’t be put out .
41009045	If your foot causes you to fall into sin , chop it off . It’s better for you to enter life lame than to be thrown into hell with two feet .
41009047	If your eye causes you to fall into sin , tear it out . It’s better for you to enter God’s kingdom with one eye than to be thrown into hell with two .
41009048	That’s a place where worms don’t die and the fire never goes out .
41009049	Everyone will be salted with fire .
41009050	Salt is good ; but if salt loses its saltiness , how will it become salty again ? Maintain salt among yourselves and keep peace with each other . "
41010001	Jesus left that place and went beyond the Jordan and into the region of Judea . Crowds gathered around him again and , as usual , he taught them .
41010002	Some Pharisees came and , trying to test him , they asked , " Does the Law allow a man to divorce his wife ? "
41010003	Jesus answered , " What did Moses command you ? "
41010004	They said , " Moses allowed a man to write a divorce certificate and to divorce his wife . "
41010005	Jesus said to them , " He wrote this commandment for you because of your unyielding hearts .
41010006	At the beginning of creation , God made them male and female .
41010007	Because of this , a man should leave his father and mother and be joined together with his wife ,
41010008	and the two will be one flesh . So they are no longer two but one flesh .
41010009	Therefore , humans must not pull apart what God has put together . "
41010010	Inside the house , the disciples asked him again about this .
41010011	He said to them , " Whoever divorces his wife and marries another commits adultery against her ;
41010012	and if a wife divorces her husband and marries another , she commits adultery . "
41010013	People were bringing children to Jesus so that he would bless them . But the disciples scolded them .
41010014	When Jesus saw this , he grew angry and said to them , " Allow the children to come to me . Don’t forbid them , because God’s kingdom belongs to people like these children .
41010015	I assure you that whoever doesn’t welcome God’s kingdom like a child will never enter it . "
41010016	Then he hugged the children and blessed them .
41010017	As Jesus continued down the road , a man ran up , knelt before him , and asked , " Good Teacher , what must I do to obtain eternal life ? "
41010018	Jesus replied , " Why do you call me good ? No one is good except the one God .
41010019	You know the commandments : Don’t commit murder . Don’t commit adultery . Don’t steal . Don’t give false testimony . Don’t cheat . Honor your father and mother . "
41010020	" Teacher , " he responded , " I’ve kept all of these things since I was a boy . "
41010021	Jesus looked at him carefully and loved him . He said , " You are lacking one thing . Go , sell what you own , and give the money to the poor . Then you will have treasure in heaven . And come , follow me . "
41010022	But the man was dismayed at this statement and went away saddened , because he had many possessions .
41010023	Looking around , Jesus said to his disciples , " It will be very hard for the wealthy to enter God’s kingdom ! "
41010024	His words startled the disciples , so Jesus told them again , " Children , it’s difficult to enter God’s kingdom !

41015033	From noon until three in the afternoon the whole earth was dark .

41015042	Since it was late in the afternoon on Preparation Day , just before the Sabbath ,
41015043	Joseph from Arimathea dared to approach Pilate and ask for Jesus’ body . ( Joseph was a prominent council member who also eagerly anticipated the coming of God’s kingdom . )
41015044	Pilate wondered if Jesus was already dead . He called the centurion and asked him whether Jesus had already died .
41015045	When he learned from the centurion that Jesus was dead , Pilate gave the dead body to Joseph .

41016001	When the Sabbath was over , Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought spices so that they could go and anoint Jesus’ dead body .
41016002	Very early on the first day of the week , just after sunrise , they came to the tomb .
41016003	They were saying to each other , " Who’s going to roll the stone away from the entrance for us ? "
41016004	When they looked up , they saw that the stone had been rolled away . ( And it was a very large stone ! )
41016005	Going into the tomb , they saw a young man in a white robe seated on the right side ; and they were startled .

41016008	Overcome with terror and dread , they fled from the tomb . They said nothing to anyone , because they were afraid .

41016018	They will pick up snakes with their hands . If they drink anything poisonous , it will not hurt them . They will place their hands on the sick , and they will get well . "
41016019	After the Lord Jesus spoke to them , he was lifted up into heaven and sat down on the right side of God .

42001001	Many people have already applied themselves to the task of compiling an account of the events that have been fulfilled among us .

42001003	Now , after having investigated everything carefully from the beginning , I have also decided to write a carefully ordered account for you , most honorable Theophilus .

42001005	During the rule of King Herod of Judea there was a priest named Zechariah who belonged to the priestly division of Abijah . His wife Elizabeth was a descendant of Aaron .
42001006	They were both righteous before God , blameless in their observance of all the Lord’s commandments and regulations .
42001007	They had no children because Elizabeth was unable to become pregnant and they both were very old .
42001008	One day Zechariah was serving as a priest before God because his priestly division was on duty .
42001009	Following the customs of priestly service , he was chosen by lottery to go into the Lord’s sanctuary and burn incense .
42001010	All the people who gathered to worship were praying outside during this hour of incense offering .
42001011	An angel from the Lord appeared to him , standing to the right of the altar of incense .
42001012	When Zechariah saw the angel , he was startled and overcome with fear .
42001013	The angel said , " Don’t be afraid , Zechariah . Your prayers have been heard . Your wife Elizabeth will give birth to your son and you must name him John .

42001020	Know this : What I have spoken will come true at the proper time . But because you didn’t believe , you will remain silent , unable to speak until the day when these things happen . "

42005001	One day Jesus was standing beside Lake Gennesaret when the crowd pressed in around him to hear God’s word .
42005002	Jesus saw two boats sitting by the lake . The fishermen had gone ashore and were washing their nets .
42005003	Jesus boarded one of the boats , the one that belonged to Simon , then asked him to row out a little distance from the shore . Jesus sat down and taught the crowds from the boat .
42005004	When he finished speaking to the crowds , he said to Simon , " Row out farther , into the deep water , and drop your nets for a catch . "
42005005	Simon replied , " Master , we’ve worked hard all night and caught nothing . But because you say so , I’ll drop the nets . "
42005006	So they dropped the nets and their catch was so huge that their nets were splitting .
42005007	They signaled for their partners in the other boat to come and help them . They filled both boats so full that they were about to sink .
42005008	When Simon Peter saw the catch , he fell at Jesus’ knees and said , " Leave me , Lord , for I’m a sinner ! "
42005009	Peter and those with him were overcome with amazement because of the number of fish they caught .
42005010	James and John , Zebedee’s sons , were Simon’s partners and they were amazed too . Jesus said to Simon , " Don’t be afraid . From now on , you will be fishing for people . "
42005011	As soon as they brought the boats to the shore , they left everything and followed Jesus .
42005012	Jesus was in one of the towns where there was also a man covered with a skin disease . When he saw Jesus , he fell on his face and begged , " Lord , if you want , you can make me clean . "
42005013	Jesus reached out his hand , touched him , and said , " I do want to . Be clean . " Instantly , the skin disease left him .
42005014	Jesus ordered him not to tell anyone . " Instead , " Jesus said , " go and show yourself to the priest and make an offering for your cleansing , as Moses instructed . This will be a testimony to them . "
42005015	News of him spread even more and huge crowds gathered to listen and to be healed from their illnesses .
42005016	But Jesus would withdraw to deserted places for prayer .
42005017	One day when Jesus was teaching , Pharisees and legal experts were sitting nearby . They had come from every village in Galilee and Judea , and from Jerusalem . Now the power of the Lord was with Jesus to heal .
42005018	Some men were bringing a man who was paralyzed , lying on a cot . They wanted to carry him in and place him before Jesus ,
42005019	but they couldn’t reach him because of the crowd . So they took him up on the roof and lowered him — cot and all — through the roof tiles into the crowded room in front of Jesus .
42005020	When Jesus saw their faith , he said , " Friend , your sins are forgiven . "
42005021	The legal experts and Pharisees began to mutter among themselves , " Who is this who insults God ? Only God can forgive sins ! "
42005022	Jesus recognized what they were discussing and responded , " Why do you fill your minds with these questions ?
42005023	Which is easier — to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
42005024	But so that you will know that the Human One has authority on the earth to forgive sins " — Jesus now spoke to the man who was paralyzed , " I say to you , get up , take your cot , and go home . "
42005025	Right away , the man stood before them , picked up his cot , and went home , praising God .
42005026	All the people were beside themselves with wonder . Filled with awe , they glorified God , saying , " We’ve seen unimaginable things today . "
42005027	Afterward , Jesus went out and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at a kiosk for collecting taxes . Jesus said to him , " Follow me . "
42005028	Levi got up , left everything behind , and followed him .
42005029	Then Levi threw a great banquet for Jesus in his home . A large number of tax collectors and others sat down to eat with them .
42005030	The Pharisees and their legal experts grumbled against his disciples . They said , " Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? "
42005031	Jesus answered , " Healthy people don’t need a doctor , but sick people do .
42005032	I didn’t come to call righteous people but sinners to change their hearts and lives . "
42005033	Some people said to Jesus , " The disciples of John fast often and pray frequently . The disciples of the Pharisees do the same , but your disciples are always eating and drinking . "
42005034	Jesus replied , " You can’t make the wedding guests fast while the groom is with them , can you ?
42005035	The days will come when the groom will be taken from them , and then they will fast . "
42005036	Then he told them a parable . " No one tears a patch from a new garment to patch an old garment . Otherwise , the new garment would be ruined , and the new patch wouldn’t match the old garment .
42005037	Nobody pours new wine into old wineskins . If they did , the new wine would burst the wineskins , the wine would spill , and the wineskins would be ruined .
42005038	Instead , new wine must be put into new wineskins .
42005039	No one who drinks a well-aged wine wants new wine , but says , ‘ The well-aged wine is better . ’ "
42006001	One Sabbath , as Jesus was going through the wheat fields , his disciples were picking the heads of wheat , rubbing them in their hands , and eating them .
42006002	Some Pharisees said , " Why are you breaking the Sabbath law ? "
42006003	Jesus replied , " Haven’t you read what David and his companions did when they were hungry ?
42006004	He broke the Law by going into God’s house and eating the bread of the presence , which only the priests can eat . He also gave some of the bread to his companions . "
42006005	Then he said to them , " The Human One is Lord of the Sabbath . "
42006006	On another Sabbath , Jesus entered a synagogue to teach . A man was there whose right hand was withered .
42006007	The legal experts and the Pharisees were watching him closely to see if he would heal on the Sabbath . They were looking for a reason to bring charges against him .
42006008	Jesus knew their thoughts , so he said to the man with the withered hand , " Get up and stand in front of everyone . " He got up and stood there .
42006009	Jesus said to the legal experts and Pharisees , " Here’s a question for you : Is it legal on the Sabbath to do good or to do evil , to save life or to destroy it ? "
42006010	Looking around at them all , he said to the man , " Stretch out your hand . " So he did and his hand was made healthy .
42006011	They were furious and began talking with each other about what to do to Jesus .
42006012	During that time , Jesus went out to the mountain to pray , and he prayed to God all night long .
42006013	At daybreak , he called together his disciples . He chose twelve of them whom he called apostles :
42006014	Simon , whom he named Peter ; his brother Andrew ; James ; John ; Philip ; Bartholomew ;
42006015	Matthew ; Thomas ; James the son of Alphaeus ; Simon , who was called a zealot ;
42006016	Judas the son of James ; and Judas Iscariot , who became a traitor .
42006017	Jesus came down from the mountain with them and stood on a large area of level ground . A great company of his disciples and a huge crowd of people from all around Judea and Jerusalem and the area around Tyre and Sidon joined him there .
42006018	They came to hear him and to be healed from their diseases , and those bothered by unclean spirits were healed .
42006019	The whole crowd wanted to touch him , because power was going out from him and he was healing everyone .
42006020	Jesus raised his eyes to his disciples and said : “ Happy are you who are poor , because God’s kingdom is yours .
42006021	Happy are you who hunger now , because you will be satisfied . Happy are you who weep now , because you will laugh .
42006022	Happy are you when people hate you , reject you , insult you , and condemn your name as evil because of the Human One .
42006023	Rejoice when that happens ! Leap for joy because you have a great reward in heaven . Their ancestors did the same things to the prophets .
42006024	But how terrible for you who are rich , because you have already received your comfort .
42006025	How terrible for you who have plenty now , because you will be hungry . How terrible for you who laugh now , because you will mourn and weep .
42006026	How terrible for you when all speak well of you . Their ancestors did the same things to the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I say to you who are willing to hear : Love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you .
42006028	Bless those who curse you . Pray for those who mistreat you .
42006029	If someone slaps you on the cheek , offer the other one as well . If someone takes your coat , don’t withhold your shirt either .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks and don’t demand your things back from those who take them .
42006031	Treat people in the same way that you want them to treat you .
42006032	“ If you love those who love you , why should you be commended ? Even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	If you do good to those who do good to you , why should you be commended ? Even sinners do that .
42006034	If you lend to those from whom you expect repayment , why should you be commended ? Even sinners lend to sinners expecting to be paid back in full .
42006035	Instead , love your enemies , do good , and lend expecting nothing in return . If you do , you will have a great reward . You will be acting the way children of the Most High act , for he is kind to ungrateful and wicked people .
42006036	Be compassionate just as your Father is compassionate .
42006037	" Don’t judge , and you won’t be judged . Don’t condemn , and you won’t be condemned . Forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you . A good portion — packed down , firmly shaken , and overflowing — will fall into your lap . The portion you give will determine the portion you receive in return . "
42006039	Jesus also told them a riddle . " A blind person can’t lead another blind person , right ? Won’t they both fall into a ditch ?
42006040	Disciples aren’t greater than their teacher , but whoever is fully prepared will be like their teacher .
42006041	Why do you see the splinter in your brother’s or sister’s eye but don’t notice the log in your own eye ?
42006042	How can you say to your brother or sister , ‘ Brother , Sister , let me take the splinter out of your eye , ’ when you don’t see the log in your own eye ? You deceive yourselves ! First take the log out of your eye , and then you will see clearly to take the splinter out of your brother’s or sister’s eye .
42006043	“ A good tree doesn’t produce bad fruit , nor does a bad tree produce good fruit .
42006044	Each tree is known by its own fruit . People don’t gather figs from thorny plants , nor do they pick grapes from prickly bushes .
42006045	A good person produces good from the good treasury of the inner self , while an evil person produces evil from the evil treasury of the inner self . The inner self overflows with words that are spoken .
42006046	" Why do you call me ‘ Lord , Lord ’ and don’t do what I say ?
42006047	I’ll show what it’s like when someone comes to me , hears my words , and puts them into practice .
42006048	It’s like a person building a house by digging deep and laying the foundation on bedrock . When the flood came , the rising water smashed against that house , but the water couldn’t shake the house because it was well built .
42006049	But those who don’t put into practice what they hear are like a person who built a house without a foundation . The floodwater smashed against it and it collapsed instantly . It was completely destroyed . "
42007001	After Jesus finished presenting all his words among the people , he entered Capernaum .
42007002	A centurion had a servant who was very important to him , but the servant was ill and about to die .
42007003	When the centurion heard about Jesus , he sent some Jewish elders to Jesus to ask him to come and heal his servant .
42007004	When they came to Jesus , they earnestly pleaded with Jesus . " He deserves to have you do this for him , " they said .
42007005	" He loves our people and he built our synagogue for us . "
42007006	Jesus went with them . He had almost reached the house when the centurion sent friends to say to Jesus , " Lord , don’t be bothered . I don’t deserve to have you come under my roof .
42007007	In fact , I didn’t even consider myself worthy to come to you . Just say the word and my servant will be healed .
42007008	I’m also a man appointed under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to one , ‘ Go , ’ and he goes , and to another , ‘ Come , ’ and he comes . I say to my servant , ‘ Do this , ’ and the servant does it . "
42007009	When Jesus heard these words , he was impressed with the centurion . He turned to the crowd following him and said , " I tell you , even in Israel I haven’t found faith like this . "
42007010	When the centurion’s friends returned to his house , they found the servant restored to health .
42007011	A little later Jesus went to a city called Nain . His disciples and a great crowd traveled with him .
42007012	As he approached the city gate , a dead man was being carried out . He was his mother’s only son , and she was a widow . A large crowd from the city was with her .
42007013	When he saw her , the Lord had compassion for her and said , " Don’t cry . "
42007014	He stepped forward and touched the stretcher on which the dead man was being carried . Those carrying him stood still . Jesus said , " Young man , I say to you , get up . "
42007015	The dead man sat up and began to speak , and Jesus gave him to his mother .
