42007017	This news about Jesus spread throughout Judea and the surrounding region .
42007018	John’s disciples informed him about all these things . John called two of his disciples
42007019	and sent them to the Lord . They were to ask him , " Are you the one who is coming , or should we look for someone else ? "
42007020	When they reached Jesus , they said , " John the Baptist sent us to you . He asks , ‘ Are you the one who is coming , or should we look for someone else ? ’ "
42007021	Right then , Jesus healed many of their diseases , illnesses , and evil spirits , and he gave sight to a number of blind people .
42007022	Then he replied to John’s disciples , " Go , report to John what you have seen and heard . Those who were blind are able to see . Those who were crippled now walk . People with skin diseases are cleansed . Those who were deaf now hear . Those who were dead are raised up . And good news is preached to the poor .
42007023	Happy is anyone who doesn’t stumble along the way because of me . "
42007024	After John’s messengers were gone , Jesus spoke to the crowds about John . " What did you go out into the wilderness to see ? A stalk blowing in the wind ?
42007025	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed up in refined clothes ? Look , those who dress in fashionable clothes and live in luxury are in royal palaces .
42007026	What did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
42007027	He is the one of whom it’s written : Look , I’m sending my messenger before you , who will prepare your way before you .
42007028	I tell you that no greater human being has ever been born than John . Yet whoever is least in God’s kingdom is greater than he . "
42007029	Everyone who heard this , including the tax collectors , acknowledged God’s justice because they had been baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and legal experts rejected God’s will for themselves because they hadn’t been baptized by John .
42007031	" To what will I compare the people of this generation ? " Jesus asked . " What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace calling out to each other , ‘ We played the flute for you and you didn’t dance . We sang a funeral song and you didn’t cry . ’
42007033	John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine , and you say , ‘ He has a demon . ’
42007034	Yet the Human One came eating and drinking , and you say , ‘ Look , a glutton and a drunk , a friend of tax collectors and sinners . ’
42007035	But wisdom is proved to be right by all her descendants . "
42007036	One of the Pharisees invited Jesus to eat with him . After he entered the Pharisee’s home , he took his place at the table .
42007037	Meanwhile , a woman from the city , a sinner , discovered that Jesus was dining in the Pharisee’s house . She brought perfumed oil in a vase made of alabaster .
42007038	Standing behind him at his feet and crying , she began to wet his feet with her tears . She wiped them with her hair , kissed them , and poured the oil on them .
42007039	When the Pharisee who had invited Jesus saw what was happening , he said to himself , If this man were a prophet , he would know what kind of woman is touching him . He would know that she is a sinner .
42007040	Jesus replied , " Simon , I have something to say to you . " " Teacher , speak , " he said .
42007041	" A certain lender had two debtors . One owed enough money to pay five hundred people for a day’s work . The other owed enough money for fifty .
42007042	When they couldn’t pay , the lender forgave the debts of them both . Which of them will love him more ? "
42007043	Simon replied , " I suppose the one who had the largest debt canceled . " Jesus said , " You have judged correctly . "
42007044	Jesus turned to the woman and said to Simon , " Do you see this woman ? When I entered your home , you didn’t give me water for my feet , but she wet my feet with tears and wiped them with her hair .
42007045	You didn’t greet me with a kiss , but she hasn’t stopped kissing my feet since I came in .
42007046	You didn’t anoint my head with oil , but she has poured perfumed oil on my feet .
42007047	This is why I tell you that her many sins have been forgiven ; so she has shown great love . The one who is forgiven little loves little . "
42007048	Then Jesus said to her , " Your sins are forgiven . "
42007049	The other table guests began to say among themselves , " Who is this person that even forgives sins ? "
42007050	Jesus said to the woman , " Your faith has saved you . Go in peace . "
42008001	Soon afterward , Jesus traveled through the cities and villages , preaching and proclaiming the good news of God’s kingdom . The Twelve were with him ,
42008002	along with some women who had been healed of evil spirits and sicknesses . Among them were Mary Magdalene ( from whom seven demons had been thrown out ) ,
42008003	Joanna ( the wife of Herod’s servant Chuza ) , Susanna , and many others who provided for them out of their resources .
42008004	When a great crowd was gathering and people were coming to Jesus from one city after another , he spoke to them in a parable :
42008005	" A farmer went out to scatter his seed . As he was scattering it , some fell on the path where it was crushed , and the birds in the sky came and ate it .
42008006	Other seed fell on rock . As it grew , it dried up because it had no moisture .
42008007	Other seed fell among thorny plants . The thorns grew with the plants and choked them .
42008008	Still other seed landed on good soil . When it grew , it produced one hundred times more grain than was scattered . " As he said this , he called out , " Everyone who has ears should pay attention . "
42008009	His disciples asked him what this parable meant .
42008010	He said , “ You have been given the mysteries of God’s kingdom , but these mysteries come to everyone else in parables so that when they see , they can’t see , and when they hear , they can’t understand .
42008011	“ The parable means this : The seed is God’s word .
42008012	The seed on the path are those who hear , but then the devil comes and steals the word from their hearts so that they won’t believe and be saved .
42008013	The seed on the rock are those who receive the word joyfully when they hear it , but they have no root . They believe for a while but fall away when they are tempted .
42008014	As for the seed that fell among thorny plants , these are the ones who , as they go about their lives , are choked by the concerns , riches , and pleasures of life , and their fruit never matures .
42008015	The seed that fell on good soil are those who hear the word and commit themselves to it with a good and upright heart . Through their resolve , they bear fruit .
42008016	" No one lights a lamp and then covers it with a bowl or puts it under a bed . Instead , they put it on top of a lampstand so that those who enter can see the light .
42008017	Nothing is hidden that won’t be exposed . Nor is anything concealed that won’t be made known and brought to the light .
42008018	Therefore , listen carefully . Those who have will receive more , but as for those who don’t have , even what they seem to have will be taken away from them . "
42008019	Jesus’ mother and brothers came to him but were unable to reach him because of the crowd .
42008020	Someone told him , " Your mother and brothers are standing outside , wanting to see you . "
42008021	He replied , " My mother and brothers are those who listen to God’s word and do it . "
42008022	One day Jesus and his disciples boarded a boat . He said to them , " Let’s cross over to the other side of the lake . " So they set sail .
42008023	While they were sailing , he fell asleep . Gale-force winds swept down on the lake . The boat was filling up with water and they were in danger .
42008024	So they went and woke Jesus , shouting , " Master , Master , we’re going to drown ! " But he got up and gave orders to the wind and the violent waves . The storm died down and it was calm .
42008025	He said to his disciples , " Where is your faith ? " Filled with awe and wonder , they said to each other , " Who is this ? He commands even the winds and the water , and they obey him ! "
42008026	Jesus and his disciples sailed to the Gerasenes’ land , which is across the lake from Galilee .
42008027	As soon as Jesus got out of the boat , a certain man met him . The man was from the city and was possessed by demons . For a long time , he had lived among the tombs , naked and homeless .
42008028	When he saw Jesus , he shrieked and fell down before him . Then he shouted , " What have you to do with me , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? I beg you , don’t torture me ! "
42008029	He said this because Jesus had already commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . Many times it had taken possession of him , so he would be bound with leg irons and chains and placed under guard . But he would break his restraints , and the demon would force him into the wilderness .
42008030	Jesus asked him , " What is your name ? " " Legion , " he replied , because many demons had entered him .
42008031	They pleaded with him not to order them to go back into the abyss .
42008032	A large herd of pigs was feeding on the hillside . The demons begged Jesus to let them go into the pigs . Jesus gave them permission ,
42008033	and the demons left the man and entered the pigs . The herd rushed down the cliff into the lake and drowned .
42008034	When those who tended the pigs saw what happened , they ran away and told the story in the city and in the countryside .
42008035	People came to see what had happened . They came to Jesus and found the man from whom the demons had gone . He was sitting at Jesus’ feet , fully dressed and completely sane . They were filled with awe .
42008036	Those people who had actually seen what had happened told them how the demon-possessed man had been delivered .
42008037	Then everyone gathered from the region of the Gerasenes asked Jesus to leave their area because they were overcome with fear . So he got into the boat and returned across the lake .
42008038	The man from whom the demons had gone begged to come along with Jesus as one of his disciples . Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	" Return home and tell the story of what God has done for you . " So he went throughout the city proclaiming what Jesus had done for him .
42008040	When Jesus returned , the crowd welcomed him , for they had been waiting for him .
42008041	A man named Jairus , who was a synagogue leader , came and fell at Jesus’ feet . He pleaded with Jesus to come to his house
42008042	because his only daughter , a twelve-year-old , was dying . As Jesus moved forward , he faced smothering crowds .
42008043	A woman was there who had been bleeding for twelve years . She had spent her entire livelihood on doctors , but no one could heal her .
42008044	She came up behind him and touched the hem of his clothes , and at once her bleeding stopped .
42008045	" Who touched me ? " Jesus asked . When everyone denied it , Peter said , " Master , the crowds are surrounding you and pressing in on you ! "
42008046	But Jesus said , " Someone touched me . I know that power has gone out from me . "
42008047	When the woman saw that she couldn’t escape notice , she came trembling and fell before Jesus . In front of everyone , she explained why she had touched him and how she had been immediately healed .
42008048	" Daughter , your faith has healed you , " Jesus said . " Go in peace . "
42008049	While Jesus was still speaking , someone came from the synagogue leader’s house , saying to Jairus , " Your daughter has died . Don’t bother the teacher any longer . "
42008050	When Jesus heard this , he responded , " Don’t be afraid ; just keep trusting , and she will be healed . "
42008051	When he came to the house , he didn’t allow anyone to enter with him except Peter , John , and James , and the child’s father and mother .
42008052	They were all crying and mourning for her , but Jesus said , " Don’t cry . She isn’t dead . She’s only sleeping . "
42008053	They laughed at him because they knew she was dead .
42008054	Taking her hand , Jesus called out , " Child , get up . "
42008055	Her life returned and she got up at once . He directed them to give her something to eat .
42008056	Her parents were beside themselves with joy , but he ordered them to tell no one what had happened .
42009001	Jesus called the Twelve together and he gave them power and authority over all demons and to heal sicknesses .
42009002	He sent them out to proclaim God’s kingdom and to heal the sick .
42009003	He told them , " Take nothing for the journey — no walking stick , no bag , no bread , no money , not even an extra shirt .

42009007	Herod the ruler heard about everything that was happening . He was confused because some people were saying that John had been raised from the dead ,
42009008	others that Elijah had appeared , and still others that one of the ancient prophets had come back to life .

42009026	Whoever is ashamed of me and my words , the Human One will be ashamed of that person when he comes in his glory and in the glory of the Father and of the holy angels .

42009036	Even as the voice spoke , Jesus was found alone . They were speechless and at the time told no one what they had seen .
42009037	The next day , when Jesus , Peter , John , and James had come down from the mountain , a large crowd met Jesus .
42009038	A man from the crowd shouted , " Teacher , I beg you to take a look at my son , my only child .
42009039	Look , a spirit seizes him and , without any warning , he screams . It shakes him and causes him to foam at the mouth . It tortures him and rarely leaves him alone .
42009040	I begged your disciples to throw it out , but they couldn’t . "
42009041	Jesus answered , " You faithless and crooked generation , how long will I be with you and put up with you ? Bring your son here . "
42009042	While he was coming , the demon threw him down and shook him violently . Jesus spoke harshly to the unclean spirit , healed the child , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	Everyone was overwhelmed by God’s greatness . While everyone was marveling at everything he was doing , Jesus said to his disciples ,
42009044	" Take these words to heart : the Human One is about to be delivered into human hands . "
42009045	They didn’t understand this statement . Its meaning was hidden from them so they couldn’t grasp it . And they were afraid to ask him about it .
42009046	An argument arose among the disciples about which of them was the greatest .
42009047	Aware of their deepest thoughts , Jesus took a little child and had the child stand beside him .
42009048	Jesus said to his disciples , " Whoever welcomes this child in my name welcomes me . Whoever welcomes me , welcomes the one who sent me . Whoever is least among you all is the greatest . "
42009049	John replied , " Master , we saw someone throwing demons out in your name , and we tried to stop him because he isn’t in our group of followers . "
42009050	But Jesus replied , " Don’t stop him , because whoever isn’t against you is for you . "

42009053	but the Samaritan villagers refused to welcome him because he was determined to go to Jerusalem .

42010001	After these things , the Lord commissioned seventy-two others and sent them on ahead in pairs to every city and place he was about to go .
42010002	He said to them , “ The harvest is bigger than you can imagine , but there are few workers . Therefore , plead with the Lord of the harvest to send out workers for his harvest .

42010005	Whenever you enter a house , first say , ‘ May peace be on this house . ’
42010006	If anyone there shares God’s peace , then your peace will rest on that person . If not , your blessing will return to you .
42010007	Remain in this house , eating and drinking whatever they set before you , for workers deserve their pay . Don’t move from house to house .

42012038	Happy are those whom he finds alert , even if he comes at midnight or just before dawn .

42012041	Peter said , " Lord , are you telling this parable for us or for everyone ? "

42012048	The one who didn’t know the master’s will but who did things deserving punishment will be beaten only a little . Much will be demanded from everyone who has been given much , and from the one who has been entrusted with much , even more will be asked .

42012055	And when a south wind blows , you say , ‘ A heat wave is coming . ’ And it does .

42014001	One Sabbath , when Jesus went to share a meal in the home of one of the leaders of the Pharisees , they were watching him closely .
42014002	A man suffering from an abnormal swelling of the body was there .
42014003	Jesus asked the lawyers and Pharisees , " Does the Law allow healing on the Sabbath or not ? "
42014004	But they said nothing . Jesus took hold of the sick man , cured him , and then let him go .
42014005	He said to them , " Suppose your child or ox fell into a ditch on the Sabbath day . Wouldn’t you immediately pull it out ? "
42014006	But they had no response .
42014007	When Jesus noticed how the guests sought out the best seats at the table , he told them a parable .
42014008	" When someone invites you to a wedding celebration , don’t take your seat in the place of honor . Someone more highly regarded than you could have been invited by your host .
42014009	The host who invited both of you will come and say to you , ‘ Give your seat to this other person . ’ Embarrassed , you will take your seat in the least important place .
42014010	Instead , when you receive an invitation , go and sit in the least important place . When your host approaches you , he will say , ‘ Friend , move up here to a better seat . ’ Then you will be honored in the presence of all your fellow guests .
42014011	All who lift themselves up will be brought low , and those who make themselves low will be lifted up . "
42014012	Then Jesus said to the person who had invited him , " When you host a lunch or dinner , don’t invite your friends , your brothers and sisters , your relatives , or rich neighbors . If you do , they will invite you in return and that will be your reward .
42014013	Instead , when you give a banquet , invite the poor , crippled , lame , and blind .
42014014	And you will be blessed because they can’t repay you . Instead , you will be repaid when the just are resurrected . "
42014015	When one of the dinner guests heard Jesus’ remarks , he said to Jesus , " Happy are those who will feast in God’s kingdom . "
42014016	Jesus replied , " A certain man hosted a large dinner and invited many people .
42014017	When it was time for the dinner to begin , he sent his servant to tell the invited guests , ‘ Come ! The dinner is now ready . ’
42014018	One by one , they all began to make excuses . The first one told him , ‘ I bought a farm and must go and see it . Please excuse me . ’
42014019	Another said , ‘ I bought five teams of oxen , and I’m going to check on them . Please excuse me . ’
42014020	Another said , ‘ I just got married , so I can’t come . ’
42014021	When he returned , the servant reported these excuses to his master . The master of the house became angry and said to his servant , ‘ Go quickly to the city’s streets , the busy ones and the side streets , and bring the poor , crippled , blind , and lame . ’
42014022	The servant said , ‘ Master , your instructions have been followed and there is still room . ’

42021003	He said , " I assure you that this poor widow has put in more than them all .

42021035	like a trap . It will come upon everyone who lives on the face of the whole earth .

42021037	Every day Jesus was teaching in the temple , but he spent each night on the Mount of Olives .

43002006	Nearby were six stone water jars used for the Jewish cleansing ritual , each able to hold about twenty or thirty gallons .
43002007	Jesus said to the servants , " Fill the jars with water , " and they filled them to the brim .
43002008	Then he told them , " Now draw some from them and take it to the headwaiter , " and they did .
43002009	The headwaiter tasted the water that had become wine . He didn’t know where it came from , though the servants who had drawn the water knew . The headwaiter called the groom
43002010	and said , " Everyone serves the good wine first . They bring out the second-rate wine only when the guests are drinking freely . You kept the good wine until now . "
43002011	This was the first miraculous sign that Jesus did in Cana of Galilee . He revealed his glory , and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this , Jesus and his mother , his brothers , and his disciples went down to Capernaum and stayed there for a few days .
43002013	It was nearly time for the Jewish Passover , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	He found in the temple those who were selling cattle , sheep , and doves , as well as those involved in exchanging currency sitting there .
43002015	He made a whip from ropes and chased them all out of the temple , including the cattle and the sheep . He scattered the coins and overturned the tables of those who exchanged currency .
43002016	He said to the dove sellers , " Get these things out of here ! Don’t make my Father’s house a place of business . "
43002017	His disciples remembered that it is written , Passion for your house consumes me .
43002018	Then the Jewish leaders asked him , " By what authority are you doing these things ? What miraculous sign will you show us ? "
43002019	Jesus answered , " Destroy this temple and in three days I’ll raise it up . "
43002020	The Jewish leaders replied , " It took forty-six years to build this temple , and you will raise it up in three days ? "
43002021	But the temple Jesus was talking about was his body .
43002022	After he was raised from the dead , his disciples remembered what he had said , and they believed the scripture and the word that Jesus had spoken .
43002023	While Jesus was in Jerusalem for the Passover Festival , many believed in his name because they saw the miraculous signs that he did .
43002024	But Jesus didn’t trust himself to them because he knew all people .
43002025	He didn’t need anyone to tell him about human nature , for he knew what human nature was .
43003001	There was a Pharisee named Nicodemus , a Jewish leader .
43003002	He came to Jesus at night and said to him , " Rabbi , we know that you are a teacher who has come from God , for no one could do these miraculous signs that you do unless God is with him . "
43003003	Jesus answered , " I assure you , unless someone is born anew , it’s not possible to see God’s kingdom . "
43003004	Nicodemus asked , " How is it possible for an adult to be born ? It’s impossible to enter the mother’s womb for a second time and be born , isn’t it ? "
43003005	Jesus answered , " I assure you , unless someone is born of water and the Spirit , it’s not possible to enter God’s kingdom .
43003006	Whatever is born of the flesh is flesh , and whatever is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Don’t be surprised that I said to you , ‘ You must be born anew . ’
43003008	God’s Spirit blows wherever it wishes . You hear its sound , but you don’t know where it comes from or where it is going . It’s the same with everyone who is born of the Spirit . "
43003009	Nicodemus said , " How are these things possible ? "
43003010	“ Jesus answered , “ You are a teacher of Israel and you don’t know these things ?
43003011	I assure you that we speak about what we know and testify about what we have seen , but you don’t receive our testimony .
43003012	If I have told you about earthly things and you don’t believe , how will you believe if I tell you about heavenly things ?
43003013	No one has gone up to heaven except the one who came down from heaven , the Human One .
43003014	Just as Moses lifted up the snake in the wilderness , so must the Human One be lifted up
43003015	so that everyone who believes in him will have eternal life .
43003016	God so loved the world that he gave his only Son , so that everyone who believes in him won’t perish but will have eternal life .
43003017	God didn’t send his Son into the world to judge the world , but that the world might be saved through him .
43003018	Whoever believes in him isn’t judged ; whoever doesn’t believe in him is already judged , because they don’t believe in the name of God’s only Son .
43003019	" This is the basis for judgment : The light came into the world , and people loved darkness more than the light , for their actions are evil .
43003020	All who do wicked things hate the light and don’t come to the light for fear that their actions will be exposed to the light .
43003021	Whoever does the truth comes to the light so that it can be seen that their actions were done in God . "
43003022	After this Jesus and his disciples went into Judea , where he spent some time with them and was baptizing .
43003023	John was baptizing at Aenon near Salem because there was a lot of water there , and people were coming to him and being baptized . (
43003024	John hadn’t yet been thrown into prison . )
43003025	A debate started between John’s disciples and a certain Jew about cleansing rituals .
43003026	They came to John and said , " Rabbi , look ! The man who was with you across the Jordan , the one about whom you testified , is baptizing and everyone is flocking to him . "
43003027	John replied , " No one can receive anything unless it is given from heaven .
43003028	You yourselves can testify that I said that I’m not the Christ but that I’m the one sent before him .
43003029	The groom is the one who is getting married . The friend of the groom stands close by and , when he hears him , is overjoyed at the groom’s voice . Therefore , my joy is now complete .
43003030	He must increase and I must decrease .
43003031	The one who comes from above is above all things . The one who is from the earth belongs to the earth and speaks as one from the earth . The one who comes from heaven is above all things .
43003032	He testifies to what he has seen and heard , but no one accepts his testimony .
43003033	Whoever accepts his testimony confirms that God is true .
43003034	The one whom God sent speaks God’s words because God gives the Spirit generously .
43003035	The Father loves the Son and gives everything into his hands .
43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life . Whoever doesn’t believe in the Son won’t see life , but the angry judgment of God remains on them . "
43004001	Jesus learned that the Pharisees had heard that he was making more disciples and baptizing more than John (
43004002	although Jesus’ disciples were baptizing , not Jesus himself ) .
43004003	Therefore , he left Judea and went back to Galilee .
43004004	Jesus had to go through Samaria .
43004005	He came to a Samaritan city called Sychar , which was near the land Jacob had given to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob’s well was there . Jesus was tired from his journey , so he sat down at the well . It was about noon .
43004007	A Samaritan woman came to the well to draw water . Jesus said to her , " Give me some water to drink . "
43004008	His disciples had gone into the city to buy him some food .
43004009	The Samaritan woman asked , " Why do you , a Jewish man , ask for something to drink from me , a Samaritan woman ? " ( Jews and Samaritans didn’t associate with each other . )
43004010	Jesus responded , " If you recognized God’s gift and who is saying to you , ‘ Give me some water to drink , ’ you would be asking him and he would give you living water . "
43004011	The woman said to him , " Sir , you don’t have a bucket and the well is deep . Where would you get this living water ?
43004012	You aren’t greater than our father Jacob , are you ? He gave this well to us , and he drank from it himself , as did his sons and his livestock . "
43004013	Jesus answered , " Everyone who drinks this water will be thirsty again ,
43004014	but whoever drinks from the water that I will give will never be thirsty again . The water that I give will become in those who drink it a spring of water that bubbles up into eternal life . "
43004015	The woman said to him , " Sir , give me this water , so that I will never be thirsty and will never need to come here to draw water ! "
43004016	Jesus said to her , " Go , get your husband , and come back here . "
43004017	The woman replied , " I don’t have a husband . " " You are right to say , ‘ I don’t have a husband , ’ " Jesus answered .
43004018	" You’ve had five husbands , and the man you are with now isn’t your husband . You’ve spoken the truth . "
43004019	The woman said , " Sir , I see that you are a prophet .
43004020	Our ancestors worshipped on this mountain , but you and your people say that it is necessary to worship in Jerusalem . "
43004021	Jesus said to her , " Believe me , woman , the time is coming when you and your people will worship the Father neither on this mountain nor in Jerusalem .
43004022	You and your people worship what you don’t know ; we worship what we know because salvation is from the Jews .
43004023	But the time is coming — and is here ! — when true worshippers will worship in spirit and truth . The Father looks for those who worship him this way .
43004024	God is spirit , and it is necessary to worship God in spirit and truth . "
43004025	The woman said , " I know that the Messiah is coming , the one who is called the Christ . When he comes , he will teach everything to us . "
43004026	Jesus said to her , " I Am — the one who speaks with you . "
43004027	Just then , Jesus’ disciples arrived and were shocked that he was talking with a woman . But no one asked , " What do you want ? " or " Why are you talking with her ? "
43004028	The woman put down her water jar and went into the city . She said to the people ,
43004029	" Come and see a man who has told me everything I’ve done ! Could this man be the Christ ? "
43004030	They left the city and were on their way to see Jesus .
43004031	In the meantime the disciples spoke to Jesus , saying , " Rabbi , eat . "
43004032	Jesus said to them , " I have food to eat that you don’t know about . "
43004033	The disciples asked each other , " Has someone brought him food ? "
43004034	Jesus said to them , " I am fed by doing the will of the one who sent me and by completing his work .
43004035	Don’t you have a saying , ‘ Four more months and then it’s time for harvest ’ ? Look , I tell you : open your eyes and notice that the fields are already ripe for the harvest .
43004036	Those who harvest are receiving their pay and gathering fruit for eternal life so that those who sow and those who harvest can celebrate together .
43004037	This is a true saying , that one sows and another harvests .
43004038	I have sent you to harvest what you didn’t work hard for ; others worked hard , and you will share in their hard work . "
43004039	Many Samaritans in that city believed in Jesus because of the woman’s word when she testified , " He told me everything I’ve ever done . "
43004040	So when the Samaritans came to Jesus , they asked him to stay with them , and he stayed there two days .
43004041	Many more believed because of his word ,
43004042	and they said to the woman , " We no longer believe because of what you said , for we have heard for ourselves and know that this one is truly the savior of the world . "
43004043	After two days Jesus left for Galilee . (
43004044	Jesus himself had testified that prophets have no honor in their own country . )
43004045	When he came to Galilee , the Galileans welcomed him because they had seen all the things he had done in Jerusalem during the festival , for they also had been at the festival .
43004046	He returned to Cana in Galilee where he had turned the water into wine . In Capernaum there was a certain royal official whose son was sick .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus was coming from Judea to Galilee , he went out to meet him and asked Jesus if he would come and heal his son , for his son was about to die .
43004048	Jesus said to him , " Unless you see miraculous signs and wonders , you won’t believe . "
43004049	The royal official said to him , " Lord , come before my son dies . "
43004050	Jesus replied , " Go home . Your son lives . " The man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him and set out for his home .
43004051	While he was on his way , his servants were already coming to meet him . They said , " Your son lives ! "
43004052	So he asked them at what time his son had started to get better . And they said , " The fever left him yesterday at about one o’clock in the afternoon . "
43004053	Then the father realized that this was the hour when Jesus had said to him , " Your son lives . " And he and his entire household believed in Jesus .
43004054	This was the second miraculous sign Jesus did while going from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	After this there was a Jewish festival , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	In Jerusalem near the Sheep Gate in the north city wall is a pool with the Aramaic name Bethsaida . It had five covered porches ,
43005003	and a crowd of people who were sick , blind , lame , and paralyzed sat there .
43005005	A certain man was there who had been sick for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw him lying there , knowing that he had already been there a long time , he asked him , " Do you want to get well ? "
43005007	The sick man answered him , " Sir , I don’t have anyone who can put me in the water when it is stirred up . When I’m trying to get to it , someone else has gotten in ahead of me . "
43005008	Jesus said to him , " Get up ! Pick up your mat and walk . "
43005009	Immediately the man was well , and he picked up his mat and walked . Now that day was the Sabbath .
43005010	The Jewish leaders said to the man who had been healed , " It’s the Sabbath ; you aren’t allowed to carry your mat . "
43005011	He answered , " The man who made me well said to me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ "
43005012	They inquired , " Who is this man who said to you , ‘ Pick it up and walk ’ ? "
43005013	The man who had been cured didn’t know who it was , because Jesus had slipped away from the crowd gathered there .
43005014	Later Jesus found him in the temple and said , " See ! You have been made well . Don’t sin anymore in case something worse happens to you . "
43005015	The man went and proclaimed to the Jewish leaders that Jesus was the man who had made him well .
43005016	As a result , the Jewish leaders were harassing Jesus , since he had done these things on the Sabbath .
43005017	Jesus replied , " My Father is still working , and I am working too . "
43005018	For this reason the Jewish leaders wanted even more to kill him — not only because he was doing away with the Sabbath but also because he called God his own Father , thereby making himself equal with God .
43005019	Jesus responded to the Jewish leaders , “ I assure you that the Son can’t do anything by himself except what he sees the Father doing . Whatever the Father does , the Son does likewise .
43005020	The Father loves the Son and shows him everything that he does . He will show him greater works than these so that you will marvel .
43005021	As the Father raises the dead and gives life , so too does the Son give life to whomever he wishes .
43005022	The Father doesn’t judge anyone , but he has given all judgment to the Son
43005023	so that everyone will honor the Son just as they honor the Father . Whoever doesn’t honor the Son doesn’t honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	“ I assure you that whoever hears my word and believes in the one who sent me has eternal life and won’t come under judgment but has passed from death into life .
43005025	“ I assure you that the time is coming — and is here ! — when the dead will hear the voice of God’s Son , and those who hear it will live .
43005026	Just as the Father has life in himself , so he has granted the Son to have life in himself .
43005027	He gives the Son authority to judge , because he is the Human One .
43005028	Don’t be surprised by this , because the time is coming when all who are in their graves will hear his voice .
43005029	Those who did good things will come out into the resurrection of life , and those who did wicked things into the resurrection of judgment .
43005030	I can’t do anything by myself . Whatever I hear , I judge , and my judgment is just . I don’t seek my own will but the will of the one who sent me .
43005031	“ If I testify about myself , my testimony isn’t true .
43005032	There is someone else who testifies about me , and I know his testimony about me is true .
43005033	You sent a delegation to John , and he testified to the truth .
43005034	Although I don’t accept human testimony , I say these things so that you can be saved .
43005035	John was a burning and shining lamp , and , at least for a while , you were willing to celebrate in his light .
43005036	“ I have a witness greater than John’s testimony . The Father has given me works to do so that I might complete them . These works I do testify about me that the Father sent me .
43005037	And the Father who sent me testifies about me . You have never even heard his voice or seen his form ,
43005038	and you don’t have his word dwelling with you because you don’t believe the one whom he has sent .
43005039	Examine the scriptures , since you think that in them you have eternal life . They also testify about me ,
43005040	yet you don’t want to come to me so that you can have life .
43005041	“ I don’t accept praise from people ,
43005042	but I know you , that you don’t have God’s love in you .
43005043	I have come in my Father’s name , and you don’t receive me . If others come in their own name , you receive them .
43005044	How can you believe when you receive praise from each other but don’t seek the praise that comes from the only God ?
43005045	" Don’t think that I will accuse you before the Father . Your accuser is Moses , the one in whom your hope rests .
43005046	If you believed Moses , you would believe me , because Moses wrote about me .
43005047	If you don’t believe the writings of Moses , how will you believe my words ? "
43006001	After this Jesus went across the Galilee Sea ( that is , the Tiberius Sea ) .
43006002	A large crowd followed him , because they had seen the miraculous signs he had done among the sick .
43006003	Jesus went up a mountain and sat there with his disciples .
43006004	It was nearly time for Passover , the Jewish festival .
43006005	Jesus looked up and saw the large crowd coming toward him . He asked Philip , " Where will we buy food to feed these people ? "
43006006	Jesus said this to test him , for he already knew what he was going to do .
43006007	Philip replied , " More than a half year’s salary worth of food wouldn’t be enough for each person to have even a little bit . "
43006008	One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , said ,
43006009	" A youth here has five barley loaves and two fish . But what good is that for a crowd like this ? "
43006010	Jesus said , " Have the people sit down . " There was plenty of grass there . They sat down , about five thousand of them .
43006011	Then Jesus took the bread . When he had given thanks , he distributed it to those who were sitting there . He did the same with the fish , each getting as much as they wanted .
43006012	When they had plenty to eat , he said to his disciples , " Gather up the leftover pieces , so that nothing will be wasted . "
43006013	So they gathered them and filled twelve baskets with the pieces of the five barley loaves that had been left over by those who had eaten .
43006014	When the people saw that he had done a miraculous sign , they said , " This is truly the prophet who is coming into the world . "
43006015	Jesus understood that they were about to come and force him to be their king , so he took refuge again , alone on a mountain .
43006016	When evening came , Jesus’ disciples went down to the lake .
43006017	They got into a boat and were crossing the lake to Capernaum . It was already getting dark and Jesus hadn’t come to them yet .
43006018	The water was getting rough because a strong wind was blowing .
43006019	When the wind had driven them out for about three or four miles , they saw Jesus walking on the water . He was approaching the boat and they were afraid .
43006020	He said to them , " I Am . Don’t be afraid . "
43006021	Then they wanted to take him into the boat , and just then the boat reached the land where they had been heading .
43006022	The next day the crowd that remained on the other side of the lake realized that only one boat had been there . They knew Jesus hadn’t gone with his disciples , but that the disciples had gone alone .
43006023	Some boats came from Tiberius , near the place where they had eaten the bread over which the Lord had given thanks .
43006024	When the crowd saw that neither Jesus nor his disciples were there , they got into the boats and came to Capernaum looking for Jesus .
43006025	When they found him on the other side of the lake , they asked him , " Rabbi , when did you get here ? "
43006026	Jesus replied , " I assure you that you are looking for me not because you saw miraculous signs but because you ate all the food you wanted .
43006027	Don’t work for the food that doesn’t last but for the food that endures for eternal life , which the Human One will give you . God the Father has confirmed him as his agent to give life . "
43006028	They asked , " What must we do in order to accomplish what God requires ? "
43006029	Jesus replied , " This is what God requires , that you believe in him whom God sent . "
43006030	They asked , " What miraculous sign will you do , that we can see and believe you ? What will you do ?
43006031	Our ancestors ate manna in the wilderness , just as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat . "
43006032	Jesus told them , " I assure you , it wasn’t Moses who gave the bread from heaven to you , but my Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	The bread of God is the one who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . "
43006034	They said , " Sir , give us this bread all the time ! "
43006035	Jesus replied , " I am the bread of life . Whoever comes to me will never go hungry , and whoever believes in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But I told you that you have seen me and still don’t believe .
43006037	Everyone whom the Father gives to me will come to me , and I won’t send away anyone who comes to me .
43006038	I have come down from heaven not to do my will , but the will of him who sent me .
43006039	This is the will of the one who sent me , that I won’t lose anything he has given me , but I will raise it up at the last day .
43006040	This is my Father’s will : that all who see the Son and believe in him will have eternal life , and I will raise them up at the last day . "
43006041	The Jewish opposition grumbled about him because he said , " I am the bread that came down from heaven . "
43006042	They asked , " Isn’t this Jesus , Joseph’s son , whose mother and father we know ? How can he now say , ‘ I have come down from heaven ’ ? "
43006043	Jesus responded , " Don’t grumble among yourselves .
43006044	No one can come to me unless they are drawn to me by the Father who sent me , and I will raise them up at the last day .
43006045	It is written in the Prophets , And they will all be taught by God . Everyone who has listened to the Father and learned from him comes to me .
43006046	No one has seen the Father except the one who is from God . He has seen the Father .
43006047	I assure you , whoever believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate manna in the wilderness and they died .
43006050	This is the bread that comes down from heaven so that whoever eats from it will never die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . Whoever eats this bread will live forever , and the bread that I will give for the life of the world is my flesh . "
43006052	Then the Jews debated among themselves , asking , " How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? "
43006053	Jesus said to them , " I assure you , unless you eat the flesh of the Human One and drink his blood , you have no life in you .
43006054	Whoever eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life , and I will raise them up at the last day .
43006055	My flesh is true food and my blood is true drink .
43006056	Whoever eats my flesh and drinks my blood remains in me and I in them .
43006057	As the living Father sent me , and I live because of the Father , so whoever eats me lives because of me .
43006058	This is the bread that came down from heaven . It isn’t like the bread your ancestors ate , and then they died . Whoever eats this bread will live forever . "
43006059	Jesus said these things while he was teaching in the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	Many of his disciples who heard this said , " This message is harsh . Who can hear it ? "
43006061	Jesus knew that the disciples were grumbling about this and he said to them , " Does this offend you ?
43006062	What if you were to see the Human One going up where he was before ?
43006063	The Spirit is the one who gives life and the flesh doesn’t help at all . The words I have spoken to you are spirit and life .
43006064	Yet some of you don’t believe . " Jesus knew from the beginning who wouldn’t believe and the one who would betray him .
43006065	He said , " For this reason I said to you that none can come to me unless the Father enables them to do so . "
43006066	At this , many of his disciples turned away and no longer accompanied him .
43006067	Jesus asked the Twelve , " Do you also want to leave ? "
43006068	Simon Peter answered , " Lord , where would we go ? You have the words of eternal life .
43006069	We believe and know that you are God’s holy one . "
43006070	Jesus replied , " Didn’t I choose you twelve ? Yet one of you is a devil . "
43006071	He was speaking of Judas , Simon Iscariot’s son , for he , one of the Twelve , was going to betray him .
43007001	After this Jesus traveled throughout Galilee . He didn’t want to travel in Judea , because the Jewish authorities wanted to kill him .
43007002	When it was almost time for the Jewish Festival of Booths ,
43007003	Jesus’ brothers said to him , " Leave Galilee . Go to Judea so that your disciples can see the amazing works that you do .
43007004	Those who want to be known publicly don’t do things secretly . Since you can do these things , show yourself to the world . "
43007005	His brothers said this because even they didn’t believe in him .
43007006	Jesus replied , " For you , anytime is fine . But my time hasn’t come yet .
43007007	The world can’t hate you . It hates me , though , because I testify that its works are evil .
43007008	You go up to the festival . I’m not going to this one because my time hasn’t yet come . "
43007009	Having said this , he stayed in Galilee .
43007010	However , after his brothers left for the festival , he went too — not openly but in secret .
43007011	The Jewish leaders were looking for Jesus at the festival . They kept asking , " Where is he ? "
43007012	The crowds were murmuring about him . " He’s a good man , " some said , but others were saying , " No , he tricks the people . "
43007013	No one spoke about him publicly , though , for fear of the Jewish authorities .
43007014	Halfway through the festival , Jesus went up to the temple and started to teach .
43007015	Astonished , the Jewish leaders asked , " He’s never been taught ! How has he mastered the Law ? "
43007016	Jesus responded , " My teaching isn’t mine but comes from the one who sent me .
43007017	Whoever wants to do God’s will can tell whether my teaching is from God or whether I speak on my own .
43007018	Those who speak on their own seek glory for themselves . Those who seek the glory of him who sent me are people of truth ; there’s no falsehood in them .
43007019	Didn’t Moses give you the Law ? Yet none of you keep the Law . Why do you want to kill me ? "
43007020	The crowd answered , " You have a demon . Who wants to kill you ? "
43007021	Jesus replied , " I did one work , and you were all astonished .
43007022	Because Moses gave you the commandment about circumcision ( although it wasn’t Moses but the patriarchs ) , you circumcise a man on the Sabbath .
43007023	If a man can be circumcised on the Sabbath without breaking Moses’ Law , why are you angry with me because I made an entire man well on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Don’t judge according to appearances . Judge with right judgment . "
43007025	Some people from Jerusalem said , " Isn’t he the one they want to kill ?
43007026	Here he is , speaking in public , yet they aren’t saying anything to him . Could it be that our leaders actually think he is the Christ ?
43007027	We know where he is from , but when the Christ comes , no one will know where he is from . "
43007028	While Jesus was teaching in the temple , he exclaimed , " You know me and where I am from . I haven’t come on my own . The one who sent me is true , and you don’t know him .
43007029	I know him because I am from him and he sent me . "
43007030	So they wanted to seize Jesus , but they couldn’t because his time hadn’t yet come .
43007031	Many from that crowd believed in Jesus . They said , " When the Christ comes , will he do more miraculous signs than this man does ? "
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd whispering such things about Jesus , and the chief priests and Pharisees sent guards to arrest him .
43007033	Therefore , Jesus said , " I’m still with you for a little while before I go to the one who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me , but you won’t find me , and where I am you can’t come . "
43007035	The Jewish opposition asked each other , " Where does he intend to go that we can’t find him ? Surely he doesn’t intend to go where our people have been scattered and are living among the Greeks ! He isn’t going to teach the Greeks , is he ?
43007036	What does he mean when he says , ‘ You will look for me , but you won’t find me , and where I am you can’t come ’ ? "
43007037	On the last and most important day of the festival , Jesus stood up and shouted , " All who are thirsty should come to me !
43007038	All who believe in me should drink ! As the scriptures said concerning me ,
43007039	Jesus said this concerning the Spirit . Those who believed in him would soon receive the Spirit , but they hadn’t experienced the Spirit yet since Jesus hadn’t yet been glorified .

43007041	Others said , " He’s the Christ . " But others said , " The Christ can’t come from Galilee , can he ?

43007044	Some wanted to arrest him , but no one grabbed him .

43007047	The Pharisees replied , " Have you too been deceived ?

43007053	They each went to their own homes ,
43008001	And Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	Early in the morning he returned to the temple . All the people gathered around him , and he sat down and taught them .

43008020	He spoke these words while he was teaching in the temple area known as the treasury . No one arrested him , because his time hadn’t yet come .

43008027	They didn’t know he was speaking about his Father .

43008035	A slave isn’t a permanent member of the household , but a son is .

43008043	Why don’t you understand what I’m saying ? It’s because you can’t really hear my words .
43008044	Your father is the devil . You are his children , and you want to do what your father wants . He was a murderer from the beginning . He has never stood for the truth , because there’s no truth in him . Whenever that liar speaks , he speaks according to his own nature , because he’s a liar and the father of liars .
43008045	Because I speak the truth , you don’t believe me .
43008046	Who among you can show I’m guilty of sin ? Since I speak the truth , why don’t you believe me ?
43008047	God’s children listen to God’s words . You don’t listen to me because you aren’t God’s children . "
43008048	The Jewish opposition answered , " We were right to say that you are a Samaritan and have a demon , weren’t we ? "
43008049	" I don’t have a demon , " Jesus replied . " But I honor my Father and you dishonor me .
43008050	I’m not trying to bring glory to myself . There’s one who is seeking to glorify me , and he’s the judge .
43008051	I assure you that whoever keeps my word will never die . "
43008052	The Jewish opposition said to Jesus , " Now we know that you have a demon . Abraham and the prophets died , yet you say , ‘ Whoever keeps my word will never die . ’
43008053	Are you greater than our father Abraham ? He died and the prophets died , so who do you make yourself out to be ? "
43008054	Jesus answered , " If I glorify myself , my glory is meaningless . My Father , who you say is your God , is the one who glorifies me .
43008055	You don’t know him , but I do . If I said I didn’t know him , I would be like you , a liar . But I do know him , and I keep his word .
43008056	Your father Abraham was overjoyed that he would see my day . He saw it and was happy . "
43008057	" You aren’t even 50 years old ! " the Jewish opposition replied . " How can you say that you have seen Abraham ? "
43008058	" I assure you , " Jesus replied , " before Abraham was , I Am . "
43008059	So they picked up stones to throw at him , but Jesus hid himself and left the temple .
43009001	As Jesus walked along , he saw a man who was blind from birth .
43009002	Jesus’ disciples asked , " Rabbi , who sinned so that he was born blind , this man or his parents ? "
43009003	Jesus answered , " Neither he nor his parents . This happened so that God’s mighty works might be displayed in him .
43009004	While it’s daytime , we must do the works of him who sent me . Night is coming when no one can work .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . "
43009006	After he said this , he spit on the ground , made mud with the saliva , and smeared the mud on the man’s eyes .
43009007	Jesus said to him , " Go , wash in the pool of Siloam " ( this word means sent ) . So the man went away and washed . When he returned , he could see .
43009008	The man’s neighbors and those who used to see him when he was a beggar said , " Isn’t this the man who used to sit and beg ? "
43009009	Some said , " It is , " and others said , " No , it’s someone who looks like him . " But the man said , " Yes , it’s me ! "
43009010	So they asked him , " How are you now able to see ? "
43009011	He answered , " The man they call Jesus made mud , smeared it on my eyes , and said , ‘ Go to the Pool of Siloam and wash . ’ So I went and washed , and then I could see . "
43009012	They asked , " Where is this man ? " He replied , " I don’t know . "
43009013	Then they led the man who had been born blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	Now Jesus made the mud and smeared it on the man’s eyes on a Sabbath day .
43009015	So Pharisees also asked him how he was able to see . The man told them , " He put mud on my eyes , I washed , and now I see . "
43009016	Some Pharisees said , " This man isn’t from God , because he breaks the Sabbath law . " Others said , " How can a sinner do miraculous signs like these ? " So they were divided .
43009017	Some of the Pharisees questioned the man who had been born blind again : " What do you have to say about him , since he healed your eyes ? " He replied , " He’s a prophet . "
43009018	The Jewish leaders didn’t believe the man had been blind and received his sight until they called for his parents .
43009019	The Jewish leaders asked them , " Is this your son ? Are you saying he was born blind ? How can he now see ? "
43009020	His parents answered , " We know he is our son . We know he was born blind .
43009021	But we don’t know how he now sees , and we don’t know who healed his eyes . Ask him . He’s old enough to speak for himself . "

43009023	That’s why his parents said , " He’s old enough . Ask him . "

43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses , but we don’t know where this man is from . "

43009031	We know that God doesn’t listen to sinners . God listens to anyone who is devout and does God’s will .
43009032	No one has ever heard of a healing of the eyes of someone born blind .
43009033	If this man wasn’t from God , he couldn’t do this . "

43009039	Jesus said , " I have come into the world to exercise judgment so that those who don’t see can see and those who see will become blind . "
43009040	Some Pharisees who were with him heard what he said and asked , " Surely we aren’t blind , are we ? "
43009041	Jesus said to them , " If you were blind , you wouldn’t have any sin , but now that you say , ‘ We see , ’ your sin remains .
43010001	I assure you that whoever doesn’t enter into the sheep pen through the gate but climbs over the wall is a thief and an outlaw .
43010002	The one who enters through the gate is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The guard at the gate opens the gate for him , and the sheep listen to his voice . He calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	Whenever he has gathered all of his sheep , he goes before them and they follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	They won’t follow a stranger but will run away because they don’t know the stranger’s voice . "
43010006	Those who heard Jesus use this analogy didn’t understand what he was saying .
43010007	So Jesus spoke again , “ I assure you that I am the gate of the sheep .
43010008	All who came before me were thieves and outlaws , but the sheep didn’t listen to them .
43010009	I am the gate . Whoever enters through me will be saved . They will come in and go out and find pasture .

43010011	“ I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep .
43010012	When the hired hand sees the wolf coming , he leaves the sheep and runs away . That’s because he isn’t the shepherd ; the sheep aren’t really his . So the wolf attacks the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	He’s only a hired hand and the sheep don’t matter to him .

43010015	just as the Father knows me and I know the Father . I give up my life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep that don’t belong to this sheep pen . I must lead them too . They will listen to my voice and there will be one flock , with one shepherd .

43010042	Many believed in Jesus there .
43011001	A certain man , Lazarus , was ill . He was from Bethany , the village of Mary and her sister Martha . (
43011002	This was the Mary who anointed the Lord with fragrant oil and wiped his feet with her hair . Her brother Lazarus was ill . )
43011003	So the sisters sent word to Jesus , saying , " Lord , the one whom you love is ill . "
43011004	When he heard this , Jesus said , " This illness isn’t fatal . It’s for the glory of God so that God’s Son can be glorified through it . "

43011010	But whoever walks in the night does stumble because the light isn’t in them . "

43011012	The disciples said , " Lord , if he’s sleeping , he will get well . "

43011017	When Jesus arrived , he found that Lazarus had already been in the tomb for four days .
43011018	Bethany was a little less than two miles from Jerusalem .
43011019	Many Jews had come to comfort Martha and Mary after their brother’s death .

43011030	He hadn’t entered the village but was still in the place where Martha had met him .

43011056	They were looking for Jesus . As they spoke to each other in the temple , they said , " What do you think ? He won’t come to the festival , will he ? "
43011057	The chief priests and Pharisees had given orders that anyone who knew where he was should report it , so they could arrest him .

43012004	Judas Iscariot , one of his disciples ( the one who was about to betray him ) , complained ,
43012005	" This perfume was worth a year’s wages ! Why wasn’t it sold and the money given to the poor ? " (
43012006	He said this not because he cared about the poor but because he was a thief . He carried the money bag and would take what was in it . )
43012007	Then Jesus said , " Leave her alone . This perfume was to be used in preparation for my burial , and this is how she has used it .

43012016	His disciples didn’t understand these things at first . After he was glorified , they remembered that these things had been written about him and that they had done these things to him .

43012023	Jesus replied , “ The time has come for the Human One to be glorified .
43012024	I assure you that unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies , it can only be a single seed . But if it dies , it bears much fruit .
43012025	Those who love their lives will lose them , and those who hate their lives in this world will keep them forever .
43012026	Whoever serves me must follow me . Wherever I am , there my servant will also be . My Father will honor whoever serves me .
43012027	" Now I am deeply troubled . What should I say ? ‘ Father , save me from this time ’ ? No , for this is the reason I have come to this time .
43012028	Father , glorify your name ! " Then a voice came from heaven , " I have glorified it , and I will glorify it again . "
43012029	The crowd standing there heard and said , " It’s thunder . " Others said , " An angel spoke to him . "
43012030	Jesus replied , " This voice wasn’t for my benefit but for yours .
43012031	Now is the time for judgment of this world . Now this world’s ruler will be thrown out .
43012032	When I am lifted up from the earth , I will draw everyone to me . " (
43012033	He said this to show how he was going to die . )
43012034	The crowd responded , " We have heard from the Law that the Christ remains forever . How can you say that the Human One must be lifted up ? Who is this Human One ? "
43012035	Jesus replied , " The light is with you for only a little while . Walk while you have the light so that darkness doesn’t overtake you . Those who walk in the darkness don’t know where they are going .
43012036	As long as you have the light , believe in the light so that you might become people whose lives are determined by the light . " After Jesus said these things , he went away and hid from them .
43012037	Jesus had done many miraculous signs before the people , but they didn’t believe in him .
43012038	This was to fulfill the word of the prophet Isaiah : Lord , who has believed through our message ? To whom is the arm of the Lord fully revealed ?
43012039	Isaiah explains why they couldn’t believe :
43012040	He made their eyes blind so that they might not see with their eyes , and I would heal them .
43012041	Isaiah said these things because he saw Jesus’ glory ; he spoke about Jesus .
43012042	Even so , many leaders believed in him , but they wouldn’t acknowledge their faith because they feared that the Pharisees would expel them from the synagogue .
43012043	They believed , but they loved human praise more than God’s glory .
43012044	Jesus shouted , " Whoever believes in me doesn’t believe in me but in the one who sent me .
43012045	Whoever sees me sees the one who sent me .
43012046	I have come as a light into the world so that everyone who believes in me won’t live in darkness .
43012047	If people hear my words and don’t keep them , I don’t judge them . I didn’t come to judge the world but to save it .
43012048	Whoever rejects me and doesn’t receive my words will be judged at the last day by the word I have spoken .
43012049	I don’t speak on my own , but the Father who sent me commanded me regarding what I should speak and say .
43012050	I know that his commandment is eternal life . Therefore , whatever I say is just as the Father has said to me . "
43013001	Before the Festival of Passover , Jesus knew that his time had come to leave this world and go to the Father . Having loved his own who were in the world , he loved them fully .
43013002	Jesus and his disciples were sharing the evening meal . The devil had already provoked Judas , Simon Iscariot’s son , to betray Jesus .
43013003	Jesus knew the Father had given everything into his hands and that he had come from God and was returning to God .
43013004	So he got up from the table and took off his robes . Picking up a linen towel , he tied it around his waist .
43013005	Then he poured water into a washbasin and began to wash the disciples’ feet , drying them with the towel he was wearing .
43013006	When Jesus came to Simon Peter , Peter said to him , " Lord , are you going to wash my feet ? "
43013007	Jesus replied , " You don’t understand what I’m doing now , but you will understand later . "
43013008	" No ! " Peter said . " You will never wash my feet ! " Jesus replied , " Unless I wash you , you won’t have a place with me . "
43013009	Simon Peter said , " Lord , not only my feet but also my hands and my head ! "
43013010	Jesus responded , " Those who have bathed need only to have their feet washed , because they are completely clean . You disciples are clean , but not every one of you . "
43013011	He knew who would betray him . That’s why he said , " Not every one of you is clean . "
43013012	After he washed the disciples’ feet , he put on his robes and returned to his place at the table . He said to them , “ Do you know what I’ve done for you ?
43013013	You call me ‘ Teacher ’ and ‘ Lord , ’ and you speak correctly , because I am .
43013014	If I , your Lord and teacher , have washed your feet , you too must wash each other’s feet .
43013015	I have given you an example : just as I have done , you also must do .
43013016	I assure you , servants aren’t greater than their master , nor are those who are sent greater than the one who sent them .
43013017	Since you know these things , you will be happy if you do them .
43013018	I’m not speaking about all of you . I know those whom I’ve chosen . But this is to fulfill the scripture , The one who eats my bread has turned against me .
43013019	" I’m telling you this now , before it happens , so that when it does happen you will believe that I Am .
43013020	I assure you that whoever receives someone I send receives me , and whoever receives me receives the one who sent me . "
43013021	After he said these things , Jesus was deeply disturbed and testified , " I assure you , one of you will betray me . "
43013022	His disciples looked at each other , confused about which of them he was talking about .
43013023	One of the disciples , the one whom Jesus loved , was at Jesus’ side .
43013024	Simon Peter nodded at him to get him to ask Jesus who he was talking about .
43013025	Leaning back toward Jesus , this disciple asked , " Lord , who is it ? "
43013026	Jesus answered , " It’s the one to whom I will give this piece of bread once I have dipped into the bowl . " Then he dipped the piece of bread and gave it to Judas , Simon Iscariot’s son .
43013027	After Judas took the bread , Satan entered into him . Jesus told him , " What you are about to do , do quickly . "
43013028	No one sitting at the table understood why Jesus said this to him .
43013029	Some thought that , since Judas kept the money bag , Jesus told him , " Go , buy what we need for the feast , " or that he should give something to the poor .
43013030	So when Judas took the bread , he left immediately . And it was night .
43013031	When Judas was gone , Jesus said , “ Now the Human One has been glorified , and God has been glorified in him .
43013032	If God has been glorified in him , God will also glorify the Human One in himself and will glorify him immediately .
43013033	Little children , I’m with you for a little while longer . You will look for me — but , just as I told the Jewish leaders , I also tell you now — ‘ Where I’m going , you can’t come . ’
43013034	" I give you a new commandment : Love each other . Just as I have loved you , so you also must love each other .
43013035	This is how everyone will know that you are my disciples , when you love each other . "
43013036	Simon Peter said to Jesus , " Lord , where are you going ? " Jesus answered , " Where I am going , you can’t follow me now , but you will follow later . "
43013037	Peter asked , " Lord , why can’t I follow you now ? I’ll give up my life for you . "
43013038	Jesus replied , “ Will you give up your life for me ? I assure you that you will deny me three times before the rooster crows .
43014001	" Don’t be troubled . Trust in God . Trust also in me .
43014002	My Father’s house has room to spare . If that weren’t the case , would I have told you that I’m going to prepare a place for you ?
43014003	When I go to prepare a place for you , I will return and take you to be with me so that where I am you will be too .
43014004	You know the way to the place I’m going . "
43014005	Thomas asked , " Lord , we don’t know where you are going . How can we know the way ? "
43014006	Jesus answered , " I am the way , the truth , and the life . No one comes to the Father except through me .
43014007	If you have really known me , you will also know the Father . From now on you know him and have seen him . "
43014008	Philip said , " Lord , show us the Father ; that will be enough for us . "
43014009	Jesus replied , “ Don’t you know me , Philip , even after I have been with you all this time ? Whoever has seen me has seen the Father . How can you say , ‘ Show us the Father ’ ?
43014010	Don’t you believe that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The words I have spoken to you I don’t speak on my own . The Father who dwells in me does his works .
43014011	Trust me when I say that I am in the Father and the Father is in me , or at least believe on account of the works themselves .
43014012	I assure you that whoever believes in me will do the works that I do . They will do even greater works than these because I am going to the Father .
43014013	I will do whatever you ask for in my name , so that the Father can be glorified in the Son .
43014014	When you ask me for anything in my name , I will do it .
43014015	“ If you love me , you will keep my commandments .
43014016	I will ask the Father , and he will send another Companion , who will be with you forever .
43014017	This Companion is the Spirit of Truth , whom the world can’t receive because it neither sees him nor recognizes him . You know him , because he lives with you and will be with you .
43014018	" I won’t leave you as orphans . I will come to you .
43014019	Soon the world will no longer see me , but you will see me . Because I live , you will live too .
43014020	On that day you will know that I am in my Father , you are in me , and I am in you .
43014021	Whoever has my commandments and keeps them loves me . Whoever loves me will be loved by my Father , and I will love them and reveal myself to them . "
43014022	Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) asked , " Lord , why are you about to reveal yourself to us and not to the world ? "
43014023	Jesus answered , “ Whoever loves me will keep my word . My Father will love them , and we will come to them and make our home with them .
43014024	Whoever doesn’t love me doesn’t keep my words . The word that you hear isn’t mine . It is the word of the Father who sent me .
43014025	“ I have spoken these things to you while I am with you .
43014026	The Companion , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you everything and will remind you of everything I told you .
43014027	“ Peace I leave with you . My peace I give you . I give to you not as the world gives . Don’t be troubled or afraid .
43014028	You have heard me tell you , ‘ I’m going away and returning to you . ’ If you loved me , you would be happy that I am going to the Father , because the Father is greater than me .
43014029	I have told you before it happens so that when it happens you will believe .
43014030	I won’t say much more to you because this world’s ruler is coming . He has nothing on me .
43014031	Rather , he comes so that the world will know that I love the Father and do just as the Father has commanded me . Get up . We’re leaving this place .
43015001	“ I am the true vine , and my Father is the vineyard keeper .
43015002	He removes any of my branches that don’t produce fruit , and he trims any branch that produces fruit so that it will produce even more fruit .
43015003	You are already trimmed because of the word I have spoken to you .
43015004	Remain in me , and I will remain in you . A branch can’t produce fruit by itself , but must remain in the vine . Likewise , you can’t produce fruit unless you remain in me .
43015005	I am the vine ; you are the branches . If you remain in me and I in you , then you will produce much fruit . Without me , you can’t do anything .
43015006	If you don’t remain in me , you will be like a branch that is thrown out and dries up . Those branches are gathered up , thrown into a fire , and burned .
43015007	If you remain in me and my words remain in you , ask for whatever you want and it will be done for you .
43015008	My Father is glorified when you produce much fruit and in this way prove that you are my disciples .
43015009	“ As the Father loved me , I too have loved you . Remain in my love .
43015010	If you keep my commandments , you will remain in my love , just as I kept my Father’s commandments and remain in his love .
43015011	I have said these things to you so that my joy will be in you and your joy will be complete .
43015012	This is my commandment : love each other just as I have loved you .
43015013	No one has greater love than to give up one’s life for one’s friends .
43015014	You are my friends if you do what I command you .
43015015	I don’t call you servants any longer , because servants don’t know what their master is doing . Instead , I call you friends , because everything I heard from my Father I have made known to you .
43015016	You didn’t choose me , but I chose you and appointed you so that you could go and produce fruit and so that your fruit could last . As a result , whatever you ask the Father in my name , he will give you .
43015017	I give you these commandments so that you can love each other .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , know that it hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , the world would love you as its own . However , I have chosen you out of the world , and you don’t belong to the world . This is why the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you , ‘ Servants aren’t greater than their master . ’ If the world harassed me , it will harass you too . If it kept my word , it will also keep yours .
43015021	The world will do all these things to you on account of my name , because it doesn’t know the one who sent me .
43015022	“ If I hadn’t come and spoken to the people of this world , they wouldn’t be sinners . But now they have no excuse for their sin .
43015023	Whoever hates me also hates the Father .
43015024	If I hadn’t done works among them that no one else had done , they wouldn’t be sinners . But now they have seen and hated both me and my Father .
43015025	This fulfills the word written in their Law , They hated me without a reason .
43015026	“ When the Companion comes , whom I will send from the Father — the Spirit of Truth who proceeds from the Father — he will testify about me .
43015027	You will testify too , because you have been with me from the beginning .
43016001	I have said these things to you so that you won’t fall away .
43016002	They will expel you from the synagogue . The time is coming when those who kill you will think that they are doing a service to God .
43016003	They will do these things because they don’t know the Father or me .

43016005	But now I go away to the one who sent me . None of you ask me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	Yet because I have said these things to you , you are filled with sorrow .
43016007	I assure you that it is better for you that I go away . If I don’t go away , the Companion won’t come to you . But if I go , I will send him to you .
43016008	When he comes , he will show the world it was wrong about sin , righteousness , and judgment .
43016009	He will show the world it was wrong about sin because they don’t believe in me .

43016011	He will show the world it was wrong about judgment because this world’s ruler stands condemned .
43016012	" I have much more to say to you , but you can’t handle it now .
43016013	However , when the Spirit of Truth comes , he will guide you in all truth . He won’t speak on his own , but will say whatever he hears and will proclaim to you what is to come .
43016014	He will glorify me , because he will take what is mine and proclaim it to you .
43016015	Everything that the Father has is mine . That’s why I said that the Spirit takes what is mine and will proclaim it to you .
43016016	Soon you won’t be able to see me ; soon after that , you will see me . "
43016017	Some of Jesus’ disciples said to each other , " What does he mean : ‘ Soon you won’t see me , and soon after that you will see me ’ and ‘ Because I’m going to the Father ’ ?
43016018	What does he mean by ‘ soon ’ ? We don’t understand what he’s talking about . "
43016019	Jesus knew they wanted to ask him , so he said , “ Are you trying to find out from each other what I meant when I said , ‘ Soon you won’t see me , and soon after that you will see me ’ ?
43016020	I assure you that you will cry and lament , and the world will be happy . You will be sorrowful , but your sorrow will turn into joy .
43016021	When a woman gives birth , she has pain because her time has come . But when the child is born , she no longer remembers her distress because of her joy that a child has been born into the world .
43016022	In the same way , you have sorrow now ; but I will see you again , and you will be overjoyed . No one takes away your joy .
43016023	In that day , you won’t ask me anything . I assure you that the Father will give you whatever you ask in my name .
43016024	Up to now , you have asked nothing in my name . Ask and you will receive so that your joy will be complete .
43016025	" I’ve been using figures of speech with you . The time is coming when I will no longer speak to you in such analogies . Instead , I will tell you plainly about the Father .
43016026	In that day you will ask in my name . I’m not saying that I will ask the Father on your behalf .
43016027	The Father himself loves you , because you have loved me and believed that I came from God .

43016029	His disciples said , " See ! Now you speak plainly ; you aren’t using figures of speech .
43016030	Now we know that you know everything and you don’t need anyone to ask you . Because of this we believe you have come from God . "
43016031	Jesus replied , " Now you believe ?
43016032	Look ! A time is coming — and is here ! — when each of you will be scattered to your own homes and you will leave me alone . I’m not really alone , for the Father is with me .
43016033	I’ve said these things to you so that you will have peace in me . In the world you have distress . But be encouraged ! I have conquered the world . "
43017001	When Jesus finished saying these things , he looked up to heaven and said , “ Father , the time has come . Glorify your Son , so that the Son can glorify you .

43017003	This is eternal life : to know you , the only true God , and Jesus Christ whom you sent .

43017007	Now they know that everything you have given me comes from you .

43017013	Now I’m coming to you and I say these things while I’m in the world so that they can share completely in my joy .

43017015	I’m not asking that you take them out of this world but that you keep them safe from the evil one .
