43017019	I made myself holy on their behalf so that they also would be made holy in the truth .
43017020	“ I’m not praying only for them but also for those who believe in me because of their word .
43017021	I pray they will be one , Father , just as you are in me and I am in you . I pray that they also will be in us , so that the world will believe that you sent me .
43017022	I’ve given them the glory that you gave me so that they can be one just as we are one .
43017023	I’m in them and you are in me so that they will be made perfectly one . Then the world will know that you sent me and that you have loved them just as you loved me .
43017024	“ Father , I want those you gave me to be with me where I am . Then they can see my glory , which you gave me because you loved me before the creation of the world .
43017025	" Righteous Father , even the world didn’t know you , but I’ve known you , and these believers know that you sent me .
43017026	I’ve made your name known to them and will continue to make it known so that your love for me will be in them , and I myself will be in them . "
43018001	After he said these things , Jesus went out with his disciples and crossed over to the other side of the Kidron Valley . He and his disciples entered a garden there .
43018002	Judas , his betrayer , also knew the place because Jesus often gathered there with his disciples .
43018003	Judas brought a company of soldiers and some guards from the chief priests and Pharisees . They came there carrying lanterns , torches , and weapons .
43018004	Jesus knew everything that was to happen to him , so he went out and asked , " Who are you looking for ? "
43018005	They answered , " Jesus the Nazarene . " He said to them , " I Am . " ( Judas , his betrayer , was standing with them . )
43018006	When he said , " I Am , " they shrank back and fell to the ground .
43018007	He asked them again , " Who are you looking for ? " They said , " Jesus the Nazarene . "
43018008	Jesus answered , " I told you , ‘ I Am . ’ If you are looking for me , then let these people go . "
43018009	This was so that the word he had spoken might be fulfilled : " I didn’t lose anyone of those whom you gave me . "
43018010	Then Simon Peter , who had a sword , drew it and struck the high priest’s servant , cutting off his right ear . ( The servant’s name was Malchus . )
43018011	Jesus told Peter , " Put your sword away ! Am I not to drink the cup the Father has given me ? "
43018012	Then the company of soldiers , the commander , and the guards from the Jewish leaders took Jesus into custody . They bound him
43018013	and led him first to Annas . He was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , the high priest that year . (
43018014	Caiaphas was the one who had advised the Jewish leaders that it was better for one person to die for the people . )
43018015	Simon Peter and another disciple followed Jesus . Because this other disciple was known to the high priest , he went with Jesus into the high priest’s courtyard .
43018016	However , Peter stood outside near the gate . Then the other disciple ( the one known to the high priest ) came out and spoke to the woman stationed at the gate , and she brought Peter in .
43018017	The servant woman stationed at the gate asked Peter , " Aren’t you one of this man’s disciples ? " " I’m not , " he replied .
43018018	The servants and the guards had made a fire because it was cold . They were standing around it , warming themselves . Peter joined them there , standing by the fire and warming himself .
43018019	Meanwhile , the chief priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and his teaching .
43018020	Jesus answered , " I’ve spoken openly to the world . I’ve always taught in synagogues and in the temple , where all the Jews gather . I’ve said nothing in private .
43018021	Why ask me ? Ask those who heard what I told them . They know what I said . "
43018022	After Jesus spoke , one of the guards standing there slapped Jesus in the face . " Is that how you would answer the high priest ? " he asked .
43018023	Jesus replied , " If I speak wrongly , testify about what was wrong . But if I speak correctly , why do you strike me ? "
43018024	Then Annas sent him , bound , to Caiaphas the high priest .
43018025	Meanwhile , Simon Peter was still standing with the guards , warming himself . They asked , " Aren’t you one of his disciples ? " Peter denied it , saying , " I’m not . "
43018026	A servant of the high priest , a relative of the one whose ear Peter had cut off , said to him , " Didn’t I see you in the garden with him ? "
43018027	Peter denied it again , and immediately a rooster crowed .
43018028	The Jewish leaders led Jesus from Caiaphas to the Roman governor’s palace . It was early in the morning . So that they could eat the Passover , the Jewish leaders wouldn’t enter the palace ; entering the palace would have made them ritually impure .
43018029	So Pilate went out to them and asked , " What charge do you bring against this man ? "
43018030	They answered , " If he had done nothing wrong , we wouldn’t have handed him over to you . "
43018031	Pilate responded , " Take him yourselves and judge him according to your Law . " The Jewish leaders replied , " The Law doesn’t allow us to kill anyone . " (
43018032	This was so that Jesus’ word might be fulfilled when he indicated how he was going to die . )
43018033	Pilate went back into the palace . He summoned Jesus and asked , " Are you the king of the Jews ? "
43018034	Jesus answered , " Do you say this on your own or have others spoken to you about me ? "
43018035	Pilate responded , " I’m not a Jew , am I ? Your nation and its chief priests handed you over to me . What have you done ? "
43018036	Jesus replied , " My kingdom doesn’t originate from this world . If it did , my guards would fight so that I wouldn’t have been arrested by the Jewish leaders . My kingdom isn’t from here . "
43018037	" So you are a king ? " Pilate said . Jesus answered , " You say that I am a king . I was born and came into the world for this reason : to testify to the truth . Whoever accepts the truth listens to my voice . "
43018038	" What is truth ? " Pilate asked . After Pilate said this , he returned to the Jewish leaders and said , " I find no grounds for any charge against him .
43018039	You have a custom that I release one prisoner for you at Passover . Do you want me to release for you the king of the Jews ? "
43018040	They shouted , " Not this man ! Give us Barabbas ! " ( Barabbas was an outlaw . )
43019001	Then Pilate had Jesus taken and whipped .
43019002	The soldiers twisted together a crown of thorns and put it on his head , and dressed him in a purple robe .
43019003	Over and over they went up to him and said , " Greetings , king of the Jews ! " And they slapped him in the face .
43019004	Pilate came out of the palace again and said to the Jewish leaders , " Look ! I’m bringing him out to you to let you know that I find no grounds for a charge against him . "
43019005	When Jesus came out , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe , Pilate said to them , " Here’s the man . "
43019006	When the chief priests and their deputies saw him , they shouted out , " Crucify , crucify ! " Pilate told them , " You take him and crucify him . I don’t find any grounds for a charge against him . "
43019007	The Jewish leaders replied , " We have a Law , and according to this Law he ought to die because he made himself out to be God’s Son . "
43019008	When Pilate heard this word , he was even more afraid .
43019009	He went back into the residence and spoke to Jesus , " Where are you from ? " Jesus didn’t answer .
43019010	So Pilate said , " You won’t speak to me ? Don’t you know that I have authority to release you and also to crucify you ? "
43019011	Jesus replied , " You would have no authority over me if it had not been given to you from above . That’s why the one who handed me over to you has the greater sin . "
43019012	From that moment on , Pilate wanted to release Jesus . However , the Jewish leaders cried out , saying , " If you release this man , you aren’t a friend of the emperor ! Anyone who makes himself out to be a king opposes the emperor ! "
43019013	When Pilate heard these words , he led Jesus out and seated him on the judge’s bench at the place called Stone Pavement ( in Aramaic , Gabbatha ) .
43019014	It was about noon on the Preparation Day for the Passover . Pilate said to the Jewish leaders , " Here’s your king . "
43019015	The Jewish leaders cried out , " Take him away ! Take him away ! Crucify him ! " Pilate responded , " What ? Do you want me to crucify your king ? " " We have no king except the emperor , " the chief priests answered .
43019016	Then Pilate handed Jesus over to be crucified . The soldiers took Jesus prisoner .
43019017	Carrying his cross by himself , he went out to a place called Skull Place ( in Aramaic , Golgotha ) .
43019018	That’s where they crucified him — and two others with him , one on each side and Jesus in the middle .
43019019	Pilate had a public notice written and posted on the cross . It read " Jesus the Nazarene , the king of the Jews . "
43019020	Many of the Jews read this sign , for the place where Jesus was crucified was near the city and it was written in Aramaic , Latin , and Greek .
43019021	Therefore , the Jewish chief priests complained to Pilate , " Don’t write , ‘ The king of the Jews ’ but ‘ This man said , " I am the king of the Jews . " ’ "
43019022	Pilate answered , " What I’ve written , I’ve written . "
43019023	When the soldiers crucified Jesus , they took his clothes and his sandals , and divided them into four shares , one for each soldier . His shirt was seamless , woven as one piece from the top to the bottom .
43019024	They said to each other , " Let’s not tear it . Let’s cast lots to see who will get it . " This was to fulfill the scripture , They divided my clothes among themselves , and they cast lots for my clothing .
43019025	Jesus’ mother and his mother’s sister , Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene stood near the cross .
43019026	When Jesus saw his mother and the disciple whom he loved standing nearby , he said to his mother , " Woman , here is your son . "
43019027	Then he said to the disciple , " Here is your mother . " And from that time on , this disciple took her into his home .
43019028	After this , knowing that everything was already completed , in order to fulfill the scripture , Jesus said , " I am thirsty . "
43019029	A jar full of sour wine was nearby , so the soldiers soaked a sponge in it , placed it on a hyssop branch , and held it up to his lips .
43019030	When he had received the sour wine , Jesus said , " It is completed . " Bowing his head , he gave up his life .
43019031	It was the Preparation Day and the Jewish leaders didn’t want the bodies to remain on the cross on the Sabbath , especially since that Sabbath was an important day . So they asked Pilate to have the legs of those crucified broken and the bodies taken down .
43019032	Therefore , the soldiers came and broke the legs of the two men who were crucified with Jesus .
43019033	When they came to Jesus , they saw that he was already dead so they didn’t break his legs .
43019034	However , one of the soldiers pierced his side with a spear , and immediately blood and water came out .
43019035	The one who saw this has testified , and his testimony is true . He knows that he speaks the truth , and he has testified so that you also can believe .
43019036	These things happened to fulfill the scripture , They won’t break any of his bones .
43019037	And another scripture says , They will look at him whom they have pierced .
43019038	After this Joseph of Arimathea asked Pilate if he could take away the body of Jesus . Joseph was a disciple of Jesus , but a secret one because he feared the Jewish authorities . Pilate gave him permission , so he came and took the body away .
43019039	Nicodemus , the one who at first had come to Jesus at night , was there too . He brought a mixture of myrrh and aloe , nearly seventy-five pounds in all .
43019040	Following Jewish burial customs , they took Jesus’ body and wrapped it , with the spices , in linen cloths .
43019041	There was a garden in the place where Jesus was crucified , and in the garden was a new tomb in which no one had ever been laid .
43019042	Because it was the Jewish Preparation Day and the tomb was nearby , they laid Jesus in it .
43020001	Early in the morning of the first day of the week , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene came to the tomb and saw that the stone had been taken away from the tomb .
43020002	She ran to Simon Peter and the other disciple , the one whom Jesus loved , and said , " They have taken the Lord from the tomb , and we don’t know where they’ve put him . "
43020003	Peter and the other disciple left to go to the tomb .
43020004	They were running together , but the other disciple ran faster than Peter and was the first to arrive at the tomb .
43020005	Bending down to take a look , he saw the linen cloths lying there , but he didn’t go in .
43020006	Following him , Simon Peter entered the tomb and saw the linen cloths lying there .
43020007	He also saw the face cloth that had been on Jesus’ head . It wasn’t with the other clothes but was folded up in its own place .
43020008	Then the other disciple , the one who arrived at the tomb first , also went inside . He saw and believed .
43020009	They didn’t yet understand the scripture that Jesus must rise from the dead .
43020010	Then the disciples returned to the place where they were staying .
43020011	Mary stood outside near the tomb , crying . As she cried , she bent down to look into the tomb .
43020012	She saw two angels dressed in white , seated where the body of Jesus had been , one at the head and one at the foot .
43020013	The angels asked her , " Woman , why are you crying ? " She replied , " They have taken away my Lord , and I don’t know where they’ve put him . "
43020014	As soon as she had said this , she turned around and saw Jesus standing there , but she didn’t know it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus said to her , " Woman , why are you crying ? Who are you looking for ? " Thinking he was the gardener , she replied , " Sir , if you have carried him away , tell me where you have put him and I will get him . "
43020016	Jesus said to her , " Mary . " She turned and said to him in Aramaic , " Rabbouni " ( which means Teacher ) .
43020017	Jesus said to her , " Don’t hold on to me , for I haven’t yet gone up to my Father . Go to my brothers and sisters and tell them , ‘ I’m going up to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God . ’ "
43020018	Mary Magdalene left and announced to the disciples , " I’ve seen the Lord . " Then she told them what he said to her .
43020019	It was still the first day of the week . That evening , while the disciples were behind closed doors because they were afraid of the Jewish authorities , Jesus came and stood among them . He said , " Peace be with you . "
43020020	After he said this , he showed them his hands and his side . When the disciples saw the Lord , they were filled with joy .
43020021	Jesus said to them again , " Peace be with you . As the Father sent me , so I am sending you . "
43020022	Then he breathed on them and said , " Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive anyone’s sins , they are forgiven ; if you don’t forgive them , they aren’t forgiven . "
43020024	Thomas , the one called Didymus , one of the Twelve , wasn’t with the disciples when Jesus came .
43020025	The other disciples told him , " We’ve seen the Lord ! " But he replied , " Unless I see the nail marks in his hands , put my finger in the wounds left by the nails , and put my hand into his side , I won’t believe . "
43020026	After eight days his disciples were again in a house and Thomas was with them . Even though the doors were locked , Jesus entered and stood among them . He said , " Peace be with you . "
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , " Put your finger here . Look at my hands . Put your hand into my side . No more disbelief . Believe ! "
43020028	Thomas responded to Jesus , " My Lord and my God ! "
43020029	Jesus replied , " Do you believe because you see me ? Happy are those who don’t see and yet believe . "
43020030	Then Jesus did many other miraculous signs in his disciples’ presence , signs that aren’t recorded in this scroll .
43020031	But these things are written so that you will believe that Jesus is the Christ , God’s Son , and that believing , you will have life in his name .
43021001	Later , Jesus himself appeared again to his disciples at the Sea of Tiberius . This is how it happened :
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( called Didymus ) , Nathanael from Cana in Galilee , Zebedee’s sons , and two other disciples were together .
43021003	Simon Peter told them , " I’m going fishing . " They said , " We’ll go with you . " They set out in a boat , but throughout the night they caught nothing .
43021004	Early in the morning , Jesus stood on the shore , but the disciples didn’t realize it was Jesus .
43021005	Jesus called to them , " Children , have you caught anything to eat ? " They answered him , " No . "
43021006	He said , " Cast your net on the right side of the boat and you will find some . " So they did , and there were so many fish that they couldn’t haul in the net .
43021007	Then the disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , " It’s the Lord ! " When Simon Peter heard it was the Lord , he wrapped his coat around himself ( for he was naked ) and jumped into the water .
43021008	The other disciples followed in the boat , dragging the net full of fish , for they weren’t far from shore , only about one hundred yards .
43021009	When they landed , they saw a fire there , with fish on it , and some bread .
43021010	Jesus said to them , " Bring some of the fish that you’ve just caught . "
43021011	Simon Peter got up and pulled the net to shore . It was full of large fish , one hundred fifty-three of them . Yet the net hadn’t torn , even with so many fish .
43021012	Jesus said to them , " Come and have breakfast . " None of the disciples could bring themselves to ask him , " Who are you ? " They knew it was the Lord .
43021013	Jesus came , took the bread , and gave it to them . He did the same with the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time Jesus appeared to his disciples after he was raised from the dead .
43021015	When they finished eating , Jesus asked Simon Peter , " Simon son of John , do you love me more than these ? " Simon replied , " Yes , Lord , you know I love you . " Jesus said to him , " Feed my lambs . "
43021016	Jesus asked a second time , " Simon son of John , do you love me ? " Simon replied , " Yes , Lord , you know I love you . " Jesus said to him , " Take care of my sheep . "
43021017	He asked a third time , " Simon son of John , do you love me ? " Peter was sad that Jesus asked him a third time , " Do you love me ? " He replied , " Lord , you know everything ; you know I love you . " Jesus said to him , " Feed my sheep .
43021018	I assure you that when you were younger you tied your own belt and walked around wherever you wanted . When you grow old , you will stretch out your hands and another will tie your belt and lead you where you don’t want to go . "
43021019	He said this to show the kind of death by which Peter would glorify God . After saying this , Jesus said to Peter , " Follow me . "
43021020	Peter turned around and saw the disciple whom Jesus loved following them . This was the one who had leaned against Jesus at the meal and asked him , " Lord , who is going to betray you ? "
43021021	When Peter saw this disciple , he said to Jesus , " Lord , what about him ? "
43021022	Jesus replied , " If I want him to remain until I come , what difference does that make to you ? You must follow me . "
43021023	Therefore , the word spread among the brothers and sisters that this disciple wouldn’t die . However , Jesus didn’t say he wouldn’t die , but only , " If I want him to remain until I come , what difference does that make to you ? "
43021024	This is the disciple who testifies concerning these things and who wrote them down . We know that his testimony is true .
43021025	Jesus did many other things as well . If all of them were recorded , I imagine the world itself wouldn’t have enough room for the scrolls that would be written .
44001001	Theophilus , the first scroll I wrote concerned everything Jesus did and taught from the beginning ,
44001002	right up to the day when he was taken up into heaven . Before he was taken up , working in the power of the Holy Spirit , Jesus instructed the apostles he had chosen .
44001003	After his suffering , he showed them that he was alive with many convincing proofs . He appeared to them over a period of forty days , speaking to them about God’s kingdom .
44001004	While they were eating together , he ordered them not to leave Jerusalem but to wait for what the Father had promised . He said , " This is what you heard from me :
44001005	John baptized with water , but in only a few days you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . "
44001006	As a result , those who had gathered together asked Jesus , " Lord , are you going to restore the kingdom to Israel now ? "
44001007	Jesus replied , " It isn’t for you to know the times or seasons that the Father has set by his own authority .
44001008	Rather , you will receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you , and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem , in all Judea and Samaria , and to the end of the earth . "
44001009	After Jesus said these things , as they were watching , he was lifted up and a cloud took him out of their sight .
44001010	While he was going away and as they were staring toward heaven , suddenly two men in white robes stood next to them .

44001012	Then they returned to Jerusalem from the Mount of Olives , which is near Jerusalem — a sabbath day’s journey away .
44001013	When they entered the city , they went to the upstairs room where they were staying . Peter , John , James , and Andrew ; Philip and Thomas ; Bartholomew and Matthew ; James , Alphaeus’ son ; Simon the zealot ; and Judas , James’ son —
44001014	all were united in their devotion to prayer , along with some women , including Mary the mother of Jesus , and his brothers .
44001015	During this time , the family of believers was a company of about one hundred twenty persons . Peter stood among them and said ,
44001016	" Brothers and sisters , the scripture that the Holy Spirit announced beforehand through David had to be fulfilled . This was the scripture concerning Judas , who became a guide for those who arrested Jesus .
44001017	This happened even though he was one of us and received a share of this ministry . " (
44001018	In fact , he bought a field with the payment he received for his injustice . Falling headfirst , he burst open in the middle and all his intestines spilled out .
44001019	This became known to everyone living in Jerusalem , so they called that field in their own language Hakeldama , or " Field of Blood . " )
44001020	“ It is written in the Psalms scroll , Let his home become deserted and let there be no one living in it ; and Give his position of leadership to another .
44001021	" Therefore , we must select one of those who have accompanied us during the whole time the Lord Jesus lived among us ,
44001022	beginning from the baptism of John until the day when Jesus was taken from us . This person must become along with us a witness to his resurrection . "
44001023	So they nominated two : Joseph called Barsabbas , who was also known as Justus , and Matthias .
44001024	They prayed , " Lord , you know everyone’s deepest thoughts and desires . Show us clearly which one you have chosen from among these two
44001025	to take the place of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas turned away to go to his own place . "
44001026	When they cast lots , the lot fell on Matthias . He was added to the eleven apostles .
44002001	When Pentecost Day arrived , they were all together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly a sound from heaven like the howling of a fierce wind filled the entire house where they were sitting .
44002003	They saw what seemed to be individual flames of fire alighting on each one of them .
44002004	They were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other languages as the Spirit enabled them to speak .
44002005	There were pious Jews from every nation under heaven living in Jerusalem .
44002006	When they heard this sound , a crowd gathered . They were mystified because everyone heard them speaking in their native languages .
44002007	They were surprised and amazed , saying , " Look , aren’t all the people who are speaking Galileans , every one of them ?
44002008	How then can each of us hear them speaking in our native language ?
44002009	Parthians , Medes , and Elamites ; as well as residents of Mesopotamia , Judea , and Cappadocia , Pontus and Asia ,
44002010	Phrygia and Pamphylia , Egypt and the regions of Libya bordering Cyrene ; and visitors from Rome ( both Jews and converts to Judaism ) ,
44002011	Cretans and Arabs — we hear them declaring the mighty works of God in our own languages ! "
44002012	They were all surprised and bewildered . Some asked each other , " What does this mean ? "
44002013	Others jeered at them , saying , " They’re full of new wine ! "
44002014	Peter stood with the other eleven apostles . He raised his voice and declared , “ Judeans and everyone living in Jerusalem ! Know this ! Listen carefully to my words !
44002015	These people aren’t drunk , as you suspect ; after all , it’s only nine o’clock in the morning !
44002016	Rather , this is what was spoken through the prophet Joel :
44002017	In the last days , God says , I will pour out my Spirit on all people . Your sons and daughters will prophesy . Your young will see visions . Your elders will dream dreams .
44002018	Even upon my servants , men and women ,
44002019	I will cause wonders to occur in the heavens above and signs on the earth below ,
44002020	The sun will be changed into darkness , and the moon will be changed into blood ,
44002021	And everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved .
44002022	“ Fellow Israelites , listen to these words ! Jesus the Nazarene was a man whose credentials God proved to you through miracles , wonders , and signs , which God performed through him among you . You yourselves know this .
44002023	In accordance with God’s established plan and foreknowledge , he was betrayed . You , with the help of wicked men , had Jesus killed by nailing him to a cross .
44002024	God raised him up ! God freed him from death’s dreadful grip , since it was impossible for death to hang on to him .
44002025	David says about him , I foresaw that the Lord was always with me ; because he is at my right hand I won’t be shaken .
44002026	Therefore , my heart was glad and my tongue rejoiced . Moreover , my body will live in hope , nor permit your holy one to experience decay .
44002028	You have shown me the paths of life ; your presence will fill me with happiness .
44002029	“ Brothers and sisters , I can speak confidently about the patriarch David . He died and was buried , and his tomb is with us to this very day .
44002030	Because he was a prophet , he knew that God promised him with a solemn pledge to seat one of his descendants on his throne .
44002031	Having seen this beforehand , David spoke about the resurrection of Christ , that he wasn’t abandoned to the grave , nor did his body experience decay .
44002032	This Jesus , God raised up . We are all witnesses to that fact .
44002033	He was exalted to God’s right side and received from the Father the promised Holy Spirit . He poured out this Spirit , and you are seeing and hearing the results of his having done so .
44002034	David didn’t ascend into heaven . Yet he says , The Lord said to my Lord , ‘ Sit at my right side ,
44002035	until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet . ’
44002036	" Therefore , let all Israel know beyond question that God has made this Jesus , whom you crucified , both Lord and Christ . "
44002037	When the crowd heard this , they were deeply troubled . They said to Peter and the other apostles , " Brothers , what should we do ? "
44002038	Peter replied , " Change your hearts and lives . Each of you must be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins . Then you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit .
44002039	This promise is for you , your children , and for all who are far away — as many as the Lord our God invites . "

44002041	Those who accepted Peter’s message were baptized . God brought about three thousand people into the community on that day .
44002042	The believers devoted themselves to the apostles’ teaching , to the community , to their shared meals , and to their prayers .
44002043	A sense of awe came over everyone . God performed many wonders and signs through the apostles .
44002044	All the believers were united and shared everything .
44002045	They would sell pieces of property and possessions and distribute the proceeds to everyone who needed them .
44002046	Every day , they met together in the temple and ate in their homes . They shared food with gladness and simplicity .
44002047	They praised God and demonstrated God’s goodness to everyone . The Lord added daily to the community those who were being saved .
44003001	Peter and John were going up to the temple at three o’clock in the afternoon , the established prayer time .
44003002	Meanwhile , a man crippled since birth was being carried in . Every day , people would place him at the temple gate known as the Beautiful Gate so he could ask for money from those entering the temple .
44003003	When he saw Peter and John about to enter , he began to ask them for a gift .
44003004	Peter and John stared at him . Peter said , " Look at us ! "
44003005	So the man gazed at them , expecting to receive something from them .
44003006	Peter said , " I don’t have any money , but I will give you what I do have . In the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene , rise up and walk ! "
44003007	Then he grasped the man’s right hand and raised him up . At once his feet and ankles became strong .
44003008	Jumping up , he began to walk around . He entered the temple with them , walking , leaping , and praising God .
44003009	All the people saw him walking and praising God .
44003010	They recognized him as the same one who used to sit at the temple’s Beautiful Gate asking for money . They were filled with amazement and surprise at what had happened to him .
44003011	While the healed man clung to Peter and John , all the people rushed toward them at Solomon’s Porch , completely amazed .
44003012	Seeing this , Peter addressed the people : “ You Israelites , why are you amazed at this ? Why are you staring at us as if we made him walk by our own power or piety ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob — the God of our ancestors — has glorified his servant Jesus . This is the one you handed over and denied in Pilate’s presence , even though he had already decided to release him .
44003014	You rejected the holy and righteous one , and asked that a murderer be released to you instead .
44003015	You killed the author of life , the very one whom God raised from the dead . We are witnesses of this .
44003016	His name itself has made this man strong . That is , because of faith in Jesus’ name , God has strengthened this man whom you see and know . The faith that comes through Jesus gave him complete health right before your eyes .
44003017	" Brothers and sisters , I know you acted in ignorance . So did your rulers .
44003018	But this is how God fulfilled what he foretold through all the prophets : that his Christ would suffer .
44003019	Change your hearts and lives ! Turn back to God so that your sins may be wiped away .
44003020	Then the Lord will provide a season of relief from the distress of this age and he will send Jesus , whom he handpicked to be your Christ .
44003021	Jesus must remain in heaven until the restoration of all things , about which God spoke long ago through his holy prophets .
44003022	Moses said , The Lord your God will raise up from your own people a prophet like me . Listen to whatever he tells you .
44003023	Whoever doesn’t listen to that prophet will be totally cut off from the people .
44003024	All the prophets who spoke — from Samuel forward — announced these days .
44003025	You are the heirs of the prophets and the covenant that God made with your ancestors when he told Abraham , Through your descendants , all the families on earth will be blessed .
44003026	After God raised his servant , he sent him to you first — to bless you by enabling each of you to turn from your evil ways . "
44004001	While Peter and John were speaking to the people , the priests , the captain of the temple guard , and the Sadducees confronted them .
44004002	They were incensed that the apostles were teaching the people and announcing that the resurrection of the dead was happening because of Jesus .
44004003	They seized Peter and John and put them in prison until the next day . ( It was already evening . )
44004004	Many who heard the word became believers , and their number grew to about five thousand .
44004005	The next day the leaders , elders , and legal experts gathered in Jerusalem ,
44004006	along with Annas the high priest , Caiaphas , John , Alexander , and others from the high priest’s family .
44004007	They had Peter and John brought before them and asked , " By what power or in what name did you do this ? "
44004008	Then Peter , inspired by the Holy Spirit , answered , " Leaders of the people and elders ,
44004009	are we being examined today because something good was done for a sick person , a good deed that healed him ?
44004010	If so , then you and all the people of Israel need to know that this man stands healthy before you because of the name of Jesus Christ the Nazarene — whom you crucified but whom God raised from the dead .
44004011	This Jesus is the stone you builders rejected ; he has become the cornerstone !
44004012	Salvation can be found in no one else . Throughout the whole world , no other name has been given among humans through which we must be saved . "
44004013	The council was caught by surprise by the confidence with which Peter and John spoke . After all , they understood that these apostles were uneducated and inexperienced . They also recognized that they had been followers of Jesus .
44004014	However , since the healed man was standing with Peter and John before their own eyes , they had no rebuttal .
44004015	After ordering them to wait outside , the council members began to confer with each other .
44004016	" What should we do with these men ? Everyone living in Jerusalem is aware of the sign performed through them . It’s obvious to everyone and we can’t deny it .

44004018	When they called Peter and John back , they demanded that they stop all speaking and teaching in the name of Jesus .
44004019	Peter and John responded , " It’s up to you to determine whether it’s right before God to obey you rather than God .
44004020	As for us , we can’t stop speaking about what we have seen and heard . "
44004021	They threatened them further , then released them . Because of public support for Peter and John , they couldn’t find a way to punish them . Everyone was praising God for what had happened ,
44004022	because the man who had experienced this sign of healing was over 40 years old .
44004023	After their release , Peter and John returned to the brothers and sisters and reported everything the chief priests and elders had said .
44004024	They listened , then lifted their voices in unison to God , " Master , you are the one who created the heaven , the earth , the sea , and everything in them .
44004025	You are the one who spoke by the Holy Spirit through our ancestor David , your servant : Why did the Gentiles rage , and the peoples plot in vain ?
44004026	The kings of the earth took their stand and the rulers gathered together as one against the Lord and against his Christ .

44004029	Now , Lord , take note of their threats and enable your servants to speak your word with complete confidence .

44004031	After they prayed , the place where they were gathered was shaken . They were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began speaking God’s word with confidence .
44004032	The community of believers was one in heart and mind . None of them would say , " This is mine ! " about any of their possessions , but held everything in common .
44004033	The apostles continued to bear powerful witness to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus , and an abundance of grace was at work among them all .
44004034	There were no needy persons among them . Those who owned properties or houses would sell them , bring the proceeds from the sales ,
44004035	and place them in the care and under the authority of the apostles . Then it was distributed to anyone who was in need .
44004036	Joseph , whom the apostles nicknamed Barnabas ( that is , " one who encourages " ) , was a Levite from Cyprus .
44004037	He owned a field , sold it , brought the money , and placed it in the care and under the authority of the apostles .
44005001	However , a man named Ananias , along with his wife Sapphira , sold a piece of property .
44005002	With his wife’s knowledge , he withheld some of the proceeds from the sale . He brought the rest and placed it in the care and under the authority of the apostles .
44005003	Peter asked , " Ananias , how is it that Satan has influenced you to lie to the Holy Spirit by withholding some of the proceeds from the sale of your land ?
44005004	Wasn’t that property yours to keep ? After you sold it , wasn’t the money yours to do with whatever you wanted ? What made you think of such a thing ? You haven’t lied to other people but to God ! "
44005005	When Ananias heard these words , he dropped dead . Everyone who heard this conversation was terrified .
44005006	Some young men stood up , wrapped up his body , carried him out , and buried him .
44005007	About three hours later , his wife entered , but she didn’t know what had happened to her husband .
44005008	Peter asked her , " Tell me , did you and your husband receive this price for the field ? " She responded , " Yes , that’s the amount . "
44005009	He replied , " How could you scheme with each other to challenge the Lord’s Spirit ? Look ! The feet of those who buried your husband are at the door . They will carry you out too . "
44005010	At that very moment , she dropped dead at his feet . When the young men entered and found her dead , they carried her out and buried her with her husband .
44005011	Trepidation and dread seized the whole church and all who heard what had happened .
44005012	The apostles performed many signs and wonders among the people . They would come together regularly at Solomon’s Porch .
44005013	No one from outside the church dared to join them , even though the people spoke highly of them .
44005014	Indeed , more and more believers in the Lord , large numbers of both men and women , were added to the church .
44005015	As a result , they would even bring the sick out into the main streets and lay them on cots and mats so that at least Peter’s shadow could fall on some of them as he passed by .
44005016	Even large numbers of persons from towns around Jerusalem would gather , bringing the sick and those harassed by unclean spirits . Everyone was healed .
44005017	The high priest , together with his allies , the Sadducees , was overcome with jealousy .
44005018	They seized the apostles and made a public show of putting them in prison .
44005019	An angel from the Lord opened the prison doors during the night and led them out . The angel told them ,
44005020	" Go , take your place in the temple , and tell the people everything about this new life . "
44005021	Early in the morning , they went into the temple as they had been told and began to teach . When the high priest and his colleagues gathered , they convened the Jerusalem Council , that is , the full assembly of Israel’s elders . They sent word to the prison to have the apostles brought before them .
44005022	However , the guards didn’t find them in the prison . They returned and reported ,
44005023	" We found the prison locked and well-secured , with guards standing at the doors , but when we opened the doors we found no one inside ! "
44005024	When they received this news , the captain of the temple guard and the chief priests were baffled and wondered what might be happening .
44005025	Just then , someone arrived and announced , " Look ! The people you put in prison are standing in the temple and teaching the people ! "
44005026	Then the captain left with his guards and brought the apostles back . They didn’t use force because they were afraid the people would stone them .
44005027	The apostles were brought before the council where the high priest confronted them :
44005028	" In no uncertain terms , we demanded that you not teach in this name . And look at you ! You have filled Jerusalem with your teaching . And you are determined to hold us responsible for this man’s death . "
44005029	Peter and the apostles replied , " We must obey God rather than humans !
44005030	The God of our ancestors raised Jesus from the dead — whom you killed by hanging him on a tree .
44005031	God has exalted Jesus to his right side as leader and savior so that he could enable Israel to change its heart and life and to find forgiveness for sins .
44005032	We are witnesses of such things , as is the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to those who obey him . "
44005033	When the council members heard this , they became furious and wanted to kill the apostles .
44005034	One council member , a Pharisee and teacher of the Law named Gamaliel , well-respected by all the people , stood up and ordered that the men be taken outside for a few moments .
44005035	He said , " Fellow Israelites , consider carefully what you intend to do to these people .
44005036	Some time ago , Theudas appeared , claiming to be somebody , and some four hundred men joined him . After he was killed , all of his followers scattered , and nothing came of that .
44005037	Afterward , at the time of the census , Judas the Galilean appeared and got some people to follow him in a revolt . He was killed too , and all his followers scattered far and wide .
44005038	Here’s my recommendation in this case : Distance yourselves from these men . Let them go ! If their plan or activity is of human origin , it will end in ruin .
44005039	If it originates with God , you won’t be able to stop them . Instead , you would actually find yourselves fighting God ! " The council was convinced by his reasoning .
44005040	After calling the apostles back , they had them beaten . They ordered them not to speak in the name of Jesus , then let them go .
44005041	The apostles left the council rejoicing because they had been regarded as worthy to suffer disgrace for the sake of the name .
44005042	Every day they continued to teach and proclaim the good news that Jesus is the Christ , both in the temple and in houses .
44006001	About that time , while the number of disciples continued to increase , a complaint arose . Greek-speaking disciples accused the Aramaic-speaking disciples because their widows were being overlooked in the daily food service .
44006002	The Twelve called a meeting of all the disciples and said , " It isn’t right for us to set aside proclamation of God’s word in order to serve tables .
44006003	Brothers and sisters , carefully choose seven well-respected men from among you . They must be well-respected and endowed by the Spirit with exceptional wisdom . We will put them in charge of this concern .
44006004	As for us , we will devote ourselves to prayer and the service of proclaiming the word . "
44006005	This proposal pleased the entire community . They selected Stephen , a man endowed by the Holy Spirit with exceptional faith , Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolaus from Antioch , a convert to Judaism .
44006006	The community presented these seven to the apostles , who prayed and laid their hands on them .
44006007	God’s word continued to grow . The number of disciples in Jerusalem increased significantly . Even a large group of priests embraced the faith .
44006008	Stephen , who stood out among the believers for the way God’s grace was at work in his life and for his exceptional endowment with divine power , was doing great wonders and signs among the people .
44006009	Opposition arose from some who belonged to the so-called Synagogue of Former Slaves . Members from Cyrene , Alexandria , Cilicia , and Asia entered into debate with Stephen .
44006010	However , they couldn’t resist the wisdom the Spirit gave him as he spoke .
44006011	Then they secretly enticed some people to claim , " We heard him insult Moses and God . "
44006012	They stirred up the people , the elders , and the legal experts . They caught Stephen , dragged him away , and brought him before the Jerusalem Council .
44006013	Before the council , they presented false witnesses who testified , " This man never stops speaking against this holy place and the Law .
44006014	In fact , we heard him say that this man Jesus of Nazareth will destroy this place and alter the customary practices Moses gave us . "
44006015	Everyone seated in the council stared at Stephen , and they saw that his face was radiant , just like an angel’s .
44007001	The high priest asked , " Are these accusations true ? "
44007002	Stephen responded , “ Brothers and fathers , listen to me . Our glorious God appeared to our ancestor Abraham while he was still in Mesopotamia , before he settled in Haran .
44007003	God told him , ‘ Leave your homeland and kin , and go to the land that I will show you . ’
44007004	So Abraham left the land of the Chaldeans and settled in Haran . After Abraham’s father died , God had him resettle in this land where you now live .
44007005	God didn’t give him an inheritance here , not even a square foot of land . However , God did promise to give the land as his possession to him and to his descendants , even though Abraham had no child .
44007006	God put it this way : His descendants will be strangers in a land that belongs to others , who will enslave them and abuse them for four hundred years .
44007007	And I will condemn the nation they serve as slaves , God said , and afterward they will leave that land and serve me in this place .
44007008	God gave him the covenant confirmed through circumcision . Accordingly , eight days after Isaac’s birth , Abraham circumcised him . Isaac did the same with Jacob , and Jacob with the twelve patriarchs .
44007009	“ Because the patriarchs were jealous of Joseph , they sold him into slavery in Egypt . God was with him , however ,
44007010	and rescued him from all his troubles . The grace and wisdom he gave Joseph were recognized by Pharaoh , king of Egypt , who appointed him ruler over Egypt and over his whole palace .
44007011	A famine came upon all Egypt and Canaan , and great hardship came with it . Our ancestors had nothing to eat .
44007012	When Jacob heard there was grain in Egypt , he sent our ancestors there for the first time .
44007013	During their second visit , Joseph told his brothers who he was , and Pharaoh learned about Joseph’s family .
44007014	Joseph sent for his father Jacob and all his relatives — seventy-five in all — and invited them to live with him .
44007015	So Jacob went down to Egypt , where he and our ancestors died .
44007016	Their bodies were brought back to Shechem and placed in the tomb that Abraham had purchased for a certain sum of money from Hamor’s children , who lived in Shechem .
44007017	“ When it was time for God to keep the promise he made to Abraham , the number of our people in Egypt had greatly expanded .
44007018	But then another king rose to power over Egypt who didn’t know anything about Joseph .
44007019	He exploited our people and abused our ancestors . He even forced them to abandon their newly born babies so they would die .
44007020	That’s when Moses was born . He was highly favored by God , and for three months his parents cared for him in their home .
44007021	After he was abandoned , Pharaoh’s daughter adopted and cared for him as though he were her own son .
44007022	Moses learned everything Egyptian wisdom had to offer , and he was a man of powerful words and deeds .
44007023	“ When Moses was 40 years old , he decided to visit his family , the Israelites .
44007024	He saw one of them being wronged so he came to his rescue and evened the score by killing the Egyptian .
44007025	He expected his own kin to understand that God was using him to rescue them , but they didn’t .
44007026	The next day he came upon some Israelites who were caught up in an argument . He tried to make peace between them by saying , ‘ You are brothers ! Why are you harming each other ? ’
44007027	The one who started the fight against his neighbor pushed Moses aside and said , ‘ Who appointed you as our leader and judge ?
44007028	Are you planning to kill me like you killed that Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	When Moses heard this , he fled to Midian , where he lived as an immigrant and had two sons .
44007030	“ Forty years later , an angel appeared to Moses in the flame of a burning bush in the wilderness near Mount Sinai .
44007031	Enthralled by the sight , Moses approached to get a closer look and he heard the Lord’s voice :
44007032	‘ I am the God of your ancestors , the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’ Trembling with fear , Moses didn’t dare to investigate any further .
44007033	The Lord continued , ‘ Remove the sandals from your feet , for the place where you are standing is holy ground .
44007034	I have clearly seen the oppression my people have experienced in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning . I have come down to rescue them . Come ! I am sending you to Egypt . ’
44007035	“ This is the same Moses whom they rejected when they asked , ‘ Who appointed you as our leader and judge ? ’ This is the Moses whom God sent as leader and deliverer . God did this with the help of the angel who appeared before him in the bush .
44007036	This man led them out after he performed wonders and signs in Egypt at the Red Sea and for forty years in the wilderness .
44007037	This is the Moses who told the Israelites , ‘ God will raise up for you a prophet like me from your own people . ’
44007038	This is the one who was in the assembly in the wilderness with our ancestors and with the angel who spoke to him on Mount Sinai . He is the one who received life-giving words to give to us .
44007039	He’s also the one whom our ancestors refused to obey . Instead , they pushed him aside and , in their thoughts and desires , returned to Egypt .
44007040	They told Aaron , ‘ Make us gods that will lead us . As for this Moses who led us out of Egypt , we don’t know what’s happened to him ! ’
44007041	That’s when they made an idol in the shape of a calf , offered a sacrifice to it , and began to celebrate what they had made with their own hands .
44007042	So God turned away from them and handed them over to worship the stars in the sky , just as it is written in the scroll of the Prophets : Did you bring sacrifices and offerings to me for forty years in the wilderness , house of Israel ?
44007043	No ! Instead , you took the tent of Moloch with you , and the star of your god Rephan , the images that you made in order to worship them .
44007044	“ The tent of testimony was with our ancestors in the wilderness . Moses built it just as he had been instructed by the one who spoke to him and according to the pattern he had seen .
44007045	In time , when they had received the tent , our ancestors carried it with them when , under Joshua’s leadership , they took possession of the land from the nations whom God expelled . This tent remained in the land until the time of David .
44007046	God approved of David , who asked that he might provide a dwelling place for the God of Jacob .
44007047	But it was Solomon who actually built a house for God .
44007048	However , the Most High doesn’t live in houses built by human hands . As the prophet says ,
44007049	Heaven is my throne , and the earth is my footstool . ‘ What kind of house will you build for me , ’ says the Lord , ‘ or where is my resting place ?
44007050	Didn’t I make all these things with my own hand ? ’
44007051	" You stubborn people ! In your thoughts and hearing , you are like those who have had no part in God’s covenant ! You continuously set yourself against the Holy Spirit , just like your ancestors did .
44007052	Was there a single prophet your ancestors didn’t harass ? They even killed those who predicted the coming of the righteous one , and you’ve betrayed and murdered him !
44007053	You received the Law given by angels , but you haven’t kept it . "
44007054	Once the council members heard these words , they were enraged and began to grind their teeth at Stephen .
44007055	But Stephen , enabled by the Holy Spirit , stared into heaven and saw God’s majesty and Jesus standing at God’s right side .
44007056	He exclaimed , " Look ! I can see heaven on display and the Human One standing at God’s right side ! "
44007057	At this , they shrieked and covered their ears . Together , they charged at him ,
44007058	threw him out of the city , and began to stone him . The witnesses placed their coats in the care of a young man named Saul .
44007059	As they battered him with stones , Stephen prayed , " Lord Jesus , accept my life ! "
44007060	Falling to his knees , he shouted , " Lord , don’t hold this sin against them ! " Then he died .
44008001	Saul was in full agreement with Stephen’s murder . At that time , the church in Jerusalem began to be subjected to vicious harassment . Everyone except the apostles was scattered throughout the regions of Judea and Samaria .
44008002	Some pious men buried Stephen and deeply grieved over him .
44008003	Saul began to wreak havoc against the church . Entering one house after another , he would drag off both men and women and throw them into prison .
44008004	Those who had been scattered moved on , preaching the good news along the way .
44008005	Philip went down to a city in Samaria and began to preach Christ to them .
44008006	The crowds were united by what they heard Philip say and the signs they saw him perform , and they gave him their undivided attention .
44008007	With loud shrieks , unclean spirits came out of many people , and many who were paralyzed or crippled were healed .
44008008	There was great rejoicing in that city .
44008009	Before Philip’s arrival , a certain man named Simon had practiced sorcery in that city and baffled the people of Samaria . He claimed to be a great person .
44008010	Everyone , from the least to the greatest , gave him their undivided attention and referred to him as " the power of God called Great . "
44008011	He had their attention because he had baffled them with sorcery for a long time .
44008012	After they came to believe Philip , who preached the good news about God’s kingdom and the name of Jesus Christ , both men and women were baptized .
44008013	Even Simon himself came to believe and was baptized . Afterward , he became one of Philip’s supporters . As he saw firsthand the signs and great miracles that were happening , he was astonished .
44008014	When word reached the apostles in Jerusalem that Samaria had accepted God’s word , they commissioned Peter and John to go to Samaria .
44008015	Peter and John went down to Samaria where they prayed that the new believers would receive the Holy Spirit . (
44008016	This was because the Holy Spirit had not yet fallen on any of them ; they had only been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
44008017	So Peter and John laid their hands on them , and they received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	When Simon perceived that the Spirit was given through the laying on of the apostles’ hands , he offered them money .
44008019	He said , " Give me this authority too so that anyone on whom I lay my hands will receive the Holy Spirit . "
44008020	Peter responded , " May your money be condemned to hell along with you because you believed you could buy God’s gift with money !
44008021	You can have no part or share in God’s word because your heart isn’t right with God .
44008022	Therefore , change your heart and life ! Turn from your wickedness ! Plead with the Lord in the hope that your wicked intent can be forgiven ,
44008023	for I see that your bitterness has poisoned you and evil has you in chains . "
44008024	Simon replied , " All of you , please , plead to the Lord for me so that nothing of what you have said will happen to me ! "
44008025	After the apostles had testified and proclaimed the Lord’s word , they returned to Jerusalem , preaching the good news to many Samaritan villages along the way .
44008026	An angel from the Lord spoke to Philip , " At noon , take the road that leads from Jerusalem to Gaza . " ( This is a desert road . )
44008027	So he did . Meanwhile , an Ethiopian man was on his way home from Jerusalem , where he had come to worship . He was a eunuch and an official responsible for the entire treasury of Candace . ( Candace is the title given to the Ethiopian queen . )
44008028	He was reading the prophet Isaiah while sitting in his carriage .
44008029	The Spirit told Philip , " Approach this carriage and stay with it . "
44008030	Running up to the carriage , Philip heard the man reading the prophet Isaiah . He asked , " Do you really understand what you are reading ? "
44008031	The man replied , " Without someone to guide me , how could I ? " Then he invited Philip to climb up and sit with him .
44008032	This was the passage of scripture he was reading : Like a sheep he was led to the slaughter and like a lamb before its shearer is silent so he didn’t open his mouth .
44008033	In his humiliation justice was taken away from him . Who can tell the story of his descendants
44008034	The eunuch asked Philip , " Tell me , about whom does the prophet say this ? Is he talking about himself or someone else ? "
44008035	Starting with that passage , Philip proclaimed the good news about Jesus to him .
44008036	As they went down the road , they came to some water . The eunuch said , " Look ! Water ! What would keep me from being baptized ? "
44008038	He ordered that the carriage halt . Both Philip and the eunuch went down to the water , where Philip baptized him .
44008039	When they came up out of the water , the Lord’s Spirit suddenly took Philip away . The eunuch never saw him again but went on his way rejoicing .
44008040	Philip found himself in Azotus . He traveled through that area , preaching the good news in all the cities until he reached Caesarea .
44009001	Meanwhile , Saul was still spewing out murderous threats against the Lord’s disciples . He went to the high priest ,
44009002	seeking letters to the synagogues in Damascus . If he found persons who belonged to the Way , whether men or women , these letters would authorize him to take them as prisoners to Jerusalem .
44009003	During the journey , as he approached Damascus , suddenly a light from heaven encircled him .
44009004	He fell to the ground and heard a voice asking him , " Saul , Saul , why are you harassing me ? "
44009005	Saul asked , " Who are you , Lord ? " " I am Jesus , whom you are harassing , " came the reply .
44009006	" Now get up and enter the city . You will be told what you must do . "
44009007	Those traveling with him stood there speechless ; they heard the voice but saw no one .
44009008	After they picked Saul up from the ground , he opened his eyes but he couldn’t see . So they led him by the hand into Damascus .
44009009	For three days he was blind and neither ate nor drank anything .
44009010	In Damascus there was a certain disciple named Ananias . The Lord spoke to him in a vision , " Ananias ! " He answered , " Yes , Lord . "
44009011	The Lord instructed him , " Go to Judas’ house on Straight Street and ask for a man from Tarsus named Saul . He is praying .
44009012	In a vision he has seen a man named Ananias enter and put his hands on him to restore his sight . "
44009013	Ananias countered , " Lord , I have heard many reports about this man . People say he has done horrible things to your holy people in Jerusalem .
44009014	He’s here with authority from the chief priests to arrest everyone who calls on your name . "
44009015	The Lord replied , " Go ! This man is the agent I have chosen to carry my name before Gentiles , kings , and Israelites .
44009016	I will show him how much he must suffer for the sake of my name . "
44009017	Ananias went to the house . He placed his hands on Saul and said , " Brother Saul , the Lord sent me — Jesus , who appeared to you on the way as you were coming here . He sent me so that you could see again and be filled with the Holy Spirit . "
44009018	Instantly , flakes fell from Saul’s eyes and he could see again . He got up and was baptized .
44009019	After eating , he regained his strength . He stayed with the disciples in Damascus for several days .
44009020	Right away , he began to preach about Jesus in the synagogues . " He is God’s Son , " he declared .
44009021	Everyone who heard him was baffled . They questioned each other , " Isn’t he the one who was wreaking havoc among those in Jerusalem who called on this name ? Hadn’t he come here to take those same people as prisoners to the chief priests ? "
44009022	But Saul grew stronger and stronger . He confused the Jews who lived in Damascus by proving that Jesus is the Christ .
44009023	After this had gone on for some time , the Jews hatched a plot to kill Saul .
44009024	However , he found out about their scheme . They were keeping watch at the city gates around the clock so they could assassinate him .
44009025	But his disciples took him by night and lowered him in a basket through an opening in the city wall .
44009026	When Saul arrived in Jerusalem , he tried to join the disciples , but they were all afraid of him . They didn’t believe he was really a disciple .
44009027	Then Barnabas brought Saul to the apostles and told them the story about how Saul saw the Lord on the way and that the Lord had spoken to Saul . He also told them about the confidence with which Saul had preached in the name of Jesus in Damascus .
44009028	After this , Saul moved freely among the disciples in Jerusalem and was speaking with confidence in the name of the Lord .
44009029	He got into debates with the Greek-speaking Jews as well , but they tried to kill him .
44009030	When the family of believers learned about this , they escorted him down to Caesarea and sent him off to Tarsus .
44009031	Then the church throughout Judea , Galilee , and Samaria enjoyed a time of peace . God strengthened the church , and its life was marked by reverence for the Lord . Encouraged by the Holy Spirit , the church continued to grow in numbers .
44009032	As Peter toured the whole region , he went to visit God’s holy people in Lydda .
44009033	There he found a man named Aeneas who was paralyzed and had been confined to his bed for eight years .
44009034	Peter said to him , " Aeneas , Jesus Christ heals you ! Get up and make your bed . " At once he got up .
44009035	Everyone who lived in Lydda and Sharon saw him and turned to the Lord .
44009036	In Joppa there was a disciple named Tabitha ( in Greek her name is Dorcas ) . Her life overflowed with good works and compassionate acts on behalf of those in need .
44009037	About that time , though , she became so ill that she died . After they washed her body , they laid her in an upstairs room .
44009038	Since Lydda was near Joppa , when the disciples heard that Peter was there , they sent two people to Peter . They urged , " Please come right away ! "
44009039	Peter went with them . Upon his arrival , he was taken to the upstairs room . All the widows stood beside him , crying as they showed the tunics and other clothing Dorcas made when she was alive .
44009040	Peter sent everyone out of the room , then knelt and prayed . He turned to the body and said , " Tabitha , get up ! " She opened her eyes , saw Peter , and sat up .
44009041	He gave her his hand and raised her up . Then he called God’s holy people , including the widows , and presented her alive to them .
44009042	The news spread throughout Joppa , and many put their faith in the Lord .
44009043	Peter stayed for some time in Joppa with a certain tanner named Simon .
44010001	There was a man in Caesarea named Cornelius , a centurion in the Italian Company .
44010002	He and his whole household were pious , Gentile God-worshippers . He gave generously to those in need among the Jewish people and prayed to God constantly .
44010003	One day at nearly three o’clock in the afternoon , he clearly saw an angel from God in a vision . The angel came to him and said , " Cornelius ! "
44010004	Startled , he stared at the angel and replied , " What is it , Lord ? " The angel said , " Your prayers and your compassionate acts are like a memorial offering to God .
44010005	Send messengers to Joppa at once and summon a certain Simon , the one known as Peter .
44010006	He is a guest of Simon the tanner , whose house is near the seacoast . "
44010007	When the angel who was speaking to him had gone , Cornelius summoned two of his household servants along with a pious soldier from his personal staff .
44010008	He explained everything to them , then sent them to Joppa .
44010009	At noon on the following day , as their journey brought them close to the city , Peter went up on the roof to pray .
44010010	He became hungry and wanted to eat . While others were preparing the meal , he had a visionary experience .
44010011	He saw heaven opened up and something like a large linen sheet being lowered to the earth by its four corners .
44010012	Inside the sheet were all kinds of four-legged animals , reptiles , and wild birds .
44010013	A voice told him , " Get up , Peter ! Kill and eat ! "
44010014	Peter exclaimed , " Absolutely not , Lord ! I have never eaten anything impure or unclean . "
44010015	The voice spoke a second time , " Never consider unclean what God has made pure . "
44010016	This happened three times , then the object was suddenly pulled back into heaven .
44010017	Peter was bewildered about the meaning of the vision . Just then , the messengers sent by Cornelius discovered the whereabouts of Simon’s house and arrived at the gate .
44010018	Calling out , they inquired whether the Simon known as Peter was a guest there .
44010019	While Peter was brooding over the vision , the Spirit interrupted him , " Look ! Three people are looking for you .
44010020	Go downstairs . Don’t ask questions ; just go with them because I have sent them . "
44010021	So Peter went downstairs and told them , " I’m the one you are looking for . Why have you come ? "
44010022	They replied , " We’ve come on behalf of Cornelius , a centurion and righteous man , a God-worshipper who is well-respected by all Jewish people . A holy angel directed him to summon you to his house and to hear what you have to say . "
44010023	Peter invited them into the house as his guests . The next day he got up and went with them , together with some of the believers from Joppa .
44010024	They arrived in Caesarea the following day . Anticipating their arrival , Cornelius had gathered his relatives and close friends .
44010025	As Peter entered the house , Cornelius met him and fell at his feet in order to honor him .
44010026	But Peter lifted him up , saying , " Get up ! Like you , I’m just a human . "
44010027	As they continued to talk , Peter went inside and found a large gathering of people .
44010028	He said to them , " You all realize that it is forbidden for a Jew to associate or visit with outsiders . However , God has shown me that I should never call a person impure or unclean .
44010029	For this reason , when you sent for me , I came without objection . I want to know , then , why you sent for me . "
44010030	Cornelius answered , " Four days ago at this same time , three o’clock in the afternoon , I was praying at home . Suddenly a man in radiant clothing stood before me .
44010031	He said , ‘ Cornelius , God has heard your prayers , and your compassionate acts are like a memorial offering to him .
44010032	Therefore , send someone to Joppa and summon Simon , who is known as Peter . He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner , located near the seacoast . ’
44010033	I sent for you right away , and you were kind enough to come . Now , here we are , gathered in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has directed you to say . "
44010034	Peter said , " I really am learning that God doesn’t show partiality to one group of people over another .
44010035	Rather , in every nation , whoever worships him and does what is right is acceptable to him .
44010036	This is the message of peace he sent to the Israelites by proclaiming the good news through Jesus Christ : He is Lord of all !
44010037	You know what happened throughout Judea , beginning in Galilee after the baptism John preached .
44010038	You know about Jesus of Nazareth , whom God anointed with the Holy Spirit and endowed with power . Jesus traveled around doing good and healing everyone oppressed by the devil because God was with him .
44010039	We are witnesses of everything he did , both in Judea and in Jerusalem . They killed him by hanging him on a tree ,
44010040	but God raised him up on the third day and allowed him to be seen ,
44010041	not by everyone but by us . We are witnesses whom God chose beforehand , who ate and drank with him after God raised him from the dead .
44010042	He commanded us to preach to the people and to testify that he is the one whom God appointed as judge of the living and the dead .
44010043	All the prophets testify about him that everyone who believes in him receives forgiveness of sins through his name . "
44010044	While Peter was still speaking , the Holy Spirit fell on everyone who heard the word .
44010045	The circumcised believers who had come with Peter were astonished that the gift of the Holy Spirit had been poured out even on the Gentiles .
44010046	They heard them speaking in other languages and praising God . Peter asked ,
44010047	" These people have received the Holy Spirit just as we have . Surely no one can stop them from being baptized with water , can they ? "
44010048	He directed that they be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ . Then they invited Peter to stay for several days .
44011001	The apostles and the brothers and sisters throughout Judea heard that even the Gentiles had welcomed God’s word .
44011002	When Peter went up to Jerusalem , the circumcised believers criticized him .
44011003	They accused him , " You went into the home of the uncircumcised and ate with them ! "
44011004	Step-by-step , Peter explained what had happened .
44011005	" I was in the city of Joppa praying when I had a visionary experience . In my vision , I saw something like a large linen sheet being lowered from heaven by its four corners . It came all the way down to me .
44011006	As I stared at it , wondering what it was , I saw four-legged animals — including wild beasts — as well as reptiles and wild birds .
44011007	I heard a voice say , ‘ Get up , Peter ! Kill and eat ! ’
44011008	I responded , ‘ Absolutely not , Lord ! Nothing impure or unclean has ever entered my mouth . ’
44011009	The voice from heaven spoke a second time , ‘ Never consider unclean what God has made pure . ’
44011010	This happened three times , then everything was pulled back into heaven .
44011011	At that moment three men who had been sent to me from Caesarea arrived at the house where we were staying .
44011012	The Spirit told me to go with them even though they were Gentiles . These six brothers also went with me , and we entered that man’s house .
44011013	He reported to us how he had seen an angel standing in his house and saying , ‘ Send to Joppa and summon Simon , who is known as Peter .
44011014	He will tell you how you and your entire household can be saved . ’
44011015	When I began to speak , the Holy Spirit fell on them , just as the Spirit fell on us in the beginning .
44011016	I remembered the Lord’s words : ‘ John will baptize with water , but you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ’
44011017	If God gave them the same gift he gave us who believed in the Lord Jesus Christ , then who am I ? Could I stand in God’s way ? "
44011018	Once the apostles and other believers heard this , they calmed down . They praised God and concluded , " So then God has enabled Gentiles to change their hearts and lives so that they might have new life . "
44011019	Now those who were scattered as a result of the trouble that occurred because of Stephen traveled as far as Phoenicia , Cyprus , and Antioch . They proclaimed the word only to Jews .
44011020	Among them were some people from Cyprus and Cyrene . They entered Antioch and began to proclaim the good news about the Lord Jesus also to Jews who spoke Greek .
44011021	The Lord’s power was with them , and a large number came to believe and turned to the Lord .
44011022	When the church in Jerusalem heard about this , they sent Barnabas to Antioch .
44011023	When he arrived and saw evidence of God’s grace , he was overjoyed and encouraged everyone to remain fully committed to the Lord .
44011024	Barnabas responded in this way because he was a good man , whom the Holy Spirit had endowed with exceptional faith . A considerable number of people were added to the Lord .
44011025	Barnabas went to Tarsus in search of Saul .
44011026	When he found him , he brought him to Antioch . They were there for a whole year , meeting with the church and teaching large numbers of people . It was in Antioch where the disciples were first labeled " Christians . "
44011027	About that time , some prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch .
44011028	One of them , Agabus , stood up and , inspired by the Spirit , predicted that a severe famine would overtake the entire Roman world . ( This occurred during Claudius’ rule . )
44011029	The disciples decided they would send support to the brothers and sisters in Judea , with everyone contributing to this ministry according to each person’s abundance .
44011030	They sent Barnabas and Saul to take this gift to the elders .
44012001	About that time King Herod began to harass some who belonged to the church .
44012002	He had James , John’s brother , killed with a sword .
44012003	When he saw that this pleased the Jews , he arrested Peter as well . This happened during the Festival of Unleavened Bread .
44012004	He put Peter in prison , handing him over to four squads of soldiers , sixteen in all , who guarded him . He planned to charge him publicly after the Passover .
44012005	While Peter was held in prison , the church offered earnest prayer to God for him .
44012006	The night before Herod was going to bring Peter’s case forward , Peter was asleep between two soldiers and bound with two chains , with soldiers guarding the prison entrance .
44012007	Suddenly an angel from the Lord appeared and a light shone in the prison cell . After nudging Peter on his side to awaken him , the angel raised him up and said , " Quick ! Get up ! " The chains fell from his wrists .
44012008	The angel continued , " Get dressed . Put on your sandals . " Peter did as he was told . The angel said , " Put on your coat and follow me . "
44012009	Following the angel , Peter left the prison . However , he didn’t realize the angel had actually done all this . He thought he was seeing a vision .
44012010	They passed the first and second guards and came to the iron gate leading to the city . It opened for them by itself . After leaving the prison , they proceeded the length of one street , when abruptly the angel was gone .
44012011	At that , Peter came to his senses and remarked , " Now I’m certain that the Lord sent his angel and rescued me from Herod and from everything the Jewish people expected . "
44012012	Realizing this , he made his way to Mary’s house . ( Mary was John’s mother ; he was also known as Mark . ) Many believers had gathered there and were praying .
44012013	When Peter knocked at the outer gate , a female servant named Rhoda went to answer .
44012014	She was so overcome with joy when she recognized Peter’s voice that she didn’t open the gate . Instead , she ran back in and announced that Peter was standing at the gate .
44012015	" You’ve lost your mind ! " they responded . She stuck by her story with such determination that they began to say , " It must be his guardian angel . "
44012016	Meanwhile , Peter remained outside , knocking at the gate . They finally opened the gate and saw him there , and they were astounded .
44012017	He gestured with his hand to quiet them down , then recounted how the Lord led him out of prison . He said , " Tell this to James and the brothers and sisters . " Then he left for another place .
44012018	The next morning the soldiers were flustered about what had happened to Peter .
44012019	Herod called for a thorough search . When Peter didn’t turn up , Herod interrogated the guards and had them executed . Afterward , Herod left Judea in order to spend some time in Caesarea .
44012020	Herod had been furious with the people of Tyre and Sidon for some time . They made a pact to approach him together , since their region depended on the king’s realm for its food supply . They persuaded Blastus , the king’s personal attendant , to join their cause , then appealed for an end to hostilities .
44012021	On the scheduled day Herod dressed himself in royal attire , seated himself on the throne , and gave a speech to the people .
44012022	Those assembled kept shouting , over and over , " This is a god’s voice , not the voice of a mere human ! "
44012023	Immediately an angel from the Lord struck Herod down , because he didn’t give the honor to God . He was eaten by worms and died .
44012024	God’s word continued to grow and increase .
44012025	Barnabas and Saul returned to Antioch from Jerusalem after completing their mission , bringing with them John , who was also known as Mark .
44013001	The church at Antioch included prophets and teachers : Barnabas , Simeon ( nicknamed Niger ) , Lucius from Cyrene , Manaen ( a childhood friend of Herod the ruler ) , and Saul .
44013002	As they were worshipping the Lord and fasting , the Holy Spirit said , " Appoint Barnabas and Saul to the work I have called them to undertake . "
44013003	After they fasted and prayed , they laid their hands on these two and sent them off .
44013004	After the Holy Spirit sent them on their way , they went down to Seleucia . From there they sailed to Cyprus .
44013005	In Salamis they proclaimed God’s word in the Jewish synagogues . John was with them as their assistant .
44013006	They traveled throughout the island until they arrived at Paphos . There they found a certain man named Bar-Jesus , a Jew who was a false prophet and practiced sorcery .
44013007	He kept company with the governor of that province , an intelligent man named Sergius Paulus . The governor sent for Barnabas and Saul since he wanted to hear God’s word .
44013008	But Elymas the sorcerer ( for that’s what people understood his name meant ) opposed them , trying to steer the governor away from the faith .
44013009	Empowered by the Holy Spirit , Saul , also known as Paul , glared at Bar-Jesus and
