45001008	First of all , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for all of you , because the news about your faithfulness is being spread throughout the whole world .
45001009	I serve God in my spirit by preaching the good news about God’s Son , and God is my witness that I continually mention you
45001010	in all my prayers . I’m always asking that somehow , by God’s will , I might succeed in visiting you at last .
45001011	I really want to see you to pass along some spiritual gift to you so that you can be strengthened .
45001012	What I mean is that we can mutually encourage each other while I am with you . We can be encouraged by the faithfulness we find in each other , both your faithfulness and mine .
45001013	I want you to know , brothers and sisters , that I planned to visit you many times , although I have been prevented from coming until now . I want to harvest some fruit among you , just as I have done among the other Gentiles .
45001014	I have a responsibility both to Greeks and to those who don’t speak Greek , both to the wise and to the foolish .
45001015	That’s why I’m ready to preach the gospel also to you who are in Rome .
45001016	I’m not ashamed of the gospel : it is God’s own power for salvation to all who have faith in God , to the Jew first and also to the Greek .
45001017	God’s righteousness is being revealed in the gospel , from faithfulness for faith , as it is written , The righteous person will live by faith .
45001018	God’s wrath is being revealed from heaven against all the ungodly behavior and the injustice of human beings who silence the truth with injustice .
45001019	This is because what is known about God should be plain to them because God made it plain to them .
45001020	Ever since the creation of the world , God’s invisible qualities — God’s eternal power and divine nature — have been clearly seen , because they are understood through the things God has made . So humans are without excuse .
45001021	Although they knew God , they didn’t honor God as God or thank him . Instead , their reasoning became pointless , and their foolish hearts were darkened .
45001022	While they were claiming to be wise , they made fools of themselves .
45001023	They exchanged the glory of the immortal God for images that look like mortal humans : birds , animals , and reptiles .
45001024	So God abandoned them to their hearts’ desires , which led to the moral corruption of degrading their own bodies with each other .
45001025	They traded God’s truth for a lie , and they worshipped and served the creation instead of the creator , who is blessed forever . Amen .
45001026	That’s why God abandoned them to degrading lust . Their females traded natural sexual relations for unnatural sexual relations .
45001027	Also , in the same way , the males traded natural sexual relations with females , and burned with lust for each other . Males performed shameful actions with males , and they were paid back with the penalty they deserved for their mistake in their own bodies .
45001028	Since they didn’t think it was worthwhile to acknowledge God , God abandoned them to a defective mind to do inappropriate things .
45001029	So they were filled with all injustice , wicked behavior , greed , and evil behavior . They are full of jealousy , murder , fighting , deception , and malice . They are gossips ,
45001030	they slander people , and they hate God . They are rude and proud , and they brag . They invent ways to be evil , and they are disobedient to their parents .
45001031	They are without understanding , disloyal , without affection , and without mercy .
45001032	Though they know God’s decision that those who persist in such practices deserve death , they not only keep doing these things but also approve others who practice them .
45002001	So every single one of you who judge others is without any excuse . You condemn yourself when you judge another person because the one who is judging is doing the same things .
45002002	We know that God’s judgment agrees with the truth , and his judgment is against those who do these kinds of things .
45002003	If you judge those who do these kinds of things while you do the same things yourself , think about this : Do you believe that you will escape God’s judgment ?
45002004	Or do you have contempt for the riches of God’s generosity , tolerance , and patience ? Don’t you realize that God’s kindness is supposed to lead you to change your heart and life ?
45002005	You are storing up wrath for yourself because of your stubbornness and your heart that refuses to change . God’s just judgment will be revealed on the day of wrath .
45002006	God will repay everyone based on their works .
45002007	On the one hand , he will give eternal life to those who look for glory , honor , and immortality based on their patient good work .
45002008	But on the other hand , there will be wrath and anger for those who obey wickedness instead of the truth because they are acting out of selfishness and disobedience .
45002009	There will be trouble and distress for every human being who does evil , for the Jew first and also for the Greek .
45002010	But there will be glory , honor , and peace for everyone who does what is good , for the Jew first and also for the Greek .
45002011	God does not have favorites .
45002012	Those who have sinned outside the Law will also die outside the Law , and those who have sinned under the Law will be judged by the Law .
45002013	It isn’t the ones who hear the Law who are righteous in God’s eyes . It is the ones who do what the Law says who will be treated as righteous .
45002014	Gentiles don’t have the Law . But when they instinctively do what the Law requires they are a Law in themselves , though they don’t have the Law .
45002015	They show the proof of the Law written on their hearts , and their consciences affirm it . Their conflicting thoughts will accuse them , or even make a defense for them ,
45002016	on the day when , according to my gospel , God will judge the hidden truth about human beings through Christ Jesus .
45002017	But , if you call yourself a Jew ; if you rely on the Law ; if you brag about your relationship to God ;
45002018	if you know the will of God ; if you are taught by the Law so that you can figure out the things that really matter ;
45002019	if you have persuaded yourself that you are :
45002021	then why don’t you who are teaching others teach yourself ? If you preach , " No stealing , " do you steal ?
45002022	If you say , " No adultery , " do you commit adultery ? If you hate idols , do you rob temples ?
45002023	If you brag about the Law , do you shame God by breaking the Law ?
45002024	As it is written : The name of God is discredited by the Gentiles because of you .
45002025	Circumcision is an advantage if you do what the Law says . But if you are a person who breaks the Law , your status of being circumcised has changed into not being circumcised .
45002026	So if the person who isn’t circumcised keeps the Law , won’t his status of not being circumcised be counted as if he were circumcised ?
45002027	The one who isn’t physically circumcised but keeps the Law will judge you . You became a lawbreaker after you had the written Law and circumcision .
45002028	It isn’t the Jew who maintains outward appearances who will receive praise from God , and it isn’t people who are outwardly circumcised on their bodies .
45002029	Instead , it is the person who is a Jew inside , who is circumcised in spirit , not literally . That person’s praise doesn’t come from people but from God .
45003001	So what’s the advantage of being a Jew ? Or what’s the benefit of circumcision ?
45003002	Plenty in every way . First of all , the Jews were trusted with God’s revelations .
45003003	What does it matter , then , if some weren’t faithful ? Their lack of faith won’t cancel God’s faithfulness , will it ?
45003004	Absolutely not ! God must be true , even if every human being is a liar , as it is written : So that it can show that you are right in your words ; and you will triumph when you are judged .
45003005	But if our lack of righteousness confirms God’s justice , what will we say ? That God , who brings wrath upon us , isn’t just ( I’m speaking rhetorically ) ?
45003006	Absolutely not ! If God weren’t just , how could he judge the world ?
45003007	But if God’s truth is demonstrated by my lie and it increases his glory , why am I still judged as a sinner ?
45003008	Why not say , " Let’s do evil things so that good things will come out of it " ? ( Some people who slander us accuse us of saying that , but these people deserve criticism . )
45003009	So what are we saying ? Are we better off ? Not at all . We have already stated the charge : both Jews and Greeks are all under the power of sin .
45003010	As it is written , There is no righteous person , not even one .
45003011	There is no one who understands . There is no one who looks for God .
45003012	They all turned away . They have become worthless together . There is no one who shows kindness . There is not even one .
45003013	Their throat is a grave that has been opened . They are deceitful with their tongues ,
45003014	Their mouths are full of cursing and bitterness .
45003015	Their feet are quick to shed blood ;
45003018	There is no fear of God in their view of the world .
45003019	Now we know that whatever the Law says , it speaks to those who are under the Law , in order to shut every mouth and make it so the whole world has to answer to God .
45003020	It follows that no human being will be treated as righteous in his presence by doing what the Law says , because the knowledge of sin comes through the Law .
45003021	But now God’s righteousness has been revealed apart from the Law , which is confirmed by the Law and the Prophets .
45003022	God’s righteousness comes through the faithfulness of Jesus Christ for all who have faith in him . There’s no distinction .
45003023	All have sinned and fall short of God’s glory ,
45003024	but all are treated as righteous freely by his grace because of a ransom that was paid by Christ Jesus .
45003025	Through his faithfulness , God displayed Jesus as the place of sacrifice where mercy is found by means of his blood . He did this to demonstrate his righteousness in passing over sins that happened before ,
45003026	during the time of God’s patient tolerance . He also did this to demonstrate that he is righteous in the present time , and to treat the one who has faith in Jesus as righteous .
45003027	What happens to our bragging ? It’s thrown out . With which law ? With what we have accomplished under the Law ?
45003028	No , not at all , but through the law of faith . We consider that a person is treated as righteous by faith , apart from what is accomplished under the Law .
45003029	Or is God the God of Jews only ? Isn’t God the God of Gentiles also ? Yes , God is also the God of Gentiles .
45003030	Since God is one , then the one who makes the circumcised righteous by faith will also make the one who isn’t circumcised righteous through faith .
45003031	Do we then cancel the Law through this faith ? Absolutely not ! Instead , we confirm the Law .
45004001	So what are we going to say ? Are we going to find that Abraham is our ancestor on the basis of genealogy ?
45004002	Because if Abraham was made righteous because of his actions , he would have had a reason to brag , but not in front of God .
45004003	What does the scripture say ? Abraham had faith in God , and it was credited to him as righteousness .
45004004	Workers’ salaries aren’t credited to them on the basis of an employer’s grace but rather on the basis of what they deserve .
45004005	But faith is credited as righteousness to those who don’t work , because they have faith in God who makes the ungodly righteous .
45004006	In the same way , David also pronounces a blessing on the person to whom God credits righteousness apart from actions :
45004007	Happy are those whose actions outside the Law are forgiven ,
45004008	Happy are those whose sin isn’t counted against them by the Lord .
45004009	Is this state of happiness only for the circumcised or is it also for those who aren’t circumcised ? We say , " Faith was credited to Abraham as righteousness . "
45004010	So how was it credited ? When he was circumcised , or when he wasn’t circumcised ? In fact , it was credited while he still wasn’t circumcised , not after he was circumcised .
45004011	He received the sign of circumcision as a seal of the righteousness that comes from the faith he had while he still wasn’t circumcised . It happened this way so that Abraham could be the ancestor of all those people who aren’t circumcised , who have faith in God , and so are counted as righteous .
45004012	He could also be the ancestor of those circumcised people , who aren’t only circumcised but who also walk in the path of faith , like our ancestor Abraham did while he wasn’t circumcised .
45004013	The promise to Abraham and to his descendants , that he would inherit the world , didn’t come through the Law but through the righteousness that comes from faith .
45004014	If they inherit because of the Law , then faith has no effect and the promise has been canceled .
45004015	The Law brings about wrath . But when there isn’t any law , there isn’t any violation of the law .
45004016	That’s why the inheritance comes through faith , so that it will be on the basis of God’s grace . In that way , the promise is secure for all of Abraham’s descendants , not just for those who are related by Law but also for those who are related by the faith of Abraham , who is the father of all of us .
45004017	As it is written : I have appointed you to be the father of many nations . So Abraham is our father in the eyes of God in whom he had faith , the God who gives life to the dead and calls things that don’t exist into existence .
45004018	When it was beyond hope , he had faith in the hope that he would become the father of many nations , in keeping with the promise God spoke to him : That’s how many descendants you will have .
45004019	Without losing faith , Abraham , who was nearly 100 years old , took into account his own body , which was as good as dead , and Sarah’s womb , which was dead .
45004020	He didn’t hesitate with a lack of faith in God’s promise , but he grew strong in faith and gave glory to God .
45004021	He was fully convinced that God was able to do what he promised .
45004022	Therefore , it was credited to him as righteousness .
45004023	But the scripture that says it was credited to him wasn’t written only for Abraham’s sake .
45004024	It was written also for our sake , because it is going to be credited to us too . It will be credited to those of us who have faith in the one who raised Jesus our Lord from the dead .
45004025	He was handed over because of our mistakes , and he was raised to meet the requirements of righteousness for us .
45005001	Therefore , since we have been made righteous through his faithfulness combined with our faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ .
45005002	We have access by faith into this grace in which we stand through him , and we boast in the hope of God’s glory .
45005003	But not only that ! We even take pride in our problems , because we know that trouble produces endurance ,
45005004	endurance produces character , and character produces hope .
45005005	This hope doesn’t put us to shame , because the love of God has been poured out in our hearts through the Holy Spirit , who has been given to us .
45005006	While we were still weak , at the right moment , Christ died for ungodly people .
45005007	It isn’t often that someone will die for a righteous person , though maybe someone might dare to die for a good person .
45005008	But God shows his love for us , because while we were still sinners Christ died for us .
45005009	So , now that we have been made righteous by his blood , we can be even more certain that we will be saved from God’s wrath through him .
45005010	If we were reconciled to God through the death of his Son while we were still enemies , now that we have been reconciled , how much more certain is it that we will be saved by his life ?
45005011	And not only that : we even take pride in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , the one through whom we now have a restored relationship with God .
45005012	So , in the same way that sin entered the world through one person , and death came through sin , so death spread to all human beings with the result that all sinned .
45005013	Although sin was in the world , since there was no Law , it wasn’t taken into account until the Law came .
45005014	But death ruled from Adam until Moses , even over those who didn’t sin in the same way Adam did — Adam was a type of the one who was coming .
45005015	But the free gift of Christ isn’t like Adam’s failure . If many people died through what one person did wrong , God’s grace is multiplied even more for many people with the gift — of the one person Jesus Christ — that comes through grace .
45005016	The gift isn’t like the consequences of one person’s sin . The judgment that came from one person’s sin led to punishment , but the free gift that came out of many failures led to the verdict of acquittal .
45005017	If death ruled because of one person’s failure , those who receive the multiplied grace and the gift of righteousness will even more certainly rule in life through the one person Jesus Christ .
45005018	So now the righteous requirements necessary for life are met for everyone through the righteous act of one person , just as judgment fell on everyone through the failure of one person .
45005019	Many people were made righteous through the obedience of one person , just as many people were made sinners through the disobedience of one person .
45005020	The Law stepped in to amplify the failure , but where sin increased , grace multiplied even more .
45005021	The result is that grace will rule through God’s righteousness , leading to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord , just as sin ruled in death .
45006001	So what are we going to say ? Should we continue sinning so grace will multiply ?
45006002	Absolutely not ! All of us died to sin . How can we still live in it ?
45006003	Or don’t you know that all who were baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death ?
45006004	Therefore , we were buried together with him through baptism into his death , so that just as Christ was raised from the dead through the glory of the Father , we too can walk in newness of life .
45006005	If we were united together in a death like his , we will also be united together in a resurrection like his .
45006006	This is what we know : the person that we used to be was crucified with him in order to get rid of the corpse that had been controlled by sin . That way we wouldn’t be slaves to sin anymore ,
45006007	because a person who has died has been freed from sin’s power .
45006008	But if we died with Christ , we have faith that we will also live with him .
45006009	We know that Christ has been raised from the dead and he will never die again . Death no longer has power over him .
45006010	He died to sin once and for all with his death , but he lives for God with his life .
45006011	In the same way , you also should consider yourselves dead to sin but alive for God in Christ Jesus .
45006012	So then , don’t let sin rule your body , so that you do what it wants .
45006013	Don’t offer parts of your body to sin , to be used as weapons to do wrong . Instead , present yourselves to God as people who have been brought back to life from the dead , and offer all the parts of your body to God to be used as weapons to do right .
45006014	Sin will have no power over you , because you aren’t under Law but under grace .
45006015	So what ? Should we sin because we aren’t under Law but under grace ? Absolutely not !
45006016	Don’t you know that if you offer yourselves to someone as obedient slaves , that you are slaves of the one whom you obey ? That’s true whether you serve as slaves of sin , which leads to death , or as slaves of the kind of obedience that leads to righteousness .
45006017	But thank God that although you used to be slaves of sin , you gave wholehearted obedience to the teaching that was handed down to you , which provides a pattern .
45006018	Now that you have been set free from sin , you have become slaves of righteousness .
45006019	( I’m speaking with ordinary metaphors because of your limitations . ) Once , you offered the parts of your body to be used as slaves to impurity and to lawless behavior that leads to still more lawless behavior . Now , you should present the parts of your body as slaves to righteousness , which makes your lives holy .
45006020	When you were slaves of sin , you were free from the control of righteousness .
45006021	What consequences did you get from doing things that you are now ashamed of ? The outcome of those things is death .
45006022	But now that you have been set free from sin and become slaves to God , you have the consequence of a holy life , and the outcome is eternal life .
45006023	The wages that sin pays are death , but God’s gift is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord .
45007001	Brothers and sisters , I’m talking to you as people who know the Law . Don’t you know that the Law has power over someone only as long as he or she lives ?
45007002	A married woman is united with her husband under the Law while he is alive . But if her husband dies , she is released from the Law concerning her husband .
45007003	So then , if she lives with another man while her husband is alive , she’s committing adultery . But if her husband dies , she’s free from the Law , so she won’t be committing adultery if she marries someone else .
45007004	Therefore , my brothers and sisters , you also died with respect to the Law through the body of Christ , so that you could be united with someone else . You are united with the one who was raised from the dead so that we can bear fruit for God .
45007005	When we were self-centered , the sinful passions aroused through the Law were at work in all the parts of our body , so that we bore fruit for death .
45007006	But now we have been released from the Law . We have died with respect to the thing that controlled us , so that we can be slaves in the new life under the Spirit , not in the old life under the written Law .
45007007	So what are we going to say ? That the Law is sin ? Absolutely not ! But I wouldn’t have known sin except through the Law . I wouldn’t have known the desire for what others have if the Law had not said , Don’t desire what others have .
45007008	But sin seized the opportunity and used this commandment to produce all kinds of desires in me . Sin is dead without the Law .
45007009	I used to be alive without the Law , but when the commandment came , sin sprang to life ,
45007010	and I died . So the commandment that was intended to give life brought death .
45007011	Sin seized the opportunity through the commandment , deceived me , and killed me .
45007012	So the Law itself is holy , and the commandment is holy , righteous , and good .
45007013	So did something good bring death to me ? Absolutely not ! But sin caused my death through something good so that sin would be exposed as sin . That way sin would become even more thoroughly sinful through the commandment .
45007014	We know that the Law is spiritual , but I’m made of flesh and blood , and I’m sold as a slave to sin .
45007015	I don’t know what I’m doing , because I don’t do what I want to do . Instead , I do the thing that I hate .
45007016	But if I’m doing the thing that I don’t want to do , I’m agreeing that the Law is right .
45007017	But now I’m not the one doing it anymore . Instead , it’s sin that lives in me .
45007018	I know that good doesn’t live in me — that is , in my body . The desire to do good is inside of me , but I can’t do it .
45007019	I don’t do the good that I want to do , but I do the evil that I don’t want to do .
45007020	But if I do the very thing that I don’t want to do , then I’m not the one doing it anymore . Instead , it is sin that lives in me that is doing it .
45007021	So I find that , as a rule , when I want to do what is good , evil is right there with me .
45007022	I gladly agree with the Law on the inside ,
45007023	but I see a different law at work in my body . It wages a war against the law of my mind and takes me prisoner with the law of sin that is in my body .
45007024	I’m a miserable human being . Who will deliver me from this dead corpse ?
45007025	Thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord ! So then I’m a slave to God’s Law in my mind , but I’m a slave to sin’s law in my body .
45008001	So now there isn’t any condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus .
45008002	The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus has set you free from the law of sin and death .
45008003	God has done what was impossible for the Law , since it was weak because of selfishness . God condemned sin in the body by sending his own Son to deal with sin in the same body as humans , who are controlled by sin .
45008004	He did this so that the righteous requirement of the Law might be fulfilled in us . Now the way we live is based on the Spirit , not based on selfishness .
45008005	People whose lives are based on selfishness think about selfish things , but people whose lives are based on the Spirit think about things that are related to the Spirit .
45008006	The attitude that comes from selfishness leads to death , but the attitude that comes from the Spirit leads to life and peace .
45008007	So the attitude that comes from selfishness is hostile to God . It doesn’t submit to God’s Law , because it can’t .
45008008	People who are self-centered aren’t able to please God .
45008009	But you aren’t self-centered . Instead you are in the Spirit , if in fact God’s Spirit lives in you . If anyone doesn’t have the Spirit of Christ , they don’t belong to him .
45008010	If Christ is in you , the Spirit is your life because of God’s righteousness , but the body is dead because of sin .
45008011	If the Spirit of the one who raised Jesus from the dead lives in you , the one who raised Christ from the dead will give life to your human bodies also , through his Spirit that lives in you .
45008012	So then , brothers and sisters , we have an obligation , but it isn’t an obligation to ourselves to live our lives on the basis of selfishness .
45008013	If you live on the basis of selfishness , you are going to die . But if you put to death the actions of the body with the Spirit , you will live .
45008014	All who are led by God’s Spirit are God’s sons and daughters .
45008015	You didn’t receive a spirit of slavery to lead you back again into fear , but you received a Spirit that shows you are adopted as his children . With this Spirit , we cry , " Abba , Father . "
45008016	The same Spirit agrees with our spirit , that we are God’s children .
45008017	But if we are children , we are also heirs . We are God’s heirs and fellow heirs with Christ , if we really suffer with him so that we can also be glorified with him .
45008018	I believe that the present suffering is nothing compared to the coming glory that is going to be revealed to us .
45008019	The whole creation waits breathless with anticipation for the revelation of God’s sons and daughters .
45008020	Creation was subjected to frustration , not by its own choice — it was the choice of the one who subjected it — but in the hope
45008021	that the creation itself will be set free from slavery to decay and brought into the glorious freedom of God’s children .
45008022	We know that the whole creation is groaning together and suffering labor pains up until now .
45008023	And it’s not only the creation . We ourselves who have the Spirit as the first crop of the harvest also groan inside as we wait to be adopted and for our bodies to be set free .
45008024	We were saved in hope . If we see what we hope for , that isn’t hope . Who hopes for what they already see ?
45008025	But if we hope for what we don’t see , we wait for it with patience .
45008026	In the same way , the Spirit comes to help our weakness . We don’t know what we should pray , but the Spirit himself pleads our case with unexpressed groans .
45008027	The one who searches hearts knows how the Spirit thinks , because he pleads for the saints , consistent with God’s will .
45008028	We know that God works all things together for good for the ones who love God , for those who are called according to his purpose .
45008029	We know this because God knew them in advance , and he decided in advance that they would be conformed to the image of his Son . That way his Son would be the first of many brothers and sisters .
45008030	Those who God decided in advance would be conformed to his Son , he also called . Those whom he called , he also made righteous . Those whom he made righteous , he also glorified .
45008031	So what are we going to say about these things ? If God is for us , who is against us ?
45008032	He didn’t spare his own Son but gave him up for us all . Won’t he also freely give us all things with him ?
45008033	Who will bring a charge against God’s elect people ? It is God who acquits them .
45008034	Who is going to convict them ? It is Christ Jesus who died , even more , who was raised , and who also is at God’s right side . It is Christ Jesus who also pleads our case for us .
45008035	Who will separate us from Christ’s love ? Will we be separated by trouble , or distress , or harassment , or famine , or nakedness , or danger , or sword ?
45008036	As it is written , We are being put to death all day long for your sake . We are treated like sheep for slaughter .
45008037	But in all these things we win a sweeping victory through the one who loved us .
45008038	I’m convinced that nothing can separate us from God’s love in Christ Jesus our Lord : not death or life , not angels or rulers , not present things or future things , not powers
45008039	or height or depth , or any other thing that is created .
45009001	I’m speaking the truth in Christ — I’m not lying , as my conscience assures me with the Holy Spirit :
45009002	I have great sadness and constant pain in my heart .
45009003	I wish I could be cursed , cut off from Christ if it helped my brothers and sisters , who are my flesh-and-blood relatives .
45009004	They are Israelites . The adoption as God’s children , the glory , the covenants , the giving of the Law , the worship , and the promises belong to them .
45009005	The Jewish ancestors are theirs , and the Christ descended from those ancestors . He is the one who rules over all things , who is God , and who is blessed forever . Amen .
45009006	But it’s not as though God’s word has failed . Not all who are descended from Israel are part of Israel .
45009007	Not all of Abraham’s children are called Abraham’s descendants , but instead your descendants will be named through Isaac .
45009008	That means it isn’t the natural children who are God’s children , but it is the children from the promise who are counted as descendants .
45009009	The words in the promise were : A year from now I will return , and Sarah will have a son .
45009010	Not only that , but also Rebecca conceived children with one man , our ancestor Isaac .
45009011	When they hadn’t been born yet and when they hadn’t yet done anything good or bad , it was shown that God’s purpose would continue because it was based on his choice .
45009012	It wasn’t because of what was done but because of God’s call . This was said to her : The older child will be a slave to the younger one .
45009013	As it is written , I loved Jacob , but I hated Esau .
45009014	So what are we going to say ? Isn’t this unfair on God’s part ? Absolutely not !
45009015	He says to Moses , I’ll have mercy on whomever I choose to have mercy , and I’ll show compassion to whomever I choose to show compassion .
45009016	So then , it doesn’t depend on a person’s desire or effort . It depends entirely on God , who shows mercy .
45009017	Scripture says to Pharaoh , I have put you in this position for this very thing : so I can show my power in you and so that my name can be spread through the entire earth .
45009018	So then , God has mercy on whomever he wants to , but he makes resistant whomever he wants to .
45009019	So you are going to say to me , " Then why does he still blame people ? Who has ever resisted his will ? "
45009020	You are only a human being . Who do you think you are to talk back to God ? Does the clay say to the potter , " Why did you make me like this ? "
45009021	Doesn’t the potter have the power over the clay to make one pot for special purposes and another for garbage from the same lump of clay ?
45009022	What if God very patiently puts up with pots made for wrath that were designed for destruction , because he wanted to show his wrath and to make his power known ?
45009023	What if he did this to make the wealth of his glory known toward pots made for mercy , which he prepared in advance for glory ?
45009024	We are the ones God has called . We don’t come only from the Jews but we also come from the Gentiles .
45009025	As it says also in Hosea , I will call “ my people ” those who aren’t my people , and the one who isn’t well loved , I will call “ loved one . ”
45009026	And in the place where it was said to them , " You aren’t my people , " there they will be called " the living God’s children . "
45009027	But Isaiah cries out for Israel , Though the number of Israel’s children will be like the sand of the sea , only a remaining part will be saved ,
45009029	As Isaiah prophesied , If the Lord of the heavenly forces had not left descendants for us , we would have been like Sodom , and we would have become like Gomorrah .
45009030	So what are we going to say ? Gentiles who weren’t striving for righteousness achieved righteousness , the righteousness that comes from faith .
45009031	But though Israel was striving for a Law of righteousness , they didn’t arrive .
45009032	Why ? It’s because they didn’t go for it by faith but they went for it as if it could be reached by doing something . They have tripped over a stumbling block .
45009033	As it is written : Look ! I’m putting a stumbling block in Zion , which is a rock that offends people . And the one who has faith in him will not be put to shame .
45010001	Brothers and sisters , my heart’s desire is for Israel’s salvation . That’s my prayer to God for them .
45010002	I can vouch for them : they are enthusiastic about God . However , it isn’t informed by knowledge .
45010003	They don’t submit to God’s righteousness because they don’t understand his righteousness , and they try to establish their own righteousness .
45010004	Christ is the goal of the Law , which leads to righteousness for all who have faith in God .
45010005	Moses writes about the righteousness that comes from the Law : The person who does these things will live by them .
45010006	But the righteousness that comes from faith talks like this : Don’t say in your heart , " Who will go up into heaven ? " ( that is , to bring Christ down )
45010007	or " Who will go down into the region below ? " ( that is , to bring Christ up from the dead ) .
45010008	But what does it say ? The word is near you , in your mouth and in your heart ( that is , the message of faith that we preach ) .
45010009	Because if you confess with your mouth " Jesus is Lord " and in your heart you have faith that God raised him from the dead , you will be saved .
45010010	Trusting with the heart leads to righteousness , and confessing with the mouth leads to salvation .
45010011	The scripture says , All who have faith in him won’t be put to shame .
45010012	There is no distinction between Jew and Greek , because the same Lord is Lord of all , who gives richly to all who call on him .
45010013	All who call on the Lord’s name will be saved .
45010014	So how can they call on someone they don’t have faith in ? And how can they have faith in someone they haven’t heard of ? And how can they hear without a preacher ?
45010015	And how can they preach unless they are sent ? As it is written , How beautiful are the feet of those who announce the good news .
45010016	But everyone hasn’t obeyed the good news . As Isaiah says , Lord , who has had faith in our message ?
45010017	So , faith comes from listening , but it’s listening by means of Christ’s message .
45010018	But I ask you , didn’t they hear it ? Definitely ! Their voice has gone out into the entire earth , and their message has gone out to the corners of the inhabited world .
45010019	But I ask you again , didn’t Israel understand ? First , Moses says , I will make you jealous of those who aren’t a people , of a people without understanding .
45010020	And Isaiah even dares to say , I was found by those who didn’t look for me ; I revealed myself to those who didn’t ask for me .
45010021	But he says about Israel , All day long I stretched out my hands to a disobedient and contrary people .
45011001	So I ask you , has God rejected his people ? Absolutely not ! I’m an Israelite , a descendant of Abraham , from the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	God hasn’t rejected his people , whom he knew in advance . Or don’t you know what the scripture says in the case of Elijah , when he pleads with God against Israel ?
45011003	Lord , they have killed your prophets , and they have torn down your altars . I’m the only one left , and they are trying to take my life .
45011004	But what is God’s reply to him ? I have kept for myself seven thousand people who haven’t bowed their knees to Baal .
45011005	So also in the present time there is a remaining group by the choice of God’s grace .
45011006	But if it is by grace , it isn’t by what’s done anymore . If it were , God’s grace wouldn’t be grace .
45011007	So what ? Israel didn’t find what it was looking for . Those who were chosen found it , but the others were resistant .
45011008	As it is written , God gave them a dull spirit , so that their eyes would not see and their ears not hear , right up until the present day .
45011009	And David says , Their table should become a pitfall and a trap , a stumbling block and payback to them for what they have done .
45011010	Their eyes should be darkened so they can’t see , and their backs always bent .
45011011	So I’m asking you : They haven’t stumbled so that they’ve fallen permanently , have they ? Absolutely not ! But salvation has come to the Gentiles by their failure , in order to make Israel jealous .
45011012	But if their failure brings riches to the world , and their defeat brings riches to the Gentiles , how much more will come from the completion of their number !
45011013	I’m speaking to you Gentiles . Considering that I’m an apostle to the Gentiles , I publicize my own ministry
45011014	in the hope that somehow I might make my own people jealous and save some of them .
45011015	If their rejection has brought about a close relationship between God and the world , how can their acceptance mean anything less than life from the dead ?
45011016	But if part of a batch of dough is offered to God as holy , the whole batch of dough is holy too . If a root is holy , the branches will be holy too .
45011017	If some of the branches were broken off , and you were a wild olive branch , and you were grafted in among the other branches and shared the root that produces the rich oil of the olive tree ,
45011018	then don’t brag like you’re better than the other branches . If you do brag , be careful : it’s not you that sustains the root , but it’s the root that sustains you .
45011019	You will say then , " Branches were broken off so that I could be grafted in . "
45011020	Fine . They were broken off because they weren’t faithful , but you stand only by your faithfulness . So don’t think in a proud way ; instead be afraid .
45011021	If God didn’t spare the natural branches , he won’t spare you either .
45011022	So look at God’s kindness and harshness . It’s harshness toward those who fell , but it’s God’s kindness for you , provided you continue in his kindness ; otherwise , you could be cut off too .
45011023	And even those who were cut off will be grafted back in if they don’t continue to be unfaithful , because God is able to graft them in again .
45011024	If you were naturally part of a wild olive tree and you were cut off from it , and then , contrary to nature , you were grafted into the cultivated olive tree , won’t these natural branches stand an even better chance of being grafted back onto their own olive tree ?
45011025	I don’t want you to be unaware of this secret , brothers and sisters . That way you won’t think too highly of yourselves . A part of Israel has become resistant until the full number of the Gentiles comes in .
45011026	In this way , all Israel will be saved , as it is written : The deliverer will come from Zion . He will remove ungodly behavior from Jacob .
45011027	This is my covenant with them , when I take away their sins .
45011028	According to the gospel , they are enemies for your sake , but according to God’s choice , they are loved for the sake of their ancestors .
45011029	God’s gifts and calling can’t be taken back .
45011030	Once you were disobedient to God , but now you have mercy because they were disobedient .
45011031	In the same way , they have also been disobedient because of the mercy that you received , so now they can receive mercy too .
45011032	God has locked up all people in disobedience , in order to have mercy on all of them .
45011033	God’s riches , wisdom , and knowledge are so deep ! They are as mysterious as his judgments , and they are as hard to track as his paths !
45011034	Who has known the Lord’s mind ? Or who has been his mentor ?
45011035	Or who has given him a gift and has been paid back by him ?
45011036	All things are from him and through him and for him . May the glory be to him forever . Amen .
45012001	So , brothers and sisters , because of God’s mercies , I encourage you to present your bodies as a living sacrifice that is holy and pleasing to God . This is your appropriate priestly service .
45012002	Don’t be conformed to the patterns of this world , but be transformed by the renewing of your minds so that you can figure out what God’s will is — what is good and pleasing and mature .
45012003	Because of the grace that God gave me , I can say to each one of you : don’t think of yourself more highly than you ought to think . Instead , be reasonable since God has measured out a portion of faith to each one of you .
45012004	We have many parts in one body , but the parts don’t all have the same function .
45012005	In the same way , though there are many of us , we are one body in Christ , and individually we belong to each other .
45012006	We have different gifts that are consistent with God’s grace that has been given to us . If your gift is prophecy , you should prophesy in proportion to your faith .
45012007	If your gift is service , devote yourself to serving . If your gift is teaching , devote yourself to teaching .
45012008	If your gift is encouragement , devote yourself to encouraging . The one giving should do it with no strings attached . The leader should lead with passion . The one showing mercy should be cheerful .
45012009	Love should be shown without pretending . Hate evil , and hold on to what is good .
45012010	Love each other like the members of your family . Be the best at showing honor to each other .
45012011	Don’t hesitate to be enthusiastic — be on fire in the Spirit as you serve the Lord !
45012012	Be happy in your hope , stand your ground when you’re in trouble , and devote yourselves to prayer .
45012013	Contribute to the needs of God’s people , and welcome strangers into your home .
45012014	Bless people who harass you — bless and don’t curse them .
45012015	Be happy with those who are happy , and cry with those who are crying .
45012016	Consider everyone as equal , and don’t think that you’re better than anyone else . Instead , associate with people who have no status . Don’t think that you’re so smart .
45012017	Don’t pay back anyone for their evil actions with evil actions , but show respect for what everyone else believes is good .
45012018	If possible , to the best of your ability , live at peace with all people .
45012019	Don’t try to get revenge for yourselves , my dear friends , but leave room for God’s wrath . It is written , Revenge belongs to me ; I will pay it back , says the Lord .
45012020	Instead , If your enemy is hungry , feed him ; if he is thirsty , give him a drink . By doing this , you will pile burning coals of fire upon his head .
45012021	Don’t be defeated by evil , but defeat evil with good .
45013001	Every person should place themselves under the authority of the government . There isn’t any authority unless it comes from God , and the authorities that are there have been put in place by God .
45013002	So anyone who opposes the authority is standing against what God has established . People who take this kind of stand will get punished .
45013003	The authorities don’t frighten people who are doing the right thing . Rather , they frighten people who are doing wrong . Would you rather not be afraid of authority ? Do what’s right , and you will receive its approval .
45013004	It is God’s servant given for your benefit . But if you do what’s wrong , be afraid because it doesn’t have weapons to enforce the law for nothing . It is God’s servant put in place to carry out his punishment on those who do what is wrong .
45013005	That is why it is necessary to place yourself under the government’s authority , not only to avoid God’s punishment but also for the sake of your conscience .
45013006	You should also pay taxes for the same reason , because the authorities are God’s assistants , concerned with this very thing .
45013007	So pay everyone what you owe them . Pay the taxes you owe , pay the duties you are charged , give respect to those you should respect , and honor those you should honor .
45013008	Don’t be in debt to anyone , except for the obligation to love each other . Whoever loves another person has fulfilled the Law .
45013009	The commandments , Don’t commit adultery , don’t murder , don’t steal , don’t desire what others have , and any other commandments , are all summed up in one word : You must love your neighbor as yourself .
45013010	Love doesn’t do anything wrong to a neighbor ; therefore , love is what fulfills the Law .
45013011	As you do all this , you know what time it is . The hour has already come for you to wake up from your sleep . Now our salvation is nearer than when we first had faith .
45013012	The night is almost over , and the day is near . So let’s get rid of the actions that belong to the darkness and put on the weapons of light .
45013013	Let’s behave appropriately as people who live in the day , not in partying and getting drunk , not in sleeping around and obscene behavior , not in fighting and obsession .
45013014	Instead , dress yourself with the Lord Jesus Christ , and don’t plan to indulge your selfish desires .
45014001	Welcome the person who is weak in faith — but not in order to argue about differences of opinion .
45014002	One person believes in eating everything , while the weak person eats only vegetables .
45014003	Those who eat must not look down on the ones who don’t , and the ones who don’t eat must not judge the ones who do , because God has accepted them .
45014004	Who are you to judge someone else’s servants ? They stand or fall before their own Lord ( and they will stand , because the Lord has the power to make them stand ) .
45014005	One person considers some days to be more sacred than others , while another person considers all days to be the same . Each person must have their own convictions .
45014006	Someone who thinks that a day is sacred , thinks that way for the Lord . Those who eat , eat for the Lord , because they thank God . And those who don’t eat , don’t eat for the Lord , and they thank the Lord too .
45014007	We don’t live for ourselves and we don’t die for ourselves .
45014008	If we live , we live for the Lord , and if we die , we die for the Lord . Therefore , whether we live or die , we belong to God .
45014009	This is why Christ died and lived : so that he might be Lord of both the dead and the living .
45014010	But why do you judge your brother or sister ? Or why do you look down on your brother or sister ? We all will stand in front of the judgment seat of God .
45014011	Because it is written , As I live , says the Lord , every knee will bow to me , and every tongue will give praise to God .
45014012	So then , each of us will give an account of ourselves to God .
45014013	So stop judging each other . Instead , this is what you should decide : never put a stumbling block or obstacle in the way of your brother or sister .
45014014	I know and I’m convinced in the Lord Jesus that nothing is wrong to eat in itself . But if someone thinks something is wrong to eat , it becomes wrong for that person .
45014015	If your brother or sister is upset by your food , you are no longer walking in love . Don’t let your food destroy someone for whom Christ died .
45014016	And don’t let something you consider to be good be criticized as wrong .
45014017	God’s kingdom isn’t about eating food and drinking but about righteousness , peace , and joy in the Holy Spirit .
45014018	Whoever serves Christ this way pleases God and gets human approval .
45014019	So let’s strive for the things that bring peace and the things that build each other up .
45014020	Don’t destroy what God has done because of food . All food is acceptable , but it’s a bad thing if it trips someone else .
45014021	It’s a good thing not to eat meat or drink wine or to do anything that trips your brother or sister .
45014022	Keep the belief that you have to yourself — it’s between you and God . People are blessed who don’t convict themselves by the things they approve .
45014023	But those who have doubts are convicted if they go ahead and eat , because they aren’t acting on the basis of faith . Everything that isn’t based on faith is sin .
45015001	We who are powerful need to be patient with the weakness of those who don’t have power , and not please ourselves .
45015002	Each of us should please our neighbors for their good in order to build them up .
45015003	Christ didn’t please himself , but , as it is written , The insults of those who insulted you fell on me .
45015004	Whatever was written in the past was written for our instruction so that we could have hope through endurance and through the encouragement of the scriptures .
45015005	May the God of endurance and encouragement give you the same attitude toward each other , similar to Christ Jesus’ attitude .
45015006	That way you can glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ together with one voice .
45015007	So welcome each other , in the same way that Christ also welcomed you , for God’s glory .
45015008	I’m saying that Christ became a servant of those who are circumcised for the sake of God’s truth , in order to confirm the promises given to the ancestors ,
45015009	and so that the Gentiles could glorify God for his mercy . As it is written , Because of this I will confess you among the Gentiles , and I will sing praises to your name .
45015010	And again , it says , Rejoice , Gentiles , with his people .
45015011	And again , Praise the Lord , all you Gentiles , and all the people should sing his praises .
45015012	And again , Isaiah says , There will be a root of Jesse , who will also rise to rule the Gentiles .
45015013	May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in faith so that you overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit .
45015014	My brothers and sisters , I myself am convinced that you yourselves are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , and are able to teach each other .
45015015	But I’ve written to you in a sort of daring way , partly to remind you of what you already know . I’m writing to you in this way because of the grace that was given to me by God .
45015016	It helps me to be a minister of Christ Jesus to the Gentiles . I’m working as a priest of God’s gospel so that the offering of the Gentiles can be acceptable and made holy by the Holy Spirit .
45015017	So in Christ Jesus I brag about things that have to do with God .
45015018	I don’t dare speak about anything except what Christ has done through me to bring about the obedience of the Gentiles . He did it by what I’ve said and what I’ve done ,
45015019	by the power of signs and wonders , and by the power of God’s Spirit . So I’ve completed the circuit of preaching Christ’s gospel from Jerusalem all the way around to Illyricum .
45015020	In this way , I have a goal to preach the gospel where they haven’t heard of Christ yet , so that I won’t be building on someone else’s foundation .
45015021	Instead , as it’s written , Those who hadn’t been told about him will see , and those who hadn’t heard will understand .
45015022	That’s why I’ve been stopped so many times from coming to see you .
45015023	But now , since I don’t have any place to work in these regions anymore , and since I’ve wanted to come to see you for many years ,
45015024	I’ll visit you when I go to Spain . I hope to see you while I’m passing through . And I hope you will send me on my way there , after I have first been reenergized by some time in your company .
45015025	But now I’m going to Jerusalem , to serve God’s people .
45015026	Macedonia and Achaia have been happy to make a contribution for the poor among God’s people in Jerusalem .
45015027	They were happy to do this , and they are actually in debt to God’s people in Jerusalem . If the Gentiles got a share of the Jewish people’s spiritual resources , they ought to minister to them with material resources .
45015028	So then after I have finished this job and have safely delivered the final amount of the Gentiles’ offering to them , I will leave for Spain , visiting you on the way .
45015029	And I know that when I come to you I will come with the fullest blessing of Christ .
45015030	Brothers and sisters , I urge you , through our Lord Jesus Christ and through the love of the Spirit , to join me in my struggles in your prayers to God for me .
45015031	Pray that I will be rescued from the people in Judea who don’t believe . Also , pray that my service for Jerusalem will be acceptable to God’s people there
45015032	so that I can come to you with joy by God’s will and be reenergized with your company .
45015033	May the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
45016001	I’m introducing our sister Phoebe to you , who is a servant of the church in Cenchreae .
45016002	Welcome her in the Lord in a way that is worthy of God’s people , and give her whatever she needs from you , because she herself has been a sponsor of many people , myself included .
45016003	Say hello to Prisca and Aquila , my coworkers in Christ Jesus ,
45016004	who risked their own necks for my life . I’m not the only one who thanks God for them , but all the churches of the Gentiles do the same .

45016012	Say hello to Tryphaena and Tryphosa , who are workers for the Lord . Say hello to my dear friend Persis , who has worked hard in the Lord .
