45016014	Say hello to Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and the brothers and sisters who are with them .
45016015	Say hello to Philologus and Julia , Nereus and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints who are with them .
45016016	Say hello to each other with a holy kiss . All the churches of Christ say hello to you .
45016017	Brothers and sisters , I urge you to watch out for people who create divisions and problems against the teaching that you learned . Keep away from them .
45016018	People like that aren’t serving the Lord . They are serving their own feelings . They deceive the hearts of innocent people with smooth talk and flattery .
45016019	The news of your obedience has reached everybody , so I’m happy for you . But I want you to be wise about what’s good , and innocent about what’s evil .
45016020	The God of peace will soon crush Satan under your feet . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
45016021	Timothy my coworker says hello to you , and Lucius , Jason , and Sosipater , my relatives .
45016022	I’m Tertius , and I’m writing this letter to you in the Lord — hello !
45016023	Gaius , who is host to me and to the whole church , says hello to you . Erastus the city treasurer says hello to you , along with our brother Quartus .
45016025	May the glory be to God who can strengthen you with my good news and the message that I preach about Jesus Christ . He can strengthen you with the announcement of the secret that was kept quiet for a long time .
45016026	Now that secret is revealed through what the prophets wrote . It is made known to the Gentiles in order to lead to their faithful obedience based on the command of the eternal God .
45016027	May the glory be to God , who alone is wise ! May the glory be to him through Jesus Christ forever ! Amen .
46001001	From Paul , called by God’s will to be an apostle of Jesus Christ , and from Sosthenes our brother .
46001002	To God’s church that is in Corinth : To those who have been made holy to God in Christ Jesus , who are called to be God’s people . Together with all those who call upon the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place — he’s their Lord and ours !
46001003	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
46001004	I thank my God always for you , because of God’s grace that was given to you in Christ Jesus .
46001005	That is , you were made rich through him in everything : in all your communication and every kind of knowledge ,
46001006	in the same way that the testimony about Christ was confirmed with you .
46001007	The result is that you aren’t missing any spiritual gift while you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to be revealed .
46001008	He will also confirm your testimony about Christ until the end so that you will be blameless on the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
46001009	God is faithful , and you were called by him to partnership with his Son , Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	Now I encourage you , brothers and sisters , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ : Agree with each other and don’t be divided into rival groups . Instead , be restored with the same mind and the same purpose .
46001011	My brothers and sisters , Chloe’s people gave me some information about you , that you’re fighting with each other .
46001012	What I mean is this : that each one of you says , " I belong to Paul , " " I belong to Apollos , " " I belong to Cephas , " " I belong to Christ . "
46001013	Has Christ been divided ? Was Paul crucified for you , or were you baptized in Paul’s name ?
46001014	Thank God that I didn’t baptize any of you , except Crispus and Gaius ,
46001015	so that nobody can say that you were baptized in my name !
46001016	Oh , I baptized the house of Stephanas too . Otherwise , I don’t know if I baptized anyone else .
46001017	Christ didn’t send me to baptize but to preach the good news . And Christ didn’t send me to preach the good news with clever words so that Christ’s cross won’t be emptied of its meaning .
46001018	The message of the cross is foolishness to those who are being destroyed . But it is the power of God for those of us who are being saved .
46001019	It is written in scripture : I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and I will reject the intelligence of the intelligent .
46001020	Where are the wise ? Where are the legal experts ? Where are today’s debaters ? Hasn’t God made the wisdom of the world foolish ?
46001021	In God’s wisdom , he determined that the world wouldn’t come to know him through its wisdom . Instead , God was pleased to save those who believe through the foolishness of preaching .
46001022	Jews ask for signs , and Greeks look for wisdom ,
46001023	but we preach Christ crucified , which is a scandal to Jews and foolishness to Gentiles .
46001024	But to those who are called — both Jews and Greeks — Christ is God’s power and God’s wisdom .
46001025	This is because the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom , and the weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Look at your situation when you were called , brothers and sisters ! By ordinary human standards not many were wise , not many were powerful , not many were from the upper class .
46001027	But God chose what the world considers foolish to shame the wise . God chose what the world considers weak to shame the strong .
46001028	And God chose what the world considers low-class and low-life — what is considered to be nothing — to reduce what is considered to be something to nothing .
46001029	So no human being can brag in God’s presence .
46001030	It is because of God that you are in Christ Jesus . He became wisdom from God for us . This means that he made us righteous and holy , and he delivered us .
46001031	This is consistent with what was written : The one who brags should brag in the Lord !
46002001	When I came to you , brothers and sisters , I didn’t come preaching God’s secrets to you like I was an expert in speech or wisdom .
46002002	I had made up my mind not to think about anything while I was with you except Jesus Christ , and to preach him as crucified .
46002003	I stood in front of you with weakness , fear , and a lot of shaking .
46002004	My message and my preaching weren’t presented with convincing wise words but with a demonstration of the Spirit and of power .
46002005	I did this so that your faith might not depend on the wisdom of people but on the power of God .
46002006	What we say is wisdom to people who are mature . It isn’t a wisdom that comes from the present day or from today’s leaders who are being reduced to nothing .
46002007	We talk about God’s wisdom , which has been hidden as a secret . God determined this wisdom in advance , before time began , for our glory .
46002008	It is a wisdom that none of the present-day rulers have understood , because if they did understand it , they would never have crucified the Lord of glory !
46002009	But this is precisely what is written : God has prepared things for those who love him that no eye has seen , or ear has heard , or that haven’t crossed the mind of any human being .
46002010	God has revealed these things to us through the Spirit . The Spirit searches everything , including the depths of God .
46002011	Who knows a person’s depths except their own spirit that lives in them ? In the same way , no one has known the depths of God except God’s Spirit .
46002012	We haven’t received the world’s spirit but God’s Spirit so that we can know the things given to us by God .
46002013	These are the things we are talking about — not with words taught by human wisdom but with words taught by the Spirit — we are interpreting spiritual things to spiritual people .
46002014	But people who are unspiritual don’t accept the things from God’s Spirit . They are foolishness to them and can’t be understood , because they can only be comprehended in a spiritual way .
46002015	Spiritual people comprehend everything , but they themselves aren’t understood by anyone .
46002016	Who has known the mind of the Lord , who will advise him ? But we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	Brothers and sisters , I couldn’t talk to you like spiritual people but like unspiritual people , like babies in Christ .
46003002	I gave you milk to drink instead of solid food , because you weren’t up to it yet .
46003003	Now you are still not up to it because you are still unspiritual . When jealousy and fighting exist between you , aren’t you unspiritual and living by human standards ?
46003004	When someone says , " I belong to Paul , " and someone else says , " I belong to Apollos , " aren’t you acting like people without the Spirit ?
46003005	After all , what is Apollos ? What is Paul ? They are servants who helped you to believe . Each one had a role given to them by the Lord :
46003006	I planted , Apollos watered , but God made it grow .
46003007	Because of this , neither the one who plants nor the one who waters is anything , but the only one who is anything is God who makes it grow .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters work together , but each one will receive their own reward for their own labor .
46003009	We are God’s coworkers , and you are God’s field , God’s building .
46003010	I laid a foundation like a wise master builder according to God’s grace that was given to me , but someone else is building on top of it . Each person needs to pay attention to the way they build on it .
46003011	No one can lay any other foundation besides the one that is already laid , which is Jesus Christ .
46003012	So , whether someone builds on top of the foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , grass , or hay ,
46003013	each one’s work will be clearly shown . The day will make it clear , because it will be revealed with fire — the fire will test the quality of each one’s work .
46003014	If anyone’s work survives , they’ll get a reward .
46003015	But if anyone’s work goes up in flames , they’ll lose it . However , they themselves will be saved as if they had gone through a fire .
46003016	Don’t you know that you are God’s temple and God’s Spirit lives in you ?
46003017	If someone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy that person , because God’s temple is holy , which is what you are .
46003018	Don’t fool yourself . If some of you think they are worldly-wise , then they should become foolish so that they can become wise .
46003019	This world’s wisdom is foolishness to God . As it’s written , He catches the wise in their cleverness .
46003020	And also , The Lord knows that the thoughts of the wise are silly .
46003021	So then , no one should brag about human beings . Everything belongs to you —
46003022	Paul , Apollos , Cephas , the world , life , death , things in the present , things in the future — everything belongs to you ,
46003023	but you belong to Christ , and Christ belongs to God .
46004001	So a person should think about us this way — as servants of Christ and managers of God’s secrets .
46004002	In this kind of situation , what is expected of a manager is that they prove to be faithful .
46004003	I couldn’t care less if I’m judged by you or by any human court ; I don’t even judge myself .
46004004	I’m not aware of anything against me , but that doesn’t make me innocent , because the Lord is the one who judges me .
46004005	So don’t judge anything before the right time — wait until the Lord comes . He will bring things that are hidden in the dark to light , and he will make people’s motivations public . Then there will be recognition for each person from God .
46004006	Brothers and sisters , I have applied these things to myself and Apollos for your benefit . I’ve done this so that you can learn what it means not to go beyond what has been written and so none of you will become arrogant by supporting one of us against the other .
46004007	Who says that you are better than anyone else ? What do you have that you didn’t receive ? And if you received it , then why are you bragging as if you didn’t receive it ?
46004008	You’ve been filled already ! You’ve become rich already ! You rule like kings without us ! I wish you did rule so that we could be kings with you !
46004009	I suppose that God has shown that we apostles are at the end of the line . We are like prisoners sentenced to death , because we have become a spectacle in the world , both to angels and to humans .
46004010	We are fools for Christ , but you are wise through Christ ! We are weak , but you are strong ! You are honored , but we are dishonored !
46004011	Up to this very moment we are hungry , thirsty , wearing rags , abused , and homeless .
46004012	We work hard with our own hands . When we are insulted , we respond with a blessing ; when we are harassed , we put up with it ;
46004013	when our reputation is attacked , we are encouraging . We have become the scum of the earth , the waste that runs off everything , up to the present time .
46004014	I’m not writing these things to make you ashamed but to warn you , since you are my loved children .
46004015	You may have ten thousand mentors in Christ , but you don’t have many fathers . I gave birth to you in Christ Jesus through the gospel ,
46004016	so I encourage you to follow my example .
46004017	This is why I’ve sent Timothy to you ; he’s my loved and trusted child in the Lord ; he’ll remind you about my way of life in Christ Jesus . He’ll teach the same way as I teach everywhere in every church .
46004018	Some have become arrogant as if I’m not coming to see you .
46004019	But , if the Lord is willing , I’ll come to you soon . Then I won’t focus on what these arrogant people say , but I’ll find out what power they possess .
46004020	God’s kingdom isn’t about words but about power .
46004021	Which do you want ? Should I come to you with a big stick to punish you , or with love and a gentle spirit ?
46005001	Everyone has heard that there is sexual immorality among you . This is a type of immorality that isn’t even heard of among the Gentiles — a man is having sex with his father’s wife !
46005002	And you’re proud of yourselves instead of being so upset that the one who did this thing is expelled from your community .
46005003	Though I’m absent physically , I’m present in the spirit and I’ve already judged the man who did this as if I were present .
46005004	When you meet together in the name of our Lord Jesus , I’ll be present in spirit with the power of our Lord Jesus .
46005005	At that time we need to hand this man over to Satan to destroy his human weakness so that his spirit might be saved on the day of the Lord .
46005006	Your bragging isn’t good ! Don’t you know that a tiny grain of yeast makes a whole batch of dough rise ?
46005007	Clean out the old yeast so you can be a new batch of dough , given that you’re supposed to be unleavened bread . Christ our Passover lamb has been sacrificed ,
46005008	so let’s celebrate the feast with the unleavened bread of honesty and truth , not with old yeast or with the yeast of evil and wickedness .
46005009	I wrote to you in my earlier letter not to associate with sexually immoral people .
46005010	But I wasn’t talking about the sexually immoral people in the outside world by any means — or the greedy , or the swindlers , or people who worship false gods — otherwise , you would have to leave the world entirely !
46005011	But now I’m writing to you not to associate with anyone who calls themselves " brother " or " sister " who is sexually immoral , greedy , someone who worships false gods , an abusive person , a drunk , or a swindler . Don’t even eat with anyone like this .
46005012	What do I care about judging outsiders ? Isn’t it your job to judge insiders ?
46005013	God will judge outsiders . Expel the evil one from among you !
46006001	When someone in your assembly has a legal case against another member , do they dare to take it to court to be judged by people who aren’t just , instead of by God’s people ?
46006002	Or don’t you know that God’s people will judge the world ? If the world is to be judged by you , are you incompetent to judge trivial cases ?
46006003	Don’t you know that we will judge angels ? Why not ordinary things ?
46006004	So then if you have ordinary lawsuits , do you appoint people as judges who aren’t respected by the church ?
46006005	I’m saying this because you should be ashamed of yourselves ! Isn’t there one person among you who is wise enough to pass judgment between believers ?
46006006	But instead , does a brother or sister have a lawsuit against another brother or sister , and do they do this in front of unbelievers ?
46006007	The fact that you have lawsuits against each other means that you’ve already lost your case . Why not be wronged instead ? Why not be cheated ?
46006008	But instead you are doing wrong and cheating — and you’re doing it to your own brothers and sisters .
46006009	Don’t you know that people who are unjust won’t inherit God’s kingdom ? Don’t be deceived . Those who are sexually immoral , those who worship false gods , adulterers , both participants in same-sex intercourse ,
46006010	thieves , the greedy , drunks , abusive people , and swindlers won’t inherit God’s kingdom .
46006011	That is what some of you used to be ! But you were washed clean , you were made holy to God , and you were made right with God in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and in the Spirit of our God .
46006012	I have the freedom to do anything , but not everything is helpful . I have the freedom to do anything , but I won’t be controlled by anything .
46006013	Food is for the stomach and the stomach is for food , and yet God will do away with both . The body isn’t for sexual immorality but for the Lord , and the Lord is for the body .
46006014	God has raised the Lord and will raise us through his power .
46006015	Don’t you know that your bodies are parts of Christ ? So then , should I take parts of Christ and make them a part of someone who is sleeping around ? No way !
46006016	Don’t you know that anyone who is joined to someone who is sleeping around is one body with that person ? The scripture says , The two will become one flesh .
46006017	The one who is joined to the Lord is one spirit with him .
46006018	Avoid sexual immorality ! Every sin that a person can do is committed outside the body , except those who engage in sexual immorality commit sin against their own bodies .
46006019	Or don’t you know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit who is in you ? Don’t you know that you have the Holy Spirit from God , and you don’t belong to yourselves ?
46006020	You have been bought and paid for , so honor God with your body .
46007001	Now , about what you wrote : " It’s good for a man not to have sex with a woman . "
46007002	Each man should have his own wife , and each woman should have her own husband because of sexual immorality .
46007003	The husband should meet his wife’s sexual needs , and the wife should do the same for her husband .
46007004	The wife doesn’t have authority over her own body , but the husband does . Likewise , the husband doesn’t have authority over his own body , but the wife does .
46007005	Don’t refuse to meet each other’s needs unless you both agree for a short period of time to devote yourselves to prayer . Then come back together again so that Satan might not tempt you because of your lack of self-control .
46007006	I’m saying this to give you permission ; it’s not a command .
46007007	I wish all people were like me , but each has a particular gift from God : one has this gift , and another has that one .
46007008	I’m telling those who are single and widows that it’s good for them to stay single like me .
46007009	But if they can’t control themselves , they should get married , because it’s better to marry than to burn with passion .
46007010	I’m passing on the Lord’s command to those who are married : A wife shouldn’t leave her husband ,
46007011	but if she does leave him , then she should stay single or be reconciled to her husband . And a man shouldn’t divorce his wife .
46007012	I’m telling everyone else ( the Lord didn’t say this specifically ) : If a believer has a wife who doesn’t believe , and she agrees to live with him , then he shouldn’t divorce her .
46007013	If a woman has a husband who doesn’t believe and he agrees to live with her , then she shouldn’t divorce him .
46007014	The husband who doesn’t believe belongs to God because of his wife , and the wife who doesn’t believe belongs to God because of her husband . Otherwise , your children would be contaminated by the world , but now they are spiritually set apart .
46007015	But if a spouse who doesn’t believe chooses to leave , then let them leave . The brother or sister isn’t tied down in these circumstances . God has called you to peace .
46007016	How do you know as a wife if you will save your husband ? Or how do you know as a husband if you will save your wife ?
46007017	Nevertheless , each person should live the kind of life that the Lord assigned when he called each one . This is what I teach in all the churches .
46007018	If someone was circumcised when called , he shouldn’t try to reverse it . If someone wasn’t circumcised when he was called , he shouldn’t be circumcised .
46007019	Circumcision is nothing ; not being circumcised is nothing . What matters is keeping God’s commandments .
46007020	Each person should stay in the situation they were in when they were called .
46007021	If you were a slave when you were called , don’t let it bother you . But if you are actually able to be free , take advantage of the opportunity .
46007022	Anyone who was a slave when they were called by the Lord has the status of being the Lord’s free person . In the same way , anyone who was a free person when they were called is Christ’s slave .
46007023	You were bought and paid for . Don’t become slaves of people .
46007024	So then , brothers and sisters , each of you should stay with God in the situation you were in when you were called .
46007025	I don’t have a command from the Lord about people who have never been married , but I’ll give you my opinion as someone you can trust because of the Lord’s mercy .
46007026	So I think this advice is good because of the present crisis : Stay as you are .
46007027	If you are married , don’t get a divorce . If you are divorced , don’t try to find a spouse .
46007028	But if you do marry , you haven’t sinned ; and if someone who hasn’t been married gets married , they haven’t sinned . But married people will have a hard time , and I’m trying to spare you that .
46007029	This is what I’m saying , brothers and sisters : The time has drawn short . From now on , those who have wives should be like people who don’t have them .
46007030	Those who are sad should be like people who aren’t crying . Those who are happy should be like people who aren’t happy . Those who buy something should be like people who don’t have possessions .
46007031	Those who use the world should be like people who aren’t preoccupied with it , because this world in its present form is passing away .
46007032	I want you to be free from concerns . A man who isn’t married is concerned about the Lord’s concerns — how he can please the Lord .
46007033	But a married man is concerned about the world’s concerns — how he can please his wife .
46007034	His attention is divided . A woman who isn’t married or who is a virgin is concerned about the Lord’s concerns so that she can be dedicated to God in both body and spirit . But a married woman is concerned about the world’s concerns — how she can please her husband .
46007035	I’m saying this for your own advantage . It’s not to restrict you but rather to promote effective and consistent service to the Lord without distraction .
46007036	If someone thinks he is acting inappropriately toward an unmarried woman whom he knows , and if he has strong feelings and it seems like the right thing to do , he should do what he wants — he’s not sinning — they should get married .
46007037	But if a man stands firm in his decision , and doesn’t feel the pressure , but has his own will under control , he does right if he decides in his own heart not to marry the woman .
46007038	Therefore , the one who marries the unmarried woman does right , and the one who doesn’t get married will do even better .
46007039	A woman is obligated to stay in her marriage as long as her husband is alive . But if her husband dies , she is free to marry whomever she wants , only it should be a believer in the Lord .
46007040	But in my opinion , she will be happier if she stays the way she is . And I think that I have God’s Spirit too .
46008001	Now concerning meat that has been sacrificed to a false god : We know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge makes people arrogant , but love builds people up .
46008002	If anyone thinks they know something , they don’t yet know as much as they should know .
46008003	But if someone loves God , then they are known by God .
46008004	So concerning the actual food involved in these sacrifices to false gods , we know that a false god isn’t anything in this world , and that there is no God except for the one God .
46008005	Granted , there are so-called " gods , " in heaven and on the earth , as there are many gods and many lords .
46008006	However , for us believers , There is one God the Father . And there is one Lord Jesus Christ .
46008007	But not everybody knows this . Some are eating this food as though it really is food sacrificed to a real idol , because they were used to idol worship until now . Their conscience is weak because it has been damaged .
46008008	Food won’t bring us close to God . We’re not missing out if we don’t eat , and we don’t have any advantage if we do eat .
46008009	But watch out or else this freedom of yours might be a problem for those who are weak .
46008010	Suppose someone sees you ( the person who has knowledge ) eating in an idol’s temple . Won’t the person with a weak conscience be encouraged to eat the meat sacrificed to false gods ?
46008011	The weak brother or sister for whom Christ died is destroyed by your knowledge .
46008012	You sin against Christ if you sin against your brothers and sisters and hurt their weak consciences this way .
46008013	This is why , if food causes the downfall of my brother or sister , I won’t eat meat ever again , or else I may cause my brother or sister to fall .
46009001	Am I not free ? Am I not an apostle ? Haven’t I seen Jesus our Lord ? Aren’t you my work in the Lord ?
46009002	If I’m not an apostle to others , at least I am to you ! You are the seal that shows I’m an apostle .
46009003	This is my defense against those who criticize me .
46009004	Don’t we have the right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Don’t we have the right to travel with a wife who believes like the rest of the apostles , the Lord’s brothers , and Cephas ?
46009006	Or is it only I and Barnabas who don’t have the right to not work for our living ?
46009007	Who joins the army and pays their own way ? Who plants a vineyard and doesn’t eat its fruit ? Who shepherds a flock and doesn’t drink its milk ?
46009008	I’m not saying these things just based on common sense , am I ? Doesn’t the Law itself say these things ?
46009009	In Moses’ Law it’s written : You will not muzzle the ox when it is threshing . Is God worried about oxen ,
46009010	or did he say this entirely for our sake ? It was written for our sake because the one who plows and the one who threshes should each do so with the hope of sharing the produce .
46009011	If we sowed spiritual things in you , is it so much to ask to harvest some material things from you ?
46009012	If others have these rights over you , don’t we deserve them all the more ? However , we haven’t made use of this right , but we put up with everything so we don’t put any obstacle in the way of the gospel of Christ .
46009013	Don’t you know that those who serve in the temple get to eat food from the temple , and those who serve at the altar share part of what is sacrificed on the altar ?
46009014	In the same way , the Lord commanded that those who preach the gospel should get their living from the gospel .
46009015	But I haven’t taken advantage of this . And I’m not writing this so that it will be done for me . It’s better for me to die than to lose my right to brag about this !
46009016	If I preach the gospel , I have no reason to brag , since I’m obligated to do it . I’m in trouble if I don’t preach the gospel .
46009017	If I do this voluntarily , I get rewarded for it . But if I’m forced to do it , then I’ve been charged with a responsibility .
46009018	What reward do I get ? That when I preach , I offer the good news free of charge . That’s why I don’t use the rights to which I’m entitled through the gospel .
46009019	Although I’m free from all people , I make myself a slave to all people , to recruit more of them .
46009020	I act like a Jew to the Jews , so I can recruit Jews . I act like I’m under the Law to those under the Law , so I can recruit those who are under the Law ( though I myself am not under the Law ) .
46009021	I act like I’m outside the Law to those who are outside the Law , so I can recruit those outside the Law ( though I’m not outside the law of God but rather under the law of Christ ) .
46009022	I act weak to the weak , so I can recruit the weak . I have become all things to all people , so I could save some by all possible means .
46009023	All the things I do are for the sake of the gospel , so I can be a partner with it .
46009024	Don’t you know that all the runners in the stadium run , but only one gets the prize ? So run to win .
46009025	Everyone who competes practices self-discipline in everything . The runners do this to get a crown of leaves that shrivel up and die , but we do it to receive a crown that never dies .
46009026	So now this is how I run — not without a clear goal in sight . I fight like a boxer in the ring , not like someone who is shadowboxing .
46009027	Rather , I’m landing punches on my own body and subduing it like a slave . I do this to be sure that I myself won’t be disqualified after preaching to others .
46010001	Brothers and sisters , I want you to be sure of the fact that our ancestors were all under the cloud and they all went through the sea .
46010002	All were baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	All ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink . They drank from a spiritual rock that followed them , and the rock was Christ .
46010005	However , God was unhappy with most of them , and they were struck down in the wilderness .
46010006	These things were examples for us , so we won’t crave evil things like they did .
46010007	Don’t worship false gods like some of them did , as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink and they got up to play .
46010008	Let’s not practice sexual immorality , like some of them did , and twenty-three thousand died in one day .
46010009	Let’s not test Christ , like some of them did , and were killed by the snakes .
46010010	Let’s not grumble , like some of them did , and were killed by the destroyer .
46010011	These things happened to them as an example and were written as a warning for us to whom the end of time has come .

46010013	No temptation has seized you that isn’t common for people . But God is faithful . He won’t allow you to be tempted beyond your abilities . Instead , with the temptation , God will also supply a way out so that you will be able to endure it .

46010015	I’m talking to you like you are sensible people . Think about what I’m saying .
46010016	Isn’t the cup of blessing that we bless a sharing in the blood of Christ ? Isn’t the loaf of bread that we break a sharing in the body of Christ ?
46010017	Since there is one loaf of bread , we who are many are one body , because we all share the one loaf of bread .
46010018	Look at the people of Israel . Don’t those who eat the sacrifices share from the altar ?

46010021	You can’t drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons ; you can’t participate in the table of the Lord and the table of demons .

46010023	Everything is permitted , but everything isn’t beneficial . Everything is permitted , but everything doesn’t build others up .

46010030	If I participate with gratitude , why should I be blamed for food I thank God for ?

46010032	Don’t offend either Jews or Greeks , or God’s church .
