46011001	Follow my example , just like I follow Christ’s .
46011002	I praise you because you remember all my instructions , and you hold on to the traditions exactly as I handed them on to you .
46011003	Now I want you to know that the head of every man is Christ , and the head of the woman is the man , and the head of Christ is God .
46011004	Every man who prays or prophesies with his head covered shames his head .
46011005	Every woman who prays or prophesies with her head uncovered disgraces her head . It is the same thing as having her head shaved .
46011006	If a woman doesn’t cover her head , then she should have her hair cut off . If it is disgraceful for a woman to have short hair or to be shaved , then she should keep her head covered .
46011007	A man shouldn’t have his head covered , because he is the image and glory of God ; but the woman is man’s glory .
46011008	Man didn’t have his origin from woman , but woman from man ;
46011009	and man wasn’t created for the sake of the woman , but the woman for the sake of the man .
46011010	Because of this a woman should have authority over her head , because of the angels .
46011011	However , woman isn’t independent from man , and man isn’t independent from woman in the Lord .
46011012	As woman came from man so also man comes from woman . But everything comes from God .
46011013	Judge for yourselves : Is it appropriate for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Doesn’t nature itself teach you that if a man has long hair , it is a disgrace to him ;
46011015	but if a woman has long hair , it is her glory ? This is because her long hair is given to her for a covering .
46011016	But if someone wants to argue about this , we don’t have such a custom , nor do God’s churches .
46011017	Now I don’t praise you as I give the following instruction because when you meet together , it does more harm than good .
46011018	First of all , when you meet together as a church , I hear that there are divisions among you , and I partly believe it .
46011019	It’s necessary that there are groups among you , to make it clear who is genuine .
46011020	So when you get together in one place , it isn’t to eat the Lord’s meal .
46011021	Each of you goes ahead and eats a private meal . One person goes hungry while another is drunk .
46011022	Don’t you have houses to eat and drink in ? Or do you look down on God’s churches and humiliate those who have nothing ? What can I say to you ? Will I praise you ? No , I don’t praise you in this .
46011023	I received a tradition from the Lord , which I also handed on to you : on the night on which he was betrayed , the Lord Jesus took bread .
46011024	After giving thanks , he broke it and said , " This is my body , which is for you ; do this to remember me . "
46011025	He did the same thing with the cup , after they had eaten , saying , " This cup is the new covenant in my blood . Every time you drink it , do this to remember me . "
46011026	Every time you eat this bread and drink this cup , you broadcast the death of the Lord until he comes .
46011027	This is why those who eat the bread or drink the cup of the Lord inappropriately will be guilty of the Lord’s body and blood .
46011028	Each individual should test himself or herself , and eat from the bread and drink from the cup in that way .
46011029	Those who eat and drink without correctly understanding the body are eating and drinking their own judgment .
46011030	Because of this , many of you are weak and sick , and quite a few have died .
46011031	But if we had judged ourselves , we wouldn’t be judged .
46011032	However , we are disciplined by the Lord when we are judged so that we won’t be judged and condemned along with the whole world .
46011033	For these reasons , my brothers and sisters , when you get together to eat , wait for each other .
46011034	If some of you are hungry , they should eat at home so that getting together doesn’t lead to judgment . I will give directions about the other things when I come .
46012001	Brothers and sisters , I don’t want you to be ignorant about spiritual gifts .
46012002	You know that when you were Gentiles you were often misled by false gods that can’t even speak .
46012003	So I want to make it clear to you that no one says , " Jesus is cursed ! " when speaking by God’s Spirit , and no one can say , " Jesus is Lord , " except by the Holy Spirit .
46012004	There are different spiritual gifts but the same Spirit ;
46012005	and there are different ministries and the same Lord ;
46012006	and there are different activities but the same God who produces all of them in everyone .
46012007	A demonstration of the Spirit is given to each person for the common good .
46012008	A word of wisdom is given by the Spirit to one person , a word of knowledge to another according to the same Spirit ,
46012009	faith to still another by the same Spirit , gifts of healing to another in the one Spirit ,
46012010	performance of miracles to another , prophecy to another , the ability to tell spirits apart to another , different kinds of tongues to another , and the interpretation of the tongues to another .
46012011	All these things are produced by the one and same Spirit who gives what he wants to each person .
46012012	Christ is just like the human body — a body is a unit and has many parts ; and all the parts of the body are one body , even though there are many .
46012013	We were all baptized by one Spirit into one body , whether Jew or Greek , or slave or free , and we all were given one Spirit to drink .
46012014	Certainly the body isn’t one part but many .
46012015	If the foot says , " I’m not part of the body because I’m not a hand , " does that mean it’s not part of the body ?
46012016	If the ear says , " I’m not part of the body because I’m not an eye , " does that mean it’s not part of the body ?
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , what would happen to the hearing ? And if the whole body were an ear , what would happen to the sense of smell ?
46012018	But as it is , God has placed each one of the parts in the body just like he wanted .
46012019	If all were one and the same body part , what would happen to the body ?
46012020	But as it is , there are many parts but one body .
46012021	So the eye can’t say to the hand , " I don’t need you , " or in turn , the head can’t say to the feet , " I don’t need you . "
46012022	Instead , the parts of the body that people think are the weakest are the most necessary .
46012023	The parts of the body that we think are less honorable are the ones we honor the most . The private parts of our body that aren’t presentable are the ones that are given the most dignity .
46012024	The parts of our body that are presentable don’t need this . But God has put the body together , giving greater honor to the part with less honor
46012025	so that there won’t be division in the body and so the parts might have mutual concern for each other .
46012026	If one part suffers , all the parts suffer with it ; if one part gets the glory , all the parts celebrate with it .
46012027	You are the body of Christ and parts of each other .
46012028	In the church , God has appointed first apostles , second prophets , third teachers , then miracles , then gifts of healing , the ability to help others , leadership skills , different kinds of tongues .
46012029	All aren’t apostles , are they ? All aren’t prophets , are they ? All aren’t teachers , are they ? All don’t perform miracles , do they ?
46012030	All don’t have gifts of healing , do they ? All don’t speak in different tongues , do they ? All don’t interpret , do they ?
46012031	Use your ambition to try to get the greater gifts . And I’m going to show you an even better way .
46013001	If I speak in tongues of human beings and of angels but I don’t have love , I’m a clanging gong or a clashing cymbal .
46013002	If I have the gift of prophecy and I know all the mysteries and everything else , and if I have such complete faith that I can move mountains but I don’t have love , I’m nothing .
46013003	If I give away everything that I have and hand over my own body to feel good about what I’ve done but I don’t have love , I receive no benefit whatsoever .
46013004	Love is patient , love is kind , it isn’t jealous , it doesn’t brag , it isn’t arrogant ,
46013005	it isn’t rude , it doesn’t seek its own advantage , it isn’t irritable , it doesn’t keep a record of complaints ,
46013006	it isn’t happy with injustice , but it is happy with the truth .
46013007	Love puts up with all things , trusts in all things , hopes for all things , endures all things .
46013008	Love never fails . As for prophecies , they will be brought to an end . As for tongues , they will stop . As for knowledge , it will be brought to an end .
46013009	We know in part and we prophesy in part ;
46013010	but when the perfect comes , what is partial will be brought to an end .
46013011	When I was a child , I used to speak like a child , reason like a child , think like a child . But now that I have become a man , I’ve put an end to childish things .
46013012	Now we see a reflection in a mirror ; then we will see face-to-face . Now I know partially , but then I will know completely in the same way that I have been completely known .
46013013	Now faith , hope , and love remain — these three things — and the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love , and use your ambition to try to get spiritual gifts but especially so that you might prophesy .
46014002	This is because those who speak in a tongue don’t speak to people but to God ; no one understands it — they speak mysteries by the Spirit .
46014003	Those who prophesy speak to people , building them up , and giving them encouragement and comfort .
46014004	People who speak in a tongue build up themselves ; those who prophesy build up the church .
46014005	I wish that all of you spoke in tongues , but I’d rather you could prophesy . Those who prophesy are more important than those who speak in tongues , unless they are able to interpret them so that the church might be built up .
46014006	After all , brothers and sisters , if I come to you speaking in tongues , how will I help you unless I speak to you with a revelation , some knowledge , a prophecy , or a teaching ?
46014007	Likewise , things that aren’t alive like a harp or a lyre can make a sound , but if there aren’t different notes in the sounds they make , how will the tune from the harp or the lyre be recognized ?
46014008	And if a trumpet call is unrecognizable , then who will prepare for battle ?
46014009	It’s the same way with you : If you don’t use language that is easy to understand when you speak in a tongue , then how will anyone understand what is said ?
46014010	It will be as if you are speaking into the air ! There are probably many language families in the world , and none of them are without meaning .
46014011	So if I don’t know the meaning of the language , then I will be like a foreigner to those who speak it , and they will be like foreigners to me .
46014012	The same holds true for you : since you are ambitious for spiritual gifts , use your ambition to try to work toward being the best at building up the church .
46014013	Therefore , those who speak in a tongue should pray to be able to interpret .
46014014	If I pray in a tongue , my spirit prays but my mind isn’t productive .
46014015	What should I do ? I’ll pray in the Spirit , but I’ll pray with my mind too ; I’ll sing a psalm in the Spirit , but I’ll sing the psalm with my mind too .
46014016	After all , if you praise God in the Spirit , how will the people who aren’t trained in that language say " Amen ! " to your thanksgiving , when they don’t know what you are saying ?
46014017	You may offer a beautiful prayer of thanksgiving , but the other person is not being built up .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in tongues more than all of you .
46014019	But in the church I’d rather speak five words in my right mind than speak thousands of words in a tongue so that I can teach others .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , don’t be like children in the way you think . Well , be babies when it comes to evil , but be adults in your thinking .
46014021	In the Law it is written : I will speak to this people with foreign languages and foreigners’ lips , but they will not even listen to me this way , says the Lord .
46014022	So then , tongues are a sign for those who don’t believe , not for those who believe . But prophecy is a sign for believers , not for those who don’t believe .
46014023	So suppose that the whole church is meeting and everyone is speaking in tongues . If people come in who are outsiders or unbelievers , won’t they say that you are out of your minds ?
46014024	But if everyone is prophesying when an unbeliever or outsider comes in , they are tested by all and called to account by all .
46014025	The secrets of their hearts are brought to light . When that happens , they will fall on their faces and worship God , proclaiming out loud that truly God is among you !
46014026	What is the outcome of this , brothers and sisters ? When you meet together , each one has a psalm , a teaching , a revelation , a tongue , or an interpretation . All these things must be done to build up the church .
46014027	If some speak in a tongue , then let two or at most three speak , one at a time , and someone must interpret .
46014028	However , if there is no interpreter , then they should keep quiet in the meeting . They should speak privately to themselves and to God .
46014029	In the case of prophets , let two or three speak and have the rest evaluate what is said .
46014030	And if some revelation comes to someone else who is sitting down , the first one should be quiet .
46014031	You can all prophesy one at a time so that everyone can learn and be encouraged .
46014032	The spirits of prophets are under the control of the prophets .
46014033	God isn’t a God of disorder but of peace . Like in all the churches of God’s people ,
46014034	the women should be quiet during the meeting . They are not allowed to talk . Instead , they need to get under control , just as the Law says .
46014035	If they want to learn something , they should ask their husbands at home . It is disgraceful for a woman to talk during the meeting .
46014036	Did the word of God originate with you ? Has it come only to you ?
46014037	If anyone thinks that they are prophets or " spiritual people , " then let them recognize that what I’m writing to you is the Lord’s command .
46014038	If someone doesn’t recognize this , they aren’t recognized .
46014039	So then , brothers and sisters , use your ambition to try to get the gift of prophecy , but don’t prevent speaking in tongues .
46014040	Everything should be done with dignity and in proper order .
46015001	Brothers and sisters , I want to call your attention to the good news that I preached to you , which you also received and in which you stand .
46015002	You are being saved through it if you hold on to the message I preached to you , unless somehow you believed it for nothing .
46015003	I passed on to you as most important what I also received : Christ died for our sins in line with the scriptures ,
46015004	he was buried , and he rose on the third day in line with the scriptures .
46015005	He appeared to Cephas , then to the Twelve ,
46015006	and then he appeared to more than five hundred brothers and sisters at once — most of them are still alive to this day , though some have died .
46015007	Then he appeared to James , then to all the apostles ,
46015008	and last of all he appeared to me , as if I were born at the wrong time .
46015009	I’m the least important of the apostles . I don’t deserve to be called an apostle , because I harassed God’s church .
46015010	I am what I am by God’s grace , and God’s grace hasn’t been for nothing . In fact , I have worked harder than all the others — that is , it wasn’t me but the grace of God that is with me .
46015011	So then , whether you heard the message from me or them , this is what we preach and this is what you have believed .
46015012	So if the message that is preached says that Christ has been raised from the dead , then how can some of you say , " There’s no resurrection of the dead " ?
46015013	If there’s no resurrection of the dead , then Christ hasn’t been raised either .
46015014	If Christ hasn’t been raised , then our preaching is useless and your faith is useless .
46015015	We are found to be false witnesses about God , because we testified against God that he raised Christ , when he didn’t raise him if it’s the case that the dead aren’t raised .
46015016	If the dead aren’t raised , then Christ hasn’t been raised either .
46015017	If Christ hasn’t been raised , then your faith is worthless ; you are still in your sins ,
46015018	and what’s more , those who have died in Christ are gone forever .
46015019	If we have a hope in Christ only in this life , then we deserve to be pitied more than anyone else .
46015020	But in fact Christ has been raised from the dead . He’s the first crop of the harvest of those who have died .
46015021	Since death came through a human being , the resurrection of the dead came through one too .
46015022	In the same way that everyone dies in Adam , so also everyone will be given life in Christ .
46015023	Each event will happen in the right order : Christ , the first crop of the harvest , then those who belong to Christ at his coming ,
46015024	and then the end , when Christ hands over the kingdom to God the Father , when he brings every form of rule , every authority and power to an end .
46015025	It is necessary for him to rule until he puts all enemies under his feet .
46015026	Death is the last enemy to be brought to an end ,
46015027	since he has brought everything under control under his feet . When it says that everything has been brought under his control , this clearly means everything except for the one who placed everything under his control .
46015028	But when all things have been brought under his control , then the Son himself will also be under the control of the one who gave him control over everything so that God may be all in all .
46015029	Otherwise , what are those who are getting baptized for the dead doing ? If the dead aren’t raised , then why are they being baptized for them ?
46015030	And what about us ? Why are we in danger all day every day ?
46015031	Brothers and sisters , I swear by the pride I have in you in Christ Jesus our Lord , I’m facing death every day .
46015032	From a human point of view , what good does it do me if I fought wild animals in Ephesus ? If the dead aren’t raised , let’s eat and drink because tomorrow we’ll die .
46015033	Don’t be deceived , bad company corrupts good character .
46015034	Sober up by acting like you should and don’t sin . Some of you are ignorant about God — I say this because you should be ashamed of yourselves !
46015035	But someone will say , " How are the dead raised ? What kind of body will they have when they come back ? "
46015036	Look , fool ! When you put a seed into the ground , it doesn’t come back to life unless it dies .
46015037	What you put in the ground doesn’t have the shape that it will have , but it’s a bare grain of wheat or some other seed .
46015038	God gives it the sort of shape that he chooses , and he gives each of the seeds its own shape .
46015039	All flesh isn’t alike . Humans have one kind of flesh , animals have another kind of flesh , birds have another kind of flesh , and fish have another kind .
46015040	There are heavenly bodies and earthly bodies . The heavenly bodies have one kind of glory , and the earthly bodies have another kind of glory .
46015041	The sun has one kind of glory , the moon has another kind of glory , and the stars have another kind of glory ( but one star is different from another star in its glory ) .
46015042	It’s the same with the resurrection of the dead : a rotting body is put into the ground , but what is raised won’t ever decay .
46015043	It’s degraded when it’s put into the ground , but it’s raised in glory . It’s weak when it’s put into the ground , but it’s raised in power .
46015044	It’s a physical body when it’s put into the ground , but it’s raised as a spiritual body . If there’s a physical body , there’s also a spiritual body .
46015045	So it is also written , The first human , Adam , became a living person , and the last Adam became a spirit that gives life .
46015046	But the physical body comes first , not the spiritual one — the spiritual body comes afterward .
46015047	The first human was from the earth made from dust ; the second human is from heaven .
46015048	The nature of the person made of dust is shared by people who are made of dust , and the nature of the heavenly person is shared by heavenly people .
46015049	We will look like the heavenly person in the same way as we have looked like the person made from dust .
46015050	This is what I’m saying , brothers and sisters : Flesh and blood can’t inherit the kingdom of heaven . Something that rots can’t inherit something that doesn’t decay .
46015051	Listen , I’m telling you a secret : All of us won’t die , but we will all be changed —
46015052	in an instant , in the blink of an eye , at the final trumpet . The trumpet will blast , and the dead will be raised with bodies that won’t decay , and we will be changed .
46015053	It’s necessary for this rotting body to be clothed with what can’t decay , and for the body that is dying to be clothed in what can’t die .
46015054	And when the rotting body has been clothed in what can’t decay , and the dying body has been clothed in what can’t die , then this statement in scripture will happen : Death has been swallowed up by a victory . (
46015056	Death’s sting is sin , and the power of sin is the Law . )
46015057	Thanks be to God , who gives us this victory through our Lord Jesus Christ !
46015058	As a result of all this , my loved brothers and sisters , you must stand firm , unshakable , excelling in the work of the Lord as always , because you know that your labor isn’t going to be for nothing in the Lord .
46016001	Concerning the collection of money for God’s people : You should do what I have directed the churches in Galatia to do .
46016002	On the first day of the week , each of you should set aside whatever you can afford from what you earn so that the collection won’t be delayed until I come .
46016003	Then when I get there , I’ll send whomever you approve to Jerusalem with letters of recommendation to bring your gift .
46016004	If it seems right for me to go too , they’ll travel with me .
46016005	I’ll come to you after I go through Macedonia , and because I’m going through Macedonia ,
46016006	I may stay with you or even spend the winter there in Corinth so that you can send me on my way to wherever I’m off to next .
46016007	I don’t want to make a quick visit to you , since I hope to spend some time with you if the Lord lets it happen .
46016008	I’ll stay here in Ephesus until the Festival of Pentecost .
46016009	In spite of the fact that there are many opponents , a big and productive opportunity has opened up for my mission here .
46016010	If Timothy comes to you , be sure that he has no reason to be afraid while he’s with you , because he does the work of the Lord just like I do .
46016011	So don’t let anyone disrespect him , but send him on in peace so he can join me . I’m waiting for him along with the brothers and sisters .
46016012	Concerning Apollos our brother : I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the brothers and sisters , but he didn’t want to go now . He’ll come when he has an opportunity .
46016013	Stay awake , stand firm in your faith , be brave , be strong .
46016014	Everything should be done in love .
46016015	Brothers and sisters , I encourage you to do something else . You know that the people in Stephanas’ household were the first crop of the harvest to come from the mission to Achaia . They have dedicated themselves to the service of God’s people .
46016016	So accept the authority of people like them and of anyone who cooperates and works hard .
46016017	I’m so happy that Stephanas , Fortunatus , and Achaicus have arrived ; they’ve made up for my missing you .
46016018	Indeed they’ve provided my spirit and yours with a much-needed rest . Therefore , give them proper recognition .
46016019	The churches in the province of Asia greet you . Aquila and Prisca greet you warmly in the Lord , together with the church that meets in their house .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters greet you . You in turn should greet each other with a holy kiss .
46016021	Here is my greeting in my own handwriting — Paul .
46016022	A curse on anyone who doesn’t love the Lord . Come , Lord !
46016023	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you .
46016024	My love is with all of you in Christ Jesus .
47001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will , and Timothy our brother . To God’s church that is in Corinth , along with all of God’s people throughout Achaia .
47001002	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and from our Lord Jesus Christ .
47001003	May the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ be blessed ! He is the compassionate Father and God of all comfort .
47001004	He’s the one who comforts us in all our trouble so that we can comfort other people who are in every kind of trouble . We offer the same comfort that we ourselves received from God .
47001005	That is because we receive so much comfort through Christ in the same way that we share so many of Christ’s sufferings .
47001006	So if we have trouble , it is to bring you comfort and salvation . If we are comforted , it is to bring you comfort from the experience of endurance while you go through the same sufferings that we also suffer .
47001007	Our hope for you is certain , because we know that as you are partners in suffering , so also you are partners in comfort .
47001008	Brothers and sisters , we don’t want you to be unaware of the troubles that we went through in Asia . We were weighed down with a load of suffering that was so far beyond our strength that we were afraid we might not survive .
47001009	It certainly seemed to us as if we had gotten the death penalty . This was so that we would have confidence in God , who raises the dead , instead of ourselves .
47001010	God rescued us from a terrible death , and he will rescue us . We have set our hope on him that he will rescue us again ,
47001011	since you are helping with your prayer for us . Then many people can thank God on our behalf for the gift that was given to us through the prayers of many people .
47001012	We have conducted ourselves with godly sincerity and pure motives in the world , and especially toward you . This is why we are confident , and our conscience confirms this . We didn’t act with human wisdom but we relied on the grace of God .
47001013	We don’t write anything to you except what you can read and also understand . I hope that you will understand totally
47001014	since you have already understood us partly . Understand that in the day of our Lord Jesus , we will make you proud as you will also make us proud .
47001015	Because I was sure of this , I wanted to visit you first so that you could have a second opportunity to see me .
47001016	I wanted to visit you on my way to Macedonia , and then come to you again on my way back from Macedonia , at which point I was hoping you would help me on my way to Judea .
47001017	So I wasn’t unreliable when I planned to do this , was I ? Or do I make decisions with a substandard human process so that I say " Yes , yes " and " No , no " at the same time ?
47001018	But as God is faithful , our message to you isn’t both yes and no .
47001019	God’s Son , Jesus Christ , is the one who was preached among you by us — through me , Silvanus , and Timothy — he wasn’t yes and no . In him it is always yes .
47001020	All of God’s promises have their yes in him . That is why we say Amen through him to the glory of God .
47001021	God is the one who establishes us with you in Christ and who anointed us .
47001022	God also sealed us and gave the Spirit as a down payment in our hearts .
47001023	I call on God as my witness — I didn’t come again to Corinth because I wanted to spare you .
47001024	It isn’t that we are trying to control your faith , but we are working with you for your happiness , because you stand firm in your faith .
47002001	So I decided that , for my own sake , I wouldn’t visit you again while I was upset .
47002002	If I make you sad , who will be there to make me glad when you are sad because of me ?
47002003	That’s why I wrote this very thing to you , so that when I came I wouldn’t be made sad by the ones who ought to make me happy . I have confidence in you , that my happiness means your happiness .
47002004	I wrote to you in tears , with a very troubled and anxious heart . I didn’t write to make you sad but so you would know the overwhelming love that I have for you .
47002005	But if someone has made anyone sad , that person hasn’t hurt me but all of you to some degree ( not to exaggerate ) .
47002006	The punishment handed out by the majority is enough for this person .
47002007	This is why you should try your best to forgive and to comfort this person now instead , so that this person isn’t overwhelmed by too much sorrow .
47002008	So I encourage you to show your love for this person .
47002009	This is another reason why I wrote you . I wanted to test you and see if you are obedient in everything .
47002010	If you forgive anyone for anything , I do too . And whatever I’ve forgiven ( if I’ve forgiven anything ) , I did it for you in the presence of Christ .
47002011	This is so that we won’t be taken advantage of by Satan , because we are well aware of his schemes .
47002012	When I came to Troas to preach Christ’s gospel , the Lord gave me an opportunity to preach .
47002013	But I was worried because I couldn’t find my brother Titus there . So I said good-bye to them and went on to Macedonia .
47002014	But thank God , who is always leading us around through Christ as if we were in a parade . He releases the fragrance of the knowledge of him everywhere through us .
47002015	We smell like the aroma of Christ’s offering to God , both to those who are being saved and to those who are on the road to destruction .
47002016	We smell like a contagious dead person to those who are dying , but we smell like the fountain of life to those who are being saved . Who is qualified for this kind of ministry ?
47002017	We aren’t like so many people who hustle the word of God to make a profit . We are speaking through Christ in the presence of God , as those who are sincere and as those who are sent from God .
47003001	Are we starting to commend ourselves again ? We don’t need letters of introduction to you or from you like other people , do we ?
47003002	You are our letter , written on our hearts , known and read by everyone .
47003003	You show that you are Christ’s letter , delivered by us . You weren’t written with ink but with the Spirit of the living God . You weren’t written on tablets of stone but on tablets of human hearts .
47003004	This is the confidence that we have through Christ in the presence of God .
47003005	It isn’t that we ourselves are qualified to claim that anything came from us . No , our qualification is from God .
47003006	He has qualified us as ministers of a new covenant , not based on what is written but on the Spirit , because what is written kills , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	The ministry that brought death was carved in letters on stone tablets . It came with such glory that the Israelites couldn’t look for long at Moses’ face because his face was shining with glory , even though it was a fading glory .
47003008	Won’t the ministry of the Spirit be much more glorious ?
47003009	If the ministry that brought condemnation has glory , how much more glorious is the ministry that brings righteousness ?
47003010	In fact , what was glorious isn’t glorious now , because of the glory that is brighter .
47003011	If the glory that fades away was glorious , how much more glorious is the one that lasts !
47003012	So , since we have such a hope , we act with great confidence .
47003013	We aren’t like Moses , who used to put a veil over his face so that the Israelites couldn’t watch the end of what was fading away .
47003014	But their minds were closed . Right up to the present day the same veil remains when the old covenant is read . The veil is not removed because it is taken away by Christ .
47003015	Even today , whenever Moses is read , a veil lies over their hearts .
47003016	But whenever someone turns back to the Lord , the veil is removed .
47003017	The Lord is the Spirit , and where the Lord’s Spirit is , there is freedom .
47003018	All of us are looking with unveiled faces at the glory of the Lord as if we were looking in a mirror . We are being transformed into that same image from one degree of glory to the next degree of glory . This comes from the Lord , who is the Spirit .
47004001	This is why we don’t get discouraged , given that we received this ministry in the same way that we received God’s mercy .
47004002	Instead , we reject secrecy and shameful actions . We don’t use deception , and we don’t tamper with God’s word . Instead , we commend ourselves to everyone’s conscience in the sight of God by the public announcement of the truth .
47004003	And even if our gospel is veiled , it is veiled to those who are on the road to destruction .
47004004	The god of this age has blinded the minds of those who don’t have faith so they couldn’t see the light of the gospel that reveals Christ’s glory . Christ is the image of God .
47004005	We don’t preach about ourselves . Instead , we preach about Jesus Christ as Lord , and we describe ourselves as your slaves for Jesus’ sake .
47004006	God said that light should shine out of the darkness . He is the same one who shone in our hearts to give us the light of the knowledge of God’s glory in the face of Jesus Christ .
47004007	But we have this treasure in clay pots so that the awesome power belongs to God and doesn’t come from us .
47004008	We are experiencing all kinds of trouble , but we aren’t crushed . We are confused , but we aren’t depressed .
47004009	We are harassed , but we aren’t abandoned . We are knocked down , but we aren’t knocked out .
47004010	We always carry Jesus’ death around in our bodies so that Jesus’ life can also be seen in our bodies .
47004011	We who are alive are always being handed over to death for Jesus’ sake so that Jesus’ life can also be seen in our bodies that are dying .
47004012	So death is at work in us , but life is at work in you .
47004013	We have the same faithful spirit as what is written in scripture : I had faith , and so I spoke . We also have faith , and so we also speak .
47004014	We do this because we know that the one who raised the Lord Jesus will also raise us with Jesus , and he will bring us into his presence along with you .
47004015	All these things are for your benefit . As grace increases to benefit more and more people , it will cause gratitude to increase , which results in God’s glory .
47004016	So we aren’t depressed . But even if our bodies are breaking down on the outside , the person that we are on the inside is being renewed every day .
47004017	Our temporary minor problems are producing an eternal stockpile of glory for us that is beyond all comparison .
47004018	We don’t focus on the things that can be seen but on the things that can’t be seen . The things that can be seen don’t last , but the things that can’t be seen are eternal .
47005001	We know that if the tent that we live in on earth is torn down , we have a building from God . It’s a house that isn’t handmade , which is eternal and located in heaven .
47005002	We groan while we live in this residence . We really want to dress ourselves with our building from heaven —
47005003	since we assume that when we take off this tent , we won’t find out that we are naked .
47005004	Yes , while we are in this tent we groan , because we are weighed down . We want to be dressed not undressed , so that what is dying can be swallowed up by life .
47005005	Now the one who prepared us for this very thing is God , and God gave us the Spirit as a down payment for our home .
47005006	So we are always confident , because we know that while we are living in the body , we are away from our home with the Lord .
47005007	We live by faith and not by sight .
47005008	We are confident , and we would prefer to leave the body and to be at home with the Lord .
47005009	So our goal is to be acceptable to him , whether we are at home or away from home .
47005010	We all must appear before Christ in court so that each person can be paid back for the things that were done while in the body , whether they were good or bad .
47005011	So we try to persuade people , since we know what it means to fear the Lord . We are well known by God , and I hope that in your heart we are well known by you as well .
47005012	We aren’t trying to commend ourselves to you again . Instead , we are giving you an opportunity to be proud of us so that you could answer those who take pride in superficial appearance , and not in what is in the heart .
47005013	If we are crazy , it’s for God’s sake . If we are rational , it’s for your sake .
47005014	The love of Christ controls us , because we have concluded this : one died for the sake of all ; therefore , all died .
47005015	He died for the sake of all so that those who are alive should live not for themselves but for the one who died for them and was raised .
47005016	So then , from this point on we won’t recognize people by human standards . Even though we used to know Christ by human standards , that isn’t how we know him now .
47005017	So then , if anyone is in Christ , that person is part of the new creation . The old things have gone away , and look , new things have arrived !
47005018	All of these new things are from God , who reconciled us to himself through Christ and who gave us the ministry of reconciliation .
47005019	In other words , God was reconciling the world to himself through Christ , by not counting people’s sins against them . He has trusted us with this message of reconciliation .
47005020	So we are ambassadors who represent Christ . God is negotiating with you through us . We beg you as Christ’s representatives , " Be reconciled to God ! "
47005021	God caused the one who didn’t know sin to be sin for our sake so that through him we could become the righteousness of God .
47006001	Since we work together with him , we are also begging you not to receive the grace of God in vain .
47006002	He says , I listened to you at the right time , and I helped you on the day of salvation . Look , now is the right time ! Look , now is the day of salvation !
47006003	We don’t give anyone any reason to be offended about anything so that our ministry won’t be criticized .
47006004	Instead , we commend ourselves as ministers of God in every way . We did this with our great endurance through problems , disasters , and stressful situations .
47006005	We went through beatings , imprisonments , and riots . We experienced hard work , sleepless nights , and hunger .
47006006	We displayed purity , knowledge , patience , and generosity . We served with the Holy Spirit , genuine love ,
47006007	telling the truth , and God’s power . We carried the weapons of righteousness in our right hand and our left hand .
47006008	We were treated with honor and dishonor and with verbal abuse and good evaluation . We were seen as both fake and real ,
47006009	as unknown and well known , as dying — and look , we are alive ! We were seen as punished but not killed ,
47006010	as going through pain but always happy , as poor but making many rich , and as having nothing but owning everything .
47006011	Corinthians , we have spoken openly to you , and our hearts are wide open .
47006012	There are no limits to the affection that we feel for you . You are the ones who placed boundaries on your affection for us .
47006013	But as a fair trade — I’m talking to you like you are children — open your hearts wide too .
47006014	Don’t be tied up as equal partners with people who don’t believe . What does righteousness share with that which is outside the Law ? What relationship does light have with darkness ?
47006015	What harmony does Christ have with Satan ? What does a believer have in common with someone who doesn’t believe ?
47006016	What agreement can there be between God’s temple and idols ? Because we are the temple of the living God . Just as God said , I live with them , and I will move among them . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
47006017	Therefore , come out from among them and be separated , says the Lord . Don’t touch what is unclean . Then I will welcome you .
47006018	I will be a father to you , and you will be my sons and daughters , says the Lord Almighty .
47007001	My dear friends , since we have these promises , let’s cleanse ourselves from anything that contaminates our body or spirit so that we make our holiness complete in the fear of God .
47007002	Make room in your hearts for us . We didn’t do anything wrong to anyone . We didn’t ruin anyone . We didn’t take advantage of anyone .
47007003	I’m not saying this to make you feel guilty . I’ve already said that you are in our hearts so that we die and live together with you .
47007004	I have every confidence in you . I’m terribly proud of you . I’m filled with encouragement . I’m overwhelmed with happiness while in the middle of our problems .
47007005	Even after we arrived in Macedonia , we couldn’t rest physically . We were surrounded by problems . There was external conflict , and there were internal fears .
47007006	However , God comforts people who are discouraged , and he comforted us by Titus’ arrival .
47007007	We weren’t comforted only by his arrival but also by the comfort he had received from you . He told us about your desire to see me , how you were sorry , and about your concern for me , so that I was even happier .
47007008	Even though my letter hurt you , I don’t regret it . Well — I did regret it just a bit because I see that that letter made you sad , though only for a short time .
47007009	Now I’m glad — not because you were sad but because you were made sad enough to change your hearts and lives . You felt godly sadness so that no one was harmed by us in any way .
47007010	Godly sadness produces a changed heart and life that leads to salvation and leaves no regrets , but sorrow under the influence of the world produces death .
47007011	Look at what this very experience of godly sadness has produced in you : such enthusiasm , what a desire to clear yourselves of blame , such indignation , what fear , what purpose , such concern , what justice ! In everything you have shown yourselves to be innocent in the matter .
47007012	So although I wrote to you , it wasn’t for the sake of the one who did wrong , or for the sake of the one who was wronged , but to show you your own enthusiasm for us in the sight of God .
47007013	Because of this we have been encouraged . And in addition to our own encouragement , we were even more pleased at how happy Titus was . His mind has been put at rest by all of you .
47007014	If I’ve bragged about you to him in any way , I haven’t been embarrassed . Instead , our bragging to Titus has also been proven to be true , just like everything we said to you was true .
47007015	His devotion to you is growing even more as he remembers how all of you were obedient when you welcomed him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I’m happy , because I can completely depend on you .
47008001	Brothers and sisters , we want to let you know about the grace of God that was given to the churches of Macedonia .
47008002	While they were being tested by many problems , their extra amount of happiness and their extreme poverty resulted in a surplus of rich generosity .
47008003	I assure you that they gave what they could afford and even more than they could afford , and they did it voluntarily .
47008004	They urgently begged us for the privilege of sharing in this service for the saints .
47008005	They even exceeded our expectations , because they gave themselves to the Lord first and to us , consistent with God’s will .
47008006	As a result , we challenged Titus to finish this work of grace with you the way he had started it .
47008007	Be the best in this work of grace in the same way that you are the best in everything , such as faith , speech , knowledge , total commitment , and the love we inspired in you .
47008008	I’m not giving an order , but by mentioning the commitment of others , I’m trying to prove the authenticity of your love also .
47008009	You know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ . Although he was rich , he became poor for our sakes , so that you could become rich through his poverty .
47008010	I’m giving you my opinion about this . It’s to your advantage to do this , since you not only started to do it last year but you wanted to do it too .
47008011	Now finish the job as well so that you finish it with as much enthusiasm as you started , given what you can afford .
47008012	A gift is appreciated because of what a person can afford , not because of what that person can’t afford , if it’s apparent that it’s done willingly .
47008013	It isn’t that we want others to have financial ease and you financial difficulties , but it’s a matter of equality .
47008014	At the present moment , your surplus can fill their deficit so that in the future their surplus can fill your deficit . In this way there is equality .
47008015	As it is written , The one who gathered more didn’t have too much , and the one who gathered less didn’t have too little .
47008016	But thank God , who put the same commitment that I have for you in Titus’ heart .
47008017	Not only has he accepted our challenge but he’s on his way to see you voluntarily , and he’s excited .
47008018	We are sending the brother who is famous in all the churches because of his work for the gospel along with him .
47008019	In addition to this , he is chosen by the churches to be our traveling companion in this work of grace , which we are taking care of for the sake of the glory of the Lord himself , and to show our desire to help .
47008020	We are trying to avoid being blamed by anyone for the way we take care of this large amount of money .
47008021	We care about doing the right thing , not only in the Lord’s eyes but also in the eyes of other people .
47008022	We are sending our brother with them . We have tested his commitment in many ways and many times . Now he’s even more committed , because he has so much confidence in you .
47008023	If there is any question about Titus , he is my partner and coworker among you . If there is any question about our brothers , they are the churches’ apostles and an honor to Christ .
47008024	So show them the proof of your love and the reason we are so proud of you , in such a way that the churches can see it .
47009001	It’s unnecessary for me to write to you about this service for God’s people .
47009002	I know about your willingness to help . I brag about you to the Macedonians , saying , " Greece has been ready since last year , " and your enthusiasm has motivated most of them .
47009003	But I’m sending the brothers so that our bragging about you in this case won’t be empty words , and so that you can be prepared , just as I keep telling them you will be .
47009004	If some Macedonians should come with me and find out that you aren’t ready , we ( not to mention you ) would be embarrassed as far as this project goes .
47009005	This is why I thought it was necessary to encourage the brothers to go to you ahead of time and arrange in advance the generous gift you have already promised . I want it to be a real gift from you . I don’t want you to feel like you are being forced to give anything .
47009006	What I mean is this : the one who sows a small number of seeds will also reap a small crop , and the one who sows a generous amount of seeds will also reap a generous crop .
47009007	Everyone should give whatever they have decided in their heart . They shouldn’t give with hesitation or because of pressure . God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	God has the power to provide you with more than enough of every kind of grace . That way , you will have everything you need always and in everything to provide more than enough for every kind of good work .
47009009	As it is written , He scattered everywhere ; he gave to the needy ; his righteousness remains forever .
47009010	The one who supplies seed for planting and bread for eating will supply and multiply your seed and will increase your crop , which is righteousness .
47009011	You will be made rich in every way so that you can be generous in every way . Such generosity produces thanksgiving to God through us .
47009012	Your ministry of this service to God’s people isn’t only fully meeting their needs but it is also multiplying in many expressions of thanksgiving to God .
47009013	They will give honor to God for your obedience to your confession of Christ’s gospel . They will do this because this service provides evidence of your obedience , and because of your generosity in sharing with them and with everyone .
47009014	They will also pray for you , and they will care deeply for you because of the outstanding grace that God has given to you .
47009015	Thank God for his gift that words can’t describe !
47010001	I , Paul , make a personal request to you with the gentleness and kindness of Christ . I’m shy when I’m with you , but I’m bossy when I’m away from you !
47010002	I beg you that when I’m with you in person , I won’t have to boss you around . I’m afraid that I may have to use that kind of behavior with those people who think we live by human standards .
47010003	Although we live in the world , we don’t fight our battles with human methods .
47010004	Our weapons that we fight with aren’t human , but instead they are powered by God for the destruction of fortresses . They destroy arguments ,
47010005	and every defense that is raised up to oppose the knowledge of God . They capture every thought to make it obedient to Christ .
47010006	Once your obedience is complete , we are ready to punish any disobedience .
47010007	Look at what is right in front of you ! If anyone is sure about belonging to Christ , that person should think again . We belong to Christ just like that person .
47010008	Even if I went on to brag about our authority , I wouldn’t be ashamed of it . The Lord gave us that authority to build you up and not to destroy you .
47010009	I don’t want it to seem like I’m trying to intimidate you with my letters .
47010010	I know what some people are saying : " His letters are severe and powerful , but in person he is weak and his speech is worth nothing . "
47010011	These people need to think about this — that when we are with you , our actions will show that we are the same as the words we wrote when we were away from you .
47010012	We won’t dare to place ourselves in the same league or to compare ourselves with some of those who are promoting themselves . When they measure themselves by themselves , and compare themselves with themselves , they have no understanding .
47010013	We won’t take pride in anything more than what is appropriate . Let’s look at the boundaries of our work area that God has assigned to us . It’s an area that includes you .
47010014	We aren’t going out of bounds , as if our work area doesn’t extend as far as you . We were the first ones to travel as far as Corinth with the gospel of Christ .
47010015	We don’t take pride in what other people do outside of our boundaries . We hope that our work will be extended even more by you as your faith grows , until it expands fully ( within the boundaries , of course ) .
47010016	We hope that our work grows even to the point of the gospel being preached in places beyond Corinth , without bragging about what has already been done in another person’s work area .
47010017	But , the one who brags should brag in the Lord .
47010018	It isn’t the person who promotes himself or herself who is approved but the person whom the Lord commends .
47011001	I hope that you will put up with me while I act like a fool . Well , in fact , you are putting up with me !
47011002	I’m deeply concerned about you with the same concern that God has . As your father , I promised you in marriage to one husband . I promised to present you as an innocent virgin to Christ himself .
47011003	But I’m afraid that your minds might be seduced in the same way as the snake deceived Eve with his devious tricks . You might be unable to focus completely on a genuine and innocent commitment to Christ .
47011004	If a person comes and preaches some other Jesus than the one we preached , or if you receive a different Spirit than the one you had received , or a different gospel than the one you embraced , you put up with it so easily !
47011005	I don’t consider myself as second-rate in any way compared to the " super-apostles . "
47011006	But even if I’m uneducated in public speaking , I’m not uneducated in knowledge . We have shown this to you in every way and in everything we have done .
47011007	Did I commit a sin by humbling myself to give you an advantage because I preached the gospel of God to you free of charge ?
47011008	I robbed other churches by taking a salary from them in order to serve you !
47011009	While I was with you , I didn’t burden any of you even though I needed things . The believers who came from Macedonia gave me everything I needed . I kept myself from being a financial drain on you in any way , and I will continue to keep myself from being a burden .
47011010	Since Christ’s truth is in me , I won’t stop telling the entire area of Greece that I’m proud of what I did .
47011011	Why ? Is it because I don’t love you ? God knows that I do !
47011012	But I’m going to continue to do what I’m doing . I want to contradict the claims of the people who want to be treated like they are the same as us because of what they brag about .
47011013	Such people are false apostles and dishonest workers who disguise themselves as apostles of Christ .
47011014	And no wonder ! Even Satan disguises himself as an angel of light .
47011015	It is no great surprise then that his servants also disguise themselves as servants of righteousness . Their end will be what their actions deserve .
47011016	I repeat , no one should take me for a fool . But if you do , then allow me to be a fool so that I can brag like a fool for a bit .
47011017	I’m not saying what I’m saying because the Lord tells me to . I’m saying it like I’m a fool . I’m putting my confidence in this business of bragging .
47011018	Since so many people are bragging based on human standards , that is how I’m going to brag too .
47011019	Because you , who are so wise , are happy to put up with fools .
47011020	You put up with it if someone enslaves you , if someone exploits you , if someone takes advantage of you , if someone places themselves over you , or if someone hits you in the face .
47011021	I’m ashamed to say that we have been weak in comparison ! But in whatever they challenge me , I challenge them ( I’m speaking foolishly ) .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they descendants of Abraham ? So am I .
47011023	Are they ministers of Christ ? I’m speaking like a crazy person . What I’ve done goes well beyond what they’ve done . I’ve worked much harder . I’ve been imprisoned much more often . I’ve been beaten more times than I can count . I’ve faced death many times .
47011024	I received the " forty lashes minus one " from the Jews five times .
47011025	I was beaten with rods three times . I was stoned once . I was shipwrecked three times . I spent a day and a night on the open sea .
47011026	I’ve been on many journeys . I faced dangers from rivers , robbers , my people , and Gentiles . I faced dangers in the city , in the desert , on the sea , and from false brothers and sisters .
47011027	I faced these dangers with hard work and heavy labor , many sleepless nights , hunger and thirst , often without food , and in the cold without enough clothes .
47011028	Besides all the other things I could mention , there’s my daily stress because I’m concerned about all the churches .
47011029	Who is weak without me being weak ? Who is led astray without me being furious about it ?
47011030	If it’s necessary to brag , I’ll brag about my weaknesses .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Jesus , the one who is blessed forever , knows that I’m not lying .
47011032	At Damascus the governor under King Aretas was guarding the city of Damascus in order to capture me ,
47011033	but I got away from him by being lowered in a basket through a window in the city wall .
47012001	It is necessary to brag , not that it does any good . I’ll move on to visions and revelations from the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Christ who was caught up into the third heaven fourteen years ago . I don’t know whether it was in the body or out of the body . God knows .
47012003	
47012004	I know that this man was caught up into paradise and that he heard unspeakable words that were things no one is allowed to repeat . I don’t know whether it was in the body or apart from the body . God knows .
47012005	I’ll brag about this man , but I won’t brag about myself , except to brag about my weaknesses .
47012006	If I did want to brag , I wouldn’t make a fool of myself because I’d tell the truth . I’m holding back from bragging so that no one will give me any more credit than what anyone sees or hears about me .
47012007	I was given a thorn in my body because of the outstanding revelations I’ve received so that I wouldn’t be conceited . It’s a messenger from Satan sent to torment me so that I wouldn’t be conceited .
47012008	I pleaded with the Lord three times for it to leave me alone .
47012009	He said to me , " My grace is enough for you , because power is made perfect in weakness . " So I’ll gladly spend my time bragging about my weaknesses so that Christ’s power can rest on me .
47012010	Therefore , I’m all right with weaknesses , insults , disasters , harassments , and stressful situations for the sake of Christ , because when I’m weak , then I’m strong .
47012011	I’ve become a fool ! You made me do it . Actually , I should have been commended by you . I’m not inferior to the super-apostles in any way , even though I’m a nonentity .
47012012	The signs of an apostle were performed among you with continuous endurance through signs , wonders , and miracles .
47012013	How were you treated worse than the other churches , except that I myself wasn’t a financial burden on you ? Forgive me for this wrong !
47012014	Look , I’m ready to visit you a third time , and I won’t be a burden on you . I don’t want your things ; I want you . It isn’t the children’s responsibility to save up for their parents but parents for children .
47012015	I will very gladly spend and be spent for your sake . If I love you more , will you love me less ?
47012016	We all know that I didn’t place a burden on you , but in spite of that you think I’m a con artist who fooled you with a trick .
47012017	I haven’t taken advantage of you through any of the people I sent to you , have I ?
47012018	I strongly encouraged Titus to go to you and sent the brother with him . Titus didn’t take advantage of you , did he ? Didn’t we live by the same Spirit ? Didn’t we walk in the same footsteps ?
47012019	Have you been thinking up to now that we are defending ourselves to you ? Actually , we are speaking in the sight of God and in Christ . Dear friends , everything is meant to build you up .
47012020	I’m afraid that maybe when I come you will be different from the way I want you to be , and that I’ll be different from the way you want me to be . I’m afraid that there might be fighting , obsession , losing your temper , competitive opposition , backstabbing , gossip , conceit , and disorderly conduct .
47012021	I’m afraid that when I come again , my God may embarrass me in front of you . I might have to go into mourning over all the people who have sinned before and haven’t changed their hearts and lives from what they used to practice : moral corruption , sexual immorality , and doing whatever feels good .
47013001	This is the third time that I’m coming to visit you . Every matter is settled on the evidence of two or three witnesses .
47013002	When I was with you on my second visit , I already warned those who continued to sin . Now I’m repeating that warning to all the rest of you while I’m at a safe distance : if I come again , I won’t spare anyone .
47013003	Since you are demanding proof that Christ speaks through me , Christ isn’t weak in dealing with you but shows his power among you .
47013004	Certainly he was crucified because of weakness , but he lives by the power of God . Certainly we also are weak in him , but we will live together with him , because of God’s power that is directed toward you .
47013005	Examine yourselves to see if you are in the faith . Test yourselves . Don’t you understand that Jesus Christ is in you ? Unless , of course , you fail the test .
47013006	But I hope that you will realize that we don’t fail the test .
47013007	We pray to God that you don’t do anything wrong , not because we want to appear to pass the test but so that you might do the right thing , even if we appear to fail .
47013008	We can’t do anything against the truth but only to help the truth .
47013009	We are happy when we are weak but you are strong . We pray for this : that you will be made complete .
47013010	This is why I’m writing these things while I’m away . I’m writing so that I won’t need to act harshly when I’m with you by using the authority that the Lord gave me . He gave it to me so that I could build you up , not tear you down .
47013011	Finally , brothers and sisters , good-bye . Put things in order , respond to my encouragement , be in harmony with each other , and live in peace — and the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Say hello to each other with a holy kiss . All of God’s people say hello to you .
