47013014	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , the love of God , and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	From Paul , an apostle who is not sent from human authority or commissioned through human agency , but sent through Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised him from the dead ;
48001002	and from all the brothers and sisters with me . To the churches in Galatia .
48001003	Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
48001004	He gave himself for our sins , so he could deliver us from this present evil age , according to the will of our God and Father .
48001005	To God be the glory forever and always ! Amen .
48001006	I’m amazed that you are so quickly deserting the one who called you by the grace of Christ to follow another gospel .
48001007	It’s not really another gospel , but certain people are confusing you and they want to change the gospel of Christ .
48001008	However , even if we ourselves or a heavenly angel should ever preach anything different from what we preached to you , they should be under a curse .
48001009	I’m repeating what we’ve said before : if anyone preaches something different from what you received , they should be under a curse !
48001010	Am I trying to win over human beings or God ? Or am I trying to please people ? If I were still trying to please people , I wouldn’t be Christ’s slave .
48001011	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that the gospel I preached isn’t human in origin .
48001012	I didn’t receive it or learn it from a human . It came through a revelation from Jesus Christ .
48001013	You heard about my previous life in Judaism , how severely I harassed God’s church and tried to destroy it .
48001014	I advanced in Judaism beyond many of my peers , because I was much more militant about the traditions of my ancestors .
48001015	But God had set me apart from birth and called me through his grace . He was pleased
48001016	to reveal his Son to me , so that I might preach about him to the Gentiles . I didn’t immediately consult with any human being .
48001017	I didn’t go up to Jerusalem to see the men who were apostles before me either , but I went away into Arabia and I returned again to Damascus .
48001018	Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Cephas and stayed with him fifteen days .
48001019	But I didn’t see any other of the apostles except James the brother of the Lord .
48001020	Before God , I’m not lying about the things that I’m writing to you !
48001021	Then I went into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ,
48001022	but I wasn’t known personally by the Christian churches in Judea .
48001023	They only heard a report about me : " The man who used to harass us now preaches the faith that he once tried to destroy . "
48001024	So they were glorifying God because of me .
48002001	Then after fourteen years I went up to Jerusalem again with Barnabas , and I took Titus along also .
48002002	I went there because of a revelation , and I laid out the gospel that I preach to the Gentiles for them . But I did it privately with the influential leaders to make sure that I wouldn’t be working or that I hadn’t worked for nothing .
48002003	However , not even Titus , who was with me and who was a Greek , was required to be circumcised .
48002004	But false brothers and sisters , who were brought in secretly , slipped in to spy on our freedom , which we have in Christ Jesus , and to make us slaves .
48002005	We didn’t give in and submit to them for a single moment , so that the truth of the gospel would continue to be with you .
48002006	The influential leaders didn’t add anything to what I was preaching — and whatever they were makes no difference to me , because God doesn’t show favoritism .
48002007	But on the contrary , they saw that I had been given the responsibility to preach the gospel to the people who aren’t circumcised , just as Peter had been to the circumcised .
48002008	The one who empowered Peter to become an apostle to the circumcised empowered me also to be one to the Gentiles .
48002009	James , Cephas , and John , who are considered to be key leaders , shook hands with me and Barnabas as equals when they recognized the grace that was given to me . So it was agreed that we would go to the Gentiles , while they continue to go to the people who were circumcised .
48002010	They asked only that we would remember the poor , which was certainly something I was willing to do .
48002011	But when Cephas came to Antioch , I opposed him to his face , because he was wrong .
48002012	He had been eating with the Gentiles before certain people came from James . But when they came , he began to back out and separate himself , because he was afraid of the people who promoted circumcision .
48002013	And the rest of the Jews also joined him in this hypocrisy so that even Barnabas got carried away with them in their hypocrisy .
48002014	But when I saw that they weren’t acting consistently with the truth of the gospel , I said to Cephas in front of everyone , " If you , though you’re a Jew , live like a Gentile and not like a Jew , how can you require the Gentiles to live like Jews ? "
48002015	We are born Jews — we’re not Gentile sinners .
48002016	However , we know that a person isn’t made righteous by the works of the Law but rather through the faithfulness of Jesus Christ . We ourselves believed in Christ Jesus so that we could be made righteous by the faithfulness of Christ and not by the works of the Law — because no one will be made righteous by the works of the Law .
48002017	But if it is discovered that we ourselves are sinners while we are trying to be made righteous in Christ , then is Christ a servant of sin ? Absolutely not !
48002018	If I rebuild the very things that I tore down , I show that I myself am breaking the Law .
48002019	I died to the Law through the Law , so that I could live for God .
48002020	I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live , but Christ lives in me . And the life that I now live in my body , I live by faith , indeed , by the faithfulness of God’s Son , who loved me and gave himself for me .
48002021	I don’t ignore the grace of God , because if we become righteous through the Law , then Christ died for no purpose .
48003001	You irrational Galatians ! Who put a spell on you ? Jesus Christ was put on display as crucified before your eyes !
48003002	I just want to know this from you : Did you receive the Spirit by doing the works of the Law or by believing what you heard ?
48003003	Are you so irrational ? After you started with the Spirit , are you now finishing up with your own human effort ?
48003004	Did you experience so much for nothing ? I wonder if it really was for nothing .
48003005	So does the one providing you with the Spirit and working miracles among you do this by you doing the works of the Law or by you believing what you heard ?
48003006	Understand that in the same way that Abraham believed God and it was credited to him as righteousness ,
48003007	those who believe are the children of Abraham .
48003008	But when it saw ahead of time that God would make the Gentiles righteous on the basis of faith , scripture preached the gospel in advance to Abraham : All the Gentiles will be blessed in you .
48003009	Therefore , those who believe are blessed together with Abraham who believed .
48003010	All those who rely on the works of the Law are under a curse , because it is written , Everyone is cursed who does not keep on doing all the things that have been written in the Law scroll .
48003011	But since no one is made righteous by the Law as far as God is concerned , it is clear that the righteous one will live on the basis of faith .
48003012	The Law isn’t based on faith ; rather , the one doing these things will live by them .
48003013	Christ redeemed us from the curse of the Law by becoming a curse for us — because it is written , Everyone who is hung on a tree is cursed .
48003014	He redeemed us so that the blessing of Abraham would come to the Gentiles through Christ Jesus , and that we would receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , I’ll use an example from human experience . No one ignores or makes additions to a validated will .
48003016	The promises were made to Abraham and to his descendant . It doesn’t say , " and to the descendants , " as if referring to many rather than just one . It says , " and to your descendant , " who is Christ .
48003017	I’m saying this : the Law , which came four hundred thirty years later , doesn’t invalidate the agreement that was previously validated by God so that it cancels the promise .
48003018	If the inheritance were based upon the Law , it would no longer be from the promise . But God has given it graciously to Abraham through a promise .
48003019	So why was the Law given ? It was added because of offenses , until the descendant would come to whom the promise had been made . It was put in place through angels by the hand of a mediator .
48003020	Now the mediator does not take one side ; but God is one .
48003021	So , is the Law against the promises of God ? Absolutely not ! If a Law had been given that was able to give life , then righteousness would in fact have come from the Law .
48003022	But scripture locked up all things under sin , so that the promise based on the faithfulness of Jesus Christ might be given to those who have faith .
48003023	Before faith came , we were guarded under the Law , locked up until faith that was coming would be revealed ,
48003024	so that the Law became our custodian until Christ so that we might be made righteous by faith .
48003025	But now that faith has come , we are no longer under a custodian .
48003026	You are all God’s children through faith in Christ Jesus .
48003027	All of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ .
48003028	There is neither Jew nor Greek ; there is neither slave nor free ; nor is there male and female , for you are all one in Christ Jesus .
48003029	Now if you belong to Christ , then indeed you are Abraham’s descendants , heirs according to the promise .
48004001	I’m saying that as long as the heirs are minors , they are no different from slaves , though they really are the owners of everything .
48004002	However , they are placed under trustees and guardians until the date set by the parents .
48004003	In the same way , when we were minors , we were also enslaved by this world’s system .
48004004	But when the fulfillment of the time came , God sent his Son , born through a woman , and born under the Law .
48004005	This was so he could redeem those under the Law so that we could be adopted .
48004006	Because you are sons and daughters , God sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts , crying , " Abba , Father ! "
48004007	Therefore , you are no longer a slave but a son or daughter , and if you are his child , then you are also an heir through God .
48004008	At the time , when you didn’t know God , you were enslaved by things that aren’t gods by nature .
48004009	But now , after knowing God ( or rather , being known by God ) , how can you turn back again to the weak and worthless world system ? Do you want to be slaves to it again ?
48004010	You observe religious days and months and seasons and years .
48004011	I’m afraid for you ! Perhaps my hard work for you has been for nothing .
48004012	I beg you to be like me , brothers and sisters , because I have become like you ! You haven’t wronged me .
48004013	You know that I first preached the gospel to you because of an illness .
48004014	Though my poor health burdened you , you didn’t look down on me or reject me , but you welcomed me as if I were an angel from God , or as if I were Christ Jesus !
48004015	Where then is the great attitude that you had ? I swear that , if possible , you would have dug out your eyes and given them to me .
48004016	So then , have I become your enemy by telling you the truth ?
48004017	They are so concerned about you , though not with good intentions . Rather , they want to shut you out so that you would run after them .
48004018	However , it’s always good to have people concerned about you with good intentions , and not just when I’m there with you .
48004019	My little children , I’m going through labor pains again until Christ is formed in you .
48004020	But I wish I could be with you now and change how I sound , because I’m at a loss about you .
48004021	Tell me — those of you who want to be under the Law — don’t you listen to the Law ?
48004022	It’s written that Abraham had two sons , one by the slave woman and one by the free woman .
48004023	The son by the slave woman was conceived the normal way , but the son by the free woman was conceived through a promise .
48004024	These things are an allegory : the women are two covenants . One is from Mount Sinai , which gives birth to slave children ; this is Hagar .
48004025	Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia , and she corresponds to the present-day Jerusalem , because the city is in slavery with her children .
48004026	But the Jerusalem that is above is free , and she is our mother .
48004027	It’s written : Rejoice , barren woman , you who have not given birth . because the woman who has been deserted will have many more children
48004028	Brothers and sisters , you are children of the promise like Isaac .
48004029	But just as it was then , so it is now also : the one who was conceived the normal way harassed the one who was conceived by the Spirit .
48004030	But what does the scripture say ? Throw out the slave woman and her son , because the slave woman’s son won’t share the inheritance with the free woman’s son .
48004031	Therefore , brothers and sisters , we aren’t the slave woman’s children , but we are the free woman’s children .
48005001	Christ has set us free for freedom . Therefore , stand firm and don’t submit to the bondage of slavery again .
48005002	Look , I , Paul , am telling you that if you have yourselves circumcised , having Christ won’t help you .
48005003	Again I swear to every man who has himself circumcised that he is required to do the whole Law .
48005004	You people who are trying to be made righteous by the Law have been estranged from Christ . You have fallen away from grace !
48005005	We eagerly wait for the hope of righteousness through the Spirit by faith .
48005006	Being circumcised or not being circumcised doesn’t matter in Christ Jesus , but faith working through love does matter .
48005007	You were running well — who stopped you from obeying the truth ?
48005008	This line of reasoning doesn’t come from the one who calls you .
48005009	A little yeast works through the whole lump of dough .
48005010	I’m convinced about you in the Lord that you won’t think any other way . But the one who is confusing you will pay the penalty , whoever that may be .
48005011	Brothers and sisters , if I’m still preaching circumcision , why am I still being harassed ? In that case , the offense of the cross would be canceled .
48005012	I wish that the ones who are upsetting you would castrate themselves !
48005013	You were called to freedom , brothers and sisters ; only don’t let this freedom be an opportunity to indulge your selfish impulses , but serve each other through love .
48005014	All the Law has been fulfilled in a single statement : Love your neighbor as yourself .
48005015	But if you bite and devour each other , be careful that you don’t get eaten up by each other !
48005016	I say be guided by the Spirit and you won’t carry out your selfish desires .
48005017	A person’s selfish desires are set against the Spirit , and the Spirit is set against one’s selfish desires . They are opposed to each other , so you shouldn’t do whatever you want to do .
48005018	But if you are being led by the Spirit , you aren’t under the Law .
48005019	The actions that are produced by selfish motives are obvious , since they include sexual immorality , moral corruption , doing whatever feels good ,
48005020	idolatry , drug use and casting spells , hate , fighting , obsession , losing your temper , competitive opposition , conflict , selfishness , group rivalry ,
48005021	jealousy , drunkenness , partying , and other things like that . I warn you as I have already warned you , that those who do these kinds of things won’t inherit God’s kingdom .
48005022	But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control . There is no law against things like this .
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have crucified self with its passions and its desires .
48005025	If we live by the Spirit , let’s follow the Spirit .
48005026	Let’s not become arrogant , make each other angry , or be jealous of each other .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , if a person is caught doing something wrong , you who are spiritual should restore someone like this with a spirit of gentleness . Watch out for yourselves so you won’t be tempted too .
48006002	Carry each other’s burdens and so you will fulfill the law of Christ .
48006003	If anyone thinks they are important when they aren’t , they’re fooling themselves .
48006004	Each person should test their own work and be happy with doing a good job and not compare themselves with others .
48006005	Each person will have to carry their own load .
48006006	Those who are taught the word should share all good things with their teacher .
48006007	Make no mistake , God is not mocked . A person will harvest what they plant .
48006008	Those who plant only for their own benefit will harvest devastation from their selfishness , but those who plant for the benefit of the Spirit will harvest eternal life from the Spirit .
48006009	Let’s not get tired of doing good , because in time we’ll have a harvest if we don’t give up .
48006010	So then , let’s work for the good of all whenever we have an opportunity , and especially for those in the household of faith .
48006011	Look at the large letters I’m making with my own handwriting !
48006012	Whoever wants to look good by human standards will try to get you to be circumcised , but only so they won’t be harassed for the cross of Christ .
48006013	Those who are circumcised don’t observe the Law themselves , but they want you to be circumcised , so they can boast about your physical body .
48006014	But as for me , God forbid that I should boast about anything except for the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ . The world has been crucified to me through him , and I have been crucified to the world .
48006015	Being circumcised or not being circumcised doesn’t mean anything . What matters is a new creation .
48006016	May peace and mercy be on whoever follows this rule and on God’s Israel .
48006017	From now on , no one should bother me because I bear the marks of Jesus on my body .
48006018	Brothers and sisters , may the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
49001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will . To the holy and faithful people in Christ Jesus in Ephesus .
49001002	Grace and peace to you from God our Father and our Lord Jesus Christ .
49001003	Bless the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! He has blessed us in Christ with every spiritual blessing that comes from heaven .
49001004	God chose us in Christ to be holy and blameless in God’s presence before the creation of the world .
49001005	God destined us to be his adopted children through Jesus Christ because of his love . This was according to his goodwill and plan
49001006	and to honor his glorious grace that he has given to us freely through the Son whom he loves .
49001007	We have been ransomed through his Son’s blood , and we have forgiveness for our failures based on his overflowing grace ,
49001008	which he poured over us with wisdom and understanding .
49001009	God revealed his hidden design to us , which is according to his goodwill and the plan that he intended to accomplish through his Son .
49001010	This is what God planned for the climax of all times : to bring all things together in Christ , the things in heaven along with the things on earth .
49001011	We have also received an inheritance in Christ . We were destined by the plan of God , who accomplishes everything according to his design .
49001012	We are called to be an honor to God’s glory because we were the first to hope in Christ .
49001013	You too heard the word of truth in Christ , which is the good news of your salvation . You were sealed with the promised Holy Spirit because you believed in Christ .
49001014	The Holy Spirit is the down payment on our inheritance , which is applied toward our redemption as God’s own people , resulting in the honor of God’s glory .
49001015	Since I heard about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all God’s people , this is the reason that
49001016	I don’t stop giving thanks to God for you when I remember you in my prayers .
49001017	I pray that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , will give you a spirit of wisdom and revelation that makes God known to you .
49001018	I pray that the eyes of your heart will have enough light to see what is the hope of God’s call , what is the richness of God’s glorious inheritance among believers ,
49001019	and what is the overwhelming greatness of God’s power that is working among us believers . This power is conferred by the energy of God’s powerful strength .
49001020	God’s power was at work in Christ when God raised him from the dead and sat him at God’s right side in the heavens ,
49001021	far above every ruler and authority and power and angelic power , any power that might be named not only now but in the future .
49001022	God put everything under Christ’s feet and made him head of everything in the church ,
49001023	which is his body . His body , the church , is the fullness of Christ , who fills everything in every way .
49002001	At one time you were like a dead person because of the things you did wrong and your offenses against God .
49002002	You used to act like most people in our world do . You followed the rule of a destructive spiritual power . This is the spirit of disobedience to God’s will that is now at work in persons whose lives are characterized by disobedience .
49002003	At one time you were like those persons . All of you used to do whatever felt good and whatever you thought you wanted so that you were children headed for punishment just like everyone else .
49002004	
49002005	However , God is rich in mercy . He brought us to life with Christ while we were dead as a result of those things that we did wrong . He did this because of the great love that he has for us . You are saved by God’s grace !
49002006	And God raised us up and seated us in the heavens with Christ Jesus .
49002007	God did this to show future generations the greatness of his grace by the goodness that God has shown us in Christ Jesus .
49002008	You are saved by God’s grace because of your faith . This salvation is God’s gift . It’s not something you possessed .
49002009	It’s not something you did that you can be proud of .
49002010	Instead , we are God’s accomplishment , created in Christ Jesus to do good things . God planned for these good things to be the way that we live our lives .
49002011	So remember that once you were Gentiles by physical descent , who were called " uncircumcised " by Jews who are physically circumcised .
49002012	At that time you were without Christ . You were aliens rather than citizens of Israel , and strangers to the covenants of God’s promise . In this world you had no hope and no God .
49002013	But now , thanks to Christ Jesus , you who once were so far away have been brought near by the blood of Christ .
49002014	Christ is our peace . He made both Jews and Gentiles into one group . With his body , he broke down the barrier of hatred that divided us .
49002015	He canceled the detailed rules of the Law so that he could create one new person out of the two groups , making peace .
49002016	He reconciled them both as one body to God by the cross , which ended the hostility to God .
49002017	When he came , he announced the good news of peace to you who were far away from God and to those who were near .
49002018	We both have access to the Father through Christ by the one Spirit .
49002019	So now you are no longer strangers and aliens . Rather , you are fellow citizens with God’s people , and you belong to God’s household .
49002020	As God’s household , you are built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets with Christ Jesus himself as the cornerstone .
49002021	The whole building is joined together in him , and it grows up into a temple that is dedicated to the Lord .
49002022	Christ is building you into a place where God lives through the Spirit .
49003001	This is why I , Paul , am a prisoner of Christ for you Gentiles .
49003002	You’ve heard , of course , about the responsibility to distribute God’s grace , which God gave to me for you , right ?
49003003	God showed me his secret plan in a revelation , as I mentioned briefly before (
49003004	when you read this , you’ll understand my insight into the secret plan about Christ ) .
49003005	Earlier generations didn’t know this hidden plan that God has now revealed to his holy apostles and prophets through the Spirit .
49003006	This plan is that the Gentiles would be coheirs and parts of the same body , and that they would share with the Jews in the promises of God in Christ Jesus through the gospel .
49003007	I became a servant of the gospel because of the grace that God showed me through the exercise of his power .
49003008	God gave his grace to me , the least of all God’s people , to preach the good news about the immeasurable riches of Christ to the Gentiles .
49003009	God sent me to reveal the secret plan that had been hidden since the beginning of time by God , who created everything .
49003010	God’s purpose is now to show the rulers and powers in the heavens the many different varieties of his wisdom through the church .
49003011	This was consistent with the plan he had from the beginning of time that he accomplished through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	In Christ we have bold and confident access to God through faith in him .
49003013	So then , I ask you not to become discouraged by what I’m suffering for you , which is your glory .
49003014	This is why I kneel before the Father .
49003015	Every ethnic group in heaven or on earth is recognized by him .
49003016	I ask that he will strengthen you in your inner selves from the riches of his glory through the Spirit .
49003017	I ask that Christ will live in your hearts through faith . As a result of having strong roots in love ,
49003018	I ask that you’ll have the power to grasp love’s width and length , height and depth , together with all believers .
49003019	I ask that you’ll know the love of Christ that is beyond knowledge so that you will be filled entirely with the fullness of God .
49003020	Glory to God , who is able to do far beyond all that we could ask or imagine by his power at work within us ;
49003021	glory to him in the church and in Christ Jesus for all generations , forever and always . Amen .
49004001	Therefore , as a prisoner for the Lord , I encourage you to live as people worthy of the call you received from God .
49004002	Conduct yourselves with all humility , gentleness , and patience . Accept each other with love ,
49004003	and make an effort to preserve the unity of the Spirit with the peace that ties you together .
49004004	You are one body and one spirit , just as God also called you in one hope .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
49004006	and one God and Father of all , who is over all , through all , and in all .
49004007	God has given his grace to each one of us measured out by the gift that is given by Christ .
49004008	That’s why scripture says , When he climbed up to the heights , he captured prisoners , and he gave gifts to people .
49004009	What does the phrase " he climbed up " mean if it doesn’t mean that he had first gone down into the lower regions , the earth ?
49004010	The one who went down is the same one who climbed up above all the heavens so that he might fill everything .
49004011	He gave some apostles , some prophets , some evangelists , and some pastors and teachers .
49004012	His purpose was to equip God’s people for the work of serving and building up the body of Christ
49004013	until we all reach the unity of faith and knowledge of God’s Son . God’s goal is for us to become mature adults — to be fully grown , measured by the standard of the fullness of Christ .
49004014	As a result , we aren’t supposed to be infants any longer who can be tossed and blown around by every wind that comes from teaching with deceitful scheming and the tricks people play to deliberately mislead others .
49004015	Instead , by speaking the truth with love , let’s grow in every way into Christ ,
49004016	who is the head . The whole body grows from him , as it is joined and held together by all the supporting ligaments . The body makes itself grow in that it builds itself up with love as each one does their part .
49004017	So I’m telling you this , and I insist on it in the Lord : you shouldn’t live your life like the Gentiles anymore . They base their lives on pointless thinking ,
49004018	and they are in the dark in their reasoning . They are disconnected from God’s life because of their ignorance and their closed hearts .
49004019	They are people who lack all sense of right and wrong , and who have turned themselves over to doing whatever feels good and to practicing every sort of corruption along with greed .
49004020	But you didn’t learn that sort of thing from Christ .
49004021	Since you really listened to him and you were taught how the truth is in Jesus ,
49004022	change the former way of life that was part of the person you once were , corrupted by deceitful desires .
49004023	Instead , renew the thinking in your mind by the Spirit
49004024	and clothe yourself with the new person created according to God’s image in justice and true holiness .
49004025	Therefore , after you have gotten rid of lying , Each of you must tell the truth to your neighbor because we are parts of each other in the same body .
49004026	Be angry without sinning . Don’t let the sun set on your anger .
49004027	Don’t provide an opportunity for the devil .
49004028	Thieves should no longer steal . Instead , they should go to work , using their hands to do good so that they will have something to share with whoever is in need .
49004029	Don’t let any foul words come out of your mouth . Only say what is helpful when it is needed for building up the community so that it benefits those who hear what you say .
49004030	Don’t make the Holy Spirit of God unhappy — you were sealed by him for the day of redemption .
49004031	Put aside all bitterness , losing your temper , anger , shouting , and slander , along with every other evil .
49004032	Be kind , compassionate , and forgiving to each other , in the same way God forgave you in Christ .
49005001	Therefore , imitate God like dearly loved children .
49005002	Live your life with love , following the example of Christ , who loved us and gave himself for us . He was a sacrificial offering that smelled sweet to God .
49005003	Sexual immorality , and any kind of impurity or greed , shouldn’t even be mentioned among you , which is right for holy persons .
49005004	Obscene language , silly talk , or vulgar jokes aren’t acceptable for believers . Instead , there should be thanksgiving .
49005005	Because you know for sure that persons who are sexually immoral , impure , or greedy — which happens when things become gods — those persons won’t inherit the kingdom of Christ and God .
49005006	Nobody should deceive you with stupid ideas . God’s anger comes down on those who are disobedient because of this kind of thing .
49005007	So you shouldn’t have anything to do with them .
49005008	You were once darkness , but now you are light in the Lord , so live your life as children of light .
49005009	Light produces fruit that consists of every sort of goodness , justice , and truth .
49005010	Therefore , test everything to see what’s pleasing to the Lord ,
49005011	and don’t participate in the unfruitful actions of darkness . Instead , you should reveal the truth about them .
49005012	It’s embarrassing to even talk about what certain persons do in secret .
49005013	But everything exposed to the light is revealed by the light .
49005014	Everything that is revealed by the light is light . Therefore , it says , Wake up , sleeper ! Get up from the dead , and Christ will shine on you .
49005015	So be careful to live your life wisely , not foolishly .
49005016	Take advantage of every opportunity because these are evil times .
49005017	Because of this , don’t be ignorant , but understand the Lord’s will .
49005018	Don’t get drunk on wine , which produces depravity . Instead , be filled with the Spirit in the following ways :
49005019	speak to each other with psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs ; sing and make music to the Lord in your hearts ;
49005020	always give thanks to God the Father for everything in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
49005021	and submit to each other out of respect for Christ .
49005022	For example , wives should submit to their husbands as if to the Lord .
49005023	A husband is the head of his wife like Christ is head of the church , that is , the savior of the body .
49005024	So wives submit to their husbands in everything like the church submits to Christ .
49005025	As for husbands , love your wives just like Christ loved the church and gave himself for her .
49005026	He did this to make her holy by washing her in a bath of water with the word .
49005027	He did this to present himself with a splendid church , one without any sort of stain or wrinkle on her clothes , but rather one that is holy and blameless .
49005028	That’s how husbands ought to love their wives — in the same way as they do their own bodies . Anyone who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	No one ever hates his own body , but feeds it and takes care of it just like Christ does for the church
49005030	because we are parts of his body .
49005031	This is why a man will leave his father and mother and be united with his wife , and the two of them will be one body .
49005032	Marriage is a significant allegory , and I’m applying it to Christ and the church .
49005033	In any case , as for you individually , each one of you should love his wife as himself , and wives should respect their husbands .
49006001	As for children , obey your parents in the Lord , because it is right .
49006002	The commandment Honor your father and mother is the first one with a promise attached :
49006003	so that things will go well for you , and you will live for a long time in the land .
49006004	As for parents , don’t provoke your children to anger , but raise them with discipline and instruction about the Lord .
49006005	As for slaves , obey your human masters with fear and trembling and with sincere devotion to Christ .
49006006	Don’t work to make yourself look good and try to flatter people , but act like slaves of Christ carrying out God’s will from the heart .
49006007	Serve your owners enthusiastically , as though you were serving the Lord and not human beings .
49006008	You know that the Lord will reward every person who does what is right , whether that person is a slave or a free person .
49006009	As for masters , treat your slaves in the same way . Stop threatening them , because you know that both you and your slaves have a master in heaven . He doesn’t distinguish between people on the basis of status .
49006010	Finally , be strengthened by the Lord and his powerful strength .
49006011	Put on God’s armor so that you can make a stand against the tricks of the devil .
49006012	We aren’t fighting against human enemies but against rulers , authorities , forces of cosmic darkness , and spiritual powers of evil in the heavens .
49006013	Therefore , pick up the full armor of God so that you can stand your ground on the evil day and after you have done everything possible to still stand .
49006014	So stand with the belt of truth around your waist , justice as your breastplate ,
49006015	and put shoes on your feet so that you are ready to spread the good news of peace .
49006016	Above all , carry the shield of faith so that you can extinguish the flaming arrows of the evil one .
49006017	Take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit , which is God’s word .
49006018	Offer prayers and petitions in the Spirit all the time . Stay alert by hanging in there and praying for all believers .
49006019	As for me , pray that when I open my mouth , I’ll get a message that confidently makes this secret plan of the gospel known .
49006020	I’m an ambassador in chains for the sake of the gospel . Pray so that the Lord will give me the confidence to say what I have to say .
49006021	Tychicus , my loved brother and faithful servant of the Lord , can inform you about my situation and what I’m doing .
49006022	I’ve sent him for this reason — so that you will know about us . He can reassure you .
49006023	May there be peace with the brothers and sisters as well as love with the faith that comes from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
49006024	May grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ forever .
50001001	From Paul and Timothy , slaves of Christ Jesus . To all those in Philippi who are God’s people in Christ Jesus , along with your supervisors and servants .
50001002	May the grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
50001003	I thank my God every time I mention you in my prayers .
50001004	I’m thankful for all of you every time I pray , and it’s always a prayer full of joy .
50001005	I’m glad because of the way you have been my partners in the ministry of the gospel from the time you first believed it until now .
50001006	I’m sure about this : the one who started a good work in you will stay with you to complete the job by the day of Christ Jesus .
50001007	I have good reason to think this way about all of you because I keep you in my heart . You are all my partners in God’s grace , both during my time in prison and in the defense and support of the gospel .
50001008	God is my witness that I feel affection for all of you with the compassion of Christ Jesus .
50001009	This is my prayer : that your love might become even more and more rich with knowledge and all kinds of insight .
50001010	I pray this so that you will be able to decide what really matters and so you will be sincere and blameless on the day of Christ .
50001011	I pray that you will then be filled with the fruit of righteousness , which comes from Jesus Christ , in order to give glory and praise to God .
50001012	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know that the things that have happened to me have actually advanced the gospel .
50001013	The whole Praetorian Guard and everyone else knows that I’m in prison for Christ .
50001014	Most of the brothers and sisters have had more confidence through the Lord to speak the word boldly and bravely because of my jail time .
50001015	Some certainly preach Christ with jealous and competitive motives , but others preach with good motives .
50001016	They are motivated by love , because they know that I’m put here to give a defense of the gospel ;
50001017	the others preach Christ because of their selfish ambition . They are insincere , hoping to cause me more pain while I’m in prison .
50001018	What do I think about this ? Just this : since Christ is proclaimed in every possible way , whether from dishonest or true motives , I’m glad and I’ll continue to be glad .
50001019	I’m glad because I know that this will result in my release through your prayers and the help of the Spirit of Jesus Christ .
50001020	It is my expectation and hope that I won’t be put to shame in anything . Rather , I hope with daring courage that Christ’s greatness will be seen in my body , now as always , whether I live or die .
50001021	Because for me , living serves Christ and dying is even better .
50001022	If I continue to live in this world , I get results from my work .
50001023	But I don’t know what I prefer . I’m torn between the two because I want to leave this life and be with Christ , which is far better .
50001024	However , it’s more important for me to stay in this world for your sake .
50001025	I’m sure of this : I will stay alive and remain with all of you to help your progress and the joy of your faith ,
50001026	and to increase your pride in Christ Jesus through my presence when I visit you again .
50001027	Most important , live together in a manner worthy of Christ’s gospel . Do this , whether I come and see you or I’m absent and hear about you . Do this so that you stand firm , united in one spirit and mind as you struggle together to remain faithful to the gospel .
50001028	That way , you won’t be afraid of anything your enemies do . Your faithfulness and courage are a sign of their coming destruction and your salvation , which is from God .
50001029	God has generously granted you the privilege , not only of believing in Christ but also of suffering for Christ’s sake .
50001030	You are having the same struggle that you saw me face and now hear that I’m still facing .
50002001	Therefore , if there is any encouragement in Christ , any comfort in love , any sharing in the Spirit , any sympathy ,

50002006	Though he was in the form of God ,
50002007	But he emptied himself When he found himself in the form of a human ,
50002009	Therefore , God highly honored him
50002010	so that at the name of Jesus everyone
50002012	Therefore , my loved ones , just as you always obey me , not just when I am present but now even more while I am away , carry out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
50002013	God is the one who enables you both to want and to actually live out his good purposes .
50002014	Do everything without grumbling and arguing
50002015	so that you may be blameless and pure , innocent children of God surrounded by people who are crooked and corrupt . Among these people you shine like stars in the world
50002016	because you hold on to the word of life . This will allow me to say on the day of Christ that I haven’t run for nothing or worked for nothing .
50002017	But even if I am poured out like a drink offering upon the altar of service for your faith , I am glad . I’m glad with all of you .

50002022	You know his character , how he labors with me for the gospel like a son works with his father .
50002023	So he is the one that I hope to send as soon as I find out how things turn out here for me .
50002024	I trust in the Lord that I also will visit you soon .
50002025	I think it is also necessary to send Epaphroditus to you . He is my brother , coworker , and fellow soldier ; and he is your representative who serves my needs .
50002026	He misses you all , and he was upset because you heard he was sick .
50002027	In fact , he was so sick that he nearly died . But God had mercy on him — and not just on him but also on me , because his death would have caused me great sorrow .
50002028	Therefore , I am sending him immediately so that when you see him again you can be glad and I won’t worry .
50002029	So welcome him in the Lord with great joy and show great respect for people like him .
50002030	He risked his life and almost died for the work of Christ , and he did this to make up for the help you couldn’t give me .
50003001	So then , my brothers and sisters , be glad in the Lord . It’s no trouble for me to repeat the same things to you because they will help keep you on track .
50003002	Watch out for the " dogs . " Watch out for people who do evil things . Watch out for those who insist on circumcision , which is really mutilation .
50003003	We are the circumcision . We are the ones who serve by God’s Spirit and who boast in Christ Jesus . We don’t put our confidence in rituals performed on the body ,
50003004	though I have good reason to have this kind of confidence . If anyone else has reason to put their confidence in physical advantages , I have even more :
50003005	I was circumcised on the eighth day . I am from the people of Israel and the tribe of Benjamin . I am a Hebrew of the Hebrews . With respect to observing the Law , I’m a Pharisee .
50003006	With respect to devotion to the faith , I harassed the church . With respect to righteousness under the Law , I’m blameless .
50003007	These things were my assets , but I wrote them off as a loss for the sake of Christ .
50003008	But even beyond that , I consider everything a loss in comparison with the superior value of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord . I have lost everything for him , but what I lost I think of as sewer trash , so that I might gain Christ
50003009	and be found in him . In Christ I have a righteousness that is not my own and that does not come from the Law but rather from the faithfulness of Christ . It is the righteousness of God that is based on faith .
50003010	The righteousness that I have comes from knowing Christ , the power of his resurrection , and the participation in his sufferings . It includes being conformed to his death
50003011	so that I may perhaps reach the goal of the resurrection of the dead .
50003012	It’s not that I have already reached this goal or have already been perfected , but I pursue it , so that I may grab hold of it because Christ grabbed hold of me for just this purpose .
50003013	Brothers and sisters , I myself don’t think I’ve reached it , but I do this one thing : I forget about the things behind me and reach out for the things ahead of me .
50003014	The goal I pursue is the prize of God’s upward call in Christ Jesus .
50003015	So all of us who are spiritually mature should think this way , and if anyone thinks differently , God will reveal it to him or her .
50003016	Only let’s live in a way that is consistent with whatever level we have reached .
50003017	Brothers and sisters , become imitators of me and watch those who live this way — you can use us as models .
50003018	As I have told you many times and now say with deep sadness , many people live as enemies of the cross .
50003019	Their lives end with destruction . Their god is their stomach , and they take pride in their disgrace because their thoughts focus on earthly things .
50003020	Our citizenship is in heaven . We look forward to a savior that comes from there — the Lord Jesus Christ .
50003021	He will transform our humble bodies so that they are like his glorious body , by the power that also makes him able to subject all things to himself .
50004001	Therefore , my brothers and sisters whom I love and miss , who are my joy and crown , stand firm in the Lord . Loved ones ,
50004002	I urge Euodia and I urge Syntyche to come to an agreement in the Lord .
50004003	Yes , and I’m also asking you , loyal friend , to help these women who have struggled together with me in the ministry of the gospel , along with Clement and the rest of my coworkers whose names are in the scroll of life .
50004004	Be glad in the Lord always ! Again I say , be glad !
50004005	Let your gentleness show in your treatment of all people . The Lord is near .
50004006	Don’t be anxious about anything ; rather , bring up all of your requests to God in your prayers and petitions , along with giving thanks .
50004007	Then the peace of God that exceeds all understanding will keep your hearts and minds safe in Christ Jesus .
50004008	From now on , brothers and sisters , if anything is excellent and if anything is admirable , focus your thoughts on these things : all that is true , all that is holy , all that is just , all that is pure , all that is lovely , and all that is worthy of praise .
50004009	Practice these things : whatever you learned , received , heard , or saw in us . The God of peace will be with you .
50004010	I was very glad in the Lord because now at last you have shown concern for me again . ( Of course you were always concerned but had no way to show it . )
50004011	I’m not saying this because I need anything , for I have learned how to be content in any circumstance .
50004012	I know the experience of being in need and of having more than enough ; I have learned the secret to being content in any and every circumstance , whether full or hungry or whether having plenty or being poor .
50004013	I can endure all these things through the power of the one who gives me strength .
50004014	Still , you have done well to share my distress .
50004015	You Philippians know from the time of my first mission work in Macedonia how no church shared in supporting my ministry except you .
50004016	You sent contributions repeatedly to take care of my needs even while I was in Thessalonica .
50004017	I’m not hoping for a gift , but I am hoping for a profit that accumulates in your account .
50004018	I now have plenty and it is more than enough . I am full to overflowing because I received the gifts that you sent from Epaphroditus . Those gifts give off a fragrant aroma , an acceptable sacrifice that pleases God .
50004019	My God will meet your every need out of his riches in the glory that is found in Christ Jesus .
50004020	Let glory be given to God our Father forever and always . Amen .

51001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God’s will , and Timothy our brother .
51001002	To the holy and faithful brothers and sisters in Christ in Colossae . Grace and peace to you from God our Father .
51001003	We always give thanks to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , when we pray for you .
51001004	We’ve done this since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and your love for all God’s people .
51001005	You have this faith and love because of the hope reserved for you in heaven . You previously heard about this hope through the true message , the good news ,
51001006	which has come to you . This message has been bearing fruit and growing among you since the day you heard and truly understood God’s grace , in the same way that it is bearing fruit and growing in the whole world .
51001007	You learned it from Epaphras , who is the fellow slave we love and Christ’s faithful minister for your sake .
51001008	He informed us of your love in the Spirit .
51001009	Because of this , since the day we heard about you , we haven’t stopped praying for you and asking for you to be filled with the knowledge of God’s will , with all wisdom and spiritual understanding .
51001010	We’re praying this so that you can live lives that are worthy of the Lord and pleasing to him in every way : by producing fruit in every good work and growing in the knowledge of God ;
51001011	by being strengthened through his glorious might so that you endure everything and have patience ;
51001012	and by giving thanks with joy to the Father . He made it so you could take part in the inheritance , in light granted to God’s holy people .
51001013	He rescued us from the control of darkness and transferred us into the kingdom of the Son he loves .
51001014	He set us free through the Son and forgave our sins .
51001015	The Son is the image of the invisible God ,
51001016	Because all things were created by him :
51001017	He existed before all things ,
51001018	He is the head of the body , the church , who is the beginning ,
51001019	Because all the fullness of God was pleased to live in him ,
51001021	Once you were alienated from God and you were enemies with him in your minds , which was shown by your evil actions .
51001022	But now he has reconciled you by his physical body through death , to present you before God as a people who are holy , faultless , and without blame .
51001023	But you need to remain well established and rooted in faith and not shift away from the hope given in the good news that you heard . This message has been preached throughout all creation under heaven . And I , Paul , became a servant of this good news .
51001024	Now I’m happy to be suffering for you . I’m completing what is missing from Christ’s sufferings with my own body . I’m doing this for the sake of his body , which is the church .
51001025	I became a servant of the church by God’s commission , which was given to me for you , in order to complete God’s word .
51001026	I’m completing it with a secret plan that has been hidden for ages and generations but which has now been revealed to his holy people .
51001027	God wanted to make the glorious riches of this secret plan known among the Gentiles , which is Christ living in you , the hope of glory .
51001028	This is what we preach as we warn and teach every person with all wisdom so that we might present each one mature in Christ .
51001029	I work hard and struggle for this goal with his energy , which works in me powerfully .
51002001	I want you to know how much I struggle for you , for those in Laodicea , and for all who haven’t known me personally .
51002002	My goal is that their hearts would be encouraged and united together in love so that they might have all the riches of assurance that come with understanding , so that they might have the knowledge of the secret plan of God , namely Christ .
51002003	All the treasures of wisdom and knowledge are hidden in him .
51002004	I’m telling you this so that no one deceives you with convincing arguments ,
51002005	because even though I am absent physically , I’m with you in spirit . I’m happy to see the discipline and stability of your faith in Christ .
51002006	So live in Christ Jesus the Lord in the same way as you received him .
51002007	Be rooted and built up in him , be established in faith , and overflow with thanksgiving just as you were taught .
51002008	See to it that nobody enslaves you with philosophy and foolish deception , which conform to human traditions and the way the world thinks and acts rather than Christ .
51002009	All the fullness of deity lives in Christ’s body .
51002010	And you have been filled by him , who is the head of every ruler and authority .
51002011	You were also circumcised by him . This wasn’t performed by human hands — the whole body was removed through this circumcision by Christ .
51002012	You were buried with him through baptism and raised with him through faith in the power of God , who raised him from the dead .
51002013	When you were dead because of the things you had done wrong and because your body wasn’t circumcised , God made you alive with Christ and forgave all the things you had done wrong .
51002014	He destroyed the record of the debt we owed , with its requirements that worked against us . He canceled it by nailing it to the cross .
51002015	When he disarmed the rulers and authorities , he exposed them to public disgrace by leading them in a triumphal parade .
51002016	So don’t let anyone judge you about eating or drinking or about a festival , a new moon observance , or sabbaths .
51002017	These religious practices are only a shadow of what was coming — the body that cast the shadow is Christ .
51002018	Don’t let anyone who wants to practice harsh self-denial and worship angels rob you of the prize . They go into detail about what they have seen in visions and have become unjustifiably arrogant by their selfish way of thinking .
51002019	They don’t stay connected to the head . The head nourishes and supports the whole body through the joints and ligaments , so the body grows with a growth that is from God .
51002020	If you died with Christ to the way the world thinks and acts , why do you submit to rules and regulations as though you were living in the world ?
51002021	" Don’t handle ! " " Don’t taste ! " " Don’t touch ! "
51002022	All these things cease to exist when they are used . Such rules are human commandments and teachings .
51002023	They look like they are wise with this self-made religion and their self-denial by the harsh treatment of the body , but they are no help against indulging in selfish immoral behavior .
51003001	Therefore , if you were raised with Christ , look for the things that are above where Christ is sitting at God’s right side .
51003002	Think about the things above and not things on earth .
51003003	You died , and your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	When Christ , who is your life , is revealed , then you also will be revealed with him in glory .
51003005	So put to death the parts of your life that belong to the earth , such as sexual immorality , moral corruption , lust , evil desire , and greed ( which is idolatry ) .
51003006	The wrath of God is coming upon disobedient people because of these things .
51003007	You used to live this way , when you were alive to these things .
51003008	But now set aside these things , such as anger , rage , malice , slander , and obscene language .
51003009	Don’t lie to each other . Take off the old human nature with its practices
51003010	and put on the new nature , which is renewed in knowledge by conforming to the image of the one who created it .
51003011	In this image there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcised nor uncircumcised , barbarian , Scythian , slave nor free , but Christ is all things and in all people .
51003012	Therefore , as God’s choice , holy and loved , put on compassion , kindness , humility , gentleness , and patience .
51003013	Be tolerant with each other and , if someone has a complaint against anyone , forgive each other . As the Lord forgave you , so also forgive each other .
51003014	And over all these things put on love , which is the perfect bond of unity .
51003015	The peace of Christ must control your hearts — a peace into which you were called in one body . And be thankful people .
51003016	The word of Christ must live in you richly . Teach and warn each other with all wisdom by singing psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs . Sing to God with gratitude in your hearts .
51003017	Whatever you do , whether in speech or action , do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus and give thanks to God the Father through him .
51003018	Wives , submit to your husbands in a way that is appropriate in the Lord .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and don’t be harsh with them .
51003020	Children , obey your parents in everything , because this pleases the Lord .
51003021	Parents , don’t provoke your children in a way that ends up discouraging them .
51003022	Slaves , obey your masters on earth in everything . Don’t just obey like people pleasers when they are watching . Instead , obey with the single motivation of fearing the Lord .
51003023	Whatever you do , do it from the heart for the Lord and not for people .
51003024	You know that you will receive an inheritance as a reward . You serve the Lord Christ .
51003025	But evildoers will receive their reward for their evil actions . There is no discrimination .
51004001	Masters , be just and fair to your slaves , knowing that you yourselves have a master in heaven .
51004002	Keep on praying and guard your prayers with thanksgiving .
51004003	At the same time , pray for us also . Pray that God would open a door for the word so we can preach the secret plan of Christ — which is why I’m in chains .
51004004	Pray that I might be able to make it as clear as I ought to when I preach .
51004005	Act wisely toward outsiders , making the most of the opportunity .
51004006	Your speech should always be gracious and sprinkled with insight so that you may know how to respond to every person .
51004007	Tychicus , our dearly loved brother , faithful minister , and fellow slave in the Lord , will inform you about everything that has happened to me .
51004008	This is why I sent him to you , so that you’ll know all about us and so he can encourage your hearts .
51004009	I sent him with Onesimus , our faithful and dearly loved brother , who is one of you . They will let you know about everything here .

51004011	Jesus , called Justus , also says hello . These are my only fellow workers for God’s kingdom who are Jewish converts . They have been an encouragement to me .

52001001	From Paul , Silvanus , and Timothy . To the Thessalonians’ church that is in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ . Grace and peace to all of you .
52001002	We always thank God for all of you when we mention you constantly in our prayers .
52001003	This is because we remember your work that comes from faith , your effort that comes from love , and your perseverance that comes from hope in our Lord Jesus Christ in the presence of our God and Father .
52001004	Brothers and sisters , you are loved by God , and we know that he has chosen you .
52001005	We know this because our good news didn’t come to you just in speech but also with power and the Holy Spirit and with deep conviction . You know as well as we do what kind of people we were when we were with you , which was for your sake .
52001006	You became imitators of us and of the Lord when you accepted the message that came from the Holy Spirit with joy in spite of great suffering .
52001007	As a result you became an example to all the believers in Macedonia and Achaia .
52001008	The message about the Lord rang out from you , not only in Macedonia and Achaia but in every place . The news about your faithfulness to God has spread so that we don’t even need to mention it .
52001009	People tell us about what sort of welcome we had from you and how you turned to God from idols . As a result , you are serving the living and true God ,
52001010	and you are waiting for his Son from heaven . His Son is Jesus , who is the one he raised from the dead and who is the one who will rescue us from the coming wrath .
52002001	As you yourselves know , brothers and sisters , our visit with you wasn’t a waste of time .
52002002	On the contrary , we had the courage through God to speak God’s good news in spite of a lot of opposition , although we had already suffered and were publicly insulted , as you know .
52002003	Our appeal isn’t based on false information , the wrong motives , or deception .
52002004	Rather , we have been examined and approved by God to be trusted with the good news , and that’s exactly how we speak . We aren’t trying to please people , but we are trying to please God , who continues to examine our hearts .
52002005	As you know , we never used flattery , and God is our witness that we didn’t have greedy motives .
52002006	We didn’t ask for special treatment from people — not from you or from others —
52002007	although we could have thrown our weight around as Christ’s apostles . Instead , we were gentle with you like a nursing mother caring for her own children .
52002008	We were glad to share not only God’s good news with you but also our very lives because we cared for you so much .
52002009	You remember , brothers and sisters , our efforts and hard work . We preached God’s good news to you , while we worked night and day so we wouldn’t be a burden on any of you .
52002010	You and God are witnesses of how holy , just , and blameless we were toward you believers .
52002011	Likewise , you know how we treated each of you like a father treats his own children .
52002012	We appealed to you , encouraged you , and pleaded with you to live lives worthy of the God who is calling you into his own kingdom and glory .
52002013	We also thank God constantly for this : when you accepted God’s word that you heard from us , you welcomed it for what it truly is . Instead of accepting it as a human message , you accepted it as God’s message , and it continues to work in you who are believers .
52002014	Brothers and sisters , you became imitators of the churches of God in Judea , which are in Christ Jesus . This was because you also suffered the same things from your own people as they did from the Jews .
52002015	They killed both the Lord Jesus and the prophets and drove us out . They don’t please God , and they are hostile to the entire human race
52002016	when they try to stop us from speaking to the Gentiles so they can be saved . Their sins are constantly pushing the limit . God’s wrath has caught up with them in the end .
52002017	Brothers and sisters , we were separated from you for a while physically but not in our hearts . We made every effort in our desire to see you again face-to-face .
52002018	We wanted to come to you — I , Paul , tried over and over again — and Satan stopped us .
52002019	What is our hope , joy , or crown that we can brag about in front of our Lord Jesus when he comes ? Isn’t it all of you ?
52002020	You are our glory and joy !
52003001	So when we couldn’t stand it any longer , we thought it was a good idea to stay on in Athens by ourselves ,
52003002	and we sent you Timothy , who is our brother and God’s coworker in the good news about Christ . We sent him to strengthen and encourage you in your faithfulness .
52003003	We didn’t want any of you to be shaken by these problems . You know very well that we were meant to go through this .
52003004	In fact , when we were with you , we kept on predicting that we were going to face problems exactly like what happened , as you know .
52003005	That’s why I sent Timothy to find out about your faithfulness when I couldn’t stand it anymore . I was worried that the tempter might have tempted you so that our work would have been a waste of time .
52003006	Now Timothy has returned to us from you and has given us good news about your faithfulness and love ! He says that you always have good memories about us and that you want to see us as much as we want to see you .
52003007	Because of this , brothers and sisters , we were encouraged in all our distress and trouble through your faithfulness .
52003008	For now we are alive if you are standing your ground in the Lord .
52003009	How can we thank God enough for you , given all the joy we have because of you before our God ?
52003010	Night and day , we pray more than ever to see all of you in person and to complete whatever you still need for your faith .
52003011	Now may our God and Father himself guide us on our way back to you .
52003012	May the Lord cause you to increase and enrich your love for each other and for everyone in the same way as we also love you .
52003013	May the love cause your hearts to be strengthened , to be blameless in holiness before our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his people . Amen .
52004001	So then , brothers and sisters , we ask and encourage you in the Lord Jesus to keep living the way you already are and even do better in how you live and please God — just as you learned from us .
52004002	You know the instructions we gave you through the Lord Jesus .
52004003	God’s will is that your lives are dedicated to him . This means that you stay away from sexual immorality
52004004	and learn how to control your own body in a pure and respectable way .
52004005	Don’t be controlled by your sexual urges like the Gentiles who don’t know God .
52004006	No one should mistreat or take advantage of their brother or sister in this issue . The Lord punishes people for all these things , as we told you before and sternly warned you .
52004007	God didn’t call us to be immoral but to be dedicated to him .
52004008	Therefore , whoever rejects these instructions isn’t rejecting a human authority . They are rejecting God , who gives his Holy Spirit to you .
52004009	You don’t need us to write about loving your brothers and sisters because God has already taught you to love each other .
52004010	In fact , you are doing loving deeds for all the brothers and sisters throughout Macedonia . Now we encourage you , brothers and sisters , to do so even more .
52004011	Aim to live quietly , mind your own business , and earn your own living , just as I told you .
52004012	That way you’ll behave appropriately toward outsiders , and you won’t be in need .
52004013	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about people who have died so that you won’t mourn like others who don’t have any hope .
52004014	Since we believe that Jesus died and rose , so we also believe that God will bring with him those who have died in Jesus .
52004015	What we are saying is a message from the Lord : we who are alive and still around at the Lord’s coming definitely won’t go ahead of those who have died .
52004016	This is because the Lord himself will come down from heaven with the signal of a shout by the head angel and a blast on God’s trumpet . First , those who are dead in Christ will rise .
52004017	Then , we who are living and still around will be taken up together with them in the clouds to meet with the Lord in the air . That way we will always be with the Lord .
52004018	So encourage each other with these words .
52005001	We don’t need to write to you about the timing and dates , brothers and sisters .
52005002	You know very well that the day of the Lord is going to come like a thief in the night .
52005003	When they are saying , " There is peace and security , " at that time sudden destruction will attack them , like labor pains start with a pregnant woman , and they definitely won’t escape .
52005004	But you aren’t in darkness , brothers and sisters , so the day won’t catch you by surprise like a thief .
52005005	All of you are children of light and children of the day . We don’t belong to night or darkness .
52005006	So then , let’s not sleep like the others , but let’s stay awake and stay sober .
52005007	People who sleep sleep at night , and people who get drunk get drunk at night .
52005008	Since we belong to the day , let’s stay sober , wearing faithfulness and love as a piece of armor that protects our body and the hope of salvation as a helmet .
52005009	God didn’t intend for us to suffer his wrath but rather to possess salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005010	Jesus died for us so that , whether we are awake or asleep , we will live together with him .
52005011	So continue encouraging each other and building each other up , just like you are doing already .
52005012	Brothers and sisters , we ask you to respect those who are working with you , leading you , and instructing you .
52005013	Think of them highly with love because of their work . Live in peace with each other .
52005014	Brothers and sisters , we urge you to warn those who are disorderly . Comfort the discouraged . Help the weak . Be patient with everyone .
52005015	Make sure no one repays a wrong with a wrong , but always pursue the good for each other and everyone else .
52005016	Rejoice always .
52005017	Pray continually .
52005018	Give thanks in every situation because this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus .
52005019	Don’t suppress the Spirit .
52005020	Don’t brush off Spirit-inspired messages ,
52005021	but examine everything carefully and hang on to what is good .
52005022	Avoid every kind of evil .
52005023	Now , may the God of peace himself cause you to be completely dedicated to him ; and may your spirit , soul , and body be kept intact and blameless at our Lord Jesus Christ’s coming .

53001001	From Paul , Silvanus , and Timothy : To the church of the Thessalonians , which is in God our Father , and in the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001002	Grace and peace to all of you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53001003	Brothers and sisters , we must always thank God for you . This is only right because your faithfulness is growing by leaps and bounds , and the love that all of you have for each other is increasing .
53001004	That’s why we ourselves are bragging about you in God’s churches . We tell about your endurance and faithfulness in all the harassments and trouble that you have put up with .
53001005	This shows that God’s judgment is right , and that you will be considered worthy of God’s kingdom for which you are suffering .
53001006	After all , it’s right for God to pay back the ones making trouble for you with trouble
53001007	and to pay back you who are having trouble with relief along with us . This payback will come when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his powerful angels .
53001008	He will give justice with blazing fire to those who don’t recognize God and don’t obey the good news of our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will pay the penalty of eternal destruction away from the Lord’s presence and away from his mighty glory .
53001010	This will happen when he comes on that day to receive honor from his holy people and to be admired by everyone who has believed — and our testimony to you was believed .
53001011	We are constantly praying for you for this : that our God will make you worthy of his calling and accomplish every good desire and faithful work by his power .
53001012	Then the name of our Lord Jesus will be honored by you , and you will be honored by him , consistent with the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Brothers and sisters , we have a request for you concerning our Lord Jesus Christ’s coming and when we are gathered together to be with him .
53002002	We don’t want you to be easily confused in your mind or upset if you hear that the day of the Lord is already here , whether you hear it through some spirit , a message , or a letter supposedly from us .
53002003	Don’t let anyone deceive you in any way . That day won’t come unless the rebellion comes first and the person who is lawless is revealed , who is headed for destruction .
53002004	He is the opponent of every so-called god or object of worship and promotes himself over them . So he sits in God’s temple , displaying himself to show that he is God .
53002005	You remember that I used to tell you these things while I was with you , don’t you ?
53002006	Now you know what holds him back so that he can be revealed when his time comes .
53002007	The hidden plan to live without any law is at work now , but it will be secret only until the one who is holding it back is out of the way .
53002008	Then the person who is lawless will be revealed . The Lord Jesus will destroy him with the breath from his mouth . When the Lord comes , his appearance will put an end to him .
53002009	When the person who is lawless comes , it will happen through Satan’s effort , with all kinds of fake power , signs , and wonders .
53002010	It will happen with every sort of wicked deception of those who are heading toward destruction because they have refused to love the truth that would allow them to be saved .
53002011	This is why God will send them an influence that will mislead them so that they will believe the lie .
53002012	The result will be that everyone will be judged who is not convinced by the truth but is happy with injustice .
53002013	But we always must thank God for you , brothers and sisters who are loved by God . This is because he chose you from the beginning to be the first crop of the harvest . This brought salvation , through your dedication to God by the Spirit and through your belief in the truth .
53002014	God called all of you through our good news so you could possess the honor of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	So then , brothers and sisters , stand firm and hold on to the traditions we taught you , whether we taught you in person or through our letter .
53002016	Our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father loved us and through grace gave us eternal comfort and a good hope .
53002017	May he encourage your hearts and give you strength in every good thing you do or say .
53003001	Finally , brothers and sisters , pray for us so that the Lord’s message will spread quickly and be honored , just like it happened with you .
53003002	Pray too that we will be rescued from inappropriate and evil people since everyone that we meet won’t respond with faith .

53003007	You yourselves know how you need to imitate us because we were not undisciplined when we were with you .

53003009	We did this to give you an example to imitate , not because we didn’t have a right to insist on financial support .

54003001	This saying is reliable : if anyone has a goal to be a supervisor in the church , they want a good thing .

56003006	which God poured out upon us generously through Jesus Christ our savior .
56003007	So , since we have been made righteous by his grace , we can inherit the hope for eternal life . "
56003008	This saying is reliable . And I want you to insist on these things , so that those who have come to believe in God might give careful attention to doing good . These things are good and useful for everyone .
56003009	Avoid stupid controversies , genealogies , and fights about the Law , because they are useless and worthless .
56003010	After a first and second warning , have nothing more to do with a person who causes conflict ,
56003011	because you know that someone like this is twisted and sinful — so they condemn themselves .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , try to come to me in Nicopolis , because I’ve decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey with enthusiasm so that they won’t need anything .
56003014	But our people should also learn to devote themselves to doing good in order to meet pressing needs so they aren’t unproductive .
56003015	Everyone with me greets you ; greet those who love us faithfully . Grace be with all of you .
57001001	From Paul , who is a prisoner for the cause of Christ Jesus , and our brother Timothy . To Philemon our dearly loved coworker ,
57001002	Apphia our sister , Archippus our fellow soldier , and the church that meets in your house .
57001003	May the grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
57001004	Philemon , I thank my God every time I mention you in my prayers
57001005	because I’ve heard of your love and faithfulness , which you have both for the Lord Jesus and for all God’s people .
57001006	I pray that your partnership in the faith might become effective by an understanding of all that is good among us in Christ .
57001007	I have great joy and encouragement because of your love , since the hearts of God’s people are refreshed by your actions , my brother .
57001008	Therefore , though I have enough confidence in Christ to command you to do the right thing ,
57001009	I would rather appeal to you through love . I , Paul — an old man , and now also a prisoner for Christ Jesus —
57001010	appeal to you for my child Onesimus . I became his father in the faith during my time in prison .
57001011	He was useless to you before , but now he is useful to both of us .
57001012	I’m sending him back to you , which is like sending you my own heart .
57001013	I considered keeping him with me so that he might serve me in your place during my time in prison because of the gospel .
57001014	However , I didn’t want to do anything without your consent so that your act of kindness would occur willingly and not under pressure .
57001015	Maybe this is the reason that Onesimus was separated from you for a while so that you might have him back forever —
57001016	no longer as a slave but more than a slave — that is , as a dearly loved brother . He is especially a dearly loved brother to me . How much more can he become a brother to you , personally and spiritually in the Lord !
57001017	So , if you really consider me a partner , welcome Onesimus as if you were welcoming me .
57001018	If he has harmed you in any way or owes you money , charge it to my account .
57001019	I , Paul , will pay it back to you ( I’m writing this with my own hand ) . Of course , I won’t mention that you owe me your life .
57001020	Yes , brother , I want this favor from you in the Lord ! Refresh my heart in Christ .
57001021	I’m writing to you , confident of your obedience and knowing that you will do more than what I ask .
