57001022	Also , one more thing — prepare a guest room for me . I hope that I will be released from prison to be with you because of your prayers .
57001023	Epaphras , who is in prison with me for the cause of Christ Jesus , greets you ,
57001024	as well as my coworkers Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke .
57001025	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	In the past , God spoke through the prophets to our ancestors in many times and many ways .
58001002	In these final days , though , he spoke to us through a Son . God made his Son the heir of everything and created the world through him .
58001003	The Son is the light of God’s glory and the imprint of God’s being . He maintains everything with his powerful message . After he carried out the cleansing of people from their sins , he sat down at the right side of the highest majesty .
58001004	And the Son became so much greater than the other messengers , such as angels , that he received a more important title than theirs .
58001005	After all , when did God ever say to any of the angels : You are my Son . Or , even , I will be his Father ,
58001006	But then , when he brought his firstborn into the world , he said , All of God’s angels must worship him .
58001007	He talks about the angels : He’s the one who uses the spirits for his messengers
58001008	But he says to his Son , God , your throne is forever
58001009	You loved righteousness and hated lawless behavior .
58001010	And he says , You , Lord , laid the earth’s foundations in the beginning ,
58001011	They will pass away , They will all wear out like old clothes . They will be changed like a person changes clothes ,
58001013	When has he ever said to any of the angels , Sit at my right side
58001014	Aren’t all the angels ministering spirits who are sent to serve those who are going to inherit salvation ?
58002001	This is why it’s necessary for us to pay more attention to what we have heard , or else we may drift away from it .
58002002	If the message that was spoken by angels was reliable , and every offense and act of disobedience received an appropriate consequence ,
58002003	how will we escape if we ignore such a great salvation ? It was first announced through the Lord , and then it was confirmed by those who heard him .
58002004	God also vouched for their message with signs , amazing things , various miracles , and gifts from the Holy Spirit , which were handed out the way he wanted .
58002005	God didn’t put the world that is coming ( the world we are talking about ) under the angels’ control .
58002006	Instead , someone declared somewhere , What is humanity that you think about them ?
58002007	For a while you made them lower than angels . When he puts everything under their control , he doesn’t leave anything out of control . But right now , we don’t see everything under their control yet .
58002009	However , we do see the one who was made lower in order than the angels for a little while — it’s Jesus ! He’s the one who is now crowned with glory and honor because of the suffering of his death . He suffered death so that he could taste death for everyone through God’s grace .
58002010	It was appropriate for God , for whom and through whom everything exists , to use experiences of suffering to make perfect the pioneer of salvation . This salvation belongs to many sons and daughters whom he’s leading to glory .
58002011	This is because the one who makes people holy and the people who are being made holy all come from one source . That is why Jesus isn’t ashamed to call them brothers and sisters when he says ,
58002012	I will publicly announce your name to my brothers and sisters .
58002013	He also says , I will rely on him . And also , Here I am with the children whom God has given to me .
58002014	Therefore , since the children share in flesh and blood , he also shared the same things in the same way . He did this to destroy the one who holds the power over death — the devil — by dying .
58002015	He set free those who were held in slavery their entire lives by their fear of death .
58002016	Of course , he isn’t trying to help angels , but rather he’s helping Abraham’s descendants .
58002017	Therefore , he had to be made like his brothers and sisters in every way . This was so that he could become a merciful and faithful high priest in things relating to God , in order to wipe away the sins of the people .
58002018	He’s able to help those who are being tempted , since he himself experienced suffering when he was tempted .
58003001	Therefore , brothers and sisters who are partners in the heavenly calling , think about Jesus , the apostle and high priest of our confession .
58003002	Jesus was faithful to the one who appointed him just like Moses was faithful in God’s house .
58003003	But he deserves greater glory than Moses in the same way that the builder of the house deserves more honor than the house itself .
58003004	Every house is built by someone , but God is the builder of everything .
58003005	Moses was faithful in all God’s house as a servant in order to affirm the things that would be spoken later .
58003006	But Jesus was faithful over God’s house as a Son . We are his house if we hold on to the confidence and the pride that our hope gives us .
58003007	So , as the Holy Spirit says , Today , if you hear his voice ,
58003008	don’t have stubborn hearts
58003009	That is where your ancestors challenged and tested me ,
58003010	So I was angry with them . I said , " Their hearts always go off course ,
58003011	Because of my anger I swore :
58003012	Watch out , brothers and sisters , so that none of you have an evil , unfaithful heart that abandons the living God .
58003013	Instead , encourage each other every day , as long as it’s called " today , " so that none of you become insensitive to God because of sin’s deception .
58003014	We are partners with Christ , but only if we hold on to the confidence we had in the beginning until the end .
58003015	When it says , Today , if you hear his voice , don’t have stubborn hearts
58003016	Who was it who rebelled when they heard his voice ? Wasn’t it all of those who were brought out of Egypt by Moses ?
58003017	And with whom was God angry for forty years ? Wasn’t it with the ones who sinned , whose bodies fell in the desert ?
58003018	And against whom did he swear that they would never enter his rest , if not against the ones who were disobedient ?
58003019	We see that they couldn’t enter because of their lack of faith .
58004001	Therefore , since the promise that we can enter into rest is still open , let’s be careful so that none of you will appear to miss it .
58004002	We also had the good news preached to us , just as the Israelites did . However , the message they heard didn’t help them because they weren’t united in faith with the ones who listened to it .
58004003	We who have faith are entering the rest . As God said , And because of my anger I swore : And yet God’s works were completed at the foundation of the world .
58004004	Then somewhere he said this about the seventh day of creation : God rested on the seventh day from all his works .
58004005	But again , in the passage above , God said , They will never enter my rest !
58004006	Therefore , it’s left open for some to enter it , and the ones who had the good news preached to them before didn’t enter because of disobedience .
58004007	Just as it says in the passage above , God designates a certain day as " today , " when he says through David much later , Today , if you hear his voice ,
58004008	If Joshua gave the Israelites rest , God wouldn’t have spoken about another day later on .
58004009	So you see that a sabbath rest is left open for God’s people .
58004010	The one who entered God’s rest also rested from his works , just as God rested from his own .
58004011	Therefore , let’s make every effort to enter that rest so that no one will fall by following the same example of disobedience ,
58004012	because God’s word is living , active , and sharper than any two-edged sword . It penetrates to the point that it separates the soul from the spirit and the joints from the marrow . It’s able to judge the heart’s thoughts and intentions .
58004013	No creature is hidden from it , but rather everything is naked and exposed to the eyes of the one to whom we have to give an answer .
58004014	Also , let’s hold on to the confession since we have a great high priest who passed through the heavens , who is Jesus , God’s Son ;
58004015	because we don’t have a high priest who can’t sympathize with our weaknesses but instead one who was tempted in every way that we are , except without sin .
58004016	Finally , let’s draw near to the throne of favor with confidence so that we can receive mercy and find grace when we need help .
58005001	Every high priest is taken from the people and put in charge of things that relate to God for their sake , in order to offer gifts and sacrifices for sins .
58005002	The high priest is able to deal gently with the ignorant and those who are misled since he himself is prone to weakness .
58005003	Because of his weakness , he must offer sacrifices for his own sins as well as for the people .
58005004	No one takes this honor for themselves but takes it only when they are called by God , just like Aaron .
58005005	In the same way Christ also didn’t promote himself to become high priest . Instead , it was the one who said to him , You are my Son .
58005006	as he also says in another place , You are a priest forever ,
58005007	During his days on earth , Christ offered prayers and requests with loud cries and tears as his sacrifices to the one who was able to save him from death . He was heard because of his godly devotion .
58005008	Although he was a Son , he learned obedience from what he suffered .
58005009	After he had been made perfect , he became the source of eternal salvation for everyone who obeys him .
58005010	He was appointed by God to be a high priest according to the order of Melchizedek .
58005011	We have a lot to say about this topic , and it’s difficult to explain , because you have been lazy and you haven’t been listening .
58005012	Although you should have been teachers by now , you need someone to teach you an introduction to the basics about God’s message . You have come to the place where you need milk instead of solid food .
58005013	Everyone who lives on milk is not used to the word of righteousness , because they are babies .
58005014	But solid food is for the mature , whose senses are trained by practice to distinguish between good and evil .
58006001	So let’s press on to maturity , by moving on from the basics about Christ’s word . Let’s not lay a foundation of turning away from dead works , of faith in God ,
58006002	of teaching about ritual ways to wash with water , laying on of hands , the resurrection from the dead , and eternal judgment — all over again .
58006003	We’re going to press on , if God allows it .
58006004	Because it’s impossible to restore people to changed hearts and lives who turn away once they have seen the light , tasted the heavenly gift , become partners with the Holy Spirit ,
58006005	and tasted God’s good word and the powers of the coming age .
58006006	They are crucifying God’s Son all over again and exposing him to public shame .
58006007	The ground receives a blessing from God when it drinks up the rain that regularly comes and falls on it and yields useful plants for those who farm it .
58006008	But if it produces thorns and thistles , it’s useless and close to being cursed . It ends up being burned .
58006009	But we are convinced of better things in your case , brothers and sisters , even though we are talking this way — things that go together with salvation .
58006010	God isn’t unjust so that he forgets your efforts and the love you have shown for his name’s sake when you served and continue to serve God’s holy people .
58006011	But we desperately want each of you to show the same effort to make your hope sure until the end .
58006012	This is so you won’t be lazy but follow the example of the ones who inherit the promises through faith and patience .
58006013	When God gave Abraham his promise , he swore by himself since he couldn’t swear by anyone greater .
58006014	He said , I will certainly bless you and multiply your descendants .
58006015	So Abraham obtained the promise by showing patience .
58006016	People pledge by something greater than themselves . A solemn pledge guarantees what they say and shuts down any argument .
58006017	When God wanted to further demonstrate to the heirs of the promise that his purpose doesn’t change , he guaranteed it with a solemn pledge .
58006018	So these are two things that don’t change , because it’s impossible for God to lie . He did this so that we , who have taken refuge in him , can be encouraged to grasp the hope that is lying in front of us .
58006019	This hope , which is a safe and secure anchor for our whole being , enters the sanctuary behind the curtain .
58006020	That’s where Jesus went in advance and entered for us , since he became a high priest according to the order of Melchizedek .
58007001	This Melchizedek , who was king of Salem and priest of the Most High God , met Abraham as he returned from the defeat of the kings , and Melchizedek blessed him .
58007002	Abraham gave a tenth of everything to him . His name means first " king of righteousness , " and then " king of Salem , " that is , " king of peace . "
58007003	He is without father or mother or any family . He has no beginning or end of life , but he’s like God’s Son and remains a priest for all time .
58007004	See how great Melchizedek was ! Abraham , the father of the people , gave him a tenth of everything he captured .
58007005	The descendants of Levi who receive the office of priest have a commandment under the Law to collect a tenth of everything from the people who are their brothers and sisters , though they also are descended from Abraham .
58007006	But Melchizedek , who isn’t related to them , received a tenth of everything from Abraham and blessed the one who had received the promises .
58007007	Without question , the less important person is blessed by the more important person .
58007008	In addition , in one case a tenth is received by people who die , and in the other case , the tenth is received by someone who continues to live , according to the record .
58007009	It could be said that Levi , who received a tenth , paid a tenth through Abraham
58007010	because he was still in his ancestor’s body when Abraham paid the tenth to Melchizedek .
58007011	So if perfection came through the levitical office of priest ( for the people received the Law under the priests ) , why was there still a need to speak about raising up another priest according to the order of Melchizedek rather than one according to the order of Aaron ?
58007012	When the order of the priest changes , there has to be a change in the Law as well .
58007013	The person we are talking about belongs to another tribe , and no one ever served at the altar from that tribe .
58007014	It’s clear that our Lord came from the tribe of Judah , but Moses never said anything about priests from that tribe .
58007015	And it’s even clearer if another priest appears who is like Melchizedek .
58007016	He has become a priest by the power of a life that can’t be destroyed , rather than a legal requirement about physical descent .
58007017	This is confirmed : You are a priest forever ,
58007018	On the one hand , an earlier command is set aside because it was weak and useless
58007019	( because the Law made nothing perfect ) . On the other hand , a better hope is introduced , through which we draw near to God .
58007020	And this was not done without a solemn pledge ! The others have become priests without a solemn pledge ,
58007021	but this priest was affirmed with a solemn pledge by the one who said , The Lord has made a solemn pledge You are a priest forever .
58007022	As a result , Jesus has become the guarantee of a better covenant .
58007023	The others who became priests are numerous because death prevented them from continuing to serve .
58007024	In contrast , he holds the office of priest permanently because he continues to serve forever .
58007025	This is why he can completely save those who are approaching God through him , because he always lives to speak with God for them .
58007026	It’s appropriate for us to have this kind of high priest : holy , innocent , incorrupt , separate from sinners , and raised high above the heavens .
58007027	He doesn’t need to offer sacrifices every day like the other high priests , first for their own sins and then for the sins of the people . He did this once for all when he offered himself .
58007028	The Law appoints people who are prone to weakness as high priests , but the content of the solemn pledge , which came after the Law , appointed a Son who has been made perfect forever .
58008001	Now the main point of what we are saying is this : We have this kind of high priest . He sat down at the right side of the throne of the majesty in the heavens .
58008002	He’s serving as a priest in the holy place , which is the true meeting tent that God , not any human being , set up .
58008003	Every high priest is appointed to offer gifts and sacrifices . So it’s necessary for this high priest also to have something to offer .
58008004	If he was located on earth , he wouldn’t be a priest because there are already others who offer gifts based on the Law .
58008005	They serve in a place that is a copy and shadow of the heavenly meeting tent . This is indicated when Moses was warned by God when he was about to set up the meeting tent : See that you follow the pattern that I showed you on the mountain in every detail .
58008006	But now , Jesus has received a superior priestly service just as he arranged a better covenant that is enacted with better promises .
58008007	If the first covenant had been without fault , it wouldn’t have made sense to expect a second .
58008008	But God did find fault with them , since he says , Look , the days are coming , says the Lord ,
58008009	It will not be like the covenant that I made with their ancestors on the day I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ,
58008010	This is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel I will place my laws in their minds , I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	And each person won’t ever teach a neighbor or their brother or sister , saying , " Know the Lord , "
58008013	When it says new , it makes the first obsolete . And if something is old and outdated , it’s close to disappearing .
58009001	So then the first covenant had regulations for the priests’ service and the holy place on earth .
58009002	They pitched the first tent called the holy place . It contained the lampstand , the table , and the loaves of bread presented to God .
58009003	There was a tent behind the second curtain called the holy of holies .
58009004	It had the gold altar for incense and the chest containing the covenant , which was covered with gold on all sides . In the chest there was a gold jar containing manna , Aaron’s rod that budded , and the stone tablets of the covenant .
58009005	Above the chest there were magnificent winged creatures casting their shadow over the seat of the chest , where sin is taken care of . Right now we can’t talk about these things in detail .
58009006	When these things have been prepared in this way , priests enter the first tent all the time as they perform their service .
58009007	But only the high priest enters the second tent once a year . He never does this without blood , which he offers for himself and for the sins the people committed in ignorance .
58009008	With this , the Holy Spirit is showing that the way into the holy place hadn’t been revealed yet while the first tent was standing .
58009009	This is a symbol for the present time . It shows that the gifts and sacrifices that are being offered can’t perfect the conscience of the one who is serving .
58009010	These are superficial regulations that are only about food , drink , and various ritual ways to wash with water . They are regulations that have been imposed until the time of the new order .
58009011	But Christ has appeared as the high priest of the good things that have happened . He passed through the greater and more perfect meeting tent , which isn’t made by human hands ( that is , it’s not a part of this world ) .
58009012	He entered the holy of holies once for all by his own blood , not by the blood of goats or calves , securing our deliverance for all time .
58009013	If the blood of goats and bulls and the sprinkled ashes of cows made spiritually contaminated people holy and clean ,
58009014	how much more will the blood of Jesus wash our consciences clean from dead works in order to serve the living God ? He offered himself to God through the eternal Spirit as a sacrifice without any flaw .
58009015	This is why he’s the mediator of a new covenant ( which is a will ) : so that those who are called might receive the promise of the eternal inheritance on the basis of his death . His death occurred to set them free from the offenses committed under the first covenant .
58009016	When there is a will , you need to confirm the death of the one who made the will .
58009017	This is because a will takes effect only after a death , since it’s not in force while the one who made the will is alive .
58009018	So not even the first covenant was put into effect without blood .
58009019	Moses took the blood of calves and goats , along with water , scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the Law scroll itself and all the people after he had proclaimed every command of the Law to all the people .
58009020	While he did it , he said , This is the blood of the covenant that God established for you .
58009021	And in the same way he sprinkled the meeting tent and also all the equipment that would be used in the priests’ service with blood .
58009022	Almost everything is cleansed by blood , according to the Law’s regulations , and there is no forgiveness without blood being shed .
58009023	So it was necessary for the copies of the heavenly things to be cleansed with these sacrifices , but the heavenly things had to be cleansed with better sacrifices than these .
58009024	Christ didn’t enter the holy place ( which is a copy of the true holy place ) made by human hands , but into heaven itself , so that he now appears in God’s presence for us .
58009025	He didn’t enter to offer himself over and over again , like the high priest enters the earthly holy place every year with blood that isn’t his .
58009026	If that were so , then Jesus would have to suffer many times since the foundation of the world . Instead , he has now appeared once at the end of the ages to get rid of sin by sacrificing himself .
58009027	People are destined to die once and then face judgment .
58009028	In the same way , Christ was also offered once to take on himself the sins of many people . He will appear a second time , not to take away sin but to save those who are eagerly waiting for him .
58010001	The Law is a shadow of the good things that are coming , not the real things themselves . It never can perfect the ones who are trying to draw near to God through the same sacrifices that are offered continually every year .
58010002	Otherwise , wouldn’t they have stopped being offered ? If the people carrying out their religious duties had been completely cleansed once , no one would have been aware of sin anymore .
58010003	Instead , these sacrifices are a reminder of sin every year ,
58010004	because it’s impossible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	Therefore , when he comes into the world he says , You didn’t want a sacrifice or an offering , but you prepared a body for me ;
58010006	you weren’t pleased with entirely burned offerings or a sin offering .
58010007	So then I said , " Look , I’ve come to do your will , God . This has been written about me in the scroll . "
58010008	He says above , You didn’t want and you weren’t pleased with a sacrifice or an offering or with entirely burned offerings or a purification offering , which are offered because the Law requires them .
58010009	Then he said , Look , I’ve come to do your will . He puts an end to the first to establish the second .
58010010	We have been made holy by God’s will through the offering of Jesus Christ’s body once for all .
58010011	Every priest stands every day serving and offering the same sacrifices over and over , sacrifices that can never take away sins .
58010012	But when this priest offered one sacrifice for sins for all time , he sat down at the right side of God .
58010013	Since then , he’s waiting until his enemies are made into a footstool for his feet ,
58010014	because he perfected the people who are being made holy with one offering for all time .
58010015	The Holy Spirit affirms this when saying ,
58010016	This is the covenant that I will make with them . After these days , says the Lord ,
58010017	And I won’t remember their sins
58010018	When there is forgiveness for these things , there is no longer an offering for sin .
58010019	Brothers and sisters , we have confidence that we can enter the holy of holies by means of Jesus’ blood ,
58010020	through a new and living way that he opened up for us through the curtain , which is his body ,
58010021	and we have a great high priest over God’s house .
58010022	Therefore , let’s draw near with a genuine heart with the certainty that our faith gives us , since our hearts are sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and our bodies are washed with pure water .
58010023	Let’s hold on to the confession of our hope without wavering , because the one who made the promises is reliable .
58010024	Let’s also think about how to motivate each other to show love and to do good works .
58010025	Don’t stop meeting together with other believers , which some people have gotten into the habit of doing . Instead , encourage each other , especially as you see the day drawing near .
58010026	If we make the decision to sin after we receive the knowledge of the truth , there isn’t a sacrifice for sins left any longer .
58010027	There’s only a scary expectation of judgment and of a burning fire that’s going to devour God’s opponents .
58010028	When someone rejected the Law from Moses , they were put to death without mercy on the basis of the testimony of two or three witnesses .
58010029	How much worse punishment do you think is deserved by the person who walks all over God’s Son , who acts as if the blood of the covenant that made us holy is just ordinary blood , and who insults the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	We know the one who said , Judgment is mine ; I will pay people back . And he also said , The Lord will judge his people .
58010031	It’s scary to fall into the hands of the living God !
58010032	But remember the earlier days , after you saw the light . You stood your ground while you were suffering from an enormous amount of pressure .
58010033	Sometimes you were exposed to insults and abuse in public . Other times you became partners with those who were treated that way .
58010034	You even showed sympathy toward people in prison and accepted the confiscation of your possessions with joy , since you knew that you had better and lasting possessions .
58010035	So don’t throw away your confidence — it brings a great reward .
58010036	You need to endure so that you can receive the promises after you do God’s will .
58010037	In a little while longer , the one who is coming will come and won’t delay ;
58010038	but my righteous one will live by faith , and my whole being won’t be pleased with anyone who shrinks back .
58010039	But we aren’t the sort of people who timidly draw back and end up being destroyed . We’re the sort of people who have faith so that our whole beings are preserved .
58011001	Faith is the reality of what we hope for , the proof of what we don’t see .
58011002	The elders in the past were approved because they showed faith .
58011003	By faith we understand that the universe has been created by a word from God so that the visible came into existence from the invisible .
58011004	By faith Abel offered a better sacrifice to God than Cain , which showed that he was righteous , since God gave approval to him for his gift . Though he died , he’s still speaking through faith .
58011005	By faith Enoch was taken up so that he didn’t see death , and he wasn’t found because God took him up . He was given approval for having pleased God before he was taken up .
58011006	It’s impossible to please God without faith because the one who draws near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards people who try to find him .
58011007	By faith Noah responded with godly fear when he was warned about events he hadn’t seen yet . He built an ark to deliver his household . With his faith , he criticized the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes from faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go out to a place that he was going to receive as an inheritance . He went out without knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith he lived in the land he had been promised as a stranger . He lived in tents along with Isaac and Jacob , who were coheirs of the same promise .
58011010	He was looking forward to a city that has foundations , whose architect and builder is God .
58011011	By faith even Sarah received the ability to have a child , though she herself was barren and past the age for having children , because she believed that the one who promised was faithful .
58011012	So descendants were born from one man ( and he was as good as dead ) . They were as many as the number of the stars in the sky and as countless as the grains of sand on the seashore .
58011013	All of these people died in faith without receiving the promises , but they saw the promises from a distance and welcomed them . They confessed that they were strangers and immigrants on earth .
58011014	People who say this kind of thing make it clear that they are looking for a homeland .
58011015	If they had been thinking about the country that they had left , they would have had the opportunity to return to it .
58011016	But at this point in time , they are longing for a better country , that is , a heavenly one . Therefore , God isn’t ashamed to be called their God — he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith Abraham offered Isaac when he was tested . The one who received the promises was offering his only son .
58011018	He had been told concerning him , Your legitimate descendants will come from Isaac .
58011019	He figured that God could even raise him from the dead . So in a way he did receive him back from the dead .
58011020	By faith Isaac also blessed Jacob and Esau concerning their future .
58011021	By faith Jacob blessed each of Joseph’s sons as he was dying and bowed in worship over the head of his staff .
58011022	By faith Joseph recalled the exodus of the Israelites at the end of his life , and gave instructions about burying his bones .
58011023	By faith Moses was hidden by his parents for three months when he was born , because they saw that the child was beautiful and they weren’t afraid of the king’s orders .
58011024	By faith Moses refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter when he was grown up .
58011025	He chose to be mistreated with God’s people instead of having the temporary pleasures of sin .
58011026	He thought that the abuses he suffered for Christ were more valuable than the treasures of Egypt , since he was looking forward to the reward .
58011027	By faith he left Egypt without being afraid of the king’s anger . He kept on going as if he could see what is invisible .
58011028	By faith he kept the Passover and the sprinkling of blood , in order that the destroyer could not touch their firstborn children .
58011029	By faith they crossed the Red Sea as if they were on dry land , but when the Egyptians tried it , they were drowned .
58011030	By faith Jericho’s walls fell after the people marched around them for seven days .
58011031	By faith Rahab the prostitute wasn’t killed with the disobedient because she welcomed the spies in peace .
58011032	What more can I say ? I would run out of time if I told you about Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets .
58011033	Through faith they conquered kingdoms , brought about justice , realized promises , shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	put out raging fires , escaped from the edge of the sword , found strength in weakness , were mighty in war , and routed foreign armies .
58011035	Women received back their dead by resurrection . Others were tortured and refused to be released so they could gain a better resurrection .
58011036	But others experienced public shame by being taunted and whipped ; they were even put in chains and in prison .
58011037	They were stoned to death , they were cut in two , and they died by being murdered with swords . They went around wearing the skins of sheep and goats , needy , oppressed , and mistreated .
58011038	The world didn’t deserve them . They wandered around in deserts , mountains , caves , and holes in the ground .
58011039	All these people didn’t receive what was promised , though they were given approval for their faith .
58011040	God provided something better for us so they wouldn’t be made perfect without us .
58012001	So then let’s also run the race that is laid out in front of us , since we have such a great cloud of witnesses surrounding us . Let’s throw off any extra baggage , get rid of the sin that trips us up ,
58012002	and fix our eyes on Jesus , faith’s pioneer and perfecter . He endured the cross , ignoring the shame , for the sake of the joy that was laid out in front of him , and sat down at the right side of God’s throne .
58012003	Think about the one who endured such opposition from sinners so that you won’t be discouraged and you won’t give up .
58012004	In your struggle against sin , you haven’t resisted yet to the point of shedding blood ,
58012005	and you have forgotten the encouragement that addresses you as sons and daughters : My child , don’t make light of the Lord’s discipline or give up when you are corrected by him ,
58012006	because the Lord disciplines whomever he loves ,
58012007	Bear hardship for the sake of discipline . God is treating you like sons and daughters ! What child isn’t disciplined by his or her father ?
58012008	But if you don’t experience discipline , which happens to all children , then you are illegitimate and not real sons and daughters .
58012009	What’s more , we had human parents who disciplined us , and we respected them for it . How much more should we submit to the Father of spirits and live ?
58012010	Our human parents disciplined us for a little while , as it seemed best to them , but God does it for our benefit so that we can share his holiness .
58012011	No discipline is fun while it lasts , but it seems painful at the time . Later , however , it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness for those who have been trained by it .
58012012	So strengthen your drooping hands and weak knees !
58012013	Make straight paths for your feet so that if any part is lame , it will be healed rather than injured more seriously .
58012014	Pursue the goal of peace along with everyone — and holiness as well , because no one will see the Lord without it .
58012015	Make sure that no one misses out on God’s grace . Make sure that no root of bitterness grows up that might cause trouble and pollute many people .
58012016	Make sure that no one becomes sexually immoral or ungodly like Esau . He sold his inheritance as the oldest son for one meal .
58012017	You know that afterward , when he wanted to inherit the blessing , he was rejected because he couldn’t find a way to change his heart and life , though he looked for it with tears .
58012018	You haven’t drawn near to something that can be touched : a burning fire , darkness , shadow , a whirlwind ,
58012019	a blast of a trumpet , and a sound of words that made the ones who heard it beg that there wouldn’t be one more word .
58012020	They couldn’t stand the command , If even a wild animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned .
58012021	The sight was so frightening that Moses said , " I’m terrified and shaking ! "
58012022	But you have drawn near to Mount Zion , the city of the living God , heavenly Jerusalem , to countless angels in a festival gathering ,
58012023	to the assembly of God’s firstborn children who are registered in heaven , to God the judge of all , to the spirits of the righteous who have been made perfect ,
58012024	to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the sprinkled blood that speaks better than Abel’s blood .
58012025	See to it that you don’t resist the one who is speaking . If the people didn’t escape when they refused to listen to the one who warned them on earth , how will we escape if we reject the one who is warning from heaven ?
58012026	His voice shook the earth then , but now he has made a promise : Still once more I will shake not only the earth but heaven also .
58012027	The words " still once more " reveal the removal of what is shaken — the things that are part of this creation — so that what isn’t shaken will remain .
58012028	Therefore , since we are receiving a kingdom that can’t be shaken , let’s continue to express our gratitude . With this gratitude , let’s serve in a way that is pleasing to God with respect and awe ,
58012029	because our God really is a consuming fire .
58013001	Keep loving each other like family .
58013002	Don’t neglect to open up your homes to guests , because by doing this some have been hosts to angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember prisoners as if you were in prison with them , and people who are mistreated as if you were in their place .
58013004	Marriage must be honored in every respect , with no cheating on the relationship , because God will judge the sexually immoral person and the person who commits adultery .
58013005	Your way of life should be free from the love of money , and you should be content with what you have . After all , he has said , I will never leave you or abandon you .
58013006	This is why we can confidently say , The Lord is my helper , and I won’t be afraid . What can people do to me ?
58013007	Remember your leaders who spoke God’s word to you . Imitate their faith as you consider the way their lives turned out .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever !
58013009	Don’t be misled by the many strange teachings out there . It’s a good thing for the heart to be strengthened by grace rather than by food . Food doesn’t help those who live in this context .
58013010	We have an altar , and those who serve as priests in the meeting tent don’t have the right to eat from it .
58013011	The blood of the animals is carried into the holy of holies by the high priest as an offering for sin , and their bodies are burned outside the camp .
58013012	And so Jesus also suffered outside the city gate to make the people holy with his own blood .
58013013	So now , let’s go to him outside the camp , bearing his shame .
58013014	We don’t have a permanent city here , but rather we are looking for the city that is still to come .
58013015	So let’s continually offer up a sacrifice of praise through him , which is the fruit from our lips that confess his name .
58013016	Don’t forget to do good and to share what you have because God is pleased with these kinds of sacrifices .
58013017	Rely on your leaders and defer to them , because they watch over your whole being as people who are going to be held responsible for you . They need to be able to do this with pleasure and not with complaints about you , because that wouldn’t help you .
58013018	Pray for us . We’re sure that we have a good conscience , and we want to do the right thing in every way .
58013019	I’m particularly asking you to do this so that I can be returned to you quickly .
58013020	May the God of peace ,
58013021	equip you with every good thing to do his will , To him be the glory forever and always . Amen .
58013022	I urge you , brothers and sisters , to put up with this message of encouragement , since I’ve only written a short letter to you !
58013023	You should know that our brother Timothy has been set free . If he comes soon , we will travel together to see you .
58013024	Greet your leaders and all of God’s holy people . The group from Italy greets you .
58013025	May grace be with all of you .
59001001	From James , a slave of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ . To the twelve tribes who are scattered outside the land of Israel . Greetings !
59001002	My brothers and sisters , think of the various tests you encounter as occasions for joy .
59001003	After all , you know that the testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	Let this endurance complete its work so that you may be fully mature , complete , and lacking in nothing .
59001005	But anyone who needs wisdom should ask God , whose very nature is to give to everyone without a second thought , without keeping score . Wisdom will certainly be given to those who ask .
59001006	Whoever asks shouldn’t hesitate . They should ask in faith , without doubting . Whoever doubts is like the surf of the sea , tossed and turned by the wind .
59001007	People like that should never imagine that they will receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	They are double-minded , unstable in all their ways .
59001009	Brothers and sisters who are poor should find satisfaction in their high status .
59001010	Those who are wealthy should find satisfaction in their low status , because they will die off like wildflowers .
59001011	The sun rises with its scorching heat and dries up the grass so that its flowers fall and its beauty is lost . Just like that , in the midst of their daily lives , the wealthy will waste away .
59001012	Those who stand firm during testing are blessed . They are tried and true . They will receive the life God has promised to those who love him as their reward .
59001013	No one who is tested should say , " God is tempting me ! " This is because God is not tempted by any form of evil , nor does he tempt anyone .
59001014	Everyone is tempted by their own cravings ; they are lured away and enticed by them .
59001015	Once those cravings conceive , they give birth to sin ; and when sin grows up , it gives birth to death .
59001016	Don’t be misled , my dear brothers and sisters .
59001017	Every good gift , every perfect gift , comes from above . These gifts come down from the Father , the creator of the heavenly lights , in whose character there is no change at all .
59001018	He chose to give us birth by his true word , and here is the result : we are like the first crop from the harvest of everything he created .
59001019	Know this , my dear brothers and sisters : everyone should be quick to listen , slow to speak , and slow to grow angry .
59001020	This is because an angry person doesn’t produce God’s righteousness .
59001021	Therefore , with humility , set aside all moral filth and the growth of wickedness , and welcome the word planted deep inside you — the very word that is able to save you .
59001022	You must be doers of the word and not only hearers who mislead themselves .
59001023	Those who hear but don’t do the word are like those who look at their faces in a mirror .
59001024	They look at themselves , walk away , and immediately forget what they were like .
59001025	But there are those who study the perfect law , the law of freedom , and continue to do it . They don’t listen and then forget , but they put it into practice in their lives . They will be blessed in whatever they do .
59001026	If those who claim devotion to God don’t control what they say , they mislead themselves . Their devotion is worthless .
59001027	True devotion , the kind that is pure and faultless before God the Father , is this : to care for orphans and widows in their difficulties and to keep the world from contaminating us .
59002001	My brothers and sisters , when you show favoritism you deny the faithfulness of our Lord Jesus Christ , who has been resurrected in glory .
59002002	Imagine two people coming into your meeting . One has a gold ring and fine clothes , while the other is poor , dressed in filthy rags .
59002003	Then suppose that you were to take special notice of the one wearing fine clothes , saying , " Here’s an excellent place . Sit here . " But to the poor person you say , " Stand over there " ; or , " Here , sit at my feet . "
59002004	Wouldn’t you have shown favoritism among yourselves and become evil-minded judges ?
59002005	My dear brothers and sisters , listen ! Hasn’t God chosen those who are poor by worldly standards to be rich in terms of faith ? Hasn’t God chosen the poor as heirs of the kingdom he has promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor . Don’t the wealthy make life difficult for you ? Aren’t they the ones who drag you into court ?
59002007	Aren’t they the ones who insult the good name spoken over you at your baptism ?
59002008	You do well when you really fulfill the royal law found in scripture , Love your neighbor as yourself .
59002009	But when you show favoritism , you are committing a sin , and by that same law you are exposed as a lawbreaker .
59002010	Anyone who tries to keep all of the Law but fails at one point is guilty of failing to keep all of it .
59002011	The one who said , Don’t commit adultery , also said , Don’t commit murder . So if you don’t commit adultery but do commit murder , you are a lawbreaker .
59002012	In every way , then , speak and act as people who will be judged by the law of freedom .
59002013	There will be no mercy in judgment for anyone who hasn’t shown mercy . Mercy overrules judgment .
59002014	My brothers and sisters , what good is it if people say they have faith but do nothing to show it ? Claiming to have faith can’t save anyone , can it ?
59002015	Imagine a brother or sister who is naked and never has enough food to eat .
59002016	What if one of you said , " Go in peace ! Stay warm ! Have a nice meal ! " ? What good is it if you don’t actually give them what their body needs ?
59002017	In the same way , faith is dead when it doesn’t result in faithful activity .
59002018	Someone might claim , " You have faith and I have action . " But how can I see your faith apart from your actions ? Instead , I’ll show you my faith by putting it into practice in faithful action .
59002019	It’s good that you believe that God is one . Ha ! Even the demons believe this , and they tremble with fear .
59002020	Are you so slow ? Do you need to be shown that faith without actions has no value at all ?
59002021	What about Abraham , our father ? Wasn’t he shown to be righteous through his actions when he offered his son Isaac on the altar ?
59002022	See , his faith was at work along with his actions . In fact , his faith was made complete by his faithful actions .
59002023	So the scripture was fulfilled that says , Abraham believed God , and God regarded him as righteous . What is more , Abraham was called God’s friend .
59002024	So you see that a person is shown to be righteous through faithful actions and not through faith alone .
59002025	In the same way , wasn’t Rahab the prostitute shown to be righteous when she received the messengers as her guests and then sent them on by another road ?
59002026	As the lifeless body is dead , so faith without actions is dead .
59003001	My brothers and sisters , not many of you should become teachers , because we know that we teachers will be judged more strictly .
59003002	We all make mistakes often , but those who don’t make mistakes with their words have reached full maturity . Like a bridled horse , they can control themselves entirely .
59003003	When we bridle horses and put bits in their mouths to lead them wherever we want , we can control their whole bodies .
59003004	Consider ships : they are so large that strong winds are needed to drive them . But pilots direct their ships wherever they want with a little rudder .
59003005	In the same way , even though the tongue is a small part of the body , it boasts wildly . Think about this : a small flame can set a whole forest on fire .
59003006	The tongue is a small flame of fire , a world of evil at work in us . It contaminates our entire lives . Because of it , the circle of life is set on fire . The tongue itself is set on fire by the flames of hell .
59003007	People can tame and already have tamed every kind of animal , bird , reptile , and fish .
59003008	No one can tame the tongue , though . It is a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we both bless the Lord and Father and curse human beings made in God’s likeness .
59003010	Blessing and cursing come from the same mouth . My brothers and sisters , it just shouldn’t be this way !
59003011	Both fresh water and salt water don’t come from the same spring , do they ?
59003012	My brothers and sisters , can a fig tree produce olives ? Can a grapevine produce figs ? Of course not , and fresh water doesn’t flow from a saltwater spring either .
59003013	Are any of you wise and understanding ? Show that your actions are good with a humble lifestyle that comes from wisdom .
59003014	However , if you have bitter jealousy and selfish ambition in your heart , then stop bragging and living in ways that deny the truth .
59003015	This is not the wisdom that comes down from above . Instead , it is from the earth , natural and demonic .
59003016	Wherever there is jealousy and selfish ambition , there is disorder and everything that is evil .
59003017	What of the wisdom from above ? First , it is pure , and then peaceful , gentle , obedient , filled with mercy and good actions , fair , and genuine .
59003018	Those who make peace sow the seeds of justice by their peaceful acts .
59004001	What is the source of conflict among you ? What is the source of your disputes ? Don’t they come from your cravings that are at war in your own lives ?
59004002	You long for something you don’t have , so you commit murder . You are jealous for something you can’t get , so you struggle and fight . You don’t have because you don’t ask .
59004003	You ask and don’t have because you ask with evil intentions , to waste it on your own cravings .
59004004	You unfaithful people ! Don’t you know that friendship with the world makes you an enemy of God ?
59004005	Or do you suppose that scripture is meaningless ? Doesn’t God long for our faithfulness in the life he has given to us ?
59004006	But he gives us more grace . This is why it says , God stands against the proud , but favors the humble .
59004007	Therefore , submit to God . Resist the devil , and he will run away from you .
59004008	Come near to God , and he will come near to you . Wash your hands , you sinners . Purify your hearts , you double-minded .
59004009	Cry out in sorrow , mourn , and weep ! Let your laughter become mourning and your joy become sadness .
59004010	Humble yourselves before the Lord , and he will lift you up .
59004011	Brothers and sisters , don’t say evil things about each other . Whoever insults or criticizes a brother or sister insults and criticizes the Law . If you find fault with the Law , you are not a doer of the Law but a judge over it .
59004012	There is only one lawgiver and judge , and he is able to save and to destroy . But you who judge your neighbor , who are you ?
59004013	Pay attention , you who say , " Today or tomorrow we will go to such-and-such a town . We will stay there a year , buying and selling , and making a profit . "
59004014	You don’t really know about tomorrow . What is your life ? You are a mist that appears for only a short while before it vanishes .
59004015	Here’s what you ought to say : " If the Lord wills , we will live and do this or that . "
59004016	But now you boast and brag , and all such boasting is evil .
59004017	It is a sin when someone knows the right thing to do and doesn’t do it .
59005001	Pay attention , you wealthy people ! Weep and moan over the miseries coming upon you .
59005002	Your riches have rotted . Moths have destroyed your clothes .
59005003	Your gold and silver have rusted , and their rust will be evidence against you . It will eat your flesh like fire . Consider the treasure you have hoarded in the last days .
59005004	Listen ! Hear the cries of the wages of your field hands . These are the wages you stole from those who harvested your fields . The cries of the harvesters have reached the ears of the Lord of heavenly forces .
59005005	You have lived a self-satisfying life on this earth , a life of luxury . You have stuffed your hearts in preparation for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and murdered the righteous one , who doesn’t oppose you .
59005007	Therefore , brothers and sisters , you must be patient as you wait for the coming of the Lord . Consider the farmer who waits patiently for the coming of rain in the fall and spring , looking forward to the precious fruit of the earth .
59005008	You also must wait patiently , strengthening your resolve , because the coming of the Lord is near .
59005009	Don’t complain about each other , brothers and sisters , so that you won’t be judged . Look ! The judge is standing at the door !
59005010	Brothers and sisters , take the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord as an example of patient resolve and steadfastness .
59005011	Look at how we honor those who have practiced endurance . You have heard of the endurance of Job . And you have seen what the Lord has accomplished , for the Lord is full of compassion and mercy .
59005012	Most important , my brothers and sisters , never make a solemn pledge — neither by heaven nor earth , nor by anything else . Instead , speak with a simple " Yes " or " No , " or else you may fall under judgment .
59005013	If any of you are suffering , they should pray . If any of you are happy , they should sing .
59005014	If any of you are sick , they should call for the elders of the church , and the elders should pray over them , anointing them with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	Prayer that comes from faith will heal the sick , for the Lord will restore them to health . And if they have sinned , they will be forgiven .
59005016	For this reason , confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed . The prayer of the righteous person is powerful in what it can achieve .
59005017	Elijah was a person just like us . When he earnestly prayed that it wouldn’t rain , no rain fell for three and a half years .
59005018	He prayed again , God sent rain , and the earth produced its fruit .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , if any of you wander from the truth and someone turns back the wanderer ,
59005020	recognize that whoever brings a sinner back from the wrong path will save them from death and will bring about the forgiveness of many sins .
60001001	Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , To God’s chosen strangers in the world of the diaspora , who live in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	God the Father chose you because of what he knew beforehand . He chose you through the Holy Spirit’s work of making you holy and because of the faithful obedience and sacrifice of Jesus Christ . May God’s grace and peace be multiplied to you .
60001003	May the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ be blessed ! On account of his vast mercy , he has given us new birth . You have been born anew into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead .
60001004	You have a pure and enduring inheritance that cannot perish — an inheritance that is presently kept safe in heaven for you .
60001005	Through his faithfulness , you are guarded by God’s power so that you can receive the salvation he is ready to reveal in the last time .
60001006	You now rejoice in this hope , even if it’s necessary for you to be distressed for a short time by various trials .
60001007	This is necessary so that your faith may be found genuine . ( Your faith is more valuable than gold , which will be destroyed even though it is itself tested by fire . ) Your genuine faith will result in praise , glory , and honor for you when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001008	Although you’ve never seen him , you love him . Even though you don’t see him now , you trust him and so rejoice with a glorious joy that is too much for words .
60001009	You are receiving the goal of your faith : your salvation .
60001010	The prophets , who long ago foretold the grace that you’ve received , searched and explored , inquiring carefully about this salvation .
60001011	They wondered what the Spirit of Christ within them was saying when he bore witness beforehand about the suffering that would happen to Christ and the glory that would follow . They wondered what sort of person or what sort of time they were speaking about .
60001012	It was revealed to them that in their search they were not serving themselves but you . These things , which even angels long to examine , have now been proclaimed to you by those who brought you the good news . They did this in the power of the Holy Spirit , who was sent from heaven .
60001013	Therefore , once you have your minds ready for action and you are thinking clearly , place your hope completely on the grace that will be brought to you when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001014	Don’t be conformed to your former desires , those that shaped you when you were ignorant . But , as obedient children ,
60001015	you must be holy in every aspect of your lives , just as the one who called you is holy .
60001016	It is written , You will be holy , because I am holy .
60001017	Since you call upon a Father who judges all people according to their actions without favoritism , you should conduct yourselves with reverence during the time of your dwelling in a strange land .
60001018	Live in this way , knowing that you were not liberated by perishable things like silver or gold from the empty lifestyle you inherited from your ancestors .
60001019	Instead , you were liberated by the precious blood of Christ , like that of a flawless , spotless lamb .
60001020	Christ was chosen before the creation of the world , but was only revealed at the end of time . This was done for you ,
60001021	who through Christ are faithful to the God who raised him from the dead and gave him glory . So now , your faith and hope should rest in God .
60001022	As you set yourselves apart by your obedience to the truth so that you might have genuine affection for your fellow believers , love each other deeply and earnestly .
60001023	Do this because you have been given new birth — not from the type of seed that decays but from seed that doesn’t . This seed is God’s life-giving and enduring word .
60001024	Thus , All human life on the earth is like grass , and all human glory is like a flower in a field . The grass dries up and its flower falls off , This is the word that was proclaimed to you as good news .
60002001	Therefore , get rid of all ill will and all deceit , pretense , envy , and slander .
60002002	Instead , like a newborn baby , desire the pure milk of the word . Nourished by it , you will grow into salvation ,
60002003	since you have tasted that the Lord is good .
60002004	Now you are coming to him as to a living stone . Even though this stone was rejected by humans , from God’s perspective it is chosen , valuable .
60002005	You yourselves are being built like living stones into a spiritual temple . You are being made into a holy priesthood to offer up spiritual sacrifices that are acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	Thus it is written in scripture , Look ! I am laying a cornerstone in Zion , chosen , valuable . The person who believes in him will never be shamed .
60002007	So God honors you who believe . For those who refuse to believe , though , the stone the builders tossed aside has become the capstone .
60002008	This is a stone that makes people stumble and a rock that makes them fall . Because they refuse to believe in the word , they stumble . Indeed , this is the end to which they were appointed .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people who are God’s own possession . You have become this people so that you may speak of the wonderful acts of the one who called you out of darkness into his amazing light .
60002010	Once you weren’t a people , but now you are God’s people . Once you hadn’t received mercy , but now you have received mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , since you are immigrants and strangers in the world , I urge that you avoid worldly desires that wage war against your lives .
60002012	Live honorably among the unbelievers . Today , they defame you , as if you were doing evil . But in the day when God visits to judge they will glorify him , because they have observed your honorable deeds .
60002013	For the sake of the Lord submit to every human institution . Do this whether it means submitting to the emperor as supreme ruler ,
60002014	or to governors as those sent by the emperor . They are sent to punish those doing evil and to praise those doing good .
60002015	Submit to them because it’s God’s will that by doing good you will silence the ignorant talk of foolish people .
60002016	Do this as God’s slaves , and yet also as free people , not using your freedom as a cover-up for evil .
60002017	Honor everyone . Love the family of believers . Have respectful fear of God . Honor the emperor .
60002018	Household slaves , submit by accepting the authority of your masters with all respect . Do this not only to good and kind masters but also to those who are harsh .
60002019	Now , it is commendable if , because of one’s understanding of God , someone should endure pain through suffering unjustly .
60002020	But what praise comes from enduring patiently when you have sinned and are beaten for it ? But if you endure steadfastly when you’ve done good and suffer for it , this is commendable before God .
60002021	You were called to this kind of endurance , because Christ suffered on your behalf . He left you an example so that you might follow in his footsteps .
60002022	He committed no sin , nor did he ever speak in ways meant to deceive .
60002023	When he was insulted , he did not reply with insults . When he suffered , he did not threaten revenge . Instead , he entrusted himself to the one who judges justly .
60002024	He carried in his own body on the cross the sins we committed . He did this so that we might live in righteousness , having nothing to do with sin . By his wounds you were healed .
60002025	Though you were like straying sheep , you have now returned to the shepherd and guardian of your lives .
60003001	Wives , likewise , submit to your own husbands . Do this so that even if some of them refuse to believe the word , they may be won without a word by their wives’ way of life .
60003002	After all , they will have observed the reverent and holy manner of your lives .
60003003	Don’t try to make yourselves beautiful on the outside , with stylish hair or by wearing gold jewelry or fine clothes .
60003004	Instead , make yourselves beautiful on the inside , in your hearts , with the enduring quality of a gentle , peaceful spirit . This type of beauty is very precious in God’s eyes .
60003005	For it was in this way that holy women who trusted in God used to make themselves beautiful , accepting the authority of their own husbands .
60003006	For example , Sarah accepted Abraham’s authority when she called him master . You have become her children when you do good and don’t respond to threats with fear .
60003007	Husbands , likewise , submit by living with your wife in ways that honor her , knowing that she is the weaker partner . Honor her all the more , as she is also a coheir of the gracious care of life . Do this so that your prayers won’t be hindered .
60003008	Finally , all of you be of one mind , sympathetic , lovers of your fellow believers , compassionate , and modest in your opinion of yourselves .
60003009	Don’t pay back evil for evil or insult for insult . Instead , give blessing in return . You were called to do this so that you might inherit a blessing .
60003010	For those who want to love life and see good days should keep their tongue from evil speaking and their lips from speaking lies .
60003011	They should shun evil and do good ; seek peace and chase after it .
60003012	The Lord’s eyes are on the righteous and his ears are open to their prayers . But the Lord cannot tolerate those who do evil .
60003013	Who will harm you if you are zealous for good ?
60003014	But happy are you , even if you suffer because of righteousness ! Don’t be terrified or upset by them .
60003015	Instead , regard Christ as holy in your hearts . Whenever anyone asks you to speak of your hope , be ready to defend it .
60003016	Yet do this with respectful humility , maintaining a good conscience . Act in this way so that those who malign your good lifestyle in Christ may be ashamed when they slander you .
60003017	It is better to suffer for doing good ( if this could possibly be God’s will ) than for doing evil .
60003018	Christ himself suffered on account of sins , once for all , the righteous one on behalf of the unrighteous . He did this in order to bring you into the presence of God . Christ was put to death as a human , but made alive by the Spirit .
60003019	And it was by the Spirit that he went to preach to the spirits in prison .
60003020	In the past , these spirits were disobedient — when God patiently waited during the time of Noah . Noah built an ark in which a few ( that is , eight ) lives were rescued through water .
60003021	Baptism is like that . It saves you now — not because it removes dirt from your body but because it is the mark of a good conscience toward God . Your salvation comes through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who is at God’s right side . Now that he has gone into heaven , he rules over all angels , authorities , and powers .
60004001	Therefore , since Christ suffered as a human , you should also arm yourselves with his way of thinking . This is because whoever suffers is finished with sin .
60004002	As a result , they don’t live the rest of their human lives in ways determined by human desires but in ways determined by God’s will .
60004003	You have wasted enough time doing what unbelievers desire — living in their unrestrained immorality and lust , their drunkenness and excessive feasting and wild parties , and their forbidden worship of idols .
60004004	They think it’s strange that you don’t join in these activities with the same flood of unrestrained wickedness . So they slander you .
60004005	They will have to reckon with the one who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	Indeed , this is the reason the good news was also preached to the dead . This happened so that , although they were judged as humans according to human standards , they could live by the Spirit according to divine standards .
60004007	The end of everything has come . Therefore , be self-controlled and clearheaded so you can pray .
60004008	Above all , show sincere love to each other , because love brings about the forgiveness of many sins .
60004009	Open your homes to each other without complaining .
60004010	And serve each other according to the gift each person has received , as good managers of God’s diverse gifts .
60004011	Whoever speaks should do so as those who speak God’s word . Whoever serves should do so from the strength that God furnishes . Do this so that in everything God may be honored through Jesus Christ . To him be honor and power forever and always . Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , don’t be surprised about the fiery trials that have come among you to test you . These are not strange happenings .
60004013	Instead , rejoice as you share Christ’s suffering . You share his suffering now so that you may also have overwhelming joy when his glory is revealed .
60004014	If you are mocked because of Christ’s name , you are blessed , for the Spirit of glory — indeed , the Spirit of God — rests on you .
60004015	Now none of you should suffer as a murderer or thief or evildoer or rebel .
60004016	But don’t be ashamed if you suffer as one who belongs to Christ . Rather , honor God as you bear Christ’s name . Give honor to God ,
60004017	because it’s time for judgment to begin with God’s own household . But if judgment starts with us , what will happen to those who refuse to believe God’s good news ?
60004018	If the righteous are barely rescued , what will happen to the godless and sinful ?
60004019	So then , those who suffer because they follow God’s will should commit their lives to a trustworthy creator by doing what is right .
60005001	Therefore , I have a request for the elders among you . ( I ask this as a fellow elder and a witness of Christ’s sufferings , and as one who shares in the glory that is about to be revealed . ) I urge the elders :
60005002	Like shepherds , tend the flock of God among you . Watch over it . Don’t shepherd because you must , but do it voluntarily for God . Don’t shepherd greedily , but do it eagerly .
60005003	Don’t shepherd by ruling over those entrusted to your care , but become examples to the flock .
60005004	And when the chief shepherd appears , you will receive an unfading crown of glory .
60005005	In the same way , I urge you who are younger : accept the authority of the elders . And everyone , clothe yourselves with humility toward each other . God stands against the proud , but he gives favor to the humble .
60005006	Therefore , humble yourselves under God’s power so that he may raise you up in the last day .
60005007	Throw all your anxiety onto him , because he cares about you .
60005008	Be clearheaded . Keep alert . Your accuser , the devil , is on the prowl like a roaring lion , seeking someone to devour .
60005009	Resist him , standing firm in the faith . Do so in the knowledge that your fellow believers are enduring the same suffering throughout the world .
60005010	After you have suffered for a little while , the God of all grace , the one who called you into his eternal glory in Christ Jesus , will himself restore , empower , strengthen , and establish you .
60005011	To him be power forever and always . Amen .
60005012	I have written and sent these few lines to you by Silvanus . I consider him to be a faithful brother . In these lines I have urged and affirmed that this is the genuine grace of God . Stand firm in it .
60005013	The fellow-elect church in Babylon greets you , and so does my son Mark .
60005014	Greet each other with the kiss of love . Peace to you all who are in Christ .
61001001	From Simon Peter , a slave and apostle of Jesus Christ . To those who received a faith equal to ours through the justice of our God and savior Jesus Christ .
61001002	May you have more and more grace and peace through the knowledge of God and Jesus our Lord .
61001003	By his divine power the Lord has given us everything we need for life and godliness through the knowledge of the one who called us by his own honor and glory .
61001004	Through his honor and glory he has given us his precious and wonderful promises , that you may share the divine nature and escape from the world’s immorality that sinful craving produces .
61001005	This is why you must make every effort to add moral excellence to your faith ; and to moral excellence , knowledge ;
61001006	and to knowledge , self-control ; and to self-control , endurance ; and to endurance , godliness ;
61001007	and to godliness , affection for others ; and to affection for others , love .
61001008	If all these are yours and they are growing in you , they’ll keep you from becoming inactive and unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	Whoever lacks these things is shortsighted and blind , forgetting that they were cleansed from their past sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers and sisters , be eager to confirm your call and election . Do this and you will never ever be lost .
61001011	In this way you will receive a rich welcome into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	So I’ll keep reminding you about these things , although you already know them and stand secure in the truth you have .
61001013	I think it’s right that I keep stirring up your memory , as long as I’m alive .
61001014	After all , our Lord Jesus Christ has shown me that I am about to depart from this life .
61001015	I’m eager for you always to remember these things after my death .
61001016	We didn’t repeat crafty myths when we told you about the powerful coming of our Lord Jesus Christ . Quite the contrary , we witnessed his majesty with our own eyes .
61001017	He received honor and glory from God the Father when a voice came to him from the magnificent glory , saying , " This is my dearly loved Son , with whom I am well-pleased . "
61001018	We ourselves heard this voice from heaven while we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	In addition , we have a most reliable prophetic word , and you would do well to pay attention to it , just as you would to a lamp shining in a dark place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts .
61001020	Most important , you must know that no prophecy of scripture represents the prophet’s own understanding of things ,
61001021	because no prophecy ever came by human will . Instead , men and women led by the Holy Spirit spoke from God .
61002001	But false prophets also arose among the people . In the same way , false teachers will come among you . They will introduce destructive opinions and deny the master who bought them , bringing quick destruction on themselves .
61002002	Many will follow them in their unrestrained immorality , and because of these false teachers the way of truth will be slandered .
61002003	In their greed they will take advantage of you with lies . The judgment pronounced against them long ago hasn’t fallen idle , nor is their destruction sleeping .
61002004	God didn’t spare the angels when they sinned but cast them into the lowest level of the underworld and committed them to chains of darkness , keeping them there until the judgment .
61002005	And he didn’t spare the ancient world when he brought a flood on the world of ungodly people , even though he protected Noah , a preacher of righteousness , along with seven others .
61002006	God condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah to total destruction , reducing them to ashes as a warning to ungodly people .
61002007	And he rescued righteous Lot , who was made miserable by the unrestrained immorality of unruly people . (
61002008	While that righteous man lived among them he felt deep distress every day on account of the immoral actions he saw and heard . )
61002009	These things show that the Lord knows how to rescue the godly from their trials , and how to keep the unrighteous for punishment on the Judgment Day .
61002010	This is especially true for those who follow after the corrupt cravings of the sinful nature and defy the Lord’s authority . These reckless , brash people aren’t afraid to insult the glorious ones ,
61002011	yet angels , who are stronger and more powerful , don’t use insults when pronouncing the Lord’s judgment on them .
61002012	These false teachers are like irrational animals , mere creatures of instinct , born to be captured and destroyed . They slander what they don’t understand and , like animals , they will be destroyed .
61002013	In this way , they will receive payment for their wrongdoing . They even enjoy unruly parties in broad daylight . They are blots and blemishes , taking delight in their seductive pleasures while feasting with you .
61002014	They are always looking for someone with whom to commit adultery . They are always on the lookout for opportunities to sin . They ensnare people whose faith is weak . They have hearts trained in greed . They are under God’s curse .
61002015	Leaving the straight path , they have gone off course , following the way of Balaam son of Bosor , who loved the payment of doing wrong .
61002016	But Balaam was rebuked for his wrongdoing . A donkey , which has no voice , spoke with a human voice and put a stop to the prophet’s madness .
61002017	These false teachers are springs without water , mists driven by the wind . The underworld has been reserved for them .
61002018	With empty , self-important speech , they use sinful cravings and unrestrained immorality to ensnare people who have only just escaped life with those who have wandered from the truth .
61002019	These false teachers promise freedom , but they themselves are slaves of immorality ; whatever overpowers you , enslaves you .
61002020	If people escape the moral filth of this world through the knowledge of our Lord and savior Jesus Christ , then get tangled up in it again and are overcome by it , they are worse off than they were before .
61002021	It would be better for them never to have known the way of righteousness than , having come to know it , to turn back from the holy commandment entrusted to them .
61002022	They demonstrate the truth of the proverb : " A dog returns to its own vomit , and a washed sow wallows in the mud . "
61003001	My dear friends , this is now my second letter to you . I have written both letters to stir up your sincere understanding with a reminder .
61003002	I want you to recall what the holy prophets foretold as well as what the Lord and savior commanded through your apostles .
61003003	Most important , know this : in the last days scoffers will come , jeering , living by their own cravings ,
61003004	and saying , " Where is the promise of his coming ? After all , nothing has changed — not since the beginning of creation , nor even since the ancestors died . "
61003005	But they fail to notice that , by God’s word , heaven and earth were formed long ago out of water and by means of water .
61003006	And it was through these that the world of that time was flooded and destroyed .
61003007	But by the same word , heaven and earth are now held in reserve for fire , kept for the Judgment Day and destruction of ungodly people .
61003008	Don’t let it escape your notice , dear friends , that with the Lord a single day is like a thousand years and a thousand years are like a single day .
61003009	The Lord isn’t slow to keep his promise , as some think of slowness , but he is patient toward you , not wanting anyone to perish but all to change their hearts and lives .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief . On that day the heavens will pass away with a dreadful noise , the elements will be consumed by fire , and the earth and all the works done on it will be exposed .
61003011	Since everything will be destroyed in this way , what sort of people ought you to be ? You must live holy and godly lives ,
61003012	waiting for and hastening the coming day of God . Because of that day , the heavens will be destroyed by fire and the elements will melt away in the flames .
61003013	But according to his promise we are waiting for a new heaven and a new earth , where righteousness is at home .
61003014	Therefore , dear friends , while you are waiting for these things to happen , make every effort to be found by him in peace — pure and faultless .
