61003015	Consider the patience of our Lord to be salvation , just as our dear friend and brother Paul wrote to you according to the wisdom given to him ,
61003016	speaking of these things in all his letters . Some of his remarks are hard to understand , and people who are ignorant and whose faith is weak twist them to their own destruction , just as they do the other scriptures .
61003017	Therefore , dear friends , since you have been warned in advance , be on guard so that you aren’t led off course into the error of sinful people , and lose your own safe position .
61003018	Instead , grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and savior Jesus Christ . To him belongs glory now and forever . Amen .
62001001	We announce to you what existed from the beginning , what we have heard , what we have seen with our eyes , what we have seen and our hands handled , about the word of life .
62001002	The life was revealed , and we have seen , and we testify and announce to you the eternal life that was with the Father and was revealed to us .
62001003	What we have seen and heard , we also announce it to you so that you can have fellowship with us . Our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	We are writing these things so that our joy can be complete .
62001005	This is the message that we have heard from him and announce to you : " God is light and there is no darkness in him at all . "
62001006	If we claim , " We have fellowship with him , " and live in the darkness , we are lying and do not act truthfully .
62001007	But if we live in the light in the same way as he is in the light , we have fellowship with each other , and the blood of Jesus , his Son , cleanses us from every sin .
62001008	If we claim , " We don’t have any sin , " we deceive ourselves and the truth is not in us .
62001009	But if we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and cleanse us from everything we’ve done wrong .
62001010	If we claim , " We have never sinned , " we make him a liar and his word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , I’m writing these things to you so that you don’t sin . But if you do sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous one .
62002002	He is God’s way of dealing with our sins , not only ours but the sins of the whole world .
62002003	This is how we know that we know him : if we keep his commandments .
62002004	The one who claims , " I know him , " while not keeping his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in this person .
62002005	But the love of God is truly perfected in whoever keeps his word . This is how we know we are in him .
62002006	The one who claims to remain in him ought to live in the same way as he lived .
62002007	Dear friends , I’m not writing a new commandment to you , but an old commandment that you had from the beginning . The old commandment is the message you heard .
62002008	On the other hand , I am writing a new commandment to you , which is true in him and in you , because the darkness is passing away and the true light already shines .
62002009	The one who claims to be in the light while hating a brother or sister is in the darkness even now .
62002010	The person loving a brother and sister stays in the light , and there is nothing in the light that causes a person to stumble .
62002011	But the person who hates a brother or sister is in the darkness and lives in the darkness , and doesn’t know where to go because the darkness blinds the eyes .
62002012	Little children , I’m writing to you because your sins have been forgiven through Jesus’ name .
62002013	Parents , I’m writing to you because you have known the one who has existed from the beginning . Young people , I’m writing to you because you have conquered the evil one .
62002014	Little children , I write to you because you know the Father . Parents , I write to you because you have known the one who has existed from the beginning . Young people , I write to you because you are strong , the word of God remains in you , and you have conquered the evil one .
62002015	Don’t love the world or the things in the world . If anyone loves the world , the love of the Father is not in them .
62002016	Everything that is in the world — the craving for whatever the body feels , the craving for whatever the eyes see and the arrogant pride in one’s possessions — is not of the Father but is of the world .
62002017	And the world and its cravings are passing away , but the person who does the will of God remains forever .
62002018	Little children , it is the last hour . Just as you have heard that the antichrist is coming , so now many antichrists have appeared . This is how we know it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us , but they were not really part of us . If they had been part of us , they would have stayed with us . But by going out from us , they showed they all are not part of us .
62002020	But you have an anointing from the holy one , and all of you know the truth .
62002021	I don’t write to you because you don’t know the truth but because you know it . You know that no lie comes from the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar ? Isn’t it the person who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This person is the antichrist : the one who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	Everyone who denies the Son does not have the Father , but the one who confesses the Son has the Father also .
62002024	As for you , what you heard from the beginning must remain in you . If what you heard from the beginning remains in you , you will also remain in relationship to the Son and in the Father .
62002025	This is the promise that he himself gave us : eternal life .
62002026	I write these things to you about those who are attempting to deceive you .
62002027	As for you , the anointing that you received from him remains on you , and you don’t need anyone to teach you the truth . But since his anointing teaches you about all things ( it’s true and not a lie ) , remain in relationship to him just as he taught you .
62002028	And now , little children , remain in relationship to Jesus , so that when he appears we can have confidence and not be ashamed in front of him when he comes .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous , you also know that every person who practices righteousness is born from him .
62003001	See what kind of love the Father has given to us in that we should be called God’s children , and that is what we are ! Because the world didn’t recognize him , it doesn’t recognize us .
62003002	Dear friends , now we are God’s children , and it hasn’t yet appeared what we will be . We know that when he appears we will be like him because we’ll see him as he is .
62003003	And everyone who has this hope in him purifies himself even as he is pure .
62003004	Every person who practices sin commits an act of rebellion , and sin is rebellion .
62003005	You know that he appeared to take away sins , and there is no sin in him .
62003006	Every person who remains in relationship to him does not sin . Any person who sins has not seen him or known him .
62003007	Little children , make sure no one deceives you . The person who practices righteousness is righteous , in the same way that Jesus is righteous .
62003008	The person who practices sin belongs to the devil , because the devil has been sinning since the beginning . God’s Son appeared for this purpose : to destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Those born from God don’t practice sin because God’s DNA remains in them . They can’t sin because they are born from God .
62003010	This is how God’s children and the devil’s children are apparent : everyone who doesn’t practice righteousness is not from God , including the person who doesn’t love a brother or sister .
62003011	This is the message that you heard from the beginning : love each other .
62003012	Don’t behave like Cain , who belonged to the evil one and murdered his brother . And why did he kill him ? He killed him because his own works were evil , but the works of his brother were righteous .
62003013	Don’t be surprised , brothers and sisters , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have transferred from death to life , because we love the brothers and sisters . The person who does not love remains in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates a brother or sister is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has eternal life residing in him .
62003016	This is how we know love : Jesus laid down his life for us , and we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers and sisters .
62003017	But if a person has material possessions and sees a brother or sister in need and that person doesn’t care — how can the love of God remain in him ?
62003018	Little children , let’s not love with words or speech but with action and truth .
62003019	This is how we will know that we belong to the truth and reassure our hearts in God’s presence .
62003020	Even if our hearts condemn us , God is greater than our hearts and knows all things .
62003021	Dear friends , if our hearts don’t condemn us , we have confidence in relationship to God .
62003022	We receive whatever we ask from him because we keep his commandments and do what pleases him .
62003023	This is his commandment , that we believe in the name of his Son , Jesus Christ , and love each other as he commanded us .
62003024	The person who keeps his commandments remains in God and God remains in him ; and this is how we know that he remains in us , because of the Spirit that he has given to us .
62004001	Dear friends , don’t believe every spirit . Test the spirits to see if they are from God because many false prophets have gone into the world .
62004002	This is how you know if a spirit comes from God : every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come as a human is from God ,
62004003	and every spirit that doesn’t confess Jesus is not from God . This is the spirit of the antichrist , which you have heard is coming and is now already in the world .
62004004	You are from God , little children , and you have defeated these people because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world .
62004005	They are from the world . So they speak from the world’s point of view and the world listens to them .
62004006	We are from God . The person who knows God listens to us . Whoever is not from God doesn’t listen to us . This is how we recognize the Spirit of truth and the spirit of error .
62004007	Dear friends , let’s love each other , because love is from God , and everyone who loves is born from God and knows God .
62004008	The person who doesn’t love does not know God , because God is love .
62004009	This is how the love of God is revealed to us : God has sent his only Son into the world so that we can live through him .
62004010	This is love : it is not that we loved God but that he loved us and sent his Son as the sacrifice that deals with our sins .
62004011	Dear friends , if God loved us this way , we also ought to love each other .
62004012	No one has ever seen God . If we love each other , God remains in us and his love is made perfect in us .
62004013	This is how we know we remain in him and he remains in us , because he has given us a measure of his Spirit .
62004014	We have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son to be the savior of the world .
62004015	If any of us confess that Jesus is God’s Son , God remains in us and we remain in God .
62004016	We have known and have believed the love that God has for us . God is love , and those who remain in love remain in God and God remains in them .
62004017	This is how love has been perfected in us , so that we can have confidence on the Judgment Day , because we are exactly the same as God is in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love , but perfect love drives out fear , because fear expects punishment . The person who is afraid has not been made perfect in love .
62004019	We love because God first loved us .
62004020	If anyone says , I love God , and hates a brother or sister , he is a liar , because the person who doesn’t love a brother or sister who can be seen can’t love God , who can’t be seen .
62004021	This commandment we have from him : Those who claim to love God ought to love their brother and sister also .
62005001	Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born from God . Whoever loves someone who is a parent loves the child born to the parent .
62005002	This is how we know that we love the children of God : when we love God and keep God’s commandments .
62005003	This is the love of God : we keep God’s commandments . God’s commandments are not difficult ,
62005004	because everyone who is born from God defeats the world . And this is the victory that has defeated the world : our faith .
62005005	Who defeats the world ? Isn’t it the one who believes that Jesus is God’s Son ?
62005006	This is the one who came by water and blood : Jesus Christ . Not by water only but by water and blood . And the Spirit is the one who testifies , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	The three are testifying —
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the blood — and the three are united in agreement .
62005009	If we receive human testimony , God’s testimony is greater , because this is what God testified : he has testified about his Son .
62005010	The one who believes in God’s Son has the testimony within ; the one who doesn’t believe God has made God a liar , because that one has not believed the testimony that God gave about his Son .
62005011	And this is the testimony : God gave eternal life to us , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	The one who has the Son has life . The one who doesn’t have God’s Son does not have life .
62005013	I write these things to you who believe in the name of God’s Son so that you can know that you have eternal life .
62005014	This is the confidence that we have in our relationship with God : If we ask for anything in agreement with his will , he listens to us .

66020006	Favored and holy are those who have a share in the first resurrection . The second death has no power over them , but they will be priests of God and of Christ , and will rule with him for one thousand years .
66020007	When the thousand years are over , Satan will be released from his prison .
66020008	He will go out to deceive the nations that are at the four corners of the earth — Gog and Magog . He will gather them for battle . Their number is like the sand of the sea .
66020009	They came up across the whole earth and surrounded the saints’ camp , the city that God loves . But fire came down from heaven and consumed them .
66020010	Then the devil , who had deceived them , was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur , where the beast and the false prophet also were . There painful suffering will be inflicted upon them day and night , forever and always .
66020011	Then I saw a great white throne and the one who is seated on it . Before his face both earth and heaven fled away , and no place was found for them .
66020012	I saw the dead , the great and the small , standing before the throne , and scrolls were opened . Another scroll was opened too ; this is the scroll of life . And the dead were judged on the basis of what was written in the scrolls about what they had done .
66020013	The sea gave up the dead that were in it , and Death and the Grave gave up the dead that were in them , and people were judged by what they had done .
66020014	Then Death and the Grave were thrown into the fiery lake . This , the fiery lake , is the second death .
66020015	Then anyone whose name wasn’t found written in the scroll of life was thrown into the fiery lake .
66021001	Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth , for the former heaven and the former earth had passed away , and the sea was no more .
66021002	I saw the holy city , New Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God , made ready as a bride beautifully dressed for her husband .
66021003	I heard a loud voice from the throne say , " Look ! God’s dwelling is here with humankind . He will dwell with them , and they will be his peoples . God himself will be with them as their God .
66021004	He will wipe away every tear from their eyes . Death will be no more . There will be no mourning , crying , or pain anymore , for the former things have passed away . "
66021005	Then the one seated on the throne said , " Look ! I’m making all things new . " He also said , " Write this down , for these words are trustworthy and true . "
66021006	Then he said to me , " All is done . I am the Alpha and the Omega , the beginning and the end . To the thirsty I will freely give water from the life-giving spring .
66021007	Those who emerge victorious will inherit these things . I will be their God , and they will be my sons and daughters .
66021008	But for the cowardly , the faithless , the vile , the murderers , those who commit sexual immorality , those who use drugs and cast spells , the idolaters and all liars — their share will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur . This is the second death . "
66021009	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven last plagues spoke with me . " Come , " he said , " I will show you the bride , the Lamb’s wife . "
66021010	He took me in a Spirit-inspired trance to a great , high mountain , and he showed me the holy city , Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God .
66021011	The city had God’s glory . Its brilliance was like a priceless jewel , like jasper that was as clear as crystal .
66021012	It had a great high wall with twelve gates . By the gates were twelve angels , and on the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of Israel’s sons .
66021013	There were three gates on the east , three gates on the north , three gates on the south , and three gates on the west .
66021014	The city wall had twelve foundations , and on them were the twelve names of the Lamb’s twelve apostles .
66021015	The angel who spoke to me had a gold measuring rod with which to measure the city , its gates , and its wall .
66021016	Now the city was laid out as a square . Its length was the same as its width . He measured the city with the rod , and it was fifteen hundred miles . Its length and width and height were equal .
66021017	He also measured the thickness of its wall . It was two hundred sixteen feet thick , as a person — or rather , an angel — measures things .
66021018	The wall was built of jasper , and the city was pure gold , like pure glass .
66021019	The city wall’s foundations were decorated with every kind of jewel . The first foundation was jasper , the second was sapphire , the third was chalcedony , and the fourth was emerald .
66021020	The fifth was sardonyx , the sixth was carnelian , the seventh was chrysolite , and the eighth was beryl . The ninth was topaz , the tenth was chrysoprase , the eleventh was jacinth , and the twelfth was amethyst .
66021021	The twelve gates were twelve pearls ; each one of the gates was made from a single pearl . And the city’s main street was pure gold , as transparent as glass .
66021022	I didn’t see a temple in the city , because its temple is the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb .
66021023	The city doesn’t need the sun or the moon to shine on it , because God’s glory is its light , and its lamp is the Lamb .
66021024	The nations will walk by its light , and the kings of the earth will bring their glory into it .
66021025	Its gates will never be shut by day , and there will be no night there .
66021026	They will bring the glory and honor of the nations into it .
66021027	Nothing unclean will ever enter it , nor anyone who does what is vile and deceitful , but only those who are registered in the Lamb’s scroll of life .
66022001	Then the angel showed me the river of life-giving water , shining like crystal , flowing from the throne of God and the Lamb
66022002	through the middle of the city’s main street . On each side of the river is the tree of life , which produces twelve crops of fruit , bearing its fruit each month . The tree’s leaves are for the healing of the nations .
66022003	There will no longer be any curse . The throne of God and the Lamb will be in it , and his servants will worship him .
66022004	They will see his face , and his name will be on their foreheads .
66022005	Night will be no more . They won’t need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun , for the Lord God will shine on them , and they will rule forever and always .
66022006	Then he said to me , “ These words are trustworthy and true . The Lord , the God of the spirits of the prophets , sent his angel to show his servants what must soon take place .
66022007	" Look ! I’m coming soon . Favored is the one who keeps the words of the prophecy contained in this scroll . "
66022008	I , John , am the one who heard and saw these things . When I heard and saw them , I fell down to worship at the feet of the angel who had shown them to me .
66022009	But he said to me , " Don’t do that ! I’m a servant just like you and your brothers and sisters , the prophets , and those who keep the words of this scroll . Worship God ! "
66022010	Then he said to me , " Don’t seal up the words of the prophecy contained in this scroll , because the time is near .
66022011	Let those who do wrong keep doing what is wrong . Let the filthy still be filthy . Let those who are righteous keep doing what is right . Let those who are holy still be holy .
66022012	" Look ! I’m coming soon . My reward is with me , to repay all people as their actions deserve .
66022013	I am the alpha and the omega , the first and the last , the beginning and the end .
66022014	Favored are those who wash their robes so that they may have the right of access to the tree of life and may enter the city by the gates .
66022015	Outside are the dogs , the drug users and spell-casters , those who commit sexual immorality , the murderers , the idolaters , and all who love and practice deception .
66022016	" I , Jesus , have sent my angel to bear witness to all of you about these things for the churches . I’m the root and descendant of David , the bright morning star .
66022017	The Spirit and the bride say , ‘ Come ! ’ Let the one who hears say , ‘ Come ! ’ And let the one who is thirsty come ! Let the one who wishes receive life-giving water as a gift . "
66022018	Now I bear witness to everyone who hears the words of the prophecy contained in this scroll : If anyone adds to them , God will add to that person the plagues that are written in this scroll .
66022019	If anyone takes away from the words of this scroll of prophecy , God will take away that person’s share in the tree of life and the holy city , which are described in this scroll .
66022020	The one who bears witness to these things says , " Yes , I’m coming soon . " Amen . Come , Lord Jesus !
66022021	The grace of the Lord Jesus be with all .
